item.text: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thegs
pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'isIng po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sas rgyas dang/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems/
sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan
sa bdag la sprul pa du mchen po'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i 'khor lo zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs chen po smon cing/ bgyi ba
thams cad mngon por 'grub par bgyi ba mchis hU~M/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos badrag gras
bshad par gnangan/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can thams cud la sman par bgyi ba'i slad
du bshad par 'tshal lags so// de ci'i slad du zhan/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni gzi byin chen po'i ma
dang ldan pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen po dang/ yid bzhin gyi sngon shing bzhin du smon pa thams cad yos
su rdzogs par bgyid pas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyod kyis snying brtse ba'i phyir sems can gyi chad du 'di ltar zhus
pas na/ khyod thogs pa med pa'i gzu sa 'di bshad par gnang bar bya'o// byang chub sems dwapa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de/
ltar gnang ba dang/ las nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas slar stan la 'dug ste// sems rtsa gcig tu 'khor 'dus pa dag la rnamaM par
blta nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sams kyis sngags 'dismras so// mo tA/
ya ma hAsatAyaMmahAkAru TikAye/tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra pa titsin+ta ma Nim hApad+maru pa tiSh+Thati/ badzrab+har/ A ke ra ye hUM swAhA/ 'din lus

kyi sngags so// oM pany+tse/ tsanam Ni/ ma swA ba dzra b+harAhU~M/ 'di ni snying po'i sngags so// oM byu ra ta pad+mehU~M/ 'dan snying gi snying po'i sngaglu lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang/ sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yosaparagyur lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i khang khyim rnams kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyang shin tu skrag cing 'jigs
pa chen po skyas bar gyur/ bdud kyi rgyal po'i gzhal med khang yang rab tu 'bar bar gyur/ gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin ma rungs pa gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang dngang zhing stag pas gdong bkab ste
sa la 'gyel bar gyur/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad phye nas sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnam par thar te lha'i bde ba mchog myong bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha rnams kyis kyang rin po che'i
ma tog dang/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab par gyur/ lha'i rol mo rnams kyang bar snang la sgrasnatshog byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas
par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ rigs kyi bu
khyod sems can la brtsi ba'i phyi'i gzungs 'di bshad pa nyid kyis sems can rnams kyis phan yon chen po thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa
brjodo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi
rgyal po chen po 'gazungs 'di'i tshog shod cig denas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/
rags kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slongam 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsAnam ram/ khye'u 'amo/ bumo gzhon nu gang la la zhig gis tshe 'di nyid la rnam par smin ba man du myong bar
'tshal na/ gdugasamtshan sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis gzungs 'di ma skyod par bgyis te/ gdugs dang dus mi 'dam par gtsang yang rung mi gtsang ba nga rung ste/ g.yar ton du bzlas bar
gyuran bgyi ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ ci'ang rung ste don du bgyi zhingaganyer ba zhig mchis na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na don brgya stong du ma 'grub par 'gyur bas/ rig

sngags gzhan gang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di dang bskrun par bzod pa gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'das pa dang da ltar gyi las ngan pa dang sgrib pa lci ba rnams rab tu 'joms pas so/
gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bzlas brjod bgyis namanar ma mchis pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs dag kyang thar par 'gyur la/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyang 'byang
bar 'gyuran/ las ngan pa dang/ gdon bgegs dang/ bro nad gzhan thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag rims nad nyin gcug pa dang/ nyin gnyis ba dang/ nyin gsum pa dang/
nyin bzhi pa dang/ nyin mtshan du bro 'tshal ba 'am/ rlung ngam/ mkhris pa 'am/ ban kan la sogs pas bro 'tshal ba dag la rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis par gyur na thams cad 'byung zhing sos
par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig dug dang byad stems kyis thog par gyur tam/ lhog pa 'am/ g.yan pa 'am/ mtshand dam/ phol mig gam rlung nad dam/ smos pa 'am/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba
'am rna ba dang/ sna dang/ mchu dang/ lce dang/ med pa dang/ kha la dang/ gdong dang/ gtsug dang/ klad rgyas dang/ brang dang/ rtsib logs dang/ snying dang/ lto ba dang/ rked pa dang/ rgyab dang/
rkyang pa dang/ lag ba la sogs pa thams cad bro 'tshal ba'agyurana' thams cad sos par bgyid/ ji tsam du lus kyi bro nad ci mchis pa thams cad kyang sos bar bgyid lags so// gno sbyin dang/
srin po dang/ ba nam ka dang/ bdud sdig can dang/ 'dre gdon dag gis kyang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/ mtshon cha dang/ dmag tshogs dang/ chab dang/ zhugs dang/ rlung dang/
char pa dang/ ser ba ma rungs pa dag gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// dgra dang/ chom rkun dang/ rgyal po ma rungs pa dang/ rkun pom rungs pa dag gis kyang gnod
par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// blo bur du 'chiba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rmi lam na pa rma bar mi 'gyur/ rtsangs pa dang/ sbrul dang/ sdig pa dang/ srin bu gyi med dang/
rkang mangs dang/ gcan gzan gdug pa ma rungs pa dang/ sengag dang/ stag dang/ spyang ki dag gis kyang gnod par bgyud par mi 'gyur lags so// g.yul ngor 'thab pa'i tshe thams
cad du rgyal bar 'gyur lags so// gal te bla 'a bgyi ba dag gis rtsod par gyur na'ang 'dum par 'gyur te/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlosan gong du bstan pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin
du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig gis gdugs re gzungs 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di
skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyodag 'jigs shig/ ci zhig smon tsang su zhig yongs su gnyer bar byed/ thams cad khyod la sbyin no zhes bsgo bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpog med kyang
sku mngon du ston par 'gyur/ mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bkod pa'i dngos po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi byang chub
zab sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga gnasar po
za la'ang mthong bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyis lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur bas/rtag par rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis bkur zhir ma gro bgyid par 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos byams shing
bkur bar 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du ma'i mngal du mi skye zhing bta'i steng du skyo bar 'gyur/ bkod pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'gyur/
'dinas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nam yang ngan 'gro rnams su ma lhung zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur lags te/ 'di na sdig pa'i las thams cad rnam par
joms pa'i gzungs zhes bgyi ba lags so// sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//de nas byang chub dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ yang yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying po'i gzungs gsang ba'i chog bstan pa su'ang rung ba gces pa'i don grub pa zhig mchis na/ thams cad rang zhi bar
'gyur lags go/ de'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi nor dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gang lags pa'o// de la 'jig rten pa'i nor ni gser dang dngul la sogs
pa'i rin po che rnams so// 'jig rten las 'das ba'i nor ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi bkod pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing/ lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang/ skye bo
mang pos byams shing bkur ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang/ byams pa'i sems rgyas nas blo dang ldan pa rnams bde ba stsol ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phel
zhing mthu stobs rtas pa gang lags pa'i// gsang ba'i mdzod kyi spyod yul 'a ni gzhan dag la brjod par mi bgyi'o// gang la la zhig khadag gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dngos grub
mchog thob par 'tshal na/ sems rtse gcig tudus thams cad dang gnas thams cad du gtsang yang rung ma gtsang yang rung ste/ rtag par bzlas brjod bgyis na nongs ba ci'ang ma mchis pas ba zlos
brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyis nas/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming dang/ yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi ming dang/ gang zag de'i ming nA
brjod de/ gal te rgyal po 'am/rgyal bu 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ sus sam/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gdol pa 'am/ skyes pa
'am bud med dam/ khye'u ma/ bumo gzhon nu ma 'am/ mu stegs sna tshogs dag la brten cing mdza' bar 'tshal na/ de dag gi ming nas brjod de rtag par tho rangs kyi tsho bzlas pa'i gra=
tshang bar bgyi'o/ gal te dngos grub mtshog gnyer zhing rgyal po la brten par 'tshal na/ dgung zhag bdun gyi bar du rtag par tho rangs kyi tshilan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na mjal bar 'gyur lags
so gal te btsun mo la brten par 'tshal na lan dgu brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal bu la brten 'tshalan lan brgyad brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// sus dag mthong bar 'tshal na lan bdun brgya
bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal po'i bu mo la brten bar 'tshalan lan drug bsgrubazla bar bgyi'o// bram ze la brten bar 'atshel na lan lnga brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// rgyal rigs la brten par
'tshal na lan bzhi brgya bzla bar bgyi'o// dmangs rigs lan sum brgya'o// gdol pa lan nyis brgya'o// dge slong dang dug slong ma lan lan khargya'o// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la
na lan dgu bcu'o// khye'u gzhon nu dang bu mo gzhon nu ma la na lan drug bcu'o// 'di na brten cing mdza' bar bgyi ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ste/ nor dang/ khron dang/ rta dang/ bde ba'i yo
byad thams cad 'byor par bgyid lags so// gang la la zhig snying du sdug na mdza' ba dag ring bon mchi ba dang mjal bar 'tshalan/ yid la bsams pa bzhin rlung bzhin du mchi bar
'gyur lags so// ci bgyi'o 'tshal bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar gyur na don de dag 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug mthong bar 'tshal na lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlos brjod bgyis na/ de'i lus yang dag pa nyid mtho bzhi ng bsam pa thams cad rdzograpar bgyid lags so// gal te/
lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na bzlas brjod lan khri bgyis na lus mngon sum du bstan nas/ de la brtse zhing phas bu la byams pa bzhin du sems kyi smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur
lags so/ gal te sangs rgyas dang 'khor 'dus pa mang po mthong bar 'tshal na lan khri sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gal ti gdugasamtshan
bdun gyi bar du rgyan chad pa ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang rnams mngon sum du ston cing/ so so nas rang rang gi sngags kyi mthu ci mchis pa gang de la stsal nas yongs su
srung bar bgyid do/ zhag bdun pa la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po rnams 'khor dang bcas te mchis nas de'i son ba rnams sol bar
bgyid do// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga gong du bstan pa bzhin du bgyis na smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid de/ 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i
a mdzod las/ thams cad byams shing mos par 'gyur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod las// thams cad byams
nga mos par 'gyur ba'i tshog 'i le'u ste gnyis pa 'o////denas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i
phyir/ gang gis mthong ba dag byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sbyar nas lus la thogs te 'gro na mchog tu mngon par 'grub cing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i cho ga bstan pa/
gi'u wang dang/ tsan dan dkar po dang/ gur kum dang/ ga bur dang/ gla rtsi dang/ dzA ti pha la dang/ la shi dang/ ka ko la dang/ bar dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ gser gyi gyim pag rnams cha
mnyam par bgyis te brdungs nas sbrang rtsi dkar pos smras te/ snga ma'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas lus la bdugs sam/ gos la bdugs sam/ mag la bskus sam/ dpral
ba la thig le bgyis sam/lus la byugs na rgyal bo dang/ btsun mo dang/ blon po rnams dang/ bran rnams dang/ skyes pa dang/ budamed la sogs pa byams shing dgA ba dang/ lam gyi chos la
bkur zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed so/ lus kyi zhog dang nor rdzas dag 'phangs ba ma mchis par gtong zhing rim gro bgyid par 'gyur te brjod kyis ma lang lags so// ji ltar nyi zla thams cad kyis
mthong bar mos pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i don rnams 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig sman 'di thogs par gyur na khon ma tho ba'i sgrib ba rnams zhu byang nas bgegs thams cad
las thar bar 'gyur lags so// rgyal po'i mthus nan gyis 'brog pa dang/ chab kyis ded pa dang/ zhugs kyis tshig pa dang/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ dug dang/ 'ching ba'i
nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags so/ bsam pa thag banas sman sa ka ta sbyor ba'i tshog 'di bgyis na thams cad kyis byams shing dga' bar 'gyur lags so// sman 'dis bdugs
pas bab col du gsar khor stsal bar bgyis/ 'don spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman gyi tshog zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan
tsha ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ gzhan dag la byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman sa ka ta sbyar pa'i tshog 'i le'u ste gsum ba'o//
byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sman khar mur ba'i cho ga bstan
pa/ ga bur dang/ glatsho dang/ gur kum zhib mor btags tegi'u wang dang bsres nas gong du bstan ba'i sngags rnam pa gsum re rer yang lan stong rtsa brgyud bzlas te chab gtsang mas sbyar nas
ril bu che chung shing 'go stong gi 'bras bu tsam du bgyis te/ yang sngags gong ma gsum lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas grib ma la bskams te/ gdugs dang rlung gis ma thog khar bgyis nasal
'a rer la'ang gong ma'i sngags rnam pa gsum lan bdun bdu rgyas btab ste/ril bu gcig kharamur nas rgyal bo 'am/ blon po nye lan nam/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag la gtam bgyis par 'gyur na/
bkur sti bgyis nas nor dang/ rin po che dag 'phangs pa ma mchis pas ci dang ci 'tshal ba thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/tshig tu smras so 'tshal thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur/ bsgo kho
zhig mtshas na'ang thams cad nyan cing bgyid bar 'gyur lags so// khang sman chur ba'i tshortag bar sngags bzla 'tshal te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyud
lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du spos chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi chu zheng khru bzhis 'khor ba gcig bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang
du rtsi shing gi me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ci 'byor pa bkum zhing/ tsan dan dkar bo bsregs nas sman gyi ril bu sbam blas te dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bzhag nas/ rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs shing/
phel ba dang bla re dkarapo bras te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma dkar bo bzhi'ang bris te/ byang chub sems dpa' sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyis lags pa'i rjes la snying po'i
sngags dang/ snying gi snying bo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bgyi'o// lus kyi sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas tsan dan dkar bo bsregs te me tog gtor na/ de'i tshe smon/
pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang naachis pa'i sman blangs te lus la brtags na phyogs gang du mchi'ang rung ste/ tsa dar rtse gnyer ba thams cad
'grub par 'gyur/ tshig tu smas pa thams cad kyis yid ches shing nyan bar 'gyur/ don du sgrub la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma
gtogs te/ [”]bad ni yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo las/smanamur ba'i cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor le las//
sman skur ba'i cho ga 'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir skye bo mang

bo thams cad kyis mthong n byams shing dga' bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bstan pa/ sman shing ka ku shu dang/ par le brgan dang/ bod sngon po dang/ rgyumatsho'i chab kyi dbu ba dang/ nya nun nag bo'i rus pa dang

ba blo dang/ kakun bon su dang/ gi hang dang/ gur kum dang/ rgya'i gur kum dang/ ba pa lang dang/ na le sham dang/ bca'i sgra rnams chamanyam par bgyis te/ brdungs nas zhib mor btags te sman lngam srang

gcig mchis na/ gla rtsi dang ga bur srang byed stsal nas zhib mor bdar te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyimadun du sbyar ba bgyis lags bas/ snga ma'i sngags rnam ba gsum re re'ang lan stong rtsa brgyad
bzlas te/ sems can thams cad la byams ba dang snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/ sman de dag byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gnang pa'i drung du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la/
meg par bgyis nas 'khar ba'i thur mas blangs te mig tu stsalan mig dang klad pa bro 'tshal ba dang/ ming tog gis bsgribs pa thams cad dang/ sbyin dkar dang/ mtshim 'dzag pa dang/ swen dmar dang/
khand dang/ klad pa bro 'tshal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur lags so// rtag par gdugs re bzhin du sman 'di mig chu stsal namig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gnyis
snyal na lus kyi bond thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs gsum stsal na skyo ba'i bro nad rnam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gdugs bzhi stsalan phyi nang gi sgrib pa thamA
cad kyis sgrib par mi 'gyur lags so// gdugs lnga stsal na dgra dang 'thab pa na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gdugs drug stsal na sdig pa'i las dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ lci ba bzhi dang/ mtshams
ma mchis pa lnga dang/ milam ngan pa dang/ khyod snyoms thams cad rnam par 'gas shing/ ngan 'gro rnams su nam yang ltung bar mi 'gyur lags so// gdugs bdun stsal na rgyal po dang/ blon po chen po
dang skye bo mang po thams cad rjes su 'brang zhing bkur sti bgyis nas yid ches shing byams bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du stsal na rang dbang chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ zhag bdun
phrag gsum gyi bar du sul na rgyal po dang blon po chen po dag mdza' bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bzhi'i bar du stsalan gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas ba rnams rim gro bgyid par
'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag lnga'i bar du sul na lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin bo rnams g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag drug gi bar du stsal nanam mkha' lding dang srin
bo mthu chen bo dang ldan pa rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yongs su srung bar bgyid bas/ byad stems dang 'dre gdon rnams kyis tshugs bar mi 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag
bdun gyi bar du stsal na lhan g bo chen po dang/ 'dre srin sde brgyad rnams nye bar lhags nas rjes su 'brang zhing g.yog bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag brgyad kyi bar du stsalan an trad nar
'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag dgu'i bar du stsalan gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu'i bar du stsal na lha ma yin gyi khang khyim gyi sgo rang bye nas/ de na ci mchis pa thal
cad 'agleng bar 'gyur/ 'byung zhing 'jug pa la thog pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gcig gi bar du stsalan san zhugs ltar 'bar ba ji snyed pa thams cad mngon sum du
tsha dga' bar 'gyur bas/ tshe ring bar 'gyur 'tshal lam/ mthu chen po dang ldan par 'tshal na'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du stsal na drang srong/
mang bo rnams kyis rin po che'i gter rnams phye ste nye bar bstan nas yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu gsum gyi bar du stsal na klu'i gzhal med khang rnams sgo nga bye
nas lta ba dag la thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrug bcu bzhi'i bar du stsalan 'dod ba'i khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag sgo rang bye ba 'gyur bas thams cad
mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco lnga'i bar du stsalan mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du'ang gdugs bzhin dugasal bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu drug gikhar du stsalan sa'i 'og gi
rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu bdun gyi bar du stsal na gling bzhi po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sems can ji snyed mchis pa'i ng
thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i mthu'i dbang gis sdug bsngal myong ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang thar bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bco brgyud kyi bar dustsal na gang zag de nyi ma
lta bu'i mthu thob par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun phrag bcu dgu'i bar du stsal na lag na rdo rje'i lus yang dag pa nyida mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs bar bgyid do// zhag
bdun phrag nyi shu'i bar du stsal na spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen bo dang ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur bas smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar bgyid do// zhag bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa
gcig gi bar du snyal na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob par 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang gi sgo rnams rang phye nas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//
@# phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig gi bar du sul na yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga 'thob
par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig spyod pa'i cho ga 'di mngon par 'grub par 'tshal pa gang lags ba des bstan pa 'di la shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyis zhing sems can la snying
brtse bar bgyi ste/the tshom ma mchis na gong du bstan pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te the tshom 'tshal bar gyuran cho ga rnams grub par dka' ste/ 'di ni san ris
gzigs dbang phyug gi tsan dan nor bu'i 'khor lo las/ mig sman gyi cho ga zhes bgyi ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sems kyi 'khor lo las/ mig
gi snyan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang sems can rnams la snying brtse pa'i phyir sgrub
pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa dang/ las ngan pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/dgra thams cad 'dul ba/ bi na ya ka khro ba'i sems nye

khar zhi nas skye bo mang po la gnod pa ma byed cing byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba/ sbyin sreg ho bkra shis kyi cho ga bstan pa/dog sa bskos te zhugs thapa khru gang gru bzhi pa gcig bgyis nas/che tog
man len tsa su dang/ yungs kar dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ chab mar cha mnyam par bsres te/a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ shing dri can so so nas srid du sor bcu gnyis zhung du sor gcig mchis
pa gtubs te thub tu bsred par bakyi zhing/ sman nyung zad cig glas nas lan cig sngags btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor ba lan stong rtsa 'datshang bar bgyisan/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam

par 'joms shing tsho la brgya nyi shu thub par 'gyur lags so// zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun chad pa mamachis par haM gyi tshig bzhin bgyis na tshe lo stong thub cing lus kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
zhag bdun phrag gnyis kyi bar du cho ga bgyis na rgyal bo dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po chen po nyi phan dang/ skye bo phal ba rnams kyang skyabs su mchis nas bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'gyur ro// zhag bdun

phrag gsum gyi bar du tsho ba bzhin du bgyis na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ nyi zla'i lha dang/ rgyal bo chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i ng nye bar lhags nas yongs su srung bar
'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes kyang dngos grub chen po stsal bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang ston pa chen po rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur lags so// gal te yul
khams su cher dkon par gyuran/ yungs kar dang chab ma ral sngags 'dis btab ste/ gdugs gsum gyi bar du zhugs kyi nang du bsregs na char ba 'bab par 'gyur/ gal te
char ches te ma 'khumasan thab de'i thal ba de blangs nas sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btab ste/ gnam du gtor na char pa 'khums par 'gyur ro// gal te ser ba ma sa pa babs sam/rlung
drag po glo bur du langs pagyurana' thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste sbyin machis pa'i phyogs su gtor na zhi bar 'gyur lags so// sngags 'di rtag par bzlas brjodo

bgyis na mthu stobs mthu bo che dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas/lus 'di spangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du skye ba thams cad du sngon gyi
gnas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tsan dan gyi snying po'i
'khor lo'i gzungs 'di bdag gis bstan pa bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'amadage bsnyenanam/ dge bsenam ram skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la zhig gis latsag 'chang bar
tshisha bgyid na gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur bas the tshom gyi bsam pa bskyed par ma bgyi'o// yid la bsams pa'i don thams cad thob par 'gyur bas shin tu mngon par yid ches par bgyi zhing the
tshom skyed par mi bgyid/denus bcom ldan 'das kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i sman sa gzigs dbang phyug la khyod kyis sing chen pos yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyicho ga gya nom pa
'di yang dog par bshad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la phan ba dang bde bar byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod do// gang la la zhig gis sems bskyed de
kha nas bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyis ngas bstan pa bzhin du sems can rnams la yang nas yang du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis
rjes su bstananas/dngos grub thob par bya ba'i ched du lus nye bar ston la/nga'i tshig dang 'gal bar ma byed cig dang/ pa'i ng rjes su yid rang ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems
dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagan bskal pa dpag tum mchis pa nas byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis sems can la rjes su ston
cing rtag par yongs su bsrungasanas dngos grub stsal bar lags pani bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen cing dbang du gyur pa lags so// sems can rnams kyi slad du yid bzhin gyi 'khor
lo'i gzungs 'di bshad ba lags pas// nga la la zhig gis len cing 'chang ba dang/ rtag par bdag nyid bzlas brjod bgyi ba'i grangs tshang bar bgyisan smon ba rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/
bdag ni de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su skyab par bgyid pa lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad rab tu dga' nas mngon bar yid ches pas yang dag par blangs te spyod
par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' san ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs las/ sbyin sreg ho gyi chog sman sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug pa 'o//
'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i mdzod thogs pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi 'khor lo'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
zhun chen gyi mkhan po dang lo tsa ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o///@#// rgya
gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra nAm d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed nas/ pad+madang/ nyim dang/ zla ba'i gdan l gri'i 'phro
'du las zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba/ g.yas 'og ma na bgrang 'phreng mu tig dkar po// g.yon 'og man bad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ sku mdog dkar po/
zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa rin bo che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang/ na po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa// ma lcamo jug ma dang/ yab nor bu rin po ches brtan pa/ byang chub sems dpar
dang sems m rab tu mang bos bskor te 'di skad ces gsum go/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan cig tsam brjod dam/dran zhing yid la byas sam/ bris nas lus la
bcangs sam/ mos shing gus par bya na mtshams med ba lnga dang/ de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing/ ngan song gsum dang/ ma 'om ba brgyad dang/ sdug bsngal dang
khams pa mi skye'o// ma dang/ ma ma yin pa dang/ gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad las sgrol bar 'gyur ro// nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro//oM ma Nipad+me hUM/
zhes brjod bas/'phags ba sman sa gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste/ 'di la the tshom mam/ som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis m za zhig/
phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzogs so///sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la
za @#// phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di brjod kyis/

rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ haha sa ni/ na pa sa ne/ ta pa ta pa na/ dzA la dzA lane/ tsa la tsa lane/ pu'u yo ga sma ra bar sa ya sAhA/ gang gis rig pa 'di bklags pa de tsho rabs brgya
stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur te/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po rdzogs so//

rgyu gar skad du/ pad+ma mu ku Ta tan nA ma/bod skad du/ pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'irgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzhal

med khang na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dba'i khor dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sgo kun 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyis rnam par sna mdzad la gang chen mtsho'i zhing gi rdul la reg bas/ reg ma thag tu bskal pa bzang bo'i sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis la mchod nas/ 'od zer de bam

ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub bo// nub ma thag tu thugs rjechen po phyag stong spyan stong dang ldan pa/ sku mdog gangs kyi rtso la nyi ma shar ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal bcu gcig gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar
po steng gi zhal dbus ser ba g.yas ljang khu/ g.yon dmar ba//steng gi gsum nag po// kham ldan 'das kyi dbu na byu ru bcag pa lta bur gyur te 'aTom pa mdzad nas/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag po/
rags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lagazigs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thal mo sbyar te/ khacom ldan 'das la gsol ba// sku dang sngags dang
las rnams dang/ khyad par tsho ga bstan par gyis/ zhes gsol ba btab nas//bcom ldan 'das kyis//byang chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas bka' stsal pa/

sku ni rnam pa 'dra lta ste/ thugs rje dug pas chu shel te/ mnyam ba bzhengs bas 'gro don mdzad/ chu shel mdog 'dra zhul ba/sum drakar/ ljang khu'i mdog can nag po tshe kaser po de bzhin bcom ldan mar/
nga srong dag tur nags brgyan// zhi ba 'dzum dang bzhad pa dang// khros pa'i zhal mnga' spyan gsum mdzes// bcu pa sems dpa'i rtags can te// bcu gcig bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag/ yon tan
nor bu mu tig 'phreng// 'phrin las sna tshogs smad dkris ba// dang bo'i phyag ni thal sbyar te// gams pa rin chen 'phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon pa dri med pad+ma 'dzin// g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa'o//
g.yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te// g.yas pa 'khor lo rab tu 'ani// g.yon pa nani mda' gzhu ste// lhag ma mchog sbyin sbyin ldan no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad de cod pan
gnyis nas rin po tshe rab tu 'phro ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i pad+ma'i steng du rigs lnga 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang
mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snang ba mtha' yas dang/ don yod grub pa dang/ mi bskyod pa'o// khang bu brtsegs pa'i rin po che de'i nang du seng ge dang/ rta dang/ rma bya dang/ nam mkha'i

lding dang/ glang bo che'o// de dag ni cod pan las byung ba'o// yab yum gyi sku mdog sngon mo ste// pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i steng// tshad medra bzhi ste phyag bzhis mdzes//sems dpa'i rgyan dang ldan
pa yi// mnyam pa yi ni skyil krung bcas// yab ni sku mdog ser po ste// pad+ma las byung pa'i snying//thal sbyaranor bu bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// rgyan rnams yongs su 'dzin pa'o// yang ni 'od zer
rab bkye ste// zla ba nyi ma las byung ba'i// nyi ma'i mdog can nyi ma ni// gzhon nu ut+pal mchog sbyin mad// zla ba las skyes nam mkha'i mdog nung zad khros pas rdo rje can// dkar po gangs
ltar dkar ba ste// nyi zla'i tsungan pad+ma 'dzin// drag po gnyis dang sbi yig las// gnyis med tshul gyis 'bras burdzogs// ha ya gi bas khams gsum sdud// khro gnyer can gyis 'phrin las
mdzad// gshani rje'i gshed bo gter 'dzin cing// khams gsum rnam rgyal bdud sde 'joms// 'khor lo dkar po dag pa'i steng// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// dang po dken
ba/ mchog rab dad cing// tshad med bzhin yongs su rdzogs// byang chub yan lag rdzogs pa dang// chos kyi rang bzhin stong nyid do// gleng gzhi dang sku bstan pa'i le'u ste dang bo'o//
de nas gsang sngags bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad gang chen mtsho'i zhing khams thams cad du 'od bkye nas gtsug tu nub bar gyur to// de nas yang gsungs pa/ oM gi/

[@]anamorat+nacu yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA ga ra bi ro tsanAya/byuharAdzAya/ tathA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/nam/ sarba ta thA ga te b+ho/ achad rgyu/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha y+Yo/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo

ki te shwa rA ya/ g+hAd+hi satwA ya/mahA sa twA ya/mahA kA ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/i ba lce lan+d+he/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma ba re/ i li mi li/
tsa ti dz+wa la mub na ya sAhA/ sngags 'di rnams kha ton byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/gas kyi bu mos lan cig brjod dam/ dran zhing yid la byas sam/ lus la bcangs na mtshams med pa lnga dang/
de dang nye ba'i las 'byung zhing sems can dmyal ba dang/ la dgasanang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ma skye zhing/ mi khom pa brgyad du sdug bsngal dang bcas par ma 'gyur ro// gcan gzan dang/
srin po dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ nad dang/ 'jigs ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// o rak+Sha rak+Sha/ zhes pas kyang bsrung bar bya'o// oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+hamatshwa/ A d+ya nuta pan tuta/
ces pas gtor ma'i nusayang gs lamachod bar bya'o// oM AHhU~M/ zhes pas so// de rnams srung ba'i sngags so// oMm Nibam+mehUM/ zhes pas so// 'dis rigs gsum gyibadag por 'gyur/

phan yon ni 'di'o// chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'i thugs chen po mthong bar 'gyur yod// tshon satathA ga tad+d+hAb pU dzeme g+ha sa mu drasar Nas gal haM/in masarba ta thA ga tapaN+DapU dzame g+hasamudrasar Nas ma ye hUM/

onamasarba ta thA tag tu A lo ke pAdzam g+ha sa mu dras raNas ma ye hU~M/oM nams tathA ga tag dwa phag gru samud+das re Na sa ma ye hUM/oMnasaHsarba thA ga tani wi bye bA dzame g+ha sa mu dus ra Nas ma ye hUM/[0f00]namasam+batathA ga ta

shapA pU dzame g+ha sa mu dra sa ra Nagam ye hU~M/ oM na mas tab+hag ta mal pU dzame g+has up+papar khas ma ye hUM/ de nas mchod pas yang dag mchod// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa'i// hi/yig dkar po
yang dag ldan// sngags kyi le'u gnyis pa'o///las dang chog bstanapa'i phyir// dang bo zhiba'i las bsgrubs nas//yad du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// dkar po dag ba gsal dus su// dri zhim chu
yis legs byugs te// me tog dkar bo dgram byas nas// khrus dang kha zas byogs 'thun pa'i// bde ba'i stan la nyeng 'dug ste// bum pa dkar po tsan dan dkar// dris bkangagos
kyis legs par dkri// maN+Dal dbus su legs par gzhag/ shrItsalas byung pa'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dkar// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// zla ba'i gdan
[2/]la legs bzhugs pa// hilas 'od zer spro ba bsgom// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni mdun bsams nas//siyi 'phro 'du gsal ban// bzlas pa rab tugasal ba ni// gsang sngags 'di

ni brjod par bya'o// na mo rata trayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyAn sa ga rabi tsanAya byu harA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/an te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/namasam tathA ga ted+d+ho/ad+ham+b+hasamya ka saM bud+d+ha b+hodonam ar+ya a ba lo ki te

shwar ya/ bo d+hi sa tAya/mahAm puya/ mahAkAru Ni ka ye/ a mi tAb+ha la tsheg mogAn+ti ka ra swAhA/ zhes bzlas pa bya'o// hU~M/ rnam par snang mdzad bum pa'i chu gang dag legs par khrus byed pa// drim thams cad

yongs dag nas// 'bras bu bde ba bde thob gyur// 'jigs pa kun las rnam grol nas// myur du mu skyes mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rgyas ba sgrub 'dod na// nags tshal shin tumatho ba ni// dri zhim chu yis legs

byugs la// 'bras bur bcas ba'i me tog dgram// rgyan rnams yongs su khartag gas nas ni// bdo ba'i stan la nyar 'dug ste// rin chen sna lnga 'bum+b+ha lnga// rin chen ga 'ur blugs par bya// man+Dal dbus su legs
par gzhag// hi/las byungaba'i sems dpa'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ser// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa pad+ma bsnams// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku ni bdun bsams nas//
mchod pa lnga yis yang dag mchod// sIya 'phro 'dug sal bar bzlas// namo ratAtAyA ya/nam Ar+ya dzAn sA ga ra/ b.ro tsa nA ya/myu ha rA dzAya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma

sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yo/ achad b+b+ha/samyaka saM bud+d+ha blo/na ma Ar+ya ba lokeshwa rA ya/ bo ng+hisatA ya/ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ma/ rat+taku na put+taM ku ru swAhA/ bang mdzod stong pa'i thog
bzhagan// 'bru yis yongs su khengs par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi las byed na// sdud par byed na chu klung 'gram// pa la sha dang ashAt+tha// me tog dmar po'i ril bu byas// bse gab dmar po'i nang

du bdug/ me tog dmar pos rab tu mchod// tits+tshayig las byung sgron ma'i sku// lcang khu phyagan lcags kyu 'dzin/ phyag stong sun yang de bzhin te// rgyas pa'i sku na mdun bsams nas// mchod pa lnga yis

mchod byas te// hiyag 'phro 'du gsal bar bzlas/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA ga ra'abo ro tsa na ya/ byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ achu taM/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma sarba ta thA ga te ny+nyo/

achod b+huny+tsasamyaka saM bud+d+ha ts+tso/ na ma At+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi si tA ya/ mahA sa tA la/ mahA kA ru Ni kA la/ a mo g+ha b+hasmiM ku ru/ o tA re tut+tA re tu re a mo g+ha d+ha smiM ku ru swAhA/ rdzas kyi lta gus lus
byugs na// byugs po de yis khugs par 'gyur// de nas 'phrin las byed 'dod na// dur khrod shing gcig dag zhun// ba ya lci bas legs byugs nas// me tog sngon po nam pa ya// zlos kyi tshom bu/
lnga steng dgram// byang du 'dug ste las 'di brtsam// gcan gzan steng du chu shel te// hIwayi yi ge las byung ba'i// mdog dkar ral pa'i thor tshugs can// zhal gcig spyan na gsum ba ste/
ri dgas pags po 'dzin pa'o// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad can// phyag bzhi dang pa mchog sbyin pa// g.yonan pad steng ral grinan// g.yas pa ltos 'gros brgyan pa'i mdung// rtse gsum
dkar pos brgyan pa'o// g.yon na thod ba dkar po ste// dri zhim me tog dag gis bkang// rgyal po chen po rol ba ltar// cung zhig zur gyis gzigs pa'o// phyag stong spyan yang de bzhin stong//
bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas te// pad+ma'i 'dab mar legs zhugs pa'i// rgyas pa'i sku ni legs bsams nas// hiyi 'phro 'du las byung ba'i// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// namo

rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyAn sA ga ra/ be ro tsa nA ya/ byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+ho/ armad byusamyaka saM bud+d+ha ts+tso/ mam acu ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hAsatA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya shrI/ o ka tenaka te/ ka ra ka te ka ro te ka ra tarIts+tsaM swAhA o karma a mo g+ha badzras hanAdA hUM phaT/ dra 'am phyug pa dag la ni//btab la lus la
khyug par byad me tog sngon po mgo la gzhag/ maN+Dal chu yas lus la byugs// nyishu rtsa lnga bzlas pas ni// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// donas bzhika sgrub 'dod na// bkra
shis dus su rdzogs dus su// ri bo yid 'ong gnas dag tu// sa gzhi chag chag legs btab ste// maNAl legs byas me tog ni// dri zhim dkar bos yongs gtor te// gtsang zhing dam pa'i las
nams dgram// gtsam bram ze byas te gzhag/ khrus dang ku sha'i steng gnas te// sItsalas byung ba[@]chu skyes ste// chu skyes mdog 'dra zhal gsum yang// 'dzum zhing
zhi ba'i cha byad can// ljang khu bzhad ba zham gsum pa/ nag po khros pa rngamar ser skya// ser bo'i zhal nas 'dzam po ste// dmar po bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu// ri dgas pags pas stod
g.yogs can// sna tshogs sham thabs bsnams pa ste// zhabs gnyis mnyam por bzhengs pa las// g.yas g.yon dang po thal mo sbyar// bar ma bgrang 'phreng pad+ma bsnams tha na
mchog sbyin spyi thugs 'dzin// bum pa rnam snang lha mo ni// la se ma le girti ste// ni nang gi lha mo'i bdag/ zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// b+hiya yi ge las byung ba'i// gsang

sngags rgyal pa bzlas par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra/ be ro tsa na ya/ byu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+nate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ namasarba ta thA ga ta byo/ argyud

samyaka sa bad+d+ha hU~M/ na ma Ar+ya ba la ka ta shA rA ya/ bo d+hi sata ya/ mahA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ i ze bau0f09/ tsa latsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/
ku su me ku su me ba re/ i li mi li tsi ti/ dz+wa la ma pa na ya sAwA/ bum pa'i tshul legs bsgrubs nas// lus la byugs na 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga gsang sngags grub pa'i le'u ste gsum/
de nas thabs kyi rim pa ni// gro ga ras sam shing shun la// ras 'o mas bris pa'o// tshom bu lnga yi 'khor lo la// dbus su sku yi sa bon te// lnga pa yi ni

lnga pa ste// shar du de yang bri bar bya// bzhi pa'i lta pas dbus su mtshan// lho ra de ni yang dag dgod// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi ba la gsum// nub du da ni yang dag dgod/ lnga pa yin lta pa la// sa yi
rnam par sbyar ba ste// byang du de ni yang dag dgod// dbus su thugs kyi sa bon te// naM ku ru mtshams su 'o// swA hA dbus su dgod par bya// de ltar 'khor lo gsal bkod nas// dngul lamadakar po'i
ga 'ur gzhug/ thams cad las kun zhi bar 'gyur// yung ba'i chu yis legs par bri// puN+Ti ku ru mtshams su 'o// kham phor ser por legs par gzhug/ rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur//
pa la sha yis legs par bris// ba ni ku mu mtshams su dgod// kham phor dmar por legs bar gzhug/ dbang gi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// ma pa'i chuyas legs par bris// ma ra ya ni
mtshams su dgod// lcags sam thod bar yang dag gzhug// 'phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po dri zhim zhing// zhi bas de ni me la sreg/ 'bras bu dmar por bcas pa'i shing
rgyas pas de na ma la 'o// dbangan pa la sha yi shing// de la bsregs na khugs par 'gyur// mkho'i shing la tshar gcad pa'i// bsregapA 'phrin las 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo'i le'u/
za[” @#// ste bzhi pa'o///de nas las kyi rim ba na// dur ba'i rtsa dang 'bras kyi 'dab// til dang yungs kar ci tsi la// gsang sngags bzlas na grub pa na// da le'i shing/
la legs bsregs nas// thams cad rab tu zhu bar 'gyur// ku sha sar du shug 'brum dang// stag pa'i me tog dmar bo la// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te// tsan dan shang la legs bsregA/
nas rgyas par bya ba'i las 'grub cing// nus pa'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// pA la shal shing dag dang// khre dang ci tsi mon sran la// gsang sngags bzlas pa rab byas te// pad+ma ka ya shing la
bsregs// nus pa mchog ni thob par 'gyur// thams cad dbang du 'du p+par 'gyur// gro dang so ba 'bras dang// bra bo mon sran tul nag po// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas te// kha ti ra yi 'ong
la bsregs// nus pa ldan te las rnams ni// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// pra ha kha tsha'i shing dag la// lo ma 'bras bur bcas pa dang// rdo rje'i shing la sngags bzlas nas// mya ngan
'tshang ga shing l bsregs// nus pa thob nas myur dun// ma rnams thams cad dbang du sdud// ldong ros pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang// mu la pa tra'i shing dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// a ru
rayi shing la bsregs// 'khor lo'i 'og tu bcug pa'i sa// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// ba la sha yishing dag la// ka ra wIr 'bras dag la// gsang sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas/
'dzam bu'i shing la rab bsregs nas// ral gri'i 'og tu bcug nas ni// yul dbang yang na dbang du 'gyur// tshe rabs brgya ru len pa'i dus// mchon gyis bsnun pa'i rusapa dag/ gsang
sngags rab tu bzlas byas nas// skyar pa'i me la rab bsregs te// lcags kyu'i 'og tu rab banugan// glang po dbang du 'gyur bar byed// ba le ta dang te la sha// kha ti ra dang du tim// dur khrod shing
larab bsregs na// stag la sogs pa dbang du 'du// nas dang 'bras dang so ba dang// sman dang rin chen sna tshogs dang// maN+Dal zlum po legs byas te// rgyan rnams rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
na pad+machu shel las skyes pa'i// chu shel mdog dang 'dzum dang bcas// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas bzhugs// ku sha'i stan la shor du 'dug/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcas pa yis// byams pa'i
sems kyis dbul bar bya'o// nad dang mis dang 'brum bu dang// shu ba g.yan pa me dbal dang// nad dang gdon dang thams cad zlog/ mtshams med lnga dang ma dge lnga// 'bras bu sdug
bsngal thams cad zlog/ me'i las kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o////de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa yi// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas la// tsan dan dkar po'i dris bsgos te//
mchod yonam tog bkang ba dang// ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa yis// rgyal po lta bu'i gzugs la mchod// sdig pa thams cad de mdun du// bshagasanas myur du skyabs su 'gro// gro ga dag
gam shan shul las rgyal bo dag gi gzugs byas te/yig 'bru lnga yis btab pa yis// tshen sna lnga yis rab tu bcing// byams pa'i sems kyis chu bo la// bsar na rgyal pa'i
chad la thar// oM hUM taM a shon ha ri ma ka to// sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sAhA// gcan gzan 'jigs pa 'ong ba'i tshe// maN+Dal dkar po legs byas las la// me tog dkar pos rab tu gtor/
mchod pa lnga yis rgyal po mchod// sdig bshags myur du skyabs su 'gro// 'bru sna lnga dang rin chen lnga// tshon sna lnga yi phur ma las// byas pa lus la btags pa la// gcan gzan su 'jigs
thams cad las// myur ba nyid du grol bar 'gyur// chom rkun dag gis 'jigs ba la// rdo rje sngon po rdo rje can// mthing nag sa gnon phyag rgya can// mchod nas bdag nyid skyabs su 'gro// o/
ako tu ka ka ra Na ga ra kha ti pa/ swa d+hi tsa kri pa yazur ka tsa tsa tra nyin dudanus sa ra ka raka ra sAhA/ sbrul gyi gdug pas 'jigs pa la// bal bo sa 'a'i lcag ma la// bram ze'i gzugs kyi rgyan
bsgoms nas// rin chen 'byung ldan skur bsgoms te// spyi bor mu tig byu ru dang// me shel pad+ma rA go dang// uN+NanI la dung g.yas 'khyil// gser dang dngul dang dur ba dang// rin chen rgyan dang
'bru snar bcas// ku sha gla tsho tsan dan dang// bal lu sbyar pa ul// gur gum dri zhim lus lcags la// o rat+ta saM b+ha ba// sa ti bi sha sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra swAhA/ lce 'bab pa yi 'jigs
pa la// stag dang 'brug gi rus pa la// 'khar ba'i phye ma lcags phye dang// zangs phye ragan phye ma dang// gser gyi phye ma gro bar gtum// snang ba mtha' yas skur bsgoms te// byams pas
phyogs mtshams kun tu bstan// dug rnams sna tshogs dud pas bdugs// oM a mrita badzradzul badzra dz+wa la/ gardza gardza/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra swAhA/ me yi 'jigs pa dag la ni// 'brug
dus sen da wa sha dang// ta'i dang sa lu ca tse dang/ nas dang gro dang rgun 'brum gyi// thang phrom dag la sngags btab ste// me yi phyogs su gtor bar bya// o bi ro tsa na pra b+ha/ dzA la dzA la
sa ra sa ra ka raka ra swAhA/ snam par snang mdzod skur bsgoms la// me la gtong n sa yis gsod// chu bo dag gis 'jigs pa la// mdzecan pho me'i thod pa yang// ra dang khyi dang phag gi khrag 3
sa bdag sde brgyad gzugs dang bcas// nang du bcug ste chu bor dor// don yod grub pa'i sa lugasal// oM a mo g+ha sad d+hi kA o ka pe tAr Ni sa ra sa ra ka ra ka ra sAhU/ phyag stong spyan yang
de bzhin te// thugs rje chen bo'i kha dog ni// so sor gsal zhing bsgoms par bya// byams pa kun la rab tu blta// 'jig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'jigs pa kun srung ba'i
le'u ste drug pa'o///sku gdung me tog dkar pos mchod// sa gzhi dri yis chag chag btab// snying po gzungs dang bcas pa 'am// khru gang tshad kyi mchod rten la// legs
'a@#// par bstod cing mchod par bgyi// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// thugs rje'i gzugs kyi rten du shar// rdzu 'phrul tshad med bzhi dang ldan// byang chub phyogs na yongs su

rdzogs// dri med dung 'dra dkar bo ste/ rgyal chen bzhi yang de bzhin no// byang chub chen po'i mchod rtenan// khri 'phang bcu gsum tog dang ldan// lha yi rol mochar du 'bab// chos sgra rgyun mi 'chad
ba'i gter// rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid de// phur bus gdab cing yongs su gzung// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin rlabs che// de yi bsod nams rab bstan pa// mtshams med lnga dang ma dge bcu// nyon
mongs dbang gyur sdig pa rnams// skad cig tsam gyis dag par 'gyur// shin tu gtsang ba'i gnas dag ni// byams ldan snying rje can gyis byas// khram ze'i rigs las byung ba yi// 'dri mkhan sIng rje
can gyis byas// rang bsam rnam par dag pa yis// mdun du bdar ti mchod par bya// tshad dang kha dog yongs gsal ba// yid du 'ong ba dag la 'o// rdzas dang yid du 'ong ba yi// dkar gsum sbrags/

ba sngas pa yi// sha dang sgog pa la phug dang/ gzan dang chang na shin tu sbyangs// shel 'phreng pad+ma'i snying bo dang// bo tsi dang mu tig shis// g.yal dang smad pa ma tshig gis// nam yang chod par mi bya'o//
y+Ya mo byad dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//(las rnams sna tshogs sgrub byed pa// bo ti'am lugs ma ras ris la// brten nas bdag ni byams sems ldan// tshu
las 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni// dmar gse ra ut+pal po ti 'dzin// mnyam pa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// bum pa kha dog ser po na// rin chen lnga dang 'bru snar bcas// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/

d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te btsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me/ pan da re/ ma la mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma ba na ya swAhA/ lan bdun yongs su bzlas byas na// gti mug thams cad zhi bar
'gyur// shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur// ras ris mchod rten la rten nas// maN+Dal dri zhim me tog dmar// ka ra mar gsum dag dang ni// 'bras dang til dkar yungs dkar dang// pad+ma'i rtsa ba dkar
bo la// ril bu rgya shug 'brum bu tsam// sbyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ni// las byung ba'i sku mdog dkar// phyag na pad+ma mchod sbyin mdzad// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// khang shA/

o d+ha radz+ha ra/ b+hiri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ i'u ba'i/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le bu tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma man da ra/ i li mi li/ ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya sAhA/ ril bu dag la sngags btab ste// byams pa'i sems
dang ldan pas bzo'i// srid pa'i 'dod chags zhi gyur nas// rab tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// maN+Dal sngon po legs byas nas// ut+pal bo sngon po nam pa dang// a kA ru dang tsan dan dang// dra ya chuyis

bum pa dgang// phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can// sku mdog ljang sngon nyung zhig khro// rdo rje dril bu phyagan bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hu ru d+hu ru/
@#// i'i bau0f09/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ku su me ku su ma man da re/ i li mi la/ ti dzul ma ban la sAhA/ hU~M bskyed phyag na rdo rjen// bum pa'i chu las khrus byas nas// zhe sdang
rab tu zhi nas na// bzod ba chen po thob par 'gyur// dug rab tu zhi bar byed ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///ras sam gro gshing tunal// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi chu khyud bcas//

d+harab+ha ra/ d+hari d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ra/ che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+ta zhes ba'o/srung ba lus la gdags byas na// nad dang gdon dang rims dang na/'jigs khra'i nad dang gdon las thar// bde ba yongs su rdzogs
bar 'gyur// skung ba dag ni dkar po la// mdud pa dag ni rab byas te// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad na legs bzlas nas// srung ba'i dam pa 'di byas na// srung ba yi ni dam pa
! 'dis// srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba lo// mu tig rin chen byu ru gsar//ga pur gur kum gla rtsi dang// a ka ru dang du ru ka/ phur ma sAng khang gdags par bya// tsan dan gla rtsi gur kum dang/
gu gul nag po bsregs kha'i phyo// ba yi 'oms lde gu bya// gnas gsum dag tu byugs pas ni// gdon dang nad kyis 'jigs kun las// byugs pas de ni srung bar 'gyur// srung ba'i
aN+Da 'khor lo'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//ser ba yongs su srung ba la// seng ldeng lhang ti'i phur bu la// gzungs sngags bzlas pa dbus su ni// hUM las byung ba'i sku bskyed do//

bab/ phyogs bzhir khro bo chen po na// shar du khams gsum rnam rgyal ni// sku mdog dkar po me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo sdigs mdzub mdzad// o pradz+nyAnu kr-ita han han hUM phaT// lho ru gshin rje

gshed po ni// dmar bo lag na be con 'dzin/ oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThahAl/ nub tu rtamagrin dmar po ni/ me dpung rdo rje dbyag pa 'dzin// oM ha ya grwa ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ byang du khro gnyer can

sku ni// ljang sngon ral gri 'dzan pa ste// oM a mo g+ha ka blo ku ta ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ phyogs bzhir phur bu dag la ni// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// gcan gzin dra ma yungs kar bsres//
gsang sngags bzlas shing mkha' la gtor// oM badzra kro d+ha hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban lha ban d+ha ha na ha na hUM pasnga/ ser ba srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'od zer rab tu bkye ste// phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer 'byung ba 'di lta ste// dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ ljang khu dang/ ser po ste/ 'od zer de dag gis
'gro ba ris drug po de dag thams cad la khyab ste dbugs dbyung ba mdzad do//de nas rgyal chen bzhi dang// sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan
'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs sa dang// tshangs pa kun 'khor dang/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs pa chen po dang/ 'od chen dang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang
tshad med dag dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sngon med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ mi che ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ shin tu mthong ba dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/
s+sa 'og min la sogs pa'i lha de dag gis mchod ba'i san gyi char phab nas/ lha'i bus tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje'i sku// phyag stong nyon mongs grol ba'i phyag/
sbyan stong shes rab 'od gsal te// 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i sku de mi snang bar 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
bar gyur to// de nas lha'i busagasol ba/ 'di la ban bon tsa zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig rgyud 'di yid byed na/ nad dang rims dang gdon dang ni//
( rgyal po gcan gzan 'jigs pa dang/ 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// mtshams med sdig pa mi dge kun// rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur
dmyal bangan song sdug bsngal dang// mi khom brgyad las rnam grol te// nyan dang 'chad dang sgom par 'gyur// dri med nam mkha' dkyil lta bur// bcom ldan 'das kyang mthong bar 'gyur// zhes
o ]bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bam ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs nas/ ligs so
legs so zhes bya ba gsungs nas stan la 'khod do/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag lnga stong dang/ lha dang/ mdang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon bar bstod do// pad+ma cod pan zhes bya ba'i rgyud le'u bcu gcig pa rdzogs so/////paN+Dita d+harmashI mi tra dang/ lo tsa ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
#/ rgya gar skad du/ leka ngeshA kalpa/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dgo 'dun phyog 'tshal lo// 'jig rten mgon po'i rtogo pa ni/mdor bsdus 'daran brjod bya ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyun chen po// 'dod

ba'i don kun rab ster ba// dang po'i ri zhig rig pa 'dzin pas gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs su/ hU~M gis dag par byas pas nye bar 'dug cing pad+ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM shA r+ya tA dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hab At+ma

konyahaM/ zhes brjod l/ thams cad stong pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/ de'i rjes la/ otsat+ta pra ti bo hUM ka rom/ de ltar brjod la/ sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bsgoms nas/ pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor bsam bar khya'o// zla ba'i steng du hu'i sngags gyur ba las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tubasgom par bya ste// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar bo
mchan du na gis dkar mo/ de la 'khyud pa/ bats+tshadamar bo kha 'byed pa'i gar gyi tshul can/ khab kyi phyag rgyas kha 'byed bar bsgoms la/ 'di brjod par bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po ni/
'dod chags skyon gyis ma gos shing/ de bzhin sna tshogs bag chags skyon// khams gsum rnam par dag pa 'o// dbu rgyan la 'od dpag tu med pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas 'di brjod par bya ste/

lo sarba ta thA ga ta/ kA ya bAkyit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kony+dzahaM/ de ltar bsgoms nas phyogs brgyud du lha mo rnams bsam mo/ oM ba le kani/ a ba lo ki ni/ a ba lo ka ya swAhA/ shar gyi 'dab ma la ni
skye rnam par gzigs ma zhes bya ba'i lha mo bad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o// o tare tut+tare tu re swAhA/ lho'i pad+ma la bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma pa la sha'i 'dab ma lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o//

a h+pha ri NimahAtsakra brta nihU~M/ nub kyi 'dab ma la lha ra Ni zhes bya ba'i lha mo ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ oM byu ru 'i tAre tu ta ma tA hUM/ byang ga 'dab ma la khro gnyer can zhes bya ba

ba'i lha mo pad+ma ser po bsnams pa'o// o mahA shrI ye ma Ni pad+me hU~M/ 'di ni pad+ma'i gos can shar phyogs kyi mtshams su btsodi lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// oM badzra pad+meshwa ra a ra pad+me hUM/
lho phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa'o// oM ba shA pa/ 'di na sna tshegs kyi bats+tshas/nub phyogs kyi mtshams su panag po bsnams pa'o// o ba shA pa'e hU~M/ 'di ni sna tshog

la0 kyi zhal can te/ byang phyogs kyi mtshams su snatshogs pad+mabasnams pa'o// o hipad+ma narte shwa ra hU~M/ ze 'bru'i dbus su 'dod chags chen po'i bcom ldan 'das spyan sa gzigs dbang phyug go/ da ltar

gang sgom pa dang ldan zhing ting nge 'dzin la goms par byed na dngos grub brtan por 'gyur ro// des sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dod pa'i longs sbyod thams cad ster ro// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub cing/

gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten kun gyi bde ston cing// so so rang nyid rjes su sgrub// sangs rgyas nyid na byang sems nyid// rang rgyal nyid kyang de bzhin no// yid 'ong sangs rgyas go 'phang ni//
spyad ma dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang gapur bcas// tsan dan dmare dang rab sbyar te// rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi bcud len yin// sbyor ba bzang po 'di yis
ni/bcud kyis len na bde ba yang// 'grub 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po yi// gzhon zhing nad med dam bde zhing// tshe dang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang// skal bzang ye shes bla na med// skye ba 'di la
'grub pa 'o// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang// gsad dang bsad pa la sogs pa// res dang phur bus gdab nyid dang// nam mkhar 'gro ba de bzhin no// sa bcu'i dbang
phyug thob 'gyur zhing// ting nge 'dzan la gnas par 'gyur// de phyir ting 'dzin ldan pa yis// rdo rjedum tshig de yi ni// rig pa dang na bcas pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten mgon por 'grub par 'gyur//

@#// oM hapad+ma narte shwa re hU~M/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na nyin mo dang nub mo byas pa'i sdig pa nyams par 'gyur ro// yang na lnga brgyabazlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las
grol bar 'gyur ro// yadan stong bzlas brjod byas na dus ma yin par 'chib med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag gnyis bzlos brjod byas na thams cad kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro// gzhan
yang stong phrag gsum bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang ba dang/ yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong phrag bzhi bzlas brjod byas na dbul ba med par 'gyur ro// yang na stong phrag
lnga bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad kyi sIpa'i khrug par byed do// stong phrag drug bzlas brjod byas na dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun bzlas brjod byas na bdud bzhi las mchog
tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na rig 'dzani ma 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag dgu bzlas brjod byas na gnod sbyin ma 'grub par 'gyur ro// khri tsho gcig bzlas brjod
byas na lha dang/ klu dang/ mi'i bu mo rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag nyi shu bzlas brjod byas na bar snang la 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag sum cu bzlas
brjod byas na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bzhi bcu bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la spyod pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag lnga bcu bzlas brjod byas na
ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// stong phrag drug cu bzlas brjod byas na grub pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// stong phrag bdun cu bzlas brjod byas n sa gsum gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// stong phrag
brgyad cu bzlos brjod byas na 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal por 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas brjod byas na rang dga'i
gzugs su 'gyur ro// bzhi chadang bcas pa'i 'bum phrag bzlos brjod byas na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag gcig bzlas brjod byas na thams cad du rjes su 'dzin par byed pa'i nus pa
can spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta bu 'grub par 'gyur zhing/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyang byin gyis rlob bo// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das gsung rdo rjes gsungs pa'o// o paN ra ba sa na ba re de hUM/
'di ni gos dkar mo'i sngags te lan cig brjod pas sdig pa'i rigs kyi tshogs sreg par byed do// nub bdun gyi nang rol du rgyal po blon po dang bcas pa mdunan 'don dang/ skye 'gro'i tshogs dang/ btsun
ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// bzlas pa tsam gyis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i rim pas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na gang yang sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dapa' dang nus pa mnyam zhing/ dngos su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro// o bo lo kin a ba lo kA ya sAk+kA/ 'di'i sbyor ba na stong phrag bcu bzlas
brjod byas n me long dang/ mazeb chen dang/ ma mkha' la sogs pa la gsal bo bra dbab ba 'grub bar 'gyur ro// gang sngon byung ba dang yang de ltar dang phyis 'ong ba de ston par byed do//

yang na so shing la lan nyi shu gcig mngon par bsngags bar byas la/ nub mo nyal ba'i dus su so shing 'chos nas mi smra bar nyal na dgos pa gang yin pa rmilam du ston par byed/ de'ang 'khrul pa med par

ston no// oM tA re tut+ta re tu re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma 'du 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na 'jig rten gsum grub par 'gyu'o/ lha'i bu mo dang/ klu'i bu mo dang/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi

bumo dang/ mi'i bu mo ste/ 'di rnams kyi nang nas gang 'dod pa de'i chos 'byung du gur kum dang/ rgya skyegs dang/ rang byung gi me tog dang/ byang chub kyi sems dang yang dag par ldan pas rtsibs drug pa shin tu rno ba'i
'khor lo dmar po 'khor bzhin pa rnam par bris pa bsam la// chos 'byung de sgrub pa pos ri sul chu ngogs gsang ba'i gnas su bsam par bya'o// de'ang myos shing sgrub pa po'i steng du ltung ba'i rnam pa

bsgom bar bya'o// de bkug la rang la chu shing nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur bar blta'o zhes bya'o// yang na lha dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ rig be 'dzan ba dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
'khor los sgyur ba dang/ blon po dang/ skyes bu 'am/ gang 'dod pa de dmar bor rnam bar bsams la/ de'i snying khar rdo rje lcags kyu 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i lcags kyus 'bab sa bzhin
pa dang/ zhags pas med pa nas bcings la 'gugs bzhin pa 'dod pas myos par gyur pas rab tu gsal bor bsam par bya'o// bdag nyid nor dang bcas pa 'gugs shing dbang du 'gyur pozhes
bya'o// o bur Ni ma Atsakra brtani hUM/ 'di'i sbyor ba ni dri chen cang rdo rje chu la sogs bas dkyil 'khor byas la/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gis mnyam par mchod la// de na gnas pa'i sgrub pa pos
gling ngam// gling gzhan dang grong khyer dang/ grong dang/ yul 'khor gyi rgyal por bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o// des padag po nyid du 'gyur zhing longs spyod pa la longs spyad nas bde ba can gyi 'jig

rten gyi khams su skye ba thob par 'gyur ro// oM blo ku tA re tutam ta hU~M/ lha mo khro gnyer can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ dgra'i rkang rjes kyi rdul blas la/ dug dang/ tshwa dang/ ske tsho dang/ khrag dang/ chu bo'i

'gram gnyis kyi sa dang dri chen rdo rdzo chus pa smos lo gzugs bar n byas la/ mi'i rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phur bus tshigs dang gnad kun la btab la/ thod pa kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag ste dur khrod kyi

ma la gdung bar bya'o// zhag bdun du sbyor ba byas pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sems la sdig pa med par gyuran zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// oM mahA shrI ye ma Ni
pad+ma hU~M// lha mo 'di la dra dang/ me tog dang/ mar ma dang/ bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis so sor mchod la bzlas pa byas na thams cad du bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yul chos kyi rtsod pa las rgyal
'dabya// por 'gyur ro// sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// nor chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// yang na bad+ma stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na rgyal por 'gyur ro/

oM badzra pad+mashAs ra pad+me hU~M/ rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma 'di yid kyis bzlasan dbang dang dgug pa la sogs pa byed do// lan bdun mngon par bsngags te gtsug phud mdun na rang srung zhing rims
dang lkog nad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ mtshon dang/ me dang/ rkun po dang/ seng ge dang/ glang po che dang/ sbrul dang/ 'ching ba dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ sha za'i nad stong phrag gcig bzlas
pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan cig gi las kyis brjed byed kyi gdon dang// zad byed dang/ skyag pa dang/ bri bor dka' ba dang/ sgom par dka' ba'i gdug pa can gyi sems can thams
cad nyams par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na lus 'phel zhing skal ba bzang ba dang/ lus gzhon zhing nad med par byed cing dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nyams par byed do// yang na klu

thab khung du bris la der dug dang/ skye tshe dang/ tsha ba'i sbyin sreg bya zhing/ klu'i ming dang spel bas 'bum phrag gtsag sbyin sreg byas na char chen po phab nas mu ge med par 'gyur ro// o ba shwa
pany+tsa hU~M/ sna tshogs pad+ma'adi ni rmongs pa dang/ rengs pa dang/ mnan ba dang/ phur bus gdab pa dang/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang/ phur bu dang/ mig 'phrul dang/ ngomatshar dang/ mim
sakhar byed pa dang/ phug tu 'jug pa dang/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ lcags sgrogs gcod pa dang/ ril por dgug pa gang dang gang yin pa rgyud las bstan pa dang/ rgyud gzhan dang yang dag par
ldan pa'i las thams cad byed do/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid gsum gyi dngos grub ster te/ bcom ldan 'dras 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub cing gang 'dod pa'i las
thams cad na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya'o// o bi shwa pad+me hU~M/ sna tshogs rdo rje zhes brjod pa'i lha mo 'das ni ngag gi dngos grub ste'o//tshigs shad mkhan du byed cing gzhan gyi ngag rengs
par byed do// rang nyid srung ba dang gzhan yang srung bar 'gyur ro// rang skal ba bzang zhing gzhan yang skal ba bzang bo'i rang don dang gzhan don byed do// ji ltar 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
rubang phyug sems can gyi don la blos zhing brtson pa de bzhin du/ 'dur bcom ldan 'das mas dmyal ba dang/ yi dgas dang/ byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams sgrol bar
byed do// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnams la ma nyid kyis srung ngo zhes thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de ltar rtog pa'i rgyal po bsdus pa rab tu bstan to// sems

brtan rtog pa med pa yi// blo dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig spyod lam bstan pa yi// sangs rgyas kun rgyu ji lta bar// de ltar 'dir ni rab sbyar nas// de nas rtag pa'i go 'phang 'grub// ji lta
'dod bar gnas byed tsang// kun la longs spyod kun byed ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sang rjes spyod// ji ltar 'dod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'dug pa 'am na las kyang rung// 'chag pa
'am ni gang dang de rgod pa 'am ni brjod pa 'am// gang de ji ltar don bzhin no// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'i m// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa yang// rang mos lha yi rnal 'byor bdag/bsod namA
chung ba'ang 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// thams cad mkhas pa nyid dang// thams cad rdo rje bas [“”]'chang nyid kyang// skya ba 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// yang gsung
pa rnal 'byor dag ni gzugs brnyan gyi// bcos ma'i sku las 'gyur ba min// byang chub sems chen la ban na// rnal 'byor dag na de lha yin// khrag chen po dang ga par bcas// tsan dan
dmar dang bsres pa gi tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na// kun las mchog gyur bcud len no// sbyor ba bzang po 'di las ni// bcud kyis len na smra ba ru// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe bzang dang//
nad med bde ba bzang bo 'thob// grub pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin pa dang// gzungs dang sa yang de bzhin 'grub// bde skyon thams cad thob 'gyur zhing// rang nyid so so
rjes su 'grub// sas rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid kyang// sangs rgyas kun ni rab 'grub 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi sdod

pa byed par 'dod cing sems yongs su dag pa med na de'i tshe thang sku'i sgrub pa bshad de// bsnyen gnas dang ldan zhing sbyang bar gnas pa'i lha bzos/tshon sna ma 'dres par ris gsar pa de'ang rang rang gi kun tu khru

pa'i tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ ze'u 'bru'i dkyil du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das mdog

dmar ba mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal gsum pa/ zhal gyi gtso bo ni dmar ba ste 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi phyir ro/ g.yas ba gnag pa ste zhe snang chen po nyid kyi phyir ro// g.yon pa dkar ba ste gti
mugachen po nyid kyi phyir ro// phyag drug pa bya'o// g.yon pa'i phyag gcig gis gos dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'khyud pa dang/ pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa dang/ g.yon pa gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu
bsnams pa'o// g.yas pa gsum du khab kyi phyag rgyas pad+ma kha 'byed pa dang/ me tog gi mda' dang/ lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis gnas bar bya'o// shar gyi 'dab

ma la rnam par gzigs ma mdog dkar mo pad+ma dmar po dang rdo rje phyag na bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la lha mo sgrol ma ljaparu rgya skyegs kyi shing gi lo ma dang rin po phyag na bsnams pa'o/

nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la bru ri nas ra mo ut+pal sngon po dang 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi 'dab ma la khro gnyer can pad+ma dkar ser lta bu pad+ma ser bo dang ral gri phyagan bsnams pa'o//
bya// shar phyogs kyi mtshams su pad+ma'i gos can ma gser lta bu'i mdog btsod lta bu'i pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs kyi mtshams su rdo rje pa'i dbang phyug ma nam mkha'i mdog can

dkar po pad+ma dang shel gyi 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi mtshams su sna tshogs kyi pad+maston ka'i zla ba lta bu dkaMr ser gyi mdog brlanag po dang po ta phyag na bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi mtshamA

su sna tshogs rdo rjes sna tshogs kyi mdogacan du byas la// sna tshogs kyi rdo rje dang sna tshogs kyi pad+ma bsnams pa'o// de ltar pad+ma la bkod cing bris la/ sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams rna mtshams su'o// jahUM baM

ho'i yi ge las yang dag bar byung ba'i lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa dang/ lcags sgrog dang/ dril bu rnams ni shar la sogs ba'i phyogs rnams su'o// yang thang sku gzhan brjod par bya ste/ ston ka'i zla ba/
lta bu'i dkar ser gyi bcom ldan 'das g.yas na skud pa dang/ dbyug pa dang/ rtse gsum dang mchod sbyin pa'i phyag can gayonan pad+madang/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ zhags pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen
pa'i dam tshig ki po ti bsnams pa'i phyagacan/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'chang ba/ sbrul mchod phyir thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan la 'od dpag med bzhengs pa 'am skyil krung phyeng bas/
gnas pa dbu rgyan du byas pa'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyichar sgrub pa bo mchod yon gyi snod dang bdug spos kyi snod lag pas gzung bar bya'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das phyag gnyes pa ra gru 'dzin
la gnas shing seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs pa/ g.yon pa la gnas shing zhabs g.yas ba ba d+ma'i steng ga gdam stengs su bzhugs pa'o// phyag re re na 'phreng ba bsnams par sems pa pos 'phreng
ba'i 'og tu 'dren pa'i tshul 'dis bsam par bya ba ni sems pa lta bur gnas pa zhes bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das dkarazhing dmar ba phug bcu ba ra dgas seng ge 'i gdan la pad+ma'i steng du

skyil krung byed bas bzhugs ba/ g.yas na 'phreng ba bsnams pa'o// seng ge dang/ glang bo che dang/ che dang/ sbrul gyis 'jig pa rnam las grol ba'i cha byad can no// g.yonan pad+ma dmar po sdong bu gnyis

pa steng du bo ti can te/ rkum dang/ lcags sgrog gis btsangs pa dang/ mtshon dang/ theg chen bo dang/ sha zas zo ba rnams sgrol ba'i cha byad can no// gnas de brgyud du sgrub ba bo rgyan thams cad kyis
brgyan pa/ yan lag thams cad khongs su rdzogs pa/ sngon bzhin du langs pa 'am 'dug par bsam par bya'o// gzhan yang cho ga ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das sna tshog
kyigazugs 'chang ba/ dbu bcu gsum pa/ spyi bo'i mgo bo na ljang khu'i rta zhal lo// yang na zhi ba sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal lo// phyag brgya pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sna tshogs kyi
mtshon cha bsnams pa'o// yang na zhal brgya ba phyag stong ba 'ong bya'o// kha cig tu rdo rje skyilamo krung gis gnas pa'i m bzhengs pa'i ng bya'o// ma pa lta bu'i dkar ser rgyu bcom ldan 'das so//
thang sku de kun gyi g.yas phyogs kyi bar du sgrub pa peme tog dang/ mchod yon gyi snod dang/ bdug spos kyi snod lag pa na gzung bar bya'o// de rnams kyi dbu la dbu rgyan du 'od dpag med

pa 'am/ chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten bri bar bya'o// 'di ni thang sku'i cho ga 'o// thang sku'i mdun du rtsa ba'i sngags ji lta ba 'dod pa de bzla zhing bsam gtan yang byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la/

mchod yon snod dang/ yongs su gang ba'i bdud rtsa lta bu'i zas dang/ sgron ma 'i zas la byas nas mchod yon byin te sngags gang 'dod pa de bzlas pa byas na/ de la gsungs pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// gsang ba

rgyu ni sngags 'di nyid/ khacig la yang mi sbyin no// blo ldan sems can don brtson pa'i// sems brtan pa la sbyin par bya// mchod rten las byed nyid la ni// blo ldan 'bad bas sbyin par bya// ranganyid dang ni nor dag

gis// bla ma la rtag gus par bya// rdo rje slob dbon rnal 'byor la// mchog tu gyur pa' yin yang dbul// gang dang gang ni gtang dka' ba// mchog tu gyur bar 'dir ni sngags// chung ma sring mo dang yang ni/

bu mo dang ni tsha mo dag/ bu mo rgyan kun brgyan par bya'o// glang chen rta dang shing rta dang/ phyogs dang grong khyer rgyal srid dang// yul 'khor rgyal srid ldan pa dang// rin chen sna tshogs dag kyapan// gzhan
yang rdo rje slob dbon dbul// rdo rje slob dbon dgyes gyur ba// thams cad rab sbyin dbul bar bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rtog pa rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzam+b+ha la dang
bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong ba las bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//rgya gar skad du Ar+yas man+ta b+ha dra nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun bzang
po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcomo ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung bo'i ri la//

dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tshub tshugs te/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha 'bu 'bum phrag du mas yongs su
bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yA
ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyarab bdun nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das deng bdagan bdag gis de bzhin gsheg

kha zla ba bla ma'i 'od las blangs pa kun tu bzang po'i gzungs yang dag par ston par 'tshal te/ gzungs de thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams phyir mi ldog cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang sel to// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i ng yongs su 'dzin to// lus rnam par dag pa'i ng
'thob go/ ngag rnam par dag pa'i ng 'thob bo/ sems rnam par dag ba'ang 'thob bo// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs bar bgyid do// gzungs rgya mtsho thams
cad kyang 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mnyes par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs 'di thos ma thag tum skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dpa' bar

'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rachen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ 'bar ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang

thob ma zad pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob/ phyogs bzhu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob ste// bcom ldan 'das de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin

bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdog la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das des na bdag de ltar dran pa 'di lta bu dang ldan/ blo gros 'di lta bu dang ldan/ chags pa ma mchis
ba'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan zhing/ mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i don mchis par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag thos pa don mchis/ gzungs 'di thos pa'i don
amachis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad cing 'khor bzhi po de'ang yongs su dgod du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems ma dag pa de'i dus la da bab par shes
na smyos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor bzhi bo 'di ni byin gyis brlabs zin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skad cig
thang cig yud tsam de nyid la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gzungs 'disas so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

snying chen bo dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ kha ga me kha game/ tsak+Sha kha ba/ bro dra kha pe/ glu Na kha be/ dza ha kha be/ ga la ya kha be/ ma na kha khe

sarol te/ sa ra kha be/ sa ra kha ba/ yun tu kha le/ a na mite kha pa/ a bra Nihi ta kha de/ sa mA d+haM kha pe/ pA ra mi tA kha khe/ bo d+hi kha le/ sa ra sa ras ra/ sarba bud d+d+ha a d+hiT+Thi ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/

d+harma a to/ ka la ka la kal/ saM g+ha a d+hitaM/ na mo dAn ba naM/ bud rgyu ko NaM/ ad+hin du man/ tsa ta sra par shado A yur ba la tsa da ngan du/ tad+ya thA/ su ra b+hi su ra b+hi/ ma hA su ra b+hi/mun

muni/ mang+ge mun/ ma ta ma ti/ ma hAmu ti/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatA ya/ mahAsatu ya ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa sri dAn du man/ sa man b+ha dra d+ha ra Na sAnA/
gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dpagacu med ba dag/
ni gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// gzungs 'di'i cho ga na 'ad lags te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phongs par gyur pa'i tshe lan bdun yade la bgyis na thar par 'gyur ro// mas nad thams cad
la rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rlung gis zin na mar dang 'bru mor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlos brjod bgyis te bsku bar bgyi'o// so nan so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
bzlas te bca' bar bgyi'o// rna bo nan ras bal gyi sa bon 'brumar dang lhan cig tu bskol ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod kyis rna bar blugs par bgyi'o/ klad
pa na bal 'bru mar ro// lta na ba la khyab par bgyi'o// gdon gyis btab pa la tshon skud sna lnga la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlos te mgul du gdags so// mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis
btab na 'bru mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gshis thams cad du byug go/ nad thams cad la byab par bgyi'o// 'din sgrub pa ma mchis pa'i cho ga'o// ci ste sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang/ gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mthob pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ mi sna bar bgyi ba dang/ mig bsku ba dang/ ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub par
tsam 'tshal na/ des sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor bgyis te bum pa gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzhag la/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bres
te me tog sna tshogs kyis rgyal par bkang la/tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang/ kun tu ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ mar me brgya rtsa brgyad bud cing mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ tshangs par spyod pa
gtsang bas gos gtsang ma bgos la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyigazhi 'di dag gis mtshams gcad par bgyid do// na mo rata tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki teshwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahAsatwA
ya mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hi li ban d+hami/ ma la ban d+ha mi/ iyi ma la ban d+ha tsha/ sIm ban dz+ha mi/ bdag gi mtshams las su'ang 'da' bar ma gyur cig swAhA/ chu la lan nyi shu rtsa
gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs banur mtshams gcad par bgyi'o// gang gis 'gugs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di dag kyang thog mar brjod par bya'o// na mo rata tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba
lokiteshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA sata ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsa la tsa la/ ma la ma la tsa le la/ a he b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya swAhA/ 'di ni bdag
