gi snying po bshad pa ste/ des bdag la dgog par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas bzung ste/ nya'i bar du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/
dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyi/ dus gsum du khrus bgyi/ dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bco lnga la mchod pa chen po bgyis te bzlas brjod dpag
tun mchis par bgyi'o// 'on tang nam gyi lung thun la 'phags pa spran ras gzigs dbang phyag gser gyi kha dog gi lus dang ldan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa
dang/ lus las 'od zer bye ba stong 'byin cing mchi bar 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par ma bgyid cing brtan par bgyis na mthong ma thag tu sa thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs
dang ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur ro// shar phyogs su de bzhin gshegs ba mi 'khrugs ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su rin chen tog dang (nub phyogs su 'od dbag med dang/ byang
phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med dbag tu med pa dag rags pa'i tshul gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'di
nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnamu su skye bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems dba' de dag dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/
@#/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ mi rang/ lha ma yin dang/ dra zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
ba kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan mi tra dang/ dA na shI la dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/
skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab ba//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yanI la kaN+NanA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'dzegs pa nA la
kaN+Da zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag
'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag
nges par shes rab chen po'i mig thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal// bdag nges par sems can thams cad yongs
su skyob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'otshal lo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzig/
[p]// dbang phyug thugs rje chen bo can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du shes pa chen po'i grur zhugs par gyur la// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can
khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las rgal bar gyur cig// btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la
ts+tsha 'phrog par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du chos kyi sku dang gcig par gyur cig/ gang gi tsho bdag ral gri'i ra la mchi ba na ral gri'i ri de rapanyil zhing zhig/
bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag me ma mur gyi nang du mchi ba na me ma mur de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du mchi ban sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin
gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba na yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi ba na de dag ga sems
0 rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tsho bdag dud 'gro rnams su mchi ba na de dag ye shes chen po rang thob par gyur cig/ na mo rat+ta tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shar ya/ bo d+hisata ya//

ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban d+han/ ts+tshidan ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu drits+tsal Na ka rA ya/ sa bya d+ha pra sha ma naka rA ya/ sawa i tu pa dra ba/ bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye tshu tA

NA ya/ ti s+ya nag saM taM/ i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ tabanIl kaN+Da/ namA pa ra ma ho da yaM/ a brta yi byai/ sarba at+tha sA d+ha nAn/ shu b+ha tse tanaM/ sarba bud d+hanA ma/ pA ba mAr ga ba sho d+ha

tad+ya thA/ A lo ke/ A lo ka/ A d+hi ba ti/ la ka/ kAn+ti/ e bya hi ma lha bo tshosatA/ heha mahA bo d+hi sat+ya/ he pe ya bo d+hisatA/ ham hA kA ru nika/ srid yaM a phye ru Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya pa ram me tsit+taM

kAruNika/ ku ru ku ru kamasA d+ha ya/ sAd+ha ya/ bi rgyun/de nyid him/ a raM ga maM ga ma/ bi haM ga ma/ sid d+ha lo kI shAr/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bIts+tshan+te/ maAr+ya d+he/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hAr NishA ra/ tsa la tsa la/

ba ma la mu Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ kr-idzin/ dza TA mu ku Ta/ A lo kri ta/ sha pur lam ba/ bu lasu ba la ba/ ma hAsid d+ho shud d+ha d+har/ ba ya ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ mahA ma la/ tsa latsal

mahA tsa la kr-i pak+Sha kyi 'a gnang+ge tan/ ho pad+ma hAsta/ tsa ra tsar/ nishAtsa ri shwa ra kri'u sarba kri ta ya dzI pa tIta/ e+e him hAb ra/ mahA ba rA hamu la tra pu ra/ dahane shA 2/ nA ra ya NA/ rU pa ba la be sha d+ha ri/
e phye hi nA la [”]T+Tha/ e pe he ma hA pAl b+ha la/ bi ShanaN+Di ta ka s+ya rA ga ba ba ba na shan/ dwe Sha ba Na ba no shan/ mo ha pa kha ba cha shan/ dulu hu lu/ ma h+phu hu lu yur/ mahA pad+ma

nAb+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bu rgyu/ bu rgyu/bo d+ha ya bo d+ha yA mi ta banIlakasmra e bye hi/ bA ma spyi ta mahA siha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsamuny+tsa/ mahA'u has/ e ce he b+ho b+ho ma hA sid d+ha//

yo gAshwa rA/ b+hAn bcu/ btsan/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bitan/ snar sma ra tAm b+ha ga paM/ lo kAn ba lo ka hU~M/ tathA ga tan/ de ha da hi/ me dur/ sha na ka mas+ya/ da shanaM/ pra sA d+ha ya swAhA/ sid d+hA

ya sAhA/ ma yA sad d+ha ya sAhA/ sid d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya swAhA/ nIl kaNA ya swAhA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya hA/ saM hachu lA ya sAhA/ mahAn ra saM ha mu khA ya sAhA/ badzrahas ya sASh+Tha/ sid d+ha bi d+hu rA

ya sAsh+tsa/ ma hA sid d+ha ba tu d+ha ra ya swAhA/ bad+ma hasta ya swAhA/ oM sarba ta ta ya lho pa pa ya sAhA/ mahAmA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swAhA/tsaka u d+ha d+ha rA ya swAhA/ shaM kha shab+ha ni rI nA da na ka rA ya swAhA/

bo d+han ka rA ya swAhAbAm Di ta kar+Nade sha kr-iT+ThadzinI ya swahA/ bya sgyusaMmaNi bA sa nA ya swAhA/ lakeshA rA ya sAh+pha/ mahA yo gAgarA ya swAhA/ sarba sid d+hi shwa rA ya swAhA/ rak+shar k+Sha maM swAhA ku ru ra//
mutsi nI sAhA/ na ma Ar+ya ba a ba lo ki te shwa rA yaM/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid rgyun men pa dA nI sAhA/ 'phegs pa ni kaMn+d+ha'i gzungs rdzogs so//
@#// bod skad du/ snying rjem bshel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/gnod pa thams cad las thar par mdzad pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/
'byung po thams cad nges par bzlog pa/ sems can ma khom pa brgyad du lhung ba rnams yang dag par sgrol ba la phyag 'tshAl lo// de la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/
gis bshad pa'i gzungs thugs rje chen po ma bshol ba zhes bya ba 'di brjod kyis/ thugs rje chen po mnga' ba bdagal dgongs su gsol/ 'di lta ste/ o jo ta dza ta/ dza ti dzi ti/ dz+wa tu dzA t+yaM/
tar ta ra/ ti ra ti ri/ d+hu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki la ki li/ ku lu ku lu thugs rje chen po mnga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dus pa rjes su dgongs te gshegs su gsol/ tsa ta tsata
tsa ti/ tsu tsu tu/ byang chub sems dba'athams cad kyi smon lam gyi sprin du rjes su dgongs te thugs chen po mnga' ba myur du gshegs su gsol/ ra la ra la/ ril ril/ ru lu ru lu/bsam
gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i gzhi las bzhengs su gsol/ tsa la tsa la/ la li/ tsu lu tsa lu/ bo dz+habo/ eha e/ bud d+ha bud rgyu/
bya// sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang/ chos kyi bden pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi bden bas bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol/ byams pa chen pos 'byung po thams cad bzlog tu gsol
thugs rje chen po'i sngon gyis bdag gi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ b+hun d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hun/ ma tha ma tha/ pra tha ma pra tham/ bzhengs su gsol bzhengs su gsol//
tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ las sbyang du gsol/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya swAhA/ mahApad+ma hasU ya sAhA/ pad+ma A sa nA ya sAhA/ shA ta
mA u pa ba tA ya sAhA/ kari tin AhA/ shu la ne swAhA/ tsakra Ni swAhA/ badzra Ne sAhU/ ti Ni driya sAhA/ hriN tre ya pra hor pA ya swahA/ A kAkA ya sAt+tA/ shasha ni swAhA/ pra tsa ba ta

ya swAt+taM/ ya ma ye swAhU~M/ ya ma blud ya sAhA/ aN+Dadzod+mo ts+tsha te swAhA/ dzar yu dze g+ho b+hu ta b+husAhA/ saM so da tshe blo b+hu te b+h+yA/ o pa pa tu ka byo b+hu tesgyu/ ba tikasbyo b+ha d+he byas hA/ be d+ha tiko blo b+ha d+hi

sAhA/ T+Thake blo byA d+hi byas hA/ sa ni na pa he ke sbyo byA d+him+musAhA/ sarba byA d+hi ts+tshasAhA/ b+hume a ra Na tsAr+ya skyo b+had+hi byas hA/ 'di lta ste/ ThatsA Ta/ paN+Di Ni/ ju chu rlargyu/ bdag 'jigs pa tham

cad dang 'tsho ba thams cad las srungs shig swAhA/ gra sa gra se/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra mtho/ han han/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra AdzA pa ya ti swAhA/ snying rje mi
bshol ba zhes bya ba'i gzus rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/ saM han da tananA ma/ bod skad du/ seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma/
gsung gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dus pa'i dbang phyug tu bsgyur te rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs dang/ lam mas ji ltar sbyang/ e ma ho sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i
mchog sbyan ras gzigs seng ge sgra zhes bya ba yod de/ des smon lam sbyang ba dang/ bsod nams dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags par yid la byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa cu'i
dbang phyug langs te gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras so// na mo ro tAyA ya/ na mo Ar+ya ba leka teshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a

kaTe/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Ni/ ka Ta ka Te/ ka ro TaM/ karo kaMza/ bA swAhA/ oM mAts+tshahi/ si hanA da hUM/ hUM hUM dz+wa khaM hU~M/ o~MAhU~M/ oM ba la na sgyu/ dzA dzab pu h+phu pa hUM/ sarba a rma ta hU~M/

o ba rta yi/ ma hA ba li/ hUM hUM hudzasAhA/ o b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sa ma ya NidzahU~M phaT swAhA/ oM ta pa te hUM phaT/ sid ti ka ra hU~M phaT/ oM ba ru Na A gats+tshaya kA gats+tshaya/ ma hA nag gi sa ti sawaM
b+hur thusAhA/ o b+ha ga ba ti shu tis tis ma pa ti/ sa ra ma ti sa di rgyu sAhA/ oM Ag+hihUM swAhA/ thuhi// oM sa ha nA da hU~M phaT phaT/ nA ga du ba la mA ra ya phaT/ dzA la dzA la hUM/

phaT/ o a bag+hAn kr-ita hU~M/ oM ak+Sha ye a ti bya/ a b+hi sa ma ya ya sha/ ma hA kra ye ha bya/ ka bya ma snyan ya swAhA/ oM b+ha ba ga ag+ha pe/ An+ti ku ru swAhA/ AtsAhasaM ha nA da padzra tsakra bcu la ki ka hUM hUM hUM/

lo kot+ta ra Ni saM ha nA da hUM hUM hUM hUMn hUMn saM nA da hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM sA/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di namaN+Dal gyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'o// gsad dang/ phyir ldog pa dang/ gdug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ zhi ba'i las

yin te/ nang par ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas maN+Dal byas te/ mngar gsum lag pa'i mthil du mnyes pas klu'i zhe snang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ 'di ni klu'i sde dpon zhes bya ste/ seng ge 'i stang du zla ba la/ rgyal po
rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs//g.yas na thod mtshan rtse gsum la// drag po'i rgyal rigs dbang du bsdus//pad+ma'i rtse la thod pa ni// 'phrin las bzhi ldan ku mu da// shes rab sbyor ba'i ral grir bcas//

dka' thub ldan pa'i sku de la// rig sngags rnam par rgyan pa po// gsum dang lnga na mdun du 'phyang// rtse mor 'od dpag med pas brgyan// seng ge 'i cha las byung ba yin// 'dam skyes dmar po'i lo ma gnyis/
pad+ma bzhi la sngags bzhi ldan// rang lus 'og gnas thal mo sbyor// sku la 'dud cing 'phrin las byed// rdo rje'i gdan lam bskyod pa'i// thugs ka nas no sngags 'od 'don// lo ba gsum du ldan pa'i
sngags// nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po rgyud 'di la smod pa'i sems can de nas ngs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la stod pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po

rgyud 'di nyan pa dang/ sems pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ tha na 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag la rgyal chen bzha'o lha dang/ sumacu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang/ tshangs pa'i bu dang/ tshangs chen
rnams kyis srung ba dang/ skyab pa dang/ sba ba dang/ kun tu rjes su 'brang bar byed/ debs ches lhag pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bu la mas srung ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur
ro/ bdud kyis bar du gcad par minus so// gang shi 'phos nas nub phyogs bde ba can pad+mo las skye bar 'gyur ro// mngal gyi sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di ma dang chu'i 'jigs
pa las thar par 'gyur ro// 'dir namado tsam smos su zad kyi/ de ma yin pa gang 'dod pa thams cad bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang rgyud 'di la gnod pa dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ tshul
bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed na/ de la lha'i bu dang/ klu'i bu khyed rnams kyis srung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dang/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag rab tu dga'
nas tshul bzhin du khas blang bar byas so// de nas gzhan srung ba'i phyir bdags dkar po la lan du mar bsngags n bar chad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// seng ge sgra'i rgyud ces bya ba
rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di tu pradz+nyA kA ra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos khug pa lhas btsas kyis zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yab lokiteshwarAya saM hanA da na ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i
gzungs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brapar bo
po Ta la'i rtsa tshon/ rin po che'i khang bzangs rin po che dang/ mu tig dang/ nor bu dpag med kyis smras pa/ 'od kyis stong gsum khyab pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis kun nas brgyan
waM pa'i sa phyogs de na byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med drang/ nyan thos chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la sogs pa dge slong rab tshumang pos yongs su bskor zhing/ bcom ldan
'das seng ge 'i gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dug par gyur ba de rang gi stan las langs te/
tsha bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha nargyal bo dbang phyug 'od ces bgyi ba 'khor dang/ btsun mo dang/ longs spyod phun sum tshogs po dang ldan pa las/ rgyal bo de la mdzad ng/ phol mig/
dang/ dbugs mi bde ba snying nad 'bar ba byung ste/ de ri ltar bsal bar bgyi/ bcos ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal sngon 'jig/
rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'jam dpal khyod nyid byang chub soms dpa' shes rab chen bo zhes bya ba yin la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa'
snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba yin pas/byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis stong gsum du sems can gyi don la gshegs pa la seng ge dkarapo gcig dbang du bsdus te chibs pa byas/ sku la
rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ ral gri dang/ pad+ma dang/ ut+pal thogs nas phyin pa la/ rgya mtsho chen po la rgol ba'i dus su seng ge bzhag nas 'khur
res byas shing byon pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po khyod nyid ni grogs la phan ba'i sems kyis rang gi ral gris rang ba kum mo// byang chub sems dpa' sAng rje mchog gi
bsam pa la steng 'og bar snang gi klu dang lha la sogs pas bsad dam snyam nas btung ba'i snod bram ze'i thod pa lag na thogs/ dwishu la rtse gsum pa lag na thogs/ seng ge dkar po
la zhon/ mya ngan du ral pa thod du bcings nas steng gi lha la bsdogs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas/rang gi grogs pos spangs nas gcig
pu lus/ lha rnams kun gyis nyesan chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing lha rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces smras te lha rnams la tri shu la gdengs pa dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi/
dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ khams gsum gyi lha dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste/ lha'i me tog bad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang tsam pa ka la
sogasab khul te thodapa bkango// de nas bar snang gi lha dang// klu dang/ dri za dang gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ grul bum dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci la sogs pa la bsdigs pa/
tsha tIshA la gdengs nas/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas bas rang gi grogs pos sbyangs nas gcig pu lus// sde brgyad tshogs kyis nyes na chad pa'i las// grong khyer 'joms shing ste brgyud

'gums par bgyid// ces smras te sde brgyad la cha shu la gdengs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na rin chen dang/ dri za'i rgyal bo zur phud lnga pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ lha ma yin gyi
rgyal po thags zangs ris dang/ ma 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa rta mgo can dang/ grul bum gyi rgyal bo sbrul mgo dgu pa dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can la sogs pa 'khor mang po dang
bcas pa dga' ba'i mdangs phyung ste seng ge la rin po che'i rgyan phul lo// de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu la bsdigs te/ snying rje'i stobs kyis sems can don byas pas// rang gi grogs pos sangs nas
gcig pu lus// klu tshogs rnams kyis nyes 'char ba'i las/ grong khyer 'joms shing klu rnams 'gums par bgyid// ces smras po rgya mtsho chen po tIshu las dkrugs pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa

dang/ klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang/ klu'i rgyal bo 'jog po dang/ de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'bum phrag drug
g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa 'dus kyi dga' ba'i mdangs byung nas/ klu'i rgyal po b.ru Nasprul dkar bo gcig tu byas nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying
rje can// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// klu rnams kun gyi mgon mdzod cig/ nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/ ces smras nas tid+d+hishu la lan gsum dkris/ kha byang chub sems dpa' la bsgyur/
phuphuzhes brjod cing gus pas kha nas khrag 'byin cingag nas so// klu'i rgyal bo gzhan rnams kyang thal mo sbyar nas bskor ba lan gsum gsum byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can//
khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o// klu rnams thams cad skyabs su zung/ nyams na klu yi gshed ma mdzod/ ces smras nas klu chen po brgyad sbrul dkar po gcig tu byas nas tshangs skud la
btsa/ @#// 'khris so// klu'i rgyal bo de rnams kyang bdag cag ni bran bgyid do// ci bka' stsal pa nyan no zhes smras nas klu rnams so so'i gnas su dengs so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems

dba' de ni snying rje klu 'dul zhes bya'o// snying nad sel ba zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' shos rab chen bo de 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge khyod nyid yin no// de'i dus kyi

byang chub sems dpa' snying rje mchog de ni da lta'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra klu'i ded dpon chen po 'di nyid yin no// 'jam dpal ngas rgyal bo chen po de'i don du thugs rje chen

bo'i sngags brjod par bya'o// yid la zung zhig/ na mo rat+ta tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya bal kita thA rAya/ bo d+hi satA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te nika rtse/ ka taM ka
karoTi/ti dz+wa la ka ro ta'aru swAhA/ gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cus gsungs la/ da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod pa'o// 'di'i cho ga ni ma dgos pas las thams cad 'grub pa'o// bcom

ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra'i sku lugs ma 'am/ bris sku'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor ma 'dres par maN+Dal brgyad byas te/ maN+Dal re re la me tog tshom bu
lngalnga bkram ste/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ phye ma rnams kyis mchod nas/ man+d+hal re re la gzungs lan bcu gsum bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlos la lci ba de bsdus te/

lci ba lhag ma la sngags shing nad pa la byugs na nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuro// lha dang klu la sogs pa'i dug gi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la grub par ma gyur na/
'jam dpal thugs rje chen po nyid kyis mtshams med lnga'i las byas pa yin no// 'jam dbal thugs rje chen bo nyid kyis dam bcas pa'i tshig go/ 'jam dpal rgyal bo chen po'i gnod pa ni
gzus 'dis snying nad 'bar ba las grol nas skye ba phyi ma la bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal nyon cig/ sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba
phrag dgu bcu rtswa dgus snying bo 'di gsungs so//o Ats+tshahiwas ha nA da hU~M phaT/da ltar nga nyid kyis brjod de/ rig sngags kyi snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur ro//
srid pa nyam par 'gro ma 'gyur// lus la mtshon gyis tshugs ma 'gyur// dgra dang chom pos ma tshugs shing// klu la sogs pas 'tshem 'gyur// rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// bud med
lus su mi 'gyur zhing// rtag tu skye ba dran bar 'gyur// shanas bde ba can du 'gro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/
log par dad sel dang// gser thub dang/ 'od srungs kyis kyang gsang sngags 'di gsungs la/ da ltar shAkya thub ba ngas kyang brjod pa ste/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ha ya grwa bA ya/ na mo lo
ke shA rA ya tad+ya thA/oM b+hi lulu lu nA la kaNA/ hu lu hu lu/ tang tits+tshi 1 ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hAhAhA/ badzra kro d+ha ha ya grwa ba b+hihUMphaT/ 'jam dpal
gzungs 'di 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid pad+ma hayagi ba'i sngags yin te/ lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/ sdig ba kun las grol 'gyur zhing/ ngan song sgo rnams gcod par 'gyur/
klu sogs gdon gyis 'tsho ma 'gyur/ byad dang dug las grol 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no// bye ba grangs me mthu las byung// de yi yon tan dpag tu med// lan gcig bklag
na sdig pa sel// lan gnyis bklags pas dpal dang ldan// gsum gyis tshe rnams ring bar 'gyur// 'bum phrag bcu yas zhal mthong 'gyur// pad+ma can gyi zhing der 'gro// 'jam dpal
mi gzhan dag la ni// khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ rlung dang grang ba las gyur pa dang/ klu rgyal rigs kyis zin pa dang/ klu bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa dang/ klu gdol pa dang dmangs
rigs kyis zin pa ni snying ma dga' ba dang/ snying na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ lto rgyab dun ba dang/ klad kor du na ba dang/ gzhogs phyed du na ba dang/ ma zhu ba dang/ lces pa dang/ zha grum

gyis btab pa dang/ sbrum pa lta bur na ba dang/ srog chags su na ba dang/ tshigs dang sha khol bur na ba dang/ za khu can dang/ lud pa glo can dang/ rul khol du na ba dang/ 'phros pa dang/ zha ba dang/
yi ga mi bde ba dang/ phor ba lta bu'i nad dang/ sbyin can dang/ dmu chu can dang/ 'bras dang/ me dbal dang/ lhog pa dang/ gag ba dang/ chu thig can dang/ grong lhang lhang dang/ tshe tsag tsag la
sogs pa'i garagis can dang/ phol mig dang bcas dang/ lha dang/ bdud dang/ tshangs pa dang/ gshen rje dang/ brag srin dang/ sems 'khrug gi gdon dang/ thab gzhob dang/ mtsho
sman dang/ klu la sogs pas zin pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung pa dang/ log 'dren dang/ sha za'i gdon rnams kyis zin pa dang/ nad sna tshogs 'byung ste/ de'ang ma dag ba las
sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal nyon cig/ sAri bo gzungs kyi tshig 'di/dang po thugs rje chen po/

la gus shing dad pa'i sems bskyed nas// snyam pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya// lce la drir bcas byugs nas// tshon rtsi kha dog sna lnga yis// dkyil 'khor pad+ma lta bur bri// bum pa gang ba lnga dag kyang
phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru gzhag/ gang ba'i gtor ma lnga yang bshams// seng ldeng phur bu lta yang dgod// dar gyis dkris pa'i mda' bzhi dgod// tshon skud lnga yi dra ba bre// 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo'irgyal po rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo// a UsipaM taMnaM/ yi ge drug pa'i sngags 'di ni// brjod pas sdig pa sdug bsngal sel// swAhA/ sangs rgyas
mchod la brtsod par bya// me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sos dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ phyo ma dang/ rgyan thams cad kyis mchod/
nas/ seng ldeng rgya shug ma btang ga/ tshon skud bcang zhing 'bru rnams sreg/ rma bya skyagashad lhug ma yis// klu yi dug rnams sel bar byed// hU~Mtsin ga le la/ nA ga dum ba le la/ nAg phud phud/
@# ha le ha la/ hA la A la/ spu Ta spu Na/ nA ga khrol khrol shig shig swAhA/ klu dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yod kyi dug dang/ mthong ba'i dug dang/ bcings pa'i dug dang/ kha rlangs kyi dus
dang/ reg pa'i dug dang/ dug thams cad phyir phud cig swAhA/ dug 'dir ma 'dug zhig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song zhig/ 'dzin pa'i nang du song zhig/ me'i nang du song zhig/ chu'i
nang du song zhig/ zhi bar gyur cig swAhA/ 'jam dbal 'dagan de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o// sihUM hUM hUM khaM/ rigs lngas dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje srung ba'i mchog
tu 'gyur// bkra shis lha mo dbal dang ldan// bsnyen gnas la ni gnas gyur nas// dkon mchog rjes dran sems bskyed nas// bum chu dag pas las sgrib sel// lus ngag sems kyis dag pa thob//
pha rol phyin drug gnas rgyur cing// sas rgyas sems mkhyen bar gyur// ting 'dzan thams cad mngon du 'gyur// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// skud pa dkar bo sum sgril la// bzlas brjod
nyi shu brgyad bzlas nas// mgul du btags na nad las grol// nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la// gzungs sngags bzlas shing btab gyur na// nad rnams kun las grol bar 'gyur// chu la
gzungs sngags mang bzlas na// klund khong du sel bar 'gyur// lo tog za ba kha bcing na// bye ma sa dang thal pas sel// ha cang char ba ches pa na// lha la phul ba'i nang pa la// kham
por gsar pa'i nang du yang// ma tog gtsang ma blangs nas ni// bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur// ser ba drag po 'ong ba na// thal chen nyung kar bzlas brjod kyis//ser ba nya lcibs
lcag ma dang// lcam bo btags te btsugs gyur na// ser ba 'chad par 'gyur ba yin// lha klu dri za la sogs pa'i// gdon na gnod par gyur pa la// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la///
bum ba gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste// sman sbyar chus na gang ba la// bzlas brjod brgya nas brgyad bzlas// slob ma gos zas dkar por sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhug/ bum pa'i chu yis
bkru bar bya// nad dang gnod pa kun las thar// klu sogs gdon rnams dpag med kyis// glags kyang med par mi 'gyur ro// bus pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la// gi'u wang gis ni srung
'khor bri// yungs kar dag dang bcas te gdags// byis pa gdon dang nad las thar// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// thu ba g.yas pa'i gos kyi gar// bzlas brjod pan/ a mdud
ba bor// song na bde zhing don yang 'grub// rta la sogs pa'i phyugs rnams la// chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la// bzlas nas gtor na bde bar 'gyur// mi nad phyugs nad thams cad la// yungs kar
dang ni bum pa'i chus// bkru zhing btags na mi nad ni/a tsAr ya gzungs sel ltar// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dbalargyal po 'di'i khongan klu'i dug gis gang nas 'dug ste/ 'di ni klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na 'dra yis klu thams cad la dbang byed pa yin pas 'dis dbyung bar
bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po taklu ka la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po mthal[%]pas

la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal bo pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po pad+ma chen po la phyag 'tshal go/ klu'i rgyal po dung skyong la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan la phyag 'tshal lo//

klu'i rgyal bo dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ba ru Na ya swAhA/ oM a nan+ta ya swAhA/o bsu kA ya swAhA/o tam+b+ha kA ya swAhA/o kano Ta ya swAhA/o pa ya sAhA/
0 oM ma hA pad+maswAhA/ oM shaM kha pA lA ya swAhA/ oM ku la kA ya swAhA/ klu yi gzugs na mang po yang// dkar gsum mngar gsum 'bras zan la// legs byas kha dog bsgyur byas la// me tog spos
dang byug pa dang// mar me zhal zas sgra snyan dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ma tog 'phreng// tshangs pa'i skud pas mnyes par bya// rtsa ba lo ma sdong bu dang// mo tog 'bras bu sman gyis
mchod// mabya gzugs mi ma lags// rgyal po 'ong ga dug thon cig/ rin chen rmag shad ma chod pa'i rgyun// mi ldog pa yi rdzas su chongs// bum pa gter gyis gang ba mdzes// srog chagA
yid 'ongs gzugs kyis mchod// zhi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// klu yi rgyal po 'jog po yis// zin kyang skad cig gcig la thon/'jam dpal 'di gzhan gyi mthu ma yin te// 'phags
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i mthu'o// stobs so// byin gyi rlobs so// thugs rje dang ldan pa 'di'i yon tan brjod kyis mi lang yang bdag gi cha shas tsam zhig brjod na// oM bcom
ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// khur bor bdag don rjes su b.res// srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang dag bkag las rnam par grol// sems dpa' dbang sgyur thams cad kyis//
mchog tu pha rol phyin thob pa// srid las brgal zhing tshogs gnyis rdzogs// A/ gzhan la phan brtson thugs brtse can// sems can kun la mchog tu byams// khams gsum kun gyi
gnyen gcig pu// mtha' yas sems can sgrol la mkhas// hru'agro ba nyam thag kun tu skyob// dri ma gsum spangs pha rol phyin// mngon shes drug brnyes n+ya gro ba// skyes//
bu chen po'i mtshan rnams// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes// sku mdog shel gyi kha dog 'dra// gangs ri nyi shar lta bur mtshan// sku tshad che la 'od zer
'bar// rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku la 'gro// dbu skra thor tshugs rkyen la mdzes// dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// klu rnams thams cad 'dul mdzad pa// rtse gsum sbrul gyis rab tu
dkris// rigs gsum mgon po'i byin rlabs 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod la bstod// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma bsnams// shes rab phun sum ral gri 'bor// nyon mongs dag pa bram
ze'i mgo/ me tog dri zhim tshog sakyis bkang// rnams kun nas dbang bsdus pas// sbrul gyi tshangs skud mdzes la bstod// sa ha/ brla dag gi gdan la bzhugs// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon
mdzad pa// seng ge dkar bo'i gdan la bzhugs// 'dod pa'i don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// ba spu nyag ma re re yang// sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur//
phyag 'tshal thugs rje can la bstod// dam chos rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// lhamo sgrolas rjes su 'brong// 'jigs pa brgyad skyob skumadog ljang// gnod pa sel ba mi 'jigs sbyin// ut+pal
thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// btud de sprul pa mang po 'byed// hUM/gos dkar ma ni bka' bzhin byed// yid bzhin 'khor lo bde bar bskor// 'dod pa'i don yod sdug bsngal zhi// 'jigs pa

brgyad po sel la bstod// phaT/ ha ya grwa ba khro bo'i sku// 'phags pa rta mgrin bdud bzhi 'joms// kro d+ha mgrin sngon gdug pa 'dul// klu bdud 'dul mdzod hU~M gis bstod// na ma mkha' klu rgyal ba ru/

[E/ ]chu lha ston pa'i zhal mthong zhing// bstan la rab dga' klu rnams 'dul// sa dang po yi bden pa mthong// bde bar gshegs pa'i ring bsrel 'dzin// klu rgyal byang chub sems la bstod// oM tA re tut+tA/

re tu re swAhA// oM ka pa kaze na ka Te/ ka taM ka ra swAhA/ gang gis bstod cing zlos pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i ng yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par
'gyuro// gsang sngags thams cad bzlas bar 'gyur ro// bsal pa stong gi bar du ngan song du mi skye'o// bud med kyi lus su mi skye'o// su zhig nang bar langs nas chu dri zhim pos khrus byas te gtsang
sbra la gnas nas// thugs rje chen po seng ge sgra'i spyan sngar gzungs 'di klog gam/ 'dra 'am/'chang ngam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du bton nas snying po dang gzungs sngags zlosan ni/ de'i
lus la mdzad ng/ shu ba dang/ 'ol mig dang/ 'bras dang/ bas bsngags dang/ me dbal dang/ g.yan pa dang/ lhog pa dang/ gag pa dang/ lces ba dang/ dmu chu dang/ skal ba dang/ mkhal
[p/ ]@#// ma rdol ba dang/ don snod du 'dus pa dang/ byad kyi dkyil 'khor la nad sna tshogs 'dus pa dang/ glo ba na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/ rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa thaA/
spacad las thar ba 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzungs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs ba thamacad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ su zhig gam rgyal po des gzungs 'di glegs bam la bris te 'chad pa
dang/ klog pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po yul 'khor dang bcas pa 'am/
tshe/ gtsug lag khang du glegs bam 'di 'chang na/ dpal nag po chen po dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ klu'i rgyal po ba ru Na dang/ klu chen po brgyad rnams slad bzhin 'brang zhing/ dpag tshad
stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang/ log par 'dren pa dang/ phyir rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// sgom nyes pa
dang/ bri nyes ba dang/ sngags nor ba dang/ phyag rgya nor ba dang/ bshad nyes pa dang/ mnyan pa nor ba'ang gzungs 'di bklags pas dag par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'disasu la bsrung ba byas
pa dang/ yongs su bskyab pa byas ba dang/ bskyang ba dang/ zhib dang bde legs su byas pa de la mtshon dang/ dug dang/ dbyig dug dang/ byad dang/ gshed ma dang/ rims dang/ gnod pa thams cad
dang dus ma yin par 'a mibs ma tshugs so// gnod par byed pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/
nyan thos chen po shar dwa ti'i budang/ lha dang/ mdang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'bag
ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug seng ge sgra zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//(kha che'i yul dur khrod 'bra sa ka rang byung gi mchod rten rtsar dngos grub brnyed pa'i rje btsun
ma rdo rje sems ma dang/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba 'gar shes rab 'byung gnas zhes bya bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//tsa#// na mo rat+taM
tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo du satA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM akaNe/ pa ka tre/ ni ka'u/ ka TaMka'adakaro Te/ka roTishAr+ya sAhA/ bcom ldan
'das de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas so sor maN+Dal brgyad byas la/ mal re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du bzlas la/ lci ba lhagam la sngags bzlas te nad pa la nye bar
byugs nand thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma bdun nam/ bcu gsum mam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa na ma yin no// de ltar ma grub
@# @#// na bdag gis mtshams med ba lnga byas par 'gyur ro// seng ge sgra'i gzungs rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang//
klog skya shes rab brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//@#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra yA nA ma asha ta kan/ bod skad du/ 'phag
ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi u0f00tshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ra po Ta la'i rtse mo na me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzam bun dA'i gser gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/ rin po mo sna
tshogs kun tu 'bar ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byed dang/
tshas pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mi dang/ mag min ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ma gror byas/ mchod cing bkur stir byas
yongs su bskor nas mdun du byas pa la chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar dudago ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang bo/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yongs
su dag pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su gsal ba/ tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs ba la sogs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
go 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bya ba byas shing byed la mkhas//khur bor bdag don rjes su brnyes// srid pa sbyor ba yongs su zad// yang
ngag bka' la rnam grol sems// shes rab shin tu rnam par grol// klu chen po na cang shes po// sems la dbang sgyur thams cad kyis// mchog tu pha rol phyin pa thob// ye shes tshogs ni yongs
su rdzogs// srid pa'i dgon pa rab tu brgal// gzhan la phan pa mdzad la brtson/ thugs rje dang na 'brel ba'i thugs// skye dgu kun la [“] mchog tu byams// bde bar brtson pa byam las byung//
mtha' yas sems can grol la mkhas// bde bar gshegs pa nyid las skyes// bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi bka'// khams gsum kun gyi gnyen gcig pu// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug

med// dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// rig ba gsum gyi pha rol phyin// mngon par shes pa drug kyang brnyes// n+ya gro d+ha lta bur zlum// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang ldan/
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kyang// sku ni rnam pa kun tu brgyan// sku mdog gser gyi kha dog 'dra// sku tshad che la dkar sham po// na ga ge sar gzhon nu ltar// cung zad dmar ba 'dra ba'i mdog/
[# ]// dbu yi thor tshugs dag dang ldan// thor tshugs mang pos nye bar g.yogs// dbu la 'od dpag med pa bzhugs// 'od zer dag ni rnam par 'phro// 'od 'phro 'dom gang rab tu 'bar
gser gyi ra 'dra grags pas khyab// gzi brjid dag kyang rab tu che// shar gyi ri la 'a char ba yi// nyam 'a gtsug gtor dag dang ldan// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba yis// se ral khar ni sku phyed brgyan/
sa dag la na rab tu mkhas// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams spyod// tshul khrims ma nyams ral ba med// mthon ka seng ge 'i ral pa 'dra// sku na 'jam zhing ldem bag can// gzigs shing/
lca gshegs pa khyu mchog 'ad// g.yas su 'khyil ba'i dung yang 'dra// dpral ba zla ba kham pa 'dra// dpral ba'i dbyibs kyi rgya yang che// smin mtshams bar yang yong ma chad// shangs kyi dbyibs
kyang cung zad mtho// mgur yang bum pa'i mgrin pa 'dra// dpung pa dag kyang rab tu zlum// phyag sor rnams kyi tshigs kyang rang// sor mo 'jam zhing cung zad dmar// phyag sor rnams kyi bar
'grel ba// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthal rnams la// 'khor lo dag gis rab tu nga rgyan// ston ka'i pad+ma 'dra bar mdzes// sku mdangs 'jamashing shangs kyang rgyas// gsung na tshangs pa'i dbyangs
ltar snyan// yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur// blta na sdug cing mdangs dga' ba// pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma dag las kun tu skyes// pad+ma dag gi gdan la bzhugs// phyag
ca na bad+mabazang bo bsnams// ril ba spyi blugs phyag na bsnams// khri snyan sa le'i pags ba mnabs// dbyag pa dang na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// bkra shis dag gis gtsang mar gyur// snga nas/
gsung zhing gsong bor gsungs// bdud rtsi'i chang ni rab tu 'bebs// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// sems can thams cad dga' bar mdzad// bzang po snang ba'i ljon shing ltar//
sems can kun gyi gsos su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyin stsal pa lags// bde bar gshegs pa'i cha lugs ma'// bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bsrel 'dzin// ba spu nyag ma rer yang/
sems can rnams kyi gtso bor 'gyur// bsod nams mdzad cing dge ba mdzad// bgol ba med tsang nges par mdzad// rab tu drag pa'i brtson 'grus can// 'khor ba dag las rab tubargal//
dam chos rgyal mtshan mnga' gsol ba// yid bzhin 'khor lo dgi ba sbyor// don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren// ha ya grwa ba bdud bzhi 'joms// kho d+ha mgrin sngon gdug ba sel//
lha mo sgrol ma rjes su 'brang// khro gnyer can ni bka' bzhin byed// rgyal ba can n tshul dang ldan// mthu chen ldan zhing dbang ldan//yon tan ldan zhing byams dang ldan// shes rab ldan zhing
dpal dang ldan// tshul khrims ldan zhing don dang ldan// don rnams kun na rig pa po// the tshom thams cad gcod pa bo// chos rnams thams cad smra ba po// 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa
kho zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 'dra// sku smad rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gser gyi mchod sdong 'dra bar gnas// 'od zer nyig stong bas lhag/ tsho sa gas sdug gyis/
[– ]ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis gang zhig bstod pa byed pa de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i las kyi sgrib ba yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil
'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du'ang ngan 'gror ma skye'o// mnar med par ma 'gro'o// a u0f74 nag 2 4
par langs nas klog gam/ klog tu 'jug gam/ kha ton du 'don na mi de'i lus la mdzo dang/ shu ba dang/ glo na ba dang/ dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad las thar par
'gyur ro// skyes so cog tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gar skyes kyang
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang ma 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rtag tubazlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' bar 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan par
'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad laM mkhas par 'gyur ro// bstod pa 'dis bstod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma drug cu rtsa gnyis snyed la mchod pa byas par
byatsa'agyur ro// rnam par smin pa'i ng de dang 'dra bsan bye brag med do// rgyal thams cad kyi rang bsrel rin po che za ma tog ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya
rtsa brgyud ba rdzogs so//// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa lo ki te shwa ra s+ya nA ma aShAsha ta ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyud pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dusan/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs bkram pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser khadog bzang po ltar snang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs
na bzhugs te/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen bo dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te mchod cing rjed nas/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to//
tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang bo/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag
[r]! thubya/ khar rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa ma dzad pa[.]mdzad/
spa rgyu mdzad pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su bsal ba/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang mkhyen pa/
glang bo che chen bo dang/ sems na bams cad kyidabang dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba/ gzhan la sman pa//
thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ skye dgu la mchog tu mnyes gshin pa/ bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzad pa/ byams pas zhugs pa/ sems can mtha' yas pa sgrol ba
la mkhas pa/ bde bar gshegs kha'i sras po/ srid pa gsum gyi sku lag gcig pu/ 'dod chags ma mnga' ba/ zhe sdang ma mApa' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum
sbyangs pa/ rig pa gsum gyi pha rol tu gshegs pa/ mngon par shes pa drug b.rus pa/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/
dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa/ pags pa srab cing mdog ser bo/ sku ring rgyu bzang zhing dkar bo/ sku shang gi me tog gsar ba dang dmar rangs lta bu'i dbu thor tshugs mnga'/
0 ba ltung la 'khyil ba mang pos dbu khebs pa/ 'od dpag med kyis 'od zer btang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'od 'dom gang gis gser gyi ra ba ltar snyan par grags pa// gzi brjidi rgya che ba//
gzugs 'char ka'i ra lta bu gtsug tor mnga' ba/ nor bu rab tu 'a bar pa mchod phyir thogs pa sku la se ral du thogs pa/ sa rab tu rnam par 'byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i zhabs
dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims ma nyams pa// tshul khrims ma zhig pa/ seng ge ltar thong ka phel ka che ba/ sku 'jam zhing mdzes pa/ gzigs pa dang gshegs skabs khyu mchog gi dbang po 'dra ba//
mkhur ba g.yas su 'khyil ba/ dpral pha che zhing zla ba kham pa 'dra la thig la mnga' ba/ phyag pus mor bsleb pa/ smin ma bar ma chad pa/ shangs mtho ba/ mgur bum pa'i mgrin pa
'dra ba/ phyag sor mo dang tshigs rang ba/ sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/ phyag bar dra bas 'brel ba/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los brgyan pa/ ston ka'i bad+ma'adra ba//
sku 'jam zhing rgyas pa/ tshangs ba ltar dbyangs zab pa/ yid du mchi ba/ sdug ba/ blta na sdug pa/ nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pad+ma 'dra ba/ pad+ma las 'khrungs pa pad+ma
las byung ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag na pad+mamanga' ba/ phyagan ril ba spyi blugs bsnams pa/ ri dgas nag po'i pags pa mnabs pa/ phyag 'khar bsnams pa/ bgrang/
kha'i nor bu bsnams pa/ gtsang ba stsangs pa/ gsong por gsung ba/ bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu/ blta na sdug pa'i shing 'dra ba/
[– ]sems can thams cad mos par mdzad pa/ dga' bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa/ bde bar gshegs ba'i sku mnga' ba/ bde bar gsheg
pa'i ring bsrol 'dzin pa/ ba rer skyes pa/ sems can gyi snying po/ bsod nams mdzad pa/ dge ba mdzad ba/ nges par mdzod ba/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba/'khor ba las shin tu 'das
ba dam pa'i chos la rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba/ sgrol ma zhabs drung na gnas pa/ khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/
mthu rtsal che ba/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ zhi ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thugs su chud pa/ the tshom
rnams gcod pa/ chos rnams gsung ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi ston ba/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa/ sku skyed pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis smras ba/ gser gyi mchod
sdong lta bu/ sku nyis stong bas lhag par mdzes ba/ tshangs pa'i dbang po la sogs pas phyag bgyis pa lags so// gang la la zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan
brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags thams
cad grub par 'gyur ro// bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams med par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// su zhig nang par langs nas 'don tam/ klog gam/
kha ton byed na de'i lus la mdze dang/ rkang shu dang/ lud pa dang/ mi bde ba mi 'byung zhing nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i
bu dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tsho'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs so cog tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur
ro[： ]rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// dpa' bar 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur/ bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med
bar 'gyur/ tshag btsun par 'gyur go/bstod pa sgrub pa 'dis bstod pa byas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis snyad kyi bye ma snyed dag la mchod pa byas par
'gyur te/ rnam par smin pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrol

pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo ba pu la ba ma na su pra tiT+Thita a sang lA ya/ sUr+ya sha ta

ba/ sarba satA pa ri mo tsa kAkA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+hur rgyu ba swAhA/ ma hA kA la ka ka ra Na tam ste ma ra pa ta la bar sha ka/ rwa ga te kha ma hAmo ha dza la sha ma ka/ sha sa ka ra rak+ta ka/

sarba a pa ya durga ti pra sha ma ka/ sarba satA sa ma shA sa na ka ra/ sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta saM b+ha na kar/ he he ma hA bo d+hi satA/ ba ra ba ra da ya kA/ pad+ma A lo ka saM b+ha ta/

mahA kA ru Ni ka/ dza TA mu ku TA/ a lang ka ta shir/ ma Ni ka na ka rA dza/ sha ta badzra be DUr+ya a lang krita sha rI ra a mi tA b+ha dzin ka ma la a laM kri ta/ dra b+ha ra Na rA dzA na sha ta sa ha

nAg/ pa ru Na sA ga ra/ bu ru Sha sa hi ba ha/ ba ra dza/su dan ta ba ri bri ta/ d+ha ma d+hu ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ra/ brasha sa ya phra shas ya/ pra d+han saya pra rnyan sa ya/ sgur sgyur/ b+hir//

rnyir/ bab+hi'i brnyir/ ba ra ba ri/ ba ba ri ba bo ri/ tsar tsar/ sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ tshu tsa maM tsa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hu na/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ gA ya gA
gA d+ha ya gA d+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra ha sa bra ha sa/ nAnA ba bi d+ha ke sha bA san/ ha ra ha ra/ saM hAr saM ha ra/ d+hur Ti tu ru Ti/ ma hAmaN+Da/ a laM kA ra Na/ sha tadra se ka/ a pa b+hus/
ma hA ba Sha sha ma ka/ ma hA bo d+hi satA ba ra da swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das lag na pad+ma'i lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs byang chub sems dpa'i khang bzang dam pa/ rdo rje chen pos
legs bar gsungs pa/ lha dang/ klu dang/ sbyin byed ma'i bu dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lha ma yin chen pos bstod pa/ re ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed pa 'di sgrib pa chen
bos bsgribs pa gang la la zhag nyan tamo/ 'chang ngam/ 'don tam/ klog gam/ mthong nas legs par rtogs par byed na/ de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad
yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// nang par langs nas lan cig 'don na lagan pad+ma phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yid la gang dag 'dod pa'i dgos pa bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par
'gyur ro// gcig bu rab tu dben par 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba mngon du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na bad+marjes su dran par byas la lan
bdun brjod na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de'i ngan 'gro thams cad 'gag par 'gyur ro// yud tsam zhig 'chag cing
'dug la yid la brjod na bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag du mar bsags pa'i las 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor los sgyur ba stong gis bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung bo chen po/
dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs tshe rabs su'ang pad+ma'i rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro// skye bo khyad par du 'phags pas bkur bar 'gyur ro// me tog dri zhim pos snyim pa
globakang ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan bdun brjod na yon tan chen po stong thob par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po'i chos nyid snang ba'ang de la skye bar
'gyur ro// dam pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de nyid kyi gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na bcom ldan 'das zhal rtag tu bzhad pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
kho/ mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ chos snang ba'i gsal ba dang po dri ma med par byed pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems
mnyam bar bzhag bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par byed
bar 'dod na/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba rtsub la sbyang ba byas la gos dkar po bgos te/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsan dan dkar pos dkyil
'khor bskus la/ dkyil 'khor de dang bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das dar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri zhim po'i bdug pa dang/
maram dang/ spos kyis bsti stang byas te/ de nyid du 'dug la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ des sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ mtshams med pa byed pa'i ng sdig pa byang
'di shin tu yongs su dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus dang/ ngag dang// yid kyi spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
kyis rtag par rgyun du ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ dbang bskur ba'i stobs dang/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang/ yo shes khyad par can gyi stobs sgrub par mdzad do// gnam la
gyen du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na char 'bab bo// sa la bltas te bzlas brjod byas na lo tog thams cad legs par 'gyur ro// 'bab chu dang/ mtshe'u dang/ rdzing bu'i shul du bltas te
bzlas brjod byas na chu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad la lag bas byab cing bzlas brjod byas na sos par 'gyur ro// dran pa nyams pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas na
dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// bkres pa dang skom pa'i gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod byas na phyid par 'gyur ro// mi ngas chen po byung na ras la bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags te/ dpag tshad
tshun chad mtshams bcad pa dang bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lus kyi dbyibs mdzes zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+wa barmadang/
zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+hi yi shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a b+ha ya pra dAnA ma a pa rA dzi ta/ bod
paN+NaM skad du/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// grub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal las grol bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can/
thams cad kyi bcings pa gcod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'jigs pa med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gi gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// las kun byed pa dge ba ste// 'byung po kun gyi 'jigs pa med// bdud rtsi'i las ni bdud rtsi 'byung// 'di na las kun byed pa yin/
dgra kun 'jigs par byed pa ste// brjod dang de bzhin 'thab pa dang// gzhan yang dgras ni 'khor ba dang// rtsod pa'i nang du rtsod byed dang// rtag tu dgra dang phrad pa dang// rmugs par byed cing
rengs par byed// rmos par byed cing sdig pa sel// dug dang me ni dengs par byed// rims dang nyes sdug thams cad sel// chom rkun dang na chu dang sbrul// rmilam ngan pa thams cad sel//
'byung pothams cad zlog pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub 'dren pa dang// chos kun rab tu ston ba ste// 'di ni rig sngags mthu stobs can// gzhan gyis mi thub srin po 'joms// gang tshe
rig sngags 'di 'chang ba// de nas 'di g.yo bar 'gyur// 'jigs med ldan pa zhes bya ba// rig sngags rgyal po bla na med// 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa ste// 'jig rten
gsum bo kun gyis mchod// de nas 'jigs pa med ba sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran par byas nas/ rang gi snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa de bzhin/
[f ]// gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'di smras so// oM ta ra tar/ tAre tAre/ mo rika/ tsan+d+ra pra b+he/ g+hi ri d+hi ri/tsasngatsar/ sur+ya kan/ hem pra/ bu d+ha bu rgyu/ bo d+ha ni/

sarba pA pa pra sham ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba Sha bra sha mnA/ tsar tsar ]tsu ru tsu ru/ sarba bi d+ha rA na ma krite/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hir/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha Tita/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ri pa ra/ pu ru pa ru/

bradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ a nu dzA te/ ShaT pA ra ma tA/ pa ra pu ra/ ga ga na/ d+ha ba lo ko pa ma/ ta thA ga ta/ bgaM ta/ pra tukar/ shu b+ha ka ri/ pa ba tra/ mang ge la rgyu ra Ni/ sarba de ba ta a d+ha[' ]/ sarba

ma hor ga a d+hiT+ThitaM/ sarba kun n ra a d+hiT+Thite/ sarba yak+Sha rak+Sha sa/ a d+hawid+hi pra sA d+ha b+ha ba ti/ a b+hu ShitaM/ tsa tur mahArA dzab+hAShati/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya b+ha Ni// oM pa ra ti ri/ tsan kA ra Ni/ ki li
ki li/ sarba sha tAM banA shan hUM phaT swahA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dapa'
mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa la 'di skad ces smras so// ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa/ gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du
byung ste/ de las bdag gis 'di dag thos so// de las bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ sems can thams cad la'ang bsnyad do// ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa gzhan gyis ma
thub pa'i snying po 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnam par gzigs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ 'khor ba 'jig dang/ gser thub dang/
'od srungs dang/ shAkya thub pa rnams kyis gsungs so// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po 'di ni bdag srung ba dang/ gzhan srung ba dang/ gnyis ka srung ba dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer
dang grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang srung ba dang/ srog skyong ba dang/ tshe sbyin pa dang/ lag pa rengs par byed pa dang/ 'thab mo dang/ 'thab pa dang/
'gyed pa dang/ rtsod pa thams cad zlog par byed pa// dgra thams cad zlog pa// 'ching ba thams cad grol bar byed pa/ thams cad du gzhan gyis ma thub pa'o// shud d+he muk+ti phra/ b+h+yA swa re
nA te pad pA ra bAsan/ sarba duShAn dzaM b+ha yA mi/ stam b+ha yA ma/ mo ha yA mi/ oM swahA/ sa ba tre swAhA/ shwa ti swAhA/ shA ta pa ta pra ba ti sAhA/ tad+ya thA/ ta re ra re/ ta ra rak+Sha
rak+Sha/ sarba ka le/ kal ha/ bgrwa hA/ bi b+ha ta/ duThasAb na/ b+ha ye byas hA/ rtag tu le lo med par ni// gang zhig gzungs 'ad 'chang byed pa// de la lha tshogs thams
// cad kyang// dus kun tu na srung bar byed// den 'jig par 'gyur ba med// de ni rtag srung lhan ra 'dug/ ji ltar nyi ma sa steng na// gzi brjod grags 'chang lhan ne/
bzhin// de la gshad byed byad stems dang// srul po dag gis mi tshugs te// de la dpal yon 'jug par 'gyur// kha dog dang na tsha yang 'phel// 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'jig
pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA basmad ng/ zhu chen gyi latsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal
lo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sAng rje chen bo dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye dza ye/ mahAdzaye/ dza ya ba hi ni/ ji yod

tar/ ka la ka la/ ma la ma la/ tsa la tsa la/ spyi na kAn/ sarba karma/ A ba ra Na ni/ me sarba dz+nyA na a d+hiT+Thiti swAhA/ na mo b+ha ga ti ha sa pra b+ha dz+ha/ sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki ta tsak+Sha/ khro tAsh+tsa Na dzihA

kA ya ma no ba t+yA dzAn ba sho d+hani swAhA/ phur phu ru/ su ru su ru/ phur phu rA/ pra phu rA pra phu rA/ sarba bud d+ha a d+haT+Thi ti sAhA/ d+hamad+ha tug lhe swAhA/ a b+hA ba sAhA/ sarba d+harma a ba bo d+hani swAhA/
[d/]gzungs 'di 'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod bas kyang bskal pa stong gi bar du las kyi sgrib ba bsags pa thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa thob
par 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi bar du lakhor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro// tshe brjes nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshosangs rgyas stong
mthong bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// nyin sa gsum mtshan dus gsum nyishu rtswa ri'i brjod na 'dod pa rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshog
pa'i sku gser gyi mdog can yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yul rnams la'ang mi phyed pa'i sams dad pa can du 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa phan yon tshad med pa
dag 'byung ngo// stong 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ pa la ni/ pra b+hu lo kan/ dzAb ha ba ri shod+ha ni/ d+hi da na yag ma/

AshA pa ri sho d+hani/ sarba satA ma no ra the/ kA ya sid d+ho shu tid+hA ra Ni ta d+hA ra Ni swAhA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba argya'i so shang la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas tenang re zhing zas na//
nyin gcig la sholoka brgya brgya lobs so// zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya longs pa rdzogs so//
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
tad+ya thA/ khal kha la ba la te swAhA/ gdong 'khru pa'i tshe rmukhyor gangal sngags 'dis lan gsum mam bdun bzlas te 'thungs na/ nyin gcig kyang yi ge she lo ka brgya lebs bar 'gyur te// sngon
labs pa rnams kyang brjed par ma 'gyur ro// sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so//@#// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bI re bI re/ ma hA te dza te dza ma ti d+ha ra Ni/ shwa ta d+ha ra Ni dza yan te
bi dza yan ti ma ti d+hA ra smi sAhA/ sman bran hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du 'thungs na/ gdon mi za bar
thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos pa nyin zhag gcig la sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lebs pa'i
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ trid+d+hishA tri shu lashA khi/ Ar+ya pa lo ke shA rA ya/ A dzA pa ya ti/ ba re na bu ha la/ srid d+hA tu swAhA/ chog ni 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyag gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la/ chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas/ nang par chul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha
zas 'o ma dang sngags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// yid ches pa'i rtags yod do// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
(@#// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsa karna la la te swAhA/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad
dga' bar 'gyur ro// de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang sprugs te
bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro// sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//
(@#/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//

tad+ya thA/ sba tim tam ti/ te dzA bi d+hA/ h+phu ru ma ha ra hu ru kr-iSh+Tha hu ru me sAhA/ shu dag dkar bo la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ma brjod
pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//dbye// rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha na nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs na mo rataM
tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kati shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwaya/ ma hAsatAya/ tad+ya thA/ sba la te/ sku la te/ ma na ti sAhA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ khyor chu la lan gsum
bzlas te 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyod pa'i gzus rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na garlu dang// lo tsa
ba khan b+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bcu kAr si ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban D+ha de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//

rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar hananA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rat+na b+ha yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satA ya/

mtshA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ che ba ba ba ba/ pradzabar d+hani/ dzar dzar/ mi d+hu bar d+ha ni/ d+hi'i b+hir/ bud d+hi bar d+ha na sAhA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'ad yin te/ nang re zhing chub mo
khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungasan thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shes rab bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/
dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/
sba ti ma ti ma te/ te dza ba hu ru me shu ru shu ru me/ kr-it+taM hu ru me sAhA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par
gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga a d+hin/ satA A lo kan/ bud d+ha te san daru na cu ha
nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sas rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa
chen bo'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas/ lha'i nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po dang/ me tog rgyas ba dang/ lha'i seng ge 'i khri bkod pan/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge
'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag ba zad pa/ sema' thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang/ byang chub sems dba' thams cad kyang snying rje chen po'i shes
pa la gnas pa thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang/ skye ba gnyis dang/ skye ba gsum dang/ skye ba bcu dang/ skye ba nyi shu dang/ skye ba sum cu dang/ skye ba brgya'i bar dag gis thogs ba/
'a thams cad kyangs brgyad pa dang/ sa bcu pa la gnas pa sha stag ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ dri med tog dang/ nor dpal dang/ glog gi tog dang/
dri med 'od dang/ tsan dan dang bdud tsa tog la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun brgya dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dag bstan ma thams cad kyang lung bstan pa dang ldan pa/ ting
nge 'dzin thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa lnga stong dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za thams cad kyang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ de bzhin gsheg
ba'i cho 'phrul mthong ba brgyad stong dang/ gnod sbyin mo chonamo thams cad kyang byang chub sems dba'i ye shes thob pa/ lung bstan pa thob pa/ phyir mi ldog pa/ dpe med ma dang/ dri med 'od dang/
'od can ma dang/ 'jigs byed ma dang/ dbal ldan ma dang/ 'phrog ma dang/ dung can ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo chen mo brgyad shu dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ rnam thos kyi bu dang/ yul
'khor srung dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig ma bzangadang/ nor bu bzang po'i bu dang/ gang ba bzang po la sogs pa 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyi bar dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
de nas de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs par rig nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i rgyan dang/ na bza' dang/ me
tog dang/ me tog 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par byas/ ri mor byas so// kha cig gis lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te bstod
do de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la dmag pa snying rje chen po'ishes pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus
stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od kyis snang bar gyur cing/ gzugs thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par gyur nas/ sems can dmus long gang yin pa da dag
[7 ]@#// gas na mig gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur to// na pa rnams kyis na rna bas sgra dag thes bar gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams na nad dag dang bral bar gyur
to gos med pa rnams ni gos dag thob par gyur to// skyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni lus dang dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur
to dbul po rnams kyis nanor dag thob par gyur to// sems can gang dag nor dang/ yo byad dang/ longs spyod med pa de dag na nor dang/ yo byad dang/ longs spyod dag dang ldan par
gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang bde ba thams cad dang ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
gang yin pa de dag thams cad la'ang bskul nas/ chos thams cad mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ sems can gang dag lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag tham
cad kyis ni lha'i bde ba yongs su sbyangs nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran bar byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag mi rnams
kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang mi'i bde ba yongs su spangs nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
srin po dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za rnams kyi nang du skyes pa de dag gis kyang/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran paso sor thob nas/ sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang/
lus dang sems bde bar gyur nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// sems can gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su mun pa mun nag gi nang du
skyes pa de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus yud tsam zhig dran pa so sor thob nas/ gcig gis gcig kun tu shes par gyur te/ de dag mun pa chen po de nas yongs su thar par gyur to/
sems can thams cad gcig la gcig byams par gnas shing nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshes chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/
mtho ba dang dma' bar yang gyur to// de nas 'khor 'dus pa der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po kun tu snang zhing/ 'dus pa chen po'i lnga ltas kyang kun tu snang la/
rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag lung ston pa'i ng kun tu snang zhing/ chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam chen po'i lnga ltas kyang kun tu snang ba las
na rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur zhing/ ye shes chen po'ang 'thob par
'gyur gyis/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can thams cad la snying rje skyid la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya
ba'i bar gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus shig/ rigs kyi bu khyi ma'is ma'itshan/sems can sdig pa byed pa/ dbul ba/ nyam chung ba/ lus mdog ngan pa/ rga ba
dang na bas yongs su gzir ba/ longs spyod chung/ lus yongs su ma bsgoms ba/ tshe thung khi/ blo chung ba/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gis yongs su gzir ba dag/
'byung ba yod de/ rigs kyi bu de dag gi don du chos bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba thob cig dang/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis yun ring por sems can rnam
! kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bya ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ re ba thams cad
yongs su rdzogs bar bya ba dang/ bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag byas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
[20/ ]gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dag yid la byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
de lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can rna ba dang/
na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan gyis non par gyur pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pas yongs su gzir ba/ nyam chung ba/ mdog ngan pa/ tshe thung ba/ longs spyod chung ba/ lus yongs su
ma bsgoms pa dag 'byung ba mchis te/ de dag na sor sna dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems kyis gcig la gcig 'gums par 'gyur la/ gcig gis gcig gi tshong dang/ longs spyod dang/
dbang phyug dag 'phrog par 'gyur zhing/ gad mo dang/ 'jo sgeg dang/ bro gar dang/ rtsed mo dag gis mngon pa rtsa ba dang/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du
shes par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de dag rgyud dang gzhi des sems can rnams la mi dag ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis gtses nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye
gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur lags bas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag gis de dag gi don dang/ sman pa dang/ bde ba dang/ re ba thams cad yongs
su rdzogs bar bgyi ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i ye shes thob bar bgyi ba'i bar dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar bgyi ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi
ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la ni gi mkhyen pa dang/ ma rtogs ba dang/ ma gzigs pa dang/
ma gsan pa dang/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cu'ang mi mnga' bas/ chos kyi 'phel ba'i gtam nyan bar 'tshal ba dang/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang/ shes
rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang// dge slong dang/ dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto phye chen bo mang po lhags pa 'ad dag re ba ma mchis par gyur tsang slar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar/bcom
ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag gis kyang yan lag lngas phyag byas tatshig
mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan
gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas/ phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs te sAn cing 'jebs la yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gag/
shangasangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ngas sngon dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snang ba kun tu ston pa
zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar de thos so// rigs kyi bu'i pa na de'i mang thos ma thag tusems can bye ba phrag dgu bcus de bzhin gshegs pa 'i ye shas thos bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyang de
bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu lung bstan te/ ngas kyang lung bstan pa thob bo// rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha' mkhyon bas sngon de bzhin gsheg
pa sum khris sems can thams cad kyi don du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad de/ thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/
khyod ni dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor rnams dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ [}]
dgabasnyen ma'i 'khor ji ltar lcags pa 'di dag gis kyang thos nas ri mo dang mchod pa dag byas te/ de'i 'og tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag
gis la bstan pa thob cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang thob par gyur nas/ 'dod ba thams cad du 'gro ba dang/ re ba thams cad grub pa dang/ nad rnams dang bral
bar yang gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad stongs pa dang/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/
ts+tsa mdzod dang/ bang ba rnams 'byor ba dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po rnams kyis mngon par bstod bar 'os pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os pa
dang/ dran pa dang ldan pa dang/ shes rab dang ldan pa drang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa dang/ tshe dang/
kha dog dang/ gzi brjod dang/ mthu stobs dang ldan zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ nam yang sdug pa dang bral bar ma gyur cing/ sdug pa'i sdug bsngal med
par gyur pa de dran te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos smra ba de la mchog tu gus ba'i sems bskyed de/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yan lag lngas phyag
byas shing/ me tog dang/ bdug sbos dang/ che tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dag gis legs par brgyan nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes/
brjod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par byed pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang klog pa dang/ yi ger 'dribang/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa de dag na yon tan

mang bo dang ldan por 'gyur ro/ de dag ni rmo 'ad nyidi la'ang yon tan mang po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la bltan sdug pa dang/ nad rnams dang bral ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ blo
brtan pa dang/ ngon pa dpaldan ba dang/ brtan pa dang ldan pa dang/ rgyal po thams cad dang/ rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad dang/ rgyal bu thams cad dang/ blon po thams cad dang/ dgra thams
cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod par 'os pa dang/ phyag bya bar 'os pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os par 'gyur ro// nor dang yo byad mang bar yang 'gyur ro//
de dag gi kha nas tsan dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung bar yang 'gyur ro// mag ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro// de dag gis nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag
mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa byas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad zad par yang 'gyur ro// de dag la lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// de dag 'chi ba'i dus na sas
/rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// phrag dog med pa dang/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa med par 'chiba'i dus byed par yang 'gyur ro// sha 'bro
[~ ]nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ yi ger 'dra ba dang/ yi ger 'dir 'jug pa/
dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod par byed pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ ming tsam thos par gyur ba de dag ni ngas mngon sum du lung bstan par lung bstan pa yin te/ de dag gis nga mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas/
ra mor byas/ mchod par byas pa'i ng yin pas/ de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la the tshom bskyed par mi bya'o// gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin
par yid la byas la bsnyen bkur bya'o// de'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs mi mdzes pa dang/ longs spyod med pa dang/ blo med pa dang/ sred pa che ba dang/ sdug pa dang bral ba dang/
rgyal srid 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag dang/ klad pa na ba gang yin pa dang/ zan chad pa gang yin pa dang/ gos ngan par gyur ba gang yin pa dang/ lus dang sems la gnod pa gang yin
pa dang/ reg na mi bde ba'i mal bcas pa gang yin pa dang/ sbo ba gang yin pa'i las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos ba'i mthus yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// des kyang
'di ltar sems bskyed bar byas te/ bdag gis sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams sdug ba mi dge ba rnam pasnyachogs bsags pa de dag so sor bshags par bya'o// bsal
bar bya'o// ma bcab par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la dad pa mi phyed pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i longs spyod kyi
'bras bu med par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ nyan thos dang/ sangs rgyas dag dang/ ba ma dag la sdug ba'i las byas shing bsags
bar gyur ba gang yin pa'i dag thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing/ dbang phyug chen po dag kyang yang dag bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i
sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang/ sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang/ dmus long du 'gyur ba dang/ bud med kyi dngos por 'gyur ba dang//
mtshan gnyis bar 'gyur ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ nga rgyal dang/ khro ba'i dbang gis gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag
thams cad kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na ting nge 'dzin 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yan no// rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas/
bar byed ba dang/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed par byed pa dang/ de dag thams cad kyi yon tan dang re ba thams cad/
yongs su rdzogs bar byed pa dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ bde ba chen por byed pa dang/ bsam pa dang 'dod pa thams cad yang dag par 'grub par byed ba dang/ las thamA
cad zad par byed pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang/ rmilam ngan pa thams cad dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang/ g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar byed pa dang/ tshodang/
mdog dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ mthu che bar byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du byed pa dang/ rims dang/ dug dang//
