ma dang/ chu thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang/ lung bstan pa'i bar dag thub par byed pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag yod de/ de dag mnyan cing bzung ste bsnyen bkur byed
pa dang/ klog pa dang/ yi ger 'dra ba dang/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa'i rigasakyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dgan yon tan de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sa
chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa dang/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor dag gis kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ gros dang/me tog 'phreng ba dang
phyi ma dang/ byug pa dang/ ras bcos bu zung dag gsol te legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de dag gang lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nams ta thA ga tAnAn/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he/ su bud b+he/ budad+ha ma te/ loka ba la ke/ lo ka a ti kr-i te satA a ba lo ka ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+haT+Thin a d+hin+d+ha te/

sarba A A ba ra pU ra Ni/ d+hu tid+ha re/ na ra de ba pA dzitaM/ ta thA ga tAdzAn da de/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha nyen/ sarba lo ka ma su khI b+ha ba tu burma kam ka ba ya tuM/ rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ sarba b+ha ye sh+tsa/ ta thA ga ta
a d+ha nen sAhA/ kyi rigs kyi bu dag gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa sum khris gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// ngas kyang da ltar sems can
thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba ra dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar byaba'i phyir bshad ra/
grogs po dag gang la la zhig 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur snyam du sems pa des nang par sngar langs te/
sems can thams cad la snying brtsakha'i sems dang/ snying rje ba'i sems dang/ byams ba'asems dang/ phrag dog dang/ nga rgyal dang/ 'chab pa dang/ khro ba yongs su spangs pa'i sems dang/
rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/
gang 'dod ba yid la byas nas me tog la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la re re nas dbul bar bya'o// de nas de'i ra ba thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur
ro rmalaman de bzhin gshegs ba mthong bar yang 'gyur ro// dam pa gang 'dod pa de thob bar yang 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i tshon de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar yaba'agyur ro// shi 'phos
nas kyaba'ajig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang/ stobs dang mdog dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan bar yang 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur ro//
gzus 'ad bshad pa na srog chags drug khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag thams cad las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing bsams pa thams cad yongs
tshasu rdzogs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam bca' ba mi 'jigs pa gzi brjid ces bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med bkod pa gzi brjid rgyal po'i
spyan sngar de bzung lags so// bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag gis mngon par 'tshal te/ gang gi rna lam du gzungs
de grags par gyur tam/ glo bar chud par gyur pa de'i lus la nyam chung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs sam/ bro nad dam/ rims sam/ lus bro 'tshal ba 'am/ sems gdung gam
dus ma lags par 'gum ba 'am/ chab kyis 'jigs ba 'am/ mchon gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug gis 'jigs pa 'am/ dug sbyar mas 'jigs pa 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma dang
'byung bas 'jigs pa las/ gnod sbyin nam/ dgra rnams sam/ mi dang mi ma lags pa dag gis mtho btsam pa ma/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni
gnas ma mchis lags so// de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang ba stsol cig dang/ bdag gis chos sa ba dang/ chos nyan pa de dag gi don du nyan pa rnams dang/
ri mor bgyis pa rnams dang/ mchod par bgyis ba rnams dang/ 'dzin par bgyid pa rnams kyi ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam
bca' ba'i phyag rgya dag stsal bar bgyi'o// na masarba ta thA ga tAnAn/ sarba bo d+his nAn/ a ra ha tan/ tad+ya thA/ oM badzra d+har/ badzrakA ya/ badzra ba la/ badzrate dza/ hU~MhU~M/ badzra pA Ni/
ta thA ga ta A dzI lA ya/ snar bra tid+d+haM/ sarba byA d+hi na sarba bA ba nanA sha ya/ de nyi ma/ ya the ba si tam ba ma/ yan yache ba a b+hi pra yatsa me/ tan ma ba sa tshwa d+ha tu//
wa hahe/ tur tu ru/ A gats+tsha A gats+tshA/ ma ba lam bad ri sha ya/ badzra kA yam/ bud+d+ha a d+hin sAhA/ gzungs 'di brjod pan sa chen po 'di mtho ba dang dma' bar gyur to// gnod sbyin
dang srin go thams cad kyang rab tu sbyangs so// lta thams cad dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ sems can chen po rab tu grub bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi
gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bshad pa ni legs so legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag nA
rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa lam/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ longs spyod kyi dbang phyug gam/ rgyal srid kyi
tsa dbang phyug gam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ tshodang/ stobs dang/ mdog dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ tshe ring po nyid 'tshal ba des snga nas bsnyen pa bgyis la/ dgung zla yar gyi
ngo tshes brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje 'dzin pa rta gad du dgod cing/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ snying khar sku gdung stsal ba sku gdung dang bcas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa/ rig
sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid par bgyis la/ gtsang mas bdug spos kyis bdug cing/ gdug mtshan gcig tu sbyang ba bgyis la/ de nas tshes brgyad nas/
tshes bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i gnas gtsang mar tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ bum pa gang ba bzhi'ang gzhag par bgyi/
phyogs bzhir yang ro dang ldan pa dang/ dra dang ldan pa dang/ skyems dang/ 'o thug gi gtor ma dag stsal la/ gos rin po che dkar po bgos te sems rtse gcig tu bgyis nas/ dus
gsum du bdug spos dang/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dag gis mchod pa chen po bgyi zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ng mchod pa bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis nas/
sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing/ re re nas lag na rdo rje la bstan par bgyi'o// de nas sgra skad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ dog sa g.yo ba dang 'od
zer dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ de nas dam par 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis las thams cad dang/ dgos ba thams cad kyang yang dag bar 'grub
par 'gyur lags so// bond ma mchis pa dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ sdig ba thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur zhing/ yon tan stong yang 'thob par 'gyur lags so// 'gum pa'i tshe
na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stonga mthong bar 'gyur lags so// bdag mthong ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje la/
legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// phyag rgya 'don lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ 'di la som nyi med pa dang/ yid gnyis med pa dang/
the tshom med par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni'i slad du ting nge 'dzin 'du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de las ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ lha rnams dang/ ku rnams dang/ mi
rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ dri za rnams dang/ yi dgas rnams dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang/ gshazhi rdzo'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can thams cad kyi semA
dang sems las byung ba'i lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba dag rab tu shes shing/ sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ste 2 legs par sbyod pa'i las byed pa/
sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dag la dang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag na sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba ste/ nyes par spyod pa'i las byed pa// sdig pa spyod par byed par shes
nas/ sdig pa'i lta bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston bar byed cing/ sdig ba thams cad las zlog par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'god par byed pa dang/ bsam pa thams
cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ nga rgyal dang/ khro ba dang/ ser sna dag sel bar byed pa dang/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dag la dang
ba rab tuthob nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye zhing/ nam du'ang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar ma 'gyur la/ yid ma bde bar mi 'gyur bas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di ni
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ste/ 'di thos pa'i sems can rnams na phyir mi ldog
panges pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das kyi'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag lung bstan par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das dgro
bcom panyid kyang dga' ba lags te/ bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags na/ de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po dang dka' baspyod pa nyi tsam/
zhig tu 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ngas dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa yos su rdzogs par byas pa gang yin pa dang/ mgo dang lag ba dang/ rkang pa dang/ mig dang/ lus dang/ sdug pa'i bu dang/ bumo dang/ chung ma dang/ ban dang/ bran mo
dag yongs su btang bar gyur pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byi ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba snga ma 'dis ni/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa
dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang/ klog pa dang/ 'dzin pa'i sod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang/ gzhan dag la'ang yang dag bar
ston par byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin pa dang/ chos ba de dag la'ang mchod pa byed pa dang/ bstan bkur byed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba gang yin/
ba de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu ngas kun chub par byas shing bshad pa'i chos de dag thams cad la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ blamar byed pa dang/ ri mor
byed pa dang/ mchod par byed pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byas te yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'drar 'gu pa gang yin pa de bas ni/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dra ba dang/
yi ger 'brir 'jug pa dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod par byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston par byed pa dang nyan par byed na/ de las bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba chos mang du yongs
su sdud par 'gyur te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang/
'dzin ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang mchod pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'drar 'jug pa'i bsod nams na de ltar dka' ba yin pa 'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu
sems can gang dag sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang/ bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ bro gar la mngon par dga' ba dang/ mi sdug pa la sdug par shes ba dang/ 'dod pa dang/
khro pa dang/ gnod sems mang ba dang/ mi bde ba la bde bar 'du shes ba dang/ mtshon cha dang/ spyob dang/ bsdigs pa dang/ rtog pa la mngon par dga' ba dang/ shes/
par ma 'gyur ba dang/ yid la byed par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sdig pa'i las kyagazhi de dang ma shes pa des ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin cing/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang
mya nganadang/ 'chi bas yongs su zin pas 'tshiba'i tshon yongs su gdung bar 'gyur te/ dmigs pa na so so nas dur khrod dang 'dra ba kho nar mthong ba dang/
dge ba'i sems bskyed par yang ma 'gyur la/ dad pa mi byed pa thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'bos nas kyang yang sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur bas na/
lung bstan pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba med pa dang/ de bzhin shegs pa mamatho ba dang/ lung bstan pa ma thob pa dag gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'dra mnyan pa dang/ rimor bya ba dang/ mchod
par bya ba dang/ gzung ba dang/ yi ger 'dra ba dang/ yi gar 'dir 'jug pa dang/ dad par yang mi nus la/chos sba ba de la'ang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ bla mar bya ba dang/ ri mor bya ba
dang/ mchod par bya bar yang mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul doran/ de bzhin shegs pa'i mdzad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas
ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang chos smra ba de
dang/ chos nyan pa de dag la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan pas bsnyen bkur bgyi/ bla mar bgyi// ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi zhing/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang nye bar bsgrub
na/ bar bgyi lags so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'ang rgyus par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi ste/ des na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
'das kyis/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor rnams la rnam par gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu dag legs so legasago/ khyed cag gis de bzhin du gyis shig/ gnod pa byed pa dang
brnyas pa dang/ bshe ba dang/ sdigs pa dang/ mtshon 'byin pa dang/ rgyal bar byed na'ang lus dang srog la mi blta bar byas nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/ yi ger bri bar bya/
yi ger 'drir gzhug bar bya/ bklag par bya'o// chos sba ba de la'ang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro bya'o// yul phyogs de dang/ gling de dang/ grong khyer de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang/
gnod pa dang/ 'goba'i nad dang/ 'khrug pa dag las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la'ang rtag bar rgyun du bsam bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bskal pa grangs med stong phrag ji snyed du// sangs rgyas 'byung ba lan 'ga' med pa la/ phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar// rigs kyi bu
rnams bag yod chos nyon cig/ yon tan nyan cinga mngon par dad byed pa//de dgagasan ting 'dzin rnyed pa dka'// gang gis rkang gnyis gtso bo rnams lan// bskal pa bye ba gang+ga'i bye snyed
[p]/ du nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// spos dang 'brel ba byug ba phul ba las// gang gis mdo sde 'di la dad byas te// nyan cing klog la yi ger 'dabyed pa// de la bsod
nams tshad ni yod min te// bde ba gshegs pas de snyed tshad ma gsungs// rtag tu bag yod dgon par sten byed cing// sems gzhan med par bsam gtan rtag sgom dang// sdug pa'i bu dang
bu mo spyi'i byed cing// lag pa rkang ba yongs su gtong ba bas// gang su mdo sde 'din 'dzin byed pa// de ni de bas bsod nams mang po 'thob// mdo mchog 'di na nor sbyin byed pa ste// 'di yis

glu ngan song kun kyang rta gzhu las// 'dononor dang 'bru sbyin byed pa ste// gang zhag mdo sde rnam dag 'dra 'dzin pa// de la yon tan kun kyang ma dkon zhing// de la tshe stobs brtson 'grus mod ma yin/
'dren pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong zhing// ngas de sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan na// de la nam yang sdig pa yod min zhing// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams kyang mthong//
tha de la rtag tu las gang 'byung 'gyur ba// sems gdung lus na ba 'am de bzhin du/ klad pa na ba thams cad zad 'gyur zhing// denanams kyang rnam par ltung mi 'gyur// da na mthong ba'i
chos la'ang yon tan kun// ji ltar bsams shing 'dod pas 'thob par 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang// dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal bos rtag tun// mi yi dbang po de bzhin
gdags pa ltar// chos skya ba la rjes su gus byas te// mdo sde 'don rtag tu gzung bya zhing/ 'dzin ba la yang rtag tu bsen bkur bya// sbos dang 'bre ba byug pa rnam dag gis// bsnyen/
bkur byas te ya gir 'drir yang gzhug/ phyi ma'i dus la rgand gdung 'gyur la// 'khrug pa stong phrag rab tu g.yon 'phro zhing// sems dmyal yi dgas rnams su yongs 'khyam dang//

za mam zhing smad par bya ba dang// dmus long nyid dang ro dang khyi yi dri// rigs dma' bud med rnams su skye mi byed// phrag dog che zhing rtag tu sdug byed la// khro bas zil chen rtag tuser sna can//
sangs rgyas chos la gus par ma byas pas// da ni de 'dra'i rigs sa skya 'gyur la// der yang sdug bsngal tshor ba myong 'gyur zhing// de ni phyi ma'i dus la'ang gdung bar 'gyur// de phyir gang
dag 'dzin cing ston byed pa// de dag gis ni rtag tu mchod par bya// gang gis de la yongs su spro ba dang// smad cing 'jigs la btang ba byas gyur la// des ni nga yang yongs su sbyos pa yin/
'dzan la phu dud byas na 'du byas// de'i phyir de dag gsazhi chos sa dang// gang zhig 'ad 'dzin 'dra zhing klog byed pa// de dag la na rtag tu bsnyen bkur zhing// tshig 'jam snyan ba'ang
rgyun du brjod par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te//
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rnam par lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis par rjes su dran
[5/ ]bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzad ye shes tog ces bgyi ba'i spyan sngar de thog shing bzalags so// de mnyan cing bzungal bcangs shing bklags te/ gzhan
dag la'ang bsgrags shing bsnyen bkur bgyis nas yi ger bris sam/ ya gir 'dir stsalan phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
pa'i yon tan de dag thams cad kyang 'thob khar 'gyur de ji ltar bsam pa thams cad kyang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byang
bar 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ bonada rnams dang bral bar yang 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang byang chub sems dpa' yang mthong bar 'gyur lags
so de nas bcom ldan 'a dus kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi
bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs zin gyis shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// na masarba ta thA ga tA nan/ sarba A shA pa ri pA ra kA

nan/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki tishar ya/ ba d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA rA Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha maha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi raM/ shAn te bru shan te/ sarba pA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo

klog/ kA ru tsaka/ bo d+hi'ita ma man sa ku ra bya ba lo kA ya kaM/ sma ra sma ra/ yunu blo lA pAn+te/ sa skya a d+hiSh+Than kr-i tan ten/ sate na sa te pA nen/ sarba A sha che pa ri pU ra ya/ bud d+ha

k+She tram/ pa rapisho d+ha ya mA ma ka byed ba hadaM ka ro bud d+hit+tan nasAhA/ tad+ya thA/ te dzi te dzaM/ ma hA ti dza/ ya mA ma kA ya du ra ta ma pA/ bAg dur taM bA/ ma no dur d+d+haM pA/ dAr bya ma bA/
ta tasarba dak+ta ba ya/ a lokAya/ bal kA ya/ tathA ga tA da ri shan@/ a ham ti kI kAm ya bo d+hi sa tA da ri sha nam/ rgyu d+hum/ da dwa sa ma da ra sha nam/ sadu ma kusha la a b+hi bar rgyun/
sarba ta thAg ta nAn/ nam Ar+yab la ka ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ sma ta pa ti dzA ma ma hA satA/ sid rgyun tu man bA dA swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa na sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing/
ga zha'i sgra chen po dang/ lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs
so sems can chen po khyod sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa//
las thams cad byang bar byed pa/ snang ba dang mi lam ngan pa'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs 'di legs par smras so// bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang gzung bar bya/ bsnyen
bkur bar bya'o// sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras ba/ rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su bsgrags ba'i yon tan de dag mngon par 'dod cing lung
bstan pa dang/ kho bo'ang mngon sum du mthong ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang/ longs spyod dang dbang phyug 'thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing du skye bar 'dod pa des/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la lus legs par khrus byas shing gtsang la bstan te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par byas la/ tshes brgyad nas
brtsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa phyogs su spos dang/ ma tog dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag dang bum pa gang ba dag gis sa phyogs de dang/ chos sgra
ba de la'ang mchod ba byas nas/ lus legs bar khrus byas pa gtsang mas gos dkar po bgos te/ me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ sbos dang/ ma rtog 'phreng dang/ byug pa sna tshogs
tha dag gis mchod pa byas nas yi ger 'dri bar bya'o// 'dra ba'i tshon nyin gcig bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mod byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blo ma dang gus
pa'i sems nye bar bzha gnas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems dang/ snying brtse ba'i sems dang/ snying rje'i sems kyis nyi ma byed tshun chad kyi bar de tsam du bla bar bya'o// tshes
brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa'i ng de bzhan du bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du byas te bris na/ de ma thag tu mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang/ sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'phel bar 'gyur/ brtson 'grus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'di nyid la'ang
lus bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ dargyal dang/ khro ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser snadang srab mor 'gyur ro// des yi gar 'dra
bcu gnas kyang/ sku gdung dang bcas mchod rten gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sku gdung dang bcas pa dang/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs sku
gdung dang bcas pa zhal shar phyogs su bstan tu bzhag la/ me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ mar me dag gis mchod pa shin tu rgya cher byas la/ tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/
tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya zhing/ gtsang ma kha zas dkar po za ba bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa/
yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa yid gcugs pa dang ldan pa// nga rgyal dang/ khro ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna yongs su spangs bas nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te ]
dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyud bya'o// me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ mar me dag kyang phul la/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la dor bar bya'o// lagan rdo rje la'ang bdug spos kyis bdug par bya'o// phyogs bcur phyag byas la/ nub phyogs kyi lha mo 'jigs byed
mdang/ shar phyogs kyi dpa mad ma dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi dung can ma la sogs pa la phyogs bzhir gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang/ 'o thug dang/ zho dang/ 'bras chan dag
kyang gtor bar bya'o// des na de la rnam par g.yeng ba dang/ 'gas pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ sams 'khrul par yang ma 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad
po thams cad la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas la bskul bar bya'o// cho ga 'di kho na bzhin du sngar bsAn pa byas la/ de nas tshes bco lnga'i nang par sa phyogs der bum pa gang ba
bzhi bzhag la/ bdug sbyos dang/ tsan dan dang/ pog dkar po dang/ ga bur dag kyang gzhag/ mar me kha bzhi me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan/
dang/ dar dang/ bdan sna tshogs dag dang/ gser dngul gyi snod dag gis legs par brgyan la/ sbrang rtsa dang sbyar ba'i 'o thug dang/ zho dang/ 'bras chan dang/ gzhan yang
ci 'byor pa'i lha bshos dang/ gtor ma dag kyang phyogs bzhir gzhag go/ sna ma'i ma tog brgya rtsa brgyud la snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod lan re byas la phyogs bzhir dor ro//
de nas sna ma'i lo tog brgya rtsa brgyad phra dwagasum la bzlas brjod lan re byas la/ re re nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs la bstun par bya'o///
de nas gzugs de 'gul bar 'gyur zhing sgra skad chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'od zer dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad
dang dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par yang 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyis
phyag bya ba'i 'os su'ang 'gyur/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ pang ba rnams 'byor par yang 'gyur/ nad thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang tshe ring bar yang 'gyur/
dragra thams cad dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po rnams kyang de lta 'dod tsang gces skyas byed par yang 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ 'dod chags
dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gta mug snga bar yang 'gyur/ nam du'ang sdug pa dang ma 'khrul bar 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang/ gzi badz+dzid/
dang/ dbang po rno ba dang/ blo dang ldan pa dang/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ chos shes pa dang/ 'chiba'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
ra mthong ba dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang mthong ba dang/ byams pa la gnas shing chos ston bzhin du 'chibs dus bya ba'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
ji lta bu 'dod pa dag gam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs chen po 'am/ gang du rjes su dran bar byed pa der skye ba dang/ gzhan yang yon tan stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// gsol ba/
bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang/ gzus kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag na yon tan mang bo'i 'byung gnas lags te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gsheg
ba'i byin gyi rlabs ma mtshes bar mnyan par yang rdzom thogs la/ gzung bar yang rtsom thogs/ bklag par yang drom thogs/ mchod par yang rdzom thogs/ yi ger bri bar yang rngo ma thogs//
wa/ yi ger 'drir stsal par yang drom thogs/ dad par yang dri'i zegs lags so// gal te mthong bar gyur na'ang nyan par mi 'gyur la/ gal te nyan par gyur na'ang de sams rnam par g.yeng bas
nyan par 'gyur zhing dad pa ra mi 'gyur/ bsan bkur bgyid par ma 'gyur lags so// gal te bsnyen bkurab gyid par gyur na'ang nyon mongs pa dang gnod sems dang bcas pa'i sems kyis
bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur lags so// gal te yi ger 'dri 'am yi gar 'dir stsol bar gyur na'ang de gzhan dag yid la bgyid bar 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sngon
gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i slad du de ni nyams su myong bar bgyid cing the tshom skye bar 'gyur lags so// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pas kyang lan gsum bsgrubs na/ re ba thams cad yang dag
bar 'grub par 'gyuralags te/ de la nem nur ma mchis pa dang/ yid gnyis ma mchis ba dang/ the tsom ma bskyed par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sam
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad
la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin ma chen mo dpe med ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das lame tog dang/ spos/
dbye// dang bdug spos sna tshogs dang/ ras bcos bu zung dag gis mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u sham ba na dbyas can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ sman
ba dang/ bde ba'i slad du dam bcas ba brjod ba rjes su dran lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po dag 'tshal lags so// de'i slad du bcom
ldan 'das kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge

bsnyen ma rnams kyi don du bdag rjes su gzung du gsol/ na maHsarma ta thA ga tAnAn/ spyod ya b+hudan/ shAhA/ hA/ b+hush+tsa/ sa ra sa ra/ la hU~M la hU~M/ shA shrI shA hU~M/ ma hA bi d+hu/ sarba ba rgyu
rgyu dar Na saM skra ti/ has has kyanas [”]nga gnaN+Dis/ kan ka btsa A ba ran ba hu/ sha tang ge/ pa Ta pa Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hir b+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ra/ sarba a nan me swAhA ]sA d+ha ya/ tu ru
tu ru an+nAn sAhA/ an na de hi maM/ sarlas te tAnAn sid d+hi/ sa hA/ pad+me paNe/ ma hA pa/ b.risha ra ba sha de/ ma hA bshade b+ha ba grwa ba/ b+ha bod b+ha bA ya/ tan hUM g+ho ri ta mA haMg+ho re/
taa me ba byas phra mo tsa ya/ sid d+hi kuru/ sarba AshA ma pa ri bA ra ya/ bud d+ha a d+hanan sAt+tA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la yon 'tshal ba dang/ nor dang 'bru 'chol ba dang/ semA
can thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang/ nor gyi dbang phyug chen bo dang/ rgyal sridi dang/ rig sngags 'chang chen po nyid dang/ bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des/
tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar bo gsar ba kha tshar ma gum po sla ma stsal pa ri mo mkhan gtsang ma bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas/ tshon rtsi sbyin
dang ma 'bags ba snod bsar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phag
pa rdo rje khro lo gos dkar bo 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ zla gam dang/ se mo dos brgyan pa/ rdo rje gsor zhing mchis pa khri bar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs su
ni gnod sbyin mo chen mo dab med ma 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'tshal ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan/ sug ban pad+ma thogs shing/
yang dag par dbugs 'byin ba'i tshul du mchis ba bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsam bsnyen te gnas pa 'phags pa yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa// rad pa dkar po
bya// 'tshalakha/ grogs dang ldan pa/ nas chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'tshal bas sngar bsnyen ba bgyis la/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang
[>bcas pa'i gnas gtsang mar dang bo kho nar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang lag na rdo rje la me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ sgos dag gsol bar bgyi zhing/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang/ zho dang
'bras chan dang/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan ba dang/ chang sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dag bgator la/ me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa bgyis nas/
dus sum du sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad phrag gsum bgyis shing/ re re nas gnod sbyin mo dpa med ma'i gzugs de la bsnun par bgyi'o// de
nas zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga gdugs la'ang cho ga 'di nyid dang/ gzhan yang na 'byor pa dag dang/ bdug sbos dang/ ga bur dang/ pog dkar po dang/ tsan dan dang/ shing mu sa dag kyang
dbul/ 'bru mar dri bda' ba'i zhugs mar kha gnyis kyang dbul bar bgyi'o// des na bdag der rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ ting nge
'dzin 'thob pa dang/ nam mkha' la mchib dang/ lus mi snang bar bgyi ba dang/ rgyal srid dang/ stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dang/ rig sngags 'chang nyid dang/ gter lta 'tshal
bdang/ nor bsgyur 'tshol ba dang/ pha rol gyi sems 'tshal ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ dam pa ci 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi lags so// des kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i
sems dang/ dargyal dang/ khro ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna yongs su sbyang ba'i sems su bgyi'o// mchod rten dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun nor 'brog ba yongs su sbyang ba dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa rnams la dad ba mi byed par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa zhig gis kyang lan gsum bsgrub ste/ bdag gis ma bsams par gyur na/ bces
ldan 'das bdag blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te sangs rgyas la dad par ma gyur pa dang/ yid gnyis su gyur pa gang
lags ba dang/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bgyis nas 'gyod pa mi bgyid pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems dang ldan pa gapalags pa de dag la'ang bdag mthong bar
stsal bar bgyi zhing/ thob bar yang bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin ma dpa med ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// sring mo khyod
kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdug pa kun tu spyod ba'i sems can rnams la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di lta bu dag smras shing/ dam bca' ba'ang byas pa ni nga khyod legs so// khyod sAng rje
bya chen po 'di lta bu 'dis sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu 'god nus par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/
de nas lhamo chen mo dung can mas bcom ldan 'das la me tog sna tshogs dang/ sngos sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas
bar bgyi ba dang/ chos smra ba de dag kyang srung ba'i slad du dam bca' bar bgyis shing/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams stsal bar bgyid/
lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na masarba ta thA ga tAnAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM shaM kha ni de ba/ A gtsAA tsA/ ti d+ha ne/

dz+han dza ye/bri ba/ pra ha ka ri/ d+hi d+hi d+hu ti ri/ nAnA/ ba bi d+ha/ be Sha pa tu sa yu chu d+ha ra Ni/ u u A yur la na/ tathA ga tan/ sma ra bi d+hi tsa ta tan/ mA ba lam+ba/ de ham bar na/ shaM ka ni
sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag lus la gnas par bgyis na de'i snyan pa 'phel bar gyur zhing/ gzi brjod 'phel ba dang/ longs sbyod 'phel ba dang/
dbang phyug 'phel ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ dgra rnams dbang du bgyi ba'anga'aphel bar 'gyur lags so// sa'i phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ lha'i gnas su ci 'byor pa'i gtor ma phyogs
bzhir stsal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdug spos dang pog dkar po dag gis mchod pa rgya cher bgyi zhing zhugs mar dag kyang phul la/ dgung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu byams pa la gnas pa/
dang/ nges par gnas shing bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ dam pa'i chos slong ba ma gtogs pa rnams kyi bsam bathamA cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das dang ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis/ lha mo chen mo dung can ma la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so legs so// yon tan mang po dang ldan pa'i
dam bca' ba 'dani legs par smras so// sring mo khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mas bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi me tog
dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos
ba de dag dang/ chos nyan pa de dag dang/ yi ger 'dri ba de dag dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod pa bgyid pa de dag gi don du re ba thamA cad yongs su rdzogs bar bgyid ba/
dbyig dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ rgyal srid dang/ tsherang bar bgyid pa// dag thams cad dbang du bgyid pa'i gsang sngags
rnams stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ dge slong ma/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhag 'dzin ma/ klog gam/
bsnyen bkur bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ ya gar 'dir stsol tam/ mchog tu gus pas ji skad gsungs pa'i sgrub par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bsrung bar bgyi/
yongs su bskyab par bgyi zhing/ dam pa rtsa 'tshal ba'ang stsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod dang dbang phyug dag gis mi brel bar bgyi/ 'thab mo dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ khrag khrug dang
'khrug lang dag las rgyal bar bgyi/ tshe phun sum tshogs pa nye bar bsgrub bar bgyi/ de'i yul dang grong khyer dag kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags kyis/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
kyis bdag la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ na masarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ sarba bo d+hi satAnAn/ na ma Ar+ya ba la ka shAr/ badzrapA Ni pra b+ha tAnAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hAd ba/ b+hi ma

ma ma he/ dza ye dza ya ba hi/ ya she ba hi/ yang sho dzab/ te dza dzA we/ byA ka ra Na pA/ sarba sa tA a ba lo kane/ kro ba te dza ba hu le/ ta thA ga ta a nu dzA taM pA lA ya/ sma ra pra tidzaM/ bud rgyu a

d+hiSh+Thanan/ de hami la dran/ sad dz+ha ku ru/ de ba/ mahAde ba/ sa skya btsan de ba/ b+hi me/ sa t+yA bA tsa na bra tiT+Thi te/ gu spyan bA sa na sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi
don du/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs shing/ de bzhin gshegs pasarjes su gnang ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag snus lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar me tog
dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ mar me dag gis mchod pa bgyis la/ phyogs bzhir yang 'o thug dang/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dag snyal te/ sudang ci 'tshal ba yod la
bgyis shing/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mchod pa bgyid na/ re ba de dang de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid lags so// gang la la bdag gi rang gi gzugs mthong bar 'tshal
ba des/ tshes brgyad kyi gdugs la ras dkar bo gsar ba kha tshar ma 'gum pa/ zla ma mchis pa la ra mo mkhan gtsang ma 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad yongs su bzungab tshon rtsi spyan dang ma 'bag
pa snod gsar pa'i nang du stsal bas/ dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs chos ston pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam ston pabribar bgyi'o// g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo chen mo 'jigs byed mo 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar sham du mchis la/ rad pa dkar po 'chel ba/ rgyan
bya// thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ril ba dang bgrang 'phreng thogs shing yang dag par dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul du mchis pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas sngar
bsnyen pa bgyis la/ tshes brgyad nas/ bco lnga'i bar du mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas ba'i gnas su me tog dang/ bdug sbos dang/ sbos dang/ che tog 'phreng dag gis mchod pa bgyi zhing/ phyogs
bzhari ya nga 'o thug dang/ zho dang/ 'bras chan gyi gtor ma dag gtor la/ me tog dang/ bdug sgros dang/ sbos dang/ mar me sna tshogs dag gis mchod brgya cha bgyi zhing lha bshos dkar bo dag kyang
thul la/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang/ gzhan yang ci 'byor pa dag stsal nas/ sems can thams cad la byams ba'i sems dang/ snying rje'i sems kyis sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad la
bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyi zhing/ de nas lha mo tshon mo 'jigs byed ma'i gzugs de la 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag der rang ba gzugs kyis gnas par bgyi zhing/ dam pa su 'tshal
ba' stsal bar bgyi ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug dang/ nam mkha' la mchi ba dang/ gter wa 'tshal ba dang/ nor bsgyur 'tshal ba dang/ rag sngags 'chang nyid dang/ dus ma lags par 'gam/
ba bzlog pa dang bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tugazhom pa dang bu mchis par bgyi ba dang/ tshor 'du bar bgyi ba dang/ sems can thams
cad la byams ba skya ba dang/ gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba'i las dag kyang bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te dam pa'i chos spong ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun
dag la the tshom du gyur pa gang lags pa ma gtogs par mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyid pa zhig lags na'ang/ bdag gis re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis par gyur na/
bcom ldan 'das bdag blonamed ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sring mo legs so
legs so// sring mo khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa na'ang khyod
legs so// sring mo de'i phyir khyod kyis rtag tu dam bcas pa 'di dran par gyis shig/ de nas de'i tshis chen po 'di rab tu g.yos shing/ lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab
ba dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sring mo legs so lags so// khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ba'i dam bca' ba 'di ni legs pa sbas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
gas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das cajigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad ya gar 'dab dang/ yi ger 'dir stsol ba dang/ klog
ba dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ 'don ba dang/ mchid ston du bgyid pa des bsod nams ji tsam 'thob par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i phyir de khyod nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa lan ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ ma dgongs pa 'am/ rnam par ma mkhyen pa mi mnga' bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang/ ya gar 'drar 'jug ba dang/ klog pa dang/ mchod pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/
'don ba dang/ kha ton du byed pa las bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de na dpes brjod par yang mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gos dang/ rgyan dang/ dbyig dang/ gser
dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dag gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byas te rtser bcug kyang/ sems can de dag skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba
dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sne sngags 'don ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur ba nyid yin zhing/ lo 'bum du
'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtsor bcug kyang sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ yi dgas kyi yul dag las
yongs su thar par ma 'gyur ba nyid de/ sems can rnams kyi phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad mnyan cing mchod pa byed pa dang yang dag par bstan te/ de'i don kyang mnyan cing nan tan gyis sgrub par byed
pa skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na bdang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ skye sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa dag dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i
skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su thar ba kho nar gyur bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'da'i bsod nams kyi tshad kyi dpa ma mdzad do// rigs kyi bu gang
gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang/ chos sla ba dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ klog pa dang/ ya gar 'dra ba dang/ mchod ba byed pa de dag gi phyir/ dbyig nyungs 'bru tsam yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ me tog
gcig gam/ 'bras bu gcig gam/ ba dan nam/ rol mo'i sgra lam/ sbos sam/ gos sam/ rgyan gcig tsam zhig yongs su gtong bar byed dam/ yi ger 'dra 'am/ yi ger 'drar 'jug
gam 'chang ngam klog gam/ mchod par byed dam/ yang dag par ston tam/ bsnyen bkur byed dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yan
ba dang/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon sum du bzhugs ba la lo 'bum du me tog dang/ bdug sbyos dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gi mchod pas mchod par byed/ rjod bar byed cing/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed ba dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ 'chag
sa dang/ skyodachos tshal dag byed du bcug gam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa brgya 'am stong byed du bcug ste/ de dag la lo 'bum
du mchod pa dag gis mchod par byed ba bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'dur 'jug ba dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'don ba dang/ mchod pa byed ba
dang/ yang dag par ston pa de na de bas bsod nams mngon par du bya ba ches mang du skye bar 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du mchod ba byed pa de nid lta ma yin la/ sems
can thams cad la sbyin pa byin zhing/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtser bcug ba'ang de lta ma yin no// de lta bas na rig kyi budang/ rigs kyi bumo dang/ rgyal po dang/ rgyal bu dang/

[blon bo tshan bo dang/ blon bo de dag gis rtag par rgyun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod par bya'o// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrog par byed pa dang/ rjod par byed pa dang/ don yang nye bar sgrub par
byed ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs gnyid du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing/ de drug gis bsnyen bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad mnyan par bya/gzung bar bya/
bcang par bya/ bklag par bya/ yid la bya zhing/ 'di ltar sems bskyed par yang bya ste/ bdag cag don tshad la don du 'du shes pa dang/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang/ sdug
bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes shing/ lam ma yin bar zhugs pa la lam nye bar ston pa gang yin pa dang/ bdag cag sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i
'jig rten las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam du sems bskyed par yang bya'o//
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa chen po mdzad pa bos yang dag par
bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di na phyi ma'i dus gyima'i tshon lho phyogs kyi rgyudan spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge slong ba/
[p]/ @#// dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dag bstan ma dang/ rgyal podang/ rgyal bu dang/ blon po chen po dang/ blon po snod du gyur pa dag mchod par byed pa// 'dzin par
byed pa/ klog par byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ dad par 'gyur/ yid ches par 'gyur ro// gal te byang dang/ shar dang/ nub phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod bar yang 'gyur na/ den
gang dag nyan par mi byed pa dang/ dad par mi byed ba dang/ yid ches par mi byed pa dang/ mchod par mi byed pa dang/ brtson 'grus zhan pa dang/ brjod ngas pa dang/ bu smad dang/
zla/ branAdang/ bran mo dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug dang/ bzhad gad dang/ 'jo sgeg dang/ bro dang/ gar dang/ glu sna tshogs kyis rnam par g.yengs shing phrag dog dang/ ser
sna'i dran pas nyan par mi byed/ yid ches par ma byed pa'i sems can de dag na bdud kyi las la mngon bar ban pa yin te/ de dag gi skye ba dang/ rna ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'tshib dang/
tsha/ mya ngan dang/ sne sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yad ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/
yi dgas kyi yul rnams las yongs su mo thar pa kho nar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bdag nyid ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod pa
[a/ ]de dag gis bsnyen bkur byas te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa bya zhing/ gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan bar bya/ yid la gzung bar bya'o// khrag khrug dang/ 'khrug long dang/ rnalam
ngan pa dang/ ltas ngan pa dgod/ dus ma yin par 'chib dang/ gnag nad dang/ phyugs nad dang/ mi nad dag dang/ nad dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa sna tshogs dag la'ang chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di mchod pa byas te bklag par bya'o// rgyal mtshan la btsugs la ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ sbos dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod cing phyogs
bzhir gtor ma gtor la/ me tog dang/ bdug stos dang/ spos dag gis phyag byas te 'jug par byas na/ der yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'gro ba'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu
zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// sngon gyi srid par 'dren bas lags gsungs shing// sems can thams cad
rjes su gzung pa'i phyir//da ltar ngas kyang khyod la bshad pa yi// ting 'dzan 'ad na zung zhig kun dga' bo// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog la/ gang gas khams
gsum sbyin par byin pa bas/ mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byas na ni// sbyin pas de ma dper yang ma bod de// gang gis sangs rgyas lan dad byas te// tshad med gtsug lag
khang dag bsags pa bas// gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin ba gang na ba// dan de bas bsod nams mang bor 'gyur// gang zhig me tog gcig tsam 'dor byed cing// gos
dang 'phreng ba byug pa de bzhin te// ting 'dzin 'di la bsnyen bkur byed gyur na// bsod nams tshogs char snga ma de mi 'gyur// gang gis mdo sde 'di la mchod ba'i phyir// kar sha ba Ni'i sbyin pa
sbyin byed cing// byang chub phyir na byams pa'i sems bskyedan// de ni do bas bsod nams mang bo 'thob// byang chub sems dapa' gang gis sems can la// ting 'dzin 'di bshad lung shog de
sgyu bzhin du// bla med byang chub phyir ni bkod gyuran// de yi bsod nams dper yang ma 'gyur ro// de ltas phan yon 'di dag thos nas kyang// sems can kun la de bzhin byams byas te// mdo
'di gzung zhing ya ge'abri bar bya// bklag par bya zhing de bzhin bshad par bya// ga dang de bzhin na 'chis gnod gyur cing// sdug bsngal rab drag brgya yis yongs gdungs la// sems dmyal
tsha ya dgasa rnams su skye ba na// phyi ma'i dus na 'gyod par gyur ta re// 'chi ba'i dus na yid skrag 'jigs gyur la// yang dang yang du rngam ba 'don byed cing// bdag gi dbung gnyen skyabs susu
'gyur zhes// byis ba'i blo can phan tshun rtog ga re// gang phyir de bzhin gshegs ba ma mchod cing// sangasaM rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nor brog pa// ma bzad gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'khrid
'gyur zhing// phyin chad rtag tu skyabasagyur 'ga' yang med// bu smad yod min nye du skya lag mad// yul 'khor yod min bzhad gad 'jo sgeg med// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos dang rgyan// kun spang
sdug bsngal yang dang yang mi bzad// ting 'dzin 'di la dad par ma byas pa// de 'dra'i sdug bsngal ma bzod myong 'gyur bas// sdug bsngal 'di la phan yon de thosan// byis pa'i blo yang su

zhig dad mi skyed// dang phyir rtag tu dge slong pho mo dang// dge bsnyen rnams dang rgyal pos 'khor zug tu// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tugazung bya zhing// 'dzin pa la yang rtag tu bsnyen bkur bya// de nas
bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzulags te// ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bcang
bar bgyi zhing/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag blo gal te khyod kyis ngas tshes gang bstan pa mnyan
te kun bzung ba de dag thams cad 'chang bar mi byed/ klog pa mi byed/ rgyas par m byed kyang des khyod kyi nga la nyes ba byas par ma 'gyu zhing/ gus par ma mnyan bar ma 'gyur la/ nyan
thos nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang bar ma byed/ klog par mi byed/ mchod par m byed/ yang dag par ston par ma byed/ yid la gnas par ma byed nani/
bya// des na khyod kyis nga la nyes ba byas par 'gyur zhing/ gus bar ma mnyan par yang 'gyur la/ nyan thos nyid yin par yang mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod
klu kyis bud dud du byas te chos kyi rnam gras 'di bcang bar bya// 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshon sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// srog chags drug khri len pa med par zag pa rnams las
sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' bdun brgyus na ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// lnga brgyas n sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par skye bar lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// srog/
chags dgu khrin nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol mi khom pa dang/ n gnas ong dang/ ngan 'gro thams cad spangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshan rigs kyi bu
dang rigs kyi bu mo nyan par bgyid pa dang/ 'dzan par bgyid pa dang/ ri mor bgyid pa dang/ mchod par bgyid pa de dag dang/ yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mdzod pa bgyid par 'gyur te/ dedag kyang ji lta bu 'tshal pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tulung bstan pa lags so// slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na sems can gang bzhad gad dang/ 'dza
sgrig dang/ gar dang/ bro dang/ glu dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag la sna tshogs su g.yeng ba/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi mun pa che ba/ rtsed mo la dga' bar 'du shes pa/
mi rtag pa la'ang rtag par 'du shes pa/ phrag dog dang/ ser snas yongs su 'dzin cing// mchod pa mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ dad par ma bgyid/ glo ba ches par ma bgyid/ 'chang
bar ma bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ nyan par mi bgyid/ nan tan gyis sgrub par mi bgyid pa de dag ni dal ba 'di yod byung bar bgyis shang/ sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de yongs su
bas par bgyis nas/ sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba sna tshogs dang/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing/ der yang bskal pa bye ba brgya
phrag du mar sdug bsngal nyams su myong nas/ yang slar sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags te/
mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis yun ring por rjes su 'gyod par 'gyur lags so// de lta lags pas na lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid legs par bsdam par bgyi
zhing/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dag la'ang dad pa mi phyed par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i sems dang/ phrag dog dang/ sur/
sna dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yongs su spangs pa'i sa mas dang/ khro ba yongs su spangs ba'i sems su bgyi lags so// de nas ji ltar lhags so// de nas ji ltar lhags pa'i
'khor de dag gis yang rang gi bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dgags/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/
[é ]na bza' dang/ rgyan dag dang/ a la la zhes rtsaco dang/ ga zha'i sgra dag dang lha'i sul snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dang/ glu dbyangs dag bas mchod pa byas nas legs so zhes bya ba gsol te//
bcom ldan 'das legs so legasaso// sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam gung chen po 'di shin tuleg par bka'
stsal lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bos 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ru lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar
bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba dang/ byang chub sems
0 dpa'i sa gnon pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'dus pa chen po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la
gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/
'jam dpal dang/ lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo de dag thams cad dang/ nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/
'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ panod sbyin mo chen mo dpa med ma dang/ dri med 'od dang/ 'od can ma dang/ 'jigs byed ma dang/ dbal ldan ma dang/ dung/
na ma dang/ 'phrog ma la sogs ba de dag dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad dang/ thamA
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ji ltar lhags pa de dag dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma rnams ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsted
do 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs sems can la gzigs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////
rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang/ su ren dra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ngan ng+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba/ ban d+he klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur/
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ma Nin kalpa pra Ni d+hi ba/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon
mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob
la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas
brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang gnod ba phyir rgol ba tham
[z]]cad rgyun chad bar grubacig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas
brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ ma dag ba'i chos dang/ bdud kyi las skyes ba thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig/ btsun pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rjechen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags ba thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems
can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing/ smon lam dza sad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du grub bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags ba thugasarje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags
pa gang dag zhala mngon sum du lta zhing/ dam pa'i mchog gsol ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig/ btsun ba sman ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gisarjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis 'jig rten dgan 'phongs shing
@#/// nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bgyid ba la mthu chen bo thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa
la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod bas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chon bo dang/ me dang chu dang/
rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag 'byung bas/ skye bo mang bo nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang ma mchis bar bgyid par gyur cig/ btsun pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs
sgyurje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa thugasarje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dngasems can gang dag 'jig rten 'danas
pha rol tu 'chi'apho ba'i 'jigs pa chen po nye bar gnas ba na'ang/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mngon pa du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa rjen pe
tshan mdzad par gyur cig/ bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma spros pa chos bdag med pa/ dran ba dang ldan pa// byang chub kyi sems tshad med par
brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ sbobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag bzhin du 'chi 'bo bar gyur ga/ tshe rabs thams
cad du'ang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang
phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig/ ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen bo rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis
grub pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig/ ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
pa dang/ sangs rgyas chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par pagyid pa dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs surdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig/ ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs
rje'i bdag nyid 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par
gyur cig/ ji ltar dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing mchod pa bgyis
bsazugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la'ang snying rje chen pa'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad bar 'byung bar gyur cig/ ji srid bdagan 'khor pa'i
tshe/ desnyad bdag gi lus skyes par//de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cung//de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog/ jisrid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ ji skadag gi ngag skyes bar//de srid mgon
bo'i mtshan brjod cing// ngag gi sbyor ba'i tshogs bgyid shog/ ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na// de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba// de snyad mgonapo rjes dran zhing// yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur
ga/ gultar lus dang ngag yid kyis// thugs rje'i dbang phyug pa snyan brgyus pas// lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing// yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/
thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung lags// rtag tu sbyor ba bgyis pas na// thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs// srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig pu// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
pa/ de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te// srid gsum rardzogs bgyid gyur cig/ na mo ratA Na yA ya/na mthaAr+ya pa lo ki shwar ya/ bo d+hi satA ya// ma hA satA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM
tsakra bti/ tsan ni/ ma hA b.ru ru ta/ la A ka ts+tsha ya hU~M phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags rdzogs so//smrao btsanam NidzaM la hU~M/ snying po'o/ o brda pad+ma hU~M/ nya ba'i snying po'o//
oM ma Ni badzra pa Ni hU~M/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// sngags snying bo bzhi 'byung ba dang/ smon lam dang/ tshags su bcad pa dang/ sngags su bcas pa rdzogs so//
gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis ye shes mig ni
myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can thams cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal
bdag gis thabs mkhas ba dag myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag na myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs
dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdagan myuradu sdug bsngal mtsholas 'da' bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje chal phyag 'tshal lo// bdag na myur du tshul khrims
rkang gis lam thob shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdagan myur du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag
'tshal lo// bdag gis myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag na myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog/ bdag ni
ral gyi ri la 'dzeg/ ral gyi ri ni rang snyil shog/ bdagan chu tshon phrad gyur na/ chu tshan me chur rab zhi shog/ sems can dmyal bar bdag song na// sems can
dmyal ba ring bskams shog/ bdag ni yi dgas gnas song na// bkres skom dag ni 'grangs ngoms shog/ bdag lha min gnas song na// ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog/ bdag
ni dud 'gro'i gnas phyin na// rang nyid shes rab che thob shog/ na mo rata tra yAya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+d+hi satAya/mahA satAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba

ban na tsho da na kArA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu drots+tshaSha Na kA rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra shaman kA rA ya/ serma su bad rnga ba na shan kA rA yaM/ sarba b+hi ye/ 4 pANA ya ta sa na ma hUM ta i daM/ A ba lo
ki ti shA ra/ ta pa nA la ka/ nam hri da ya/ mA ban+ta yi byamu sajaen+tha sA d+ha nan/ shu b+hu tsa ta na/ saNA satAnAn/ pA pa mA bi sho d+ha kan/ tad+ya thA/ a lo ke/ lo ki ma ti/ lo ka ba/ti/
a phyahi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA/ hU~M bo d+hi satA/ bum hA bo d+hi satA/ hi bri ya/ bo d+hi satwA/ hekA ru Ni ka/ sma ra srid yan/ a bya ni/ Ar+ya ba lo ka ti shAr/ bar ma me tItA/ kA ru Ni ka/ kuru

ku ru/ karmasahUm/sA d+ha ya ba tun/ de had hi/ ma a rig/ maM ga ma/ ba hi ga mahA/ sid d+ha yo shAr/ hu du hu[% ]/ bIr yan+te/ ma hA bar yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra NipishAr/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ba

ma la ma la mu te/ ArUb lo ki te shwa ra dzan Di dza tu ma ku zhu/ a laM kr-i ta/ sha mIr/ laM b+ha ba laM b+ha/ ba laM b+ha/ ma hA sid d+ha/ shud d+ha d+hu ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hAm la

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA dzA la trel[dg]paNe/ kloT+ThapAsha naM tan/ ho paN has tshe ya ka ra nishA tsa ri gA ra/ khro sar kri hayajo ba bI ta/ a bye hi/ ba ra ha mu kha ri bu ra/ da ha na shA ra/ nAr ya na/ ba la rU pa/
bshad+ha ra/ hen la kaNA/ he ma ha/ ha la ha la/ bisha na/ dzad lo ka s+ya/ rA ga ba ShanA/ de phab la nAn/ma hA gi kha na shan/ nar mo klan/ hu lu hu lu/ tshu dza suM dza/ mu ru mu hu lu/ ha lo

har/ ma hA pad+ma nag+ha/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ris ra/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha bu rgyu/ bo d+ha yA/ bo d+ha yA/ badz+hayA/ ma ti banI lakaNA/ e bya hi/ nIlakaNA/ e po hi/ ba many+dzi ta/ si ha chu kha/ ha sa

has/ chu dza tshu dza/ mahA zab+hAha sa nirna da ni/ a bya hi/ b+ho b+ho ma hA sid d+ha yo gi shwar/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ btsis b+ha ya sA d+ha ya bcu na/ sma ra sma ra/ tAM b+ha ga ba ta/ leke ba lo ka stan/ ta thA ga tan/

dad hI ma/ dar nA ma/ bras d+hA ya swAhA/ sid d+hA ya swahA/ ma hA sid d+hA ya sAhA/ sad d+hi yo gaTishA ra ya sAhA/ nI lakaNA ya swAhU~M/ bar ha mu khA ya swAt+taM/ saMha mu khA yasahA/ ma hAn ra saM ha mu khA

ya sAhA/ badzra haste ya sAhA/ mahA badzrahasmA ya sAhA/ sid d+ha ba tu d+ha ra ya sAhA/ bad+mahas ya sAhA/ ma hA pad+mahab+hA ya swAt+tA kr-iShA sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyA ba bi ta ya sAhA/ ma hA kA la ku'u d+ha rA ya swAhA/ tsaka

[S]// yu d+ha d+ha rA ya sAhA/ shang ga shastanaNA da na karA ya swAhA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swAhA/ lam skan d+ha de sham+bi ta 'dzin ya swA hA/ bA ma hasta khyu gru tsaman bA sa nA ya satwA/ lo ta/ shar

ya swAhA/ ma hA lo ka shA rA ya swAt+tA/ sarba sid d+he shA rA yaswA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mun+tenaM/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ A ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya mahA kA ru Ni
kAya/ sad nAmeman pa dAnaMswAhA/ bdag gis gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sme brtsegs lcags kyu can//stobs ldan shang kar dang sde brgyad dag/ btang nas rtag tu
gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis dbang phyug dang ni mthu chen dang// ku be ra dang ser skya'i bdag po dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis nor srung dang
ni chu lha dang// dge rgyas dang na ba ra tsa ta dag/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzan srung bar byed// bdag gis sar tsa dang ni ma ha ra// du lan tan ta dang ni lngas rtson dog/ btang nas rtag tu
lagazungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gas pa pa ka la'i rgyal po dang// dpal ldan ba tanangan sar har// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis tshangs pa dang ni sam
bar// gnas gtsang sde lnga dag dang mtshom dgo/ btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha// spos chen dpal ldan dang na nges da na// btang
0 nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang ni// ma mo lha la sogs pa mthu chen 'khor// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gi
rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang ni// mig mi bzang dang rnam thos bu dag kyang// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis gser mdog rma bya'i rgyal bo dang// sde dpon nyi shu
rtsa brgyud drang srong 'khor// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis nor bu bzang po dag dang ni// sde dpon chen po sna 'dzin bu la pa// btang nas rtag tugazungs 'dzan
srung bar byed// bdag gis dga' bo dpan bsnyen dga' bo// klu rgyal rgya mtshodang na a la'i 'dab// btang nas rtag tu gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis lha ma yin dang dri za dang//
mkha' lding ma 'am ci dang lto 'phye rnams// btang nas rtag tugazungs 'dzin srung bar byed// bdag gis chu dang me dang glog gi lha// grul bum bdag po dang na sha za dag/ btang nas rtag tu
gzungs 'dzin srung bar byed// byang chub sems dba' sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzhan yang gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag gi ched du gnod pa dang bgegs
yongs su bsal ba'i phyir// shin tu bsil ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba na// stag dang sbyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang// rtsangs
(pa sprul dang 'ad srin phrad gyur kyang// gzungs 'di 'don pa thosan gnod mi nus// gang zhig chu ba rgya mtshor zhugs pa las// gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang// kha red
sbyin srin po nya dparus sbalo dag/ gzungs 'di thos nas so sor 'byer ba 'gyur// gang zhig g.yul sprod dgra yis bskor ba 'am// chom rkun ma rungs nor ni 'brog pa'i tshe// rtsegacig/
thugasazlachen po'i gzungs bzlasan// de dag brtse sems bskyed nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal po'i gyod la thog pa dang// lcags sgrog khong sgrol btson rar chud pa'i tshi// rtse/
zla gcig thugs rjechen po'i gzungs bzlas na// rgyal pos bcu soms kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur// gang zhig byad stems dugama'i khyim zhugs te// zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe
rtsagacig thug rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// dug nyid zil mnan zas skom nyid du 'gyur// bud med sbrum ma bu na btsa' ba'i tshe// bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal ma bzod de//
rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dre gdon byer nas bu ni btsa' bar 'gyur// klu gdon gtum pos gdug pa'i dbugs btang bas// tsha ba'i nad kyis btab nas 'chi
nye tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// rims nad bsal nas tshe ni ring bar 'gyur// klu gdon rgyu bas gtsos te skrangs ba dang// shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag
pa'i tshe// rtse gci'i thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs ba zhi// sems can rtog pas mi dge bskyed bsan// byad stems sngangs dang dwags ni gtsas
pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// stems gdon de kun gtong ba'i mi la 'du// sdig 'phel snyigs mas dam chos 'jig pa na/ 'dod pa'i me chen sems ni rmongs log bas
khyo shug so sor gzhan la 'dod zhen nas// nyin mtshan log bsams rgyun mi 'chad ba'i tshe// gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i mi zhi log ba'i sems bsal 'gyur//
bdag gis gzungs 'di'i mthu stobs rgyas brjod na// bskal bar brjod kyang mthar thug yong ba 'gyur// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtogs ba rdzogs sog
rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA ru Nika nAm/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra d+hA ra Ni/ a nu shwas sa ha ti su kr-i ta saM gra hi// bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs=
chen bo'i gzungs phan yon mdor bsdus ba zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
'das ri bo po Ta la sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
@#// stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// pal 'di lta bu'i gzungs yod// ming ni thugs rje chen po zhes zer/ sems
na kun gyis mi dge ba'i sdig pa shin tu lci ba'i sgrib pa/ bdud dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir ngas bshad do// bcom ldan 'das
la bshad pa'i gnang ba zhus nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas gzungs bshad par 'dod pa'i dus la bab bo// myur bar bshad du gsol/
nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang rjes su yi rang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te dgo
slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mos 'don pa dang 'chang bar 'dod pas/ sems can rnams kyi ched du thugs rje chen po'i sgo nas
thogamar 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed par bya'o// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis chos rnams thams cad myur du rtogs par shog/ spyan ras
gzigs dbang thugs rje chal phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis ye shes mig ni myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis sems can tham
cad myur du sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dag myur du thob par shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag/
'tshal lo// bdag na myur du shes rab gru yis sgrol bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni gyur du sdug bsngal mtsho las 'da' bar shog/
spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rdzache la phyag 'tshal lo// bdagan myur du tshul khrims rkang gis lam thob shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag na myur
du mya ngan 'da' ba'i ri 'dzeg shog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la phyag 'tshal lo// bdagan gyur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim phyin shog/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje che la
phyag 'tshal lo// bdagan myur du chos nyid sku dang mtshungs par shog/ bdag ni mal gri'i ri 'dzegan// ral gri rin rangasAl shog/ bdag ni chu tshan phrad gyur na// chu tshan ma chur rang
shog/ sems can dmyal borab dag song na// sems can dmyal bar ng bskamasashog/ bdagan yi dgas gnas song na// bkres skom dgan 'grangs par shog/ bdagan lha min
gnas song na// ngan sems rang nyid dul bar shog// bdag ni dud 'gro'a gnas song na// rang nyid shes rab che thob shog/ de skad du smon lam btab nas// sems rtse gcig tu bdag
@#// ga mang nas 'don nying rjes su dran par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bdag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan 'don cing// de nas gzungs lan gcig
gam lan bdun gyi bar du btonan// bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong ji snyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i kha nam tho ba'i lta ba rnams bsal zhing 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te thugasarje/
chen bo 'di 'don tsang 'changan// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams der gshegs nas/ phyag myong bar 'gyur bas bsams ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
dwang gangad skye bar 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig thugs rje chen po'i
ba gasngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin padag/ gal te n gnas ong gsum po dag tu ltung bar gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi bgyi'o//
tsam thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag/ gal te ting nge 'dzin dang spobs ba tshad med pa ji snyed thob bar ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon bar rdzogs
par sangs rgyas bar mi bgyi'o// thugs rje chen po'i rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag/ gal te tshe 'di nyid la smon ba thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du grub par ma gyur
na thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs zhes mi bgyi lags te/ mi dge ba rnams dang sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus
la yongs su skyo nas skyes ba'i lus thob par 'atshal bo gang lags pa des/ thugs rje chen po'i sems kyi gzungs kyi tshig 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung bas/ gal te bud med kyi lus las
yongs su gyur te skyes pa'i lus thob par ma gyur na/ bdag nam yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o// the tshom gyi bsam pa cung zad cig bskyed par gyuran/ gdon mi za bar
gang smon pa'i 'bras bu de mngon bar 'grub par ma 'gyur lags so// de skad ces smras nas/ 'khor 'dus ba'i mdun du thal mo sbyar te drang por 'dug nas sems can rnams la thugs rje
chen po'i sems bskyed de/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis thogs pa ma mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen pa'i sems rgya cher yongs su rdzogs ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs gya nom pa 'di dag smras so// snying
po ni/ oM ma Ni pado hU~M/ gzungs ni/na mo ratra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lokiteshwarA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hAsapAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban d+ha na/ tshad na ka rA ya/

sarba pA pa sa mu dra a'o na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma na ka rAya/ sarba A r+ya u pa dra wa bi nAshan ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye khu tra NA ya/ ta rgyan ma sgri taM i daM/ Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra ta wa ni la
kaN+NanAmagri da yaM/ A wa ra ta yi ma sarba aNA sA d+ha na/ shub+hatsitan/ sarba sa t+tAnaM pA pa mAg bshadzra ka/ tad+ya thA/ a wa lo ki/ lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e bye hi/ ma hAbo d+hi

satu/ de bo d+hi satwA/ ham hA bo d+hi satwA/ he pra ya bod+hisatA/ he kA ru Ni ka smar yid yaM/ a hu he/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te/ shA ra ba ra mam patsit+takuru Nika/ ka ru du ra/ karmas d+ha ya/ bi hUM de had hi me/

a rig maM ga ma/ ba gam hAsid d+ha yo ga kar/ du du hu/ bar ste/ ma hAbir+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+har TishA ra/ tshwa la dz+wa la/ ba ma la a ma la/ mut+taM Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra kra a dzin/ rje tsam ku

Ta a laM kI ta shar/laM b+ha/ bra laM b+ha/ gilaM g+ha/ ma Asid d+ha/ shud d+ha b+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la/ ma hAm la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma sAdzul/ kr-i pak+Sha kr-iT+Thawan kr-iSh+Thapa shar

g+ha tan/ hebasmahasta/ dzayakar ni/ gtsa rigAr/ kr-it+taM sar kaM tAyadz+nyA ba pha[']ti/ a byahi/ ba ra ha chu kha ti pu ra/ da ha nishA ra nA ya na/ pa la ru pa ba sha d+ha ri/ henAl kan+d+ha ma hA ba la ha la/

ba khanar dza ta la ka s+ya/ rA ga pa mA shan/ dwangasha ba ShanA sha na/ mo hA bi Sha nA sha na/nir mo na hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsamuny+tsa ]mu hu lu mu hu lu/ ha la hal/ ma hApad+man g+ha sa ra sa ra/sa ra si'i/

su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/bo d+ma ma ta ba/ nI lakatsam bye hi/ nA la kartswa sa khyahi/ bA many+dzi ta/ si ham kha ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsamuny+tsa/ ma lho a Ta Ta hA sa nir na de ni/ e bya hi b+ho b+ho ma hA

sid d+ha yo gi shwa ra/ b+hanad+ha g+han d+ha/ wa tsam sA b+ha la/ sA d+ha ya/ bo d+hi sna rasmirahU~M/ he b+ha ga wan/ lo ka ba le ka hU~M/ ta thA ga tA da dA hami dang+gAhU~MnaM/ bras b+hU ba ma he tA/ sid d+hA ya sAhA/ ma hA sid d+ha

ya sAhA/ sid d+ha yo gishar ya swA hA/ nI lakam+b+ha ya swA hA/ ba ra ham lA ya swA hA/ si hamu khA ya swAhA/ ma hAn ra saM ha mu khA ya sAhA/ sid d+ha b+hAdi d+ha rA ya swA hA/ bad+mahas ya swAhA/ ma hA pahas la

sAtA/ badzra has pa swA hA/ ma hA badzra has ya swAhA/ khIsabo kr-i ta yadzo pa we pAya swAhA/ ma hA kA la ma ku Tad+ha rA ya swAhA/ tsakra A yu/ d+ha d+ha ra ya sAhA/ shaM kha shab+ha ra nA dan kA rAya sAhA/bo d+ha na

ka rA ya swAhA/ bi ma skan+d+hade shasr-i ta kr-i e dzani ya sAgA/ ba ma has byasgra tsar man we sa nA ya swAhA/ le kishA rA ya sAhA/ ma hA lo kid+d+hishA rA ya swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi shar ya swA hA/ rak+tarak+Sha maM swAhA/

gu ru raThamurte nI sAhA/ namo b+ha ga wa te Ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satAya/ ma hAts+tshanAya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ sid rgyanum mnu pA da ni swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs 'di bstan zin nas/ gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa dag ga ched du gnod pa dang bgegs yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ shin tu dang ba'i
tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag smras so// gang zhig ri dang 'brog dgon song ba las// stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan gtum po dang// rtsangs ba sbrul dang 'dre srin phrad gyur kyang// gzungs
@#na/ 'di 'don pa thos na gnodachanus// gang zhig chu bo rgya mtshor zhugs pa las// gdug pa'i klu dang chu srin ma rungs dang// gnod sbyin srin po nya dang sa sbal dag/ gzungs
'dithog nas so sor 'byar bar 'gyur// gang zhig g.yul sprad dgra yis bskor ba 'am// tshem rkun ma rungu nor rnams 'phrog ba'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlasan/
de dag brtse sems skyes nas ldog par 'gyur// gang zhig rgyal bo'i khyod la thogs pa dang// lcags sgrog khong sgril btson rar chud pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i
gzungs bzlas na// rgyal bos brtse sems kyis ni gtong bar 'gyur// gang zhig byung sems dug ma'i khyim zhugs te// zas skom dug can gyis ni gsod pa'i tshe// rtse gcig thug/
rje chen bo'i gzungs bzlas na// dugan zil mngar zas skom nyid du 'gyur// bud med sbrum ma bu ni btsa' ba'i tshe// bdud kyis bgegs byas sdug bsngal ma bzod tshe// rtse gcig
thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlasan// 'dre gdon bya nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// klu gdon gtum pos gdug ba'i dbugs btang nas// tsha ba'i nad kyis nyenanas 'chir nya tshe// rtse gcig
thugs rje chen po'i gzung bzlas na// rims nad bsal nas tshen rang bar 'gyur// klu gden rgyu bas gtses te skrangs pa dang// shu 'bras mi bzad rnag khrag 'dzag pa'i tshe// rtsa gcig thugs
chen po'i gzungs bzlasan// mchil ma lan gsum byugs pas skrangs pa zhi// sems can rnyog ba mi dge sbyod ban/byad stems sngags dang dgra yis gtsos ba'i tshe// rtse gcig thugs rje chen po'i
gzungs bzlasan// byad stems gdon de gtong ba'i mi la 'dud// sdig 'phel snyigs ma dam chos 'jig pa'i tshe// 'dod pa 'i me mched sems na rmongs log bas// khyolug so sor gzhan la
'dod zhen nas// nyin mtshan log bsam rgyun nam 'chad tshe// gang zhig thugs rje chen po'i gzungs bzlas na// 'dod pa'i ma zhu log pa'i sems bsal 'gyur// bdag gis gzungs 'di'i
mthu stobs rgyas brjod na// bskal par brjod kyang mthar thug long 'gyur// gal te thugasarje chen po'i gzungs 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag chu rlung ngam rgya mtshor zhugs te khrus
byas pa las/ de na gnas pa'i sems can de dang de dag gis lus bkrus pa'i chus lus la reg par gyuran/ sdig pa'i las dang kha na ma tho ba'i lci ba thams cad yongs su byang nas/ zhing
