nams go'u ta ma// dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug yum// sgrol ma yon tan mtha' yas shing// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad ma// ma ni brgya dang brgyud po 'di// tho rangs langs te
gang zhig klog/ sgrol mas 'dod pa'i don thams cad// phun sum tshogs pa thob ba byed// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so///kha che'i
baN+Di ta bud d+ha A ka ra dang// bod kyi lo rtsa ba ga rub chos kyi shes rab kyis kha che'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te ba/tan la phab pa'o//@#// dkon

mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maA ba lo ki te shwarA ya/ bod+d+hi sateya/ ma hA satAya/ mahAkA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tutatA ri ture sarba du pra dut+tanam/ma kri ta dzaM/
b+ha ya n+taM b+ha ya/ mo ha ma/ ban ng+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duShA suM b+ha na tu re swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//

pa00 gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA sA pra ti dzA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sgrol ma rang gis

dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA te tA re ye/ hUM hUMhUM/ sa ma ya sbi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba b+ha ra ta/ ba b+hu Shi te/ pad+man ba// matsA pad+ma/ a sa na sbi ti/ ha sa ha sa/ tre lokya

bar de/ sarba de ba da na pa/ pA dzi ta sma rAhA/ b+ha ga ba te tar/ sma rA hI/ b+ha ga ban ta/ ta thA ga tA s+ya/ pu ra tas ma yaM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ mah+'asatA a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka Nika/ ba tsa tra b+ha ra Na/
o ba lo kA ya// che la mo/ b+ha ga bAn te/ tAr/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob
bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te/ sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam
ngu bzlas par bya'o// gang 'dod pa da sbyin no// mchog thams cad ster ro// ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so// gzhan yang phan yon dpag tumad pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
jo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis ngom bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba ti d+hA
ra Ni bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo

[A ]ki te shwa rA ya// bo d+hi satAya/ ma hA sat+tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dzA ra ma hAdzur/ du khe mu khe ma su pan ne/ ma hA saM pan no/ saM patati/ ma hAsaM patati/ ka sa ma h+phu ka se/ ka/dzar muka ta saM swAhA/ skud pa ma

chu la lan gsum sngags na rims las thar bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisat+tAya/ mahAsanAya/ tad+yathA/ pu li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M/ ArUb
lo ki te shwa ra swAhA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa 'am/ skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du bsngags temadud pa gsum boral bcings na bar dugacod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA

ya na mo Ar+ya ba lo ki teshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satAya/ ma sAsatAya/ tad+ya thA/ ki la ki li/ si'i tsa li/ ni gi li sAhA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum bsngags te bskus na skrun 'tsho'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

rgyu na ma Ar+ya ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hAsatA ya/ tad+ya thA/sa re sa ra/ ba sa re ba sa re/ bi sa ra Na/ shi na sAhA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na

tra yA ya/na ma ArUb lo ke te ArA ya/ bo d+hi satAyakaM ma hA satAya/ tad+ya thA/ nis pin si ri/ ka la ni mi re/ ka la ri tsi ri ba ti la swAhA lnga ba dang/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang/ lce'i kyi ba mab dang/

gdon nad thams cad la 'jim pa la lan gsum du bsngags te bskus na phan no// na mo rat+na trayA ya/na maAr+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ badzrapA Nid+ham/ oM saM ka ra pra b+ha be/ b+ha ga ba ti'ud b+he/ du
d+heshAn ti kari/ ha na han/ ma ma pA ba laM/ da ha da ha/ ma ma pa pa daM/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ma ba pA pa kan/ o o rje/ gra sa gra sa/ ra teTe ri tiT/ na ti ka ra ye swAhA/ shu b+haka riye swAhA//
kye ma ka ra ye swAhA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro// sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro// zas la sngags kyis btab ste
zos na dug mi gnod par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gnod pas zin ba rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags tu bcings na thar par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa grags
ldan ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ karma dza 'a ma sAkalam dwa bo d+hi satu pa ku nam+ma Na pa Ta la ba sa rAb+ha ga ba tiAr+ya tsArAmU la
kal nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa le'u rab 'byamA las/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa
ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa sngan ras gzigs dbang phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma'i gru'i steng gi nam mkha'i mthil
na rab tu bzhugs te/ ngomatshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis ma khyab pas rab tu phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bzhugs so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu khyed rnams nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug girmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad bor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sems can
thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa dang/ tshe dang/ nad med pa dang/ dbang phyug dang/ yid kyi shing rta yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rig stagus dang gsang sngags kyi gzhi sems can thams cad
la phan pa'i ched du bshad kyis/ de legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig/ ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
lha'i bu de rnams thal mo sbyar ba btudanas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par sa so sor thob pa
byed pa/ rdo rje'i gdan gnon par byed pa/ bdud 'dul bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar byed pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung bar byed ba/ lha dang/
rnams su skye bar byed pa/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dbul ba dang nad kyis btab pa thams cad kyi nad sel bar byed pa nyid dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa tha
cad kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa byed pa de gsung du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad
ni don med par gsung bar byed pa ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i sems dang/ bdag cag dang/ sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba nye bar gzung nas de gsung du gsol
re nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sas rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas/ rnam par dag pa'i lul la 'od zer rnam
par 'gro ba rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la soms bar ba zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod nas me tog lta bu'i byang chub sems dbar rnamA
kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams mtha' yas pa 'das nas nub phyogs kyichar gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa na/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rjes su
zhugs te/ gang du de bzhin gshags ba tshe dpag med bzhugs pa der/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa la so sor gnas pa rnams kyis thabs cig tu zhugs pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba mthong bas cung zad rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal de nyid kyis/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal to// kyargyal ba'i sras rnams 'di ni bdag cag rnams kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer 'dir 'ongs pa yin par khyed cag gis shes bar gyis shig//
de nas yang sams dpa' chen po de rnams spyan 'dzum pa med bar sngan gdangasanas 'di 'od zer gyi stangs gang yin ba der mngon par phyogs gnas so// de nas kun tu skul bar byed pa'i 'od zer
des bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshadapag ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes kyi spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas sems dpa' chen po de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
med la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dgongs su
gsol/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams de dang/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang/ phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi spyod ba dang/ sgrub thabs kyi tshig dang/ dkyil
'khor gyi cho ga'i rtog pa dang/ gsang ba'i ngas ris kyi cho ga dang/ bzlas pa dang/ rig pa'i dbang bskur ba thams cad khyad par du bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs bar
'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' semA dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// sems
dba' chen po gangad lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ nga'i tshig gis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngas/ nyam nga ba chung ngos/ ljang ba yang ngam/ reg par gnas/
sam zhes ched par bya'o/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba 'od dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung brgya stong phrag ga'i byed la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
kyang khyod kyi rigs dang/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa dang/ gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba dang/ phyag smyudang/ ras ris kyi cho ga dang/ sbyin sreg
[A ]dang bzlas pa'i nges pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kun nas dga' bar byed pa/ rin po che snang ba'i le'u rab 'byamA 'das pa dang/ ma 'ong
ba dang/ da ltar 'byung ba'i ye shes rnams kyis rang gi rig sngags dang gsang sngags la 'jug par byed pa ston ba mthar thug par zin pa dang/ nang gi dus dang ldan pa dang/ dam tshag rab
'byamA kyi le'u dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa mtha' dag ma lus par bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang
smo sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la zhugs ba dang/ spyod pa mthar thug pa gsung ba dang ldan pa dag gsungs pa la'ang 'di la rjes su yi rang ba khona'o// sems dpa' chen po da lta
de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod song zhig/ shAkya thub pa'i drung du de la mngon du phyogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyon la khyod kyang sa bar 'gyur ro// 'di la'ang rtsa ba'i rig snga

su 'gyur ba ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+hA ya/ ta thog tA ya/ an te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa ta ya/ mahA satA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba Ar+ya tA

[z]nga ye/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tA ra dzuka d+harman r+ya te/ tAre tut+tare/ shAn+ti d+harman bya te/ tAre a na b+hi lA bya/ d+hamanar+ya te/ tut+tare lu'e tu re hi ni/ trAsan pas ni/ oM han/ ma pa ni/ dzam ni/

snyam ni/ pra b+he/ tsan pra b+he/ hi li hi li/ tsa la tsa le/ be ga swA mni/ kuNIkuN+Di mahA NI/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha nA pa ti tA re/ hu ru hur/ ku ru kar/ a haM yA yA/ tsin+ta yA ma tsan d+hi mI ku
sA d+ha ya swAhA/ 'di ni sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rig pa de yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi snying po'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
thams cad kyis gsungs shing gsung bar 'gyur te/ khyod kyis kyang da lta sna bar 'gyur ro// ma mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dra rgyas pas rnam par phye ba'i mthar shAkya thubapa byon te/ shAkya

thub pas rjes su gnang ba'o// 'di la mchog gi snying por 'gyur ba'ang/ namo rasna tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwarA ya/ bo d+hi sat+tAya/ mahAsarAya/ tAre tut+tar tur swAhA/ 'di la nye ba'i sA
bo'ang/ na mo ratA tra yA ya/ namasarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satAnaM/ oM ku ru kul+le sAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis

rjes su gnang nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun ba byang chub kyi snying bo kun tu thob par byed pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par
zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi rnams dang/ steng dang/ 'og dang/ thad ka'i mthar thug pa'ithamad du thum dang ldan pa'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun du gang bar gyur to// rgyal ba'i sras po lags so legs so// gangakhyod kyis ting 'dzin khyad par 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis minus te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la rab tu zhugs pa sa bcu la rab tu bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang snyoms par 'jug par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
'od dpag med sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis thabs cig byams pa dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mchog gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub
par byed pa yi ga gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed ma/ rig sngags gzhan rnams kyis kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi sbyong pa'i khyad par
tsha gyis sgrub par byed pa dang 'thun pa'i rig sngags gsung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga zhegs pa tshe dpag med yud tsam zhig ci'angam gsung bar gyur to// thams cad du thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dgos pa byams pa'i bdag nyid kyi sems kyis rig sngags gsungs
bcas par gyur to// nam sam bud+d+hanaM/ oM gA'adani bcom ldan 'das ma'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug dang de 'dzin de las langs nas 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de lag pa bsam pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa dang se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang mig 'byed

'dzum sam/ skad cig tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mgyogs pa'i blo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa nyid ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ me mdzad kyi 'a[E]sa/
gyi khams su 'ongs nas kyang slar 'khod de steng gi nam mkha'i mthil du nor bu rin po che chen po la so sor 'khod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por slar 'khod nas/ thams cad dang ldan nga'i 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor du 'od zer chen po'i kun tu snang bas kun tu snang bar byas nas/ rin po che'i snang ba'i bdag po'i rgyan gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che du mas rnam par phye ba dang/ rin po che'i gdug

du mas dbag tshad brgya stong phrag tu khyab pa dang/ lha'i gos dang dar gyi rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes par spras pa dang/ lha'i me tog dang/ ba dan dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phreng ba ngang/ rin po ste/
bya// g.yer kha'i dra ba bcings pa sgra snyan par 'khrol ba 'jug pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dba'ase sor gnas par byed pa/ lha'i dri dang 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/
byama'i char 'bebs par byed ba mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul mthong ngo//
danas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de rnams dga' ba dang bcas pas spu zing zhes byed do// lha'i gnas thams cad rab tugayos ba dang ldan pa mthong nas sgrog cing snying 'dar te/ 'on
thar te 'byor ba yongs su nyams sam ca zhes phan tshun rangs thabs su skad mthon pos skyabar rtsom zhing/ 'di skad ces kyang smras so// bcom ldan 'das yongs su skyobs shig/ shAkya thub pa
yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor la bka' stsal to/ ma 'jigs shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas ma rtog can lta bu nas nga nyid lta ba dang phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur
bar 'dod de/don chen bo spyod pa dang/ rig sngags kyi tshig dang/ chos kyi tshig rmad du byung ba yangs ba nges par bstan pa'i phyir 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan
[s ]gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig ma 'dzums par bltas te zhabs gnyis la btud nas yi ge'i tshagarab tu sa ba 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
bstod do// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mkhyen khyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// spyod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po// phyag 'tshal skyes bu gtso khyod la// don med thams cad zlog pa po//
phyag 'tshal skyes bu seng gi khyod// ngan song thams cad 'joms pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/bsod nams drin mtha' yas ba// phyag 'tshal skyes bu pad dkar khyed//
srid gsum 'dam na rnam sbyong ba// phyag 'tshal skyes bu paN khyod// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam grol byed// thams cad grol khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gdung ba thams cad legs 'dul
byed// zhi ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags kyi spyod don sgrub pa po// thams cad grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shas kun gyis bkra shis pa// bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnamA
thams cad kun tu rtogs// sangs rgyas dam tshig khyod phyag 'tshal// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// sbos pa med pa'i rnam pa ni// yang dag rjes 'jug ston pa po// de bzhin gshegs pa/
khyod phyag 'tshal// shes dang shes bya'i dngos po kun// legs par byas shing yang dag thos// theg gsum lam dang myang 'das la// rab tu gnas 'jug rab gnas pa// kun mkhyen
khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes yi ga'i tshig rab tus ba 'da rnams kyis bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon par bstod nas 'di skad ces kyang
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang+ga'i klung brgya stong phrag gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas nub phyogs kyi char kun nas me tog ldan zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
du gyur pa der/ bde ba can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston patshe dbag tu med pa bzhugs te/ de chos ston par mdzad pa na thog mar dge ba/ bar du
dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang bo/ tshig 'bru bzang bo/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs bar spyod pa/ yang dag par ston par mdzad cing/ de 'di

ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston bzhi dzad do//rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi don gyi spyod pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang/ lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i
lam dang/ skyob pa dang/ gnas dang/ skyabs dang/ dbung gnyen dang/ bde ba dang/ shin tu mthar thug pa dang/ shin tu yongs su mthar gtugs pas sems can thams cad la ston te/ bcom ldan
'das de nyid kyi mdzad pas rjes su gnang nas bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung dang nye ba 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med des bcom ldan
'dus la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ma/ ljang ba yang ngam/ bsnyan ma ma' 'am/ bde ba la reg bar gnas sam zhes yongs su 'dri bar byed da/ 'di skad ces kyang gsung ngo// gang rnam

pa 'di lta bu'i snyigasama'i dus gang du bcom ldan 'des shAkya thub pa'i sku de'ang chos ston par mdzad cing rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i skye bo la lam gsum gyi byang grol dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba red par
mdzad pa de ni ngomatshar ro// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ba de'i brtson 'grus kyis gang du skal ba med pa 'is mas can gyi tshogs srid pa gsum dang dag par 'joms pa'i lam du mthar thug par 'jug par

byed pa gtan du grub pa dang bde ba'i rjes su 'thun pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba lasems can rnams rab tu'agod par mdzad pa ni ngo mtshar ro// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
masangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lonas mkhyen gyis/ bodag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi rnam 'phrul

dungashes par 'dod pa 'am/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa dang sems pa shes par 'dod pa 'am/ mtha' dag nges par ston pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag rnams/
'bya// kyis kyang brjod par yang g la nus/ gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sgrub pa bsdus bdang/ so so ba ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas ba'i chos

nyid du blta bar bya ste/mthong bas spang bar bya ba slong ba dang/ ring bor ma thogs par sbyodab sla bar 'dod pa kham/ yon tan ston par 'dod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das khonas mkhyen gyis//
bdag gsan ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba sprul te ri bo che chen po'i bang la bcom ldan
lta'adas shAkya thub pa la lta bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rnam
pa sna tshogs pa'i gtam gyis rjes su 'brangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtam gyis mthar kyi dri ba sngon du 'gro bas phan tshun chos bstan pa'i mthar rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub
ba'i don du nye bar tshogs pa rnams la tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ ka la ping ka dang/ kuta ra dang/ ba tu ras bsgrubs pa'i rnga bo che'i dbyangs su grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi byin rlabs sgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad don yang dag par thob par byed ba dang/ rig sngags dang/ gsang sngags kyi tshig thams cad dang/ gsang ba'i dbang bskur bdang bcas
pa dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ rtog ba'i dbang bskur ba dang/ tshe dang/ nad med pa dang/ dbang phyug dang/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ sgrub thabs thams cad
kyi cho ga'i rgyud dang/ shes pa dang shes bya dus kyi mthar nub pa dang/ rgyal srid dang/ zhing 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba mdor bsdus ba las/sems can thams cad kyi bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ rang gi yon tan 'byung ba/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mthar 'jug par byed pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed ba/ mi snang ba dang nam mkhar
'gro bar byed pa/ rkang pa rab tu sgyub/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og rab tu 'jug par byed pa/ mngon par spyod par byed ba/ don thams cad thob pa/ 'bras bu dang
bcas pa/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ tsa bgyi dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang/ rgan po dang/ lang tsho ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du gnas par byed
ba ste/ mdor bsdus na las thams cad byed pa/ yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ rgyas pa can dang zhi ba can gyi las thams cad rab tu byed pa/ ji lta jiltar rab tu sbyar bar
bya bzhin pa/ de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod dang ldan pa phal po che rtog ba chen po rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam ngos rjes su gnang sangs rgyas
thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ ngag pa'i sems can rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don/ chos kyi mdzod/ skye bo mang po la phan pa'i ched dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba'i ched du lha dang
mi rnams dang/ sems can thams cad la ston cig/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngan ras gzigs dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis kun tu skul
na bar byed pa rgyan bkod pa'i 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can du ma gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyi snang bas phebrid 'og man gyi srid pa nas ji sridamanar mang ba'i dmal ba chen po'i bar gyi sems can gang la la sdug bsngal gyis shin tu
gdus pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'gro ba rnams zhi ba dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas rnams thams cad bcom
ldan 'das kyis yang dag bar bskul nas/ slar yang 'od zerd byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor nub par gyur to// 'di la gzhan shar phyogs
[z]la sogs pa rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang yin pa der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bskul ba'i 'od zer des rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bskul bas sgrub pa 'di lta ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba nyid kyi snang ba dri kun tu gsal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai zlarma 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i dpal

zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal pa zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal/
bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dbag tu med pa rnam par nges pa'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun yusnang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya
ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba pe cha ma'i snang ba'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i dbang po zhas bya ba dang/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas yongs su bskor ba mtha'
yas shing mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sgrol ma'i gru'i tshal
na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug rig sngag
dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges par ston pa'i tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam gsungs pa de la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams 'dzum pa yang dag par ston par 'dzad
de de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang gi phyogs rnams su dang/ phyogs bral rnams su zhes bas steng dang/ 'og dang/ thad ka thams cad du thams cad dang ldan ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su
snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams thams cad du'ang bdud kyi gnas thams cad smra ba kong par byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ nyan thos
rgakyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas ba sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid chen po nyid blta bar 'dod pa/
mchog gi rig pa'i rjes su spyod pa/ sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi le'u rab 'byam de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa yang gsal bar byed 'dod pas so sor 'khod
par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ lag bzang dang/ rin chen bzang bo dang/ brtul zhugs bzang po dang/ spyan bzang bo dang/ dga' ba bzang po dang/ chos bzang bo dang/ dngos grub 'char bzang
dang thams cad 'phags dang/ chos 'phags dang/ rin chen 'phags dang/ rin chen dpal dang/ lhun po'i dpal dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i dpal dang/ 'od byed dpal dang/
rab snang dang la dang/ snang ba'i dpal dang/ don thams cad kyi dpal dang/ lag na thams cad rin chen dang/ gtsug na nor bu dang/ lag na rin chen dang/ lag na lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang/
rnam par snang mdzad snying podang/ rin chen snying bo dang/ ye shes snying po dang/ don bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i snying po dang/ chos 'phags snying po dang/ mchod sbyin tog dang/ tog
bzang po dang/ mtha' yas tog dang/ 'od zer tog dang/ dra med tog dang/ ma lus rtog dang/ nam mkha'i tog dang/ rin chen tog dang/ 'brug sgra dbyangs dang/ rnga bo che'i nga ro'i
rgyal po dang/ mtha' yas gsal ba'i ye shes rgyal po dang/ mun pa mun nag thams cad rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyal
po dang/ spyod pa thams cad phul du byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal bo dang/ 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ phul du byung ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ rnam par sel ba'i rgyal po dang/ mi g.yo
ba'i rgyal po dang nyima'i rgyal po dang/ thams cadu gsal ba yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal bo dang/ rang bzhin yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang/ dngos po med par yang dag
par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang/ phyogs lhag pa'i rgyal po dang/ rang gi dngos bo med pa snang ba dang/ bsod nams snang ba dang/ kun yulta ba'i snang ba dang/ 'od dpag med dang/ dbag
yod snang ba dang/ spyan bzang snang ba dang/ legs 'byung snang ba dang/ mtha' yas snang ba dang/ mi tshugs snang ba dang/ ma bsgyur ba dang/ 'og min dang/ dri med dang/

me dang/ snang ba dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ bde ba dang/ bde ba'i mu khyud dang/ mu khyud kyi rtog dang/ 'dod pa'i lha dang/ lha'i lha dang/ lta ba skyes pa dang/ 'jig rten zhi ba dang/ nye ba'i
'chiltas dang/ rnga bo che dang/ grub pa dang/ dkar bor grags pa dang/ lha rab tubazod dka' la gdul dka' ba dang/ gsal dka' ba dang/ ring du song ba dang/ ring bor len dang/ ring por
gnas dang/ mtho zhing mtho ba'i mun ba dang/ mkha' snang dang/ kun nas snang dang/ snang min dang/ khyu mchog dang kun nas snang ldan dang/ ngos par mnyam pa dang/ lha chen po dang/
shin tu nges pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/ dri ma mthar thug ba dang/ mnyam pa'i mtshan ma bzang po dang/ dkar po dang/ e ma ki ma dang/ tha chung dang/ dka' bas 'tshob dang/ bde bar 'tsho
ba dang/ legs bar skyes pa dang/ du ba'i tog dang/ mchod sbyin tog dang/ dkar po'i tog dang/ tog bzang po dang/ dbyig ga tog dang/ nor dpag tu med pa dang/ phal chen po dang/ do
shal phyed pa dang/ 'jig rten grags pa dang/ kun tu grags pa dang chen por grags pa dang/ mchog tu bgrang ba dang/ skyes pa dang/ snang ba dang/ gyi bgyi dang/ mnyam par byed pa dang/

'jig rten byed pa dang/ snang ba byed pa dang/ nyin mor byed pa dang/ 'byung bar byed pa dang/ don thams cad byed pa dang/ grub par byed pa dang/ 'od byed pa dang/ kun tu gasal bar byed pa dang/ rdzu bo che'i
dbyangs dang/ sgra dbyangs dang/ dbyangs bzang dang/ mtha' yas dbyangs dang/ tog gi dbyangs dang/ 'byung ba'i thub pa dang/ gser thub dang/ log bar dad sel dang/ 'od srungs dang/ gtsug
tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mang bo rnams kyis kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen

bo kun tu snang bar byas nas pad+ma'i gdan la so sor bzhugs par gyur to// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de rnams kyang bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ phyag na rin chen dang/ phyagan rdo rje dang/ phyag
bzang po dang/ nam mkha'i phyag dang/ mtha' yas phyag dang/ sa'i phyag dang/ snang ba'i phyag dang/ shin tuphrimed dang/ bzang bo brtsegs pa dang/ mang bo brtsigs pa dang/ nor bu brtsegs ba dang/
rin chen brtsegs pa dang/ an brtsegs pa dang/ rin chen glang bo dang/ kun nas glang po dang/ sos kyi glang po dang/ bzang 'gro dang/ dris dang bral bar 'gro ba dang/ 'jig rten 'gro ba dang/ mdzes par
'gro ba dang/ mtha' yas 'gro ba dang/ mtha' yas grags ba dang/ legs grags dang/ dri ma dang bral bar grags pa dang/ 'gro bar grags pa dang/ drimad grags pa dang/ grags pa'i mgon po dang
[z ]@#// mgon med kyi mgon bor gyur pa dang// 'jig rten mgon po dang/ kun nas mgon bo dang/ rgyun bshes kyi bu dang/ mtha' yas bshes kyi bu dang/ kun tu bshes kyi bu dang//
byams ma'i bu dang/ mig bzangs kyi bu dang/ phyag 'tshal bshes kyi bu dang/ tA Na tra'i bu dang/ 'bras bshes kyi bu dang/ rin chen bshes kyi bu dang/ skyabs gsum bshes kyi bu dang/ theg gsum
bshes kyi bu dang/ mthu bsgyings dang/ shin yad du 'ong ba dang/ yid 'ong ldan dang/ chos kyi dbang phyug dang/ dngos po med ba'i dbang phyug dang/ nams dbang phyug dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang/
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ legs gzigs dbang phyug dang/ rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang/ 'jig rten 'dren pa dang/ mchod ba bzang po dang/ 'brug sgra'i dbang phyug dang/ rnga bo che'i
dbang phyug dang/ bkod pa'i dbang phyug dang/ ba Sha te sA ra dang/ char bzang bo dang/ sku bzang po dang/ mchod pa bzang po dang/ grags ldan dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ rab tu skyes pa la gnas pa dang/
zla ba'i dbang phyug dang/ so ba'i zla ba dang/ zla ba nyid dang/ mtha' yas dpal dang/ kun tu dbal dang/ 'jig rten dpal dang/ nam mkha'i dpal dang/ nam mkha' kun sdud dang/ nam mkha'i

mdzod dang/ sa'i dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ sa'i snying bo dang/ sgrib pa med pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ bzang skyong dang/ nor
bzang dang// legs par kun sdud dang/ lo tog kun 'gyed pa'i nam mkha' dang/ nam mkha'i snying bo dang/ don kun rtogs pa dang/ thams cad 'byung ba dang/ ldog bya min pa dang/ mi ldog pa dang/
ngan songabazod dang/ rnam par bsgyur med dang/ bkra shis rnam grol dang gnad thams cad bsrung ba zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyis dang/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po
rnams dang thabs cig bcom lnga bdos de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub ba'i spyod yul du sgrol ma'i gru la bzhugs par gyur to// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med
kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i don mtho' yas pa sgrub pa/ sems can mtha' yas ba dag gi bsam pa rnam par 'jug bar byed pa'i lam la rab gnas su 'jug
pa'i bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rig sngags kyi gzhi rjes su 'dzin par byed pa sman gyi cha byad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa rnams dang/ 'dab chags kyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ gnod sbyin
dang srin po dang/ nor bu dang/ sngags dang/ rin po che'i rgyal po dang/ sems can dang/ sems can ma yin pa grangs med ba thams cad kun tu 'jug cing sems can gyi sbyong ba'i rjes su
'jug pa rnams dang/ bsam ba ji lta bas sems can 'dul ba de lta bu'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang/ de dag so so'i khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams dang/ rig pa'i rgyal
po'i nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos nges par 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ pad+madang/ rdo rje dang/ 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad la kun tu
'jug ba'i dam tshig gi rim pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba tshig gi lam la rab tu gnas par byed cing/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par byed pa rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor mngon par
'phags pa dang/ gdugs dkar mngon par 'phags pa dang/ lo ma mtha' yas dang/ lo ma brgya pa dang/ gtsug tor rgyal ba dang/ mngon par 'phags ba'i gtsug tor dang/ pad+ma'i 'od zer dang
gser gyi 'od zer dang/ 'od zer dkar po dang/ gtsug tor bkod ba dang/ gser gyi phung po dang/ dkar po'i phung po dang/ gzi brjid phung po dang/ nor bu'i phung po dang/ kun nas phung bo dang/

rnam par grags pa'i phung po dang/ byung ba'i phung po dang/ bden pa'i phung po dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phung po dang/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung bo sU/ 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang
gtsug tor gyi rgyal bo chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam ba ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa yongs su skong bar byed ba/ skye bo thams cad kyi
yid kyi bsam pa rtogs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis kyang ma nus pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyal ponam mkha'i mthar thug ba brjod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang/ pha
rol gnon pa'i bdag nyid chen po lta bur ston par 'dod bas mtha' dag rgyas par bshad pa las mdor bsdus nas bstan par bya ste/ rig pa'i rgyal bo rnams kyis 'dus pa bshad par bya ba
'di lta ste/ mdzod spu dang/ smin ma dang/ sbyan dang/ rje ma dang/ snyan dang/ mgrin pa dang/ ma 'jigs pa dang/ sIng rje dang/ byams ba dang/ brtse ba'i tshim pa dang/ shes rab dang/ 'od zer dang/
sams dpa' dang/ 'od zer dri ma med dang/ chos gos te/ 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal po mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas spros pa rnams 'di lta ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims cha dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gsal ba dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i gsung dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshegs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drim dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i tog dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mtshan ma ste/ 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags gsungs pa rnams te/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang/ rgyal mo dang/ ci bgyi dang
bran bo dang/ branamo dang/ pho ltadang/ pho nya mo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ sems can dang/ sems can ma yin ba so sor khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i chos kyi sprin
nges par spros pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis rgyu 'thun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag tshad med bas yosasu bskor ba/ rig ba'i tshogs thams cad gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa'i
rig pa'i rgyal po de rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul der rigs bzang bor lhags bar gnas pa dang ldan bar gyur to// rig pa'i rgyal bo 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs ba phyag bcu gnyis pa/
phyag drug ba dang/ phyag bzhi pa dang/ hA la hAl dang/ don yod zhags pa dang/ rta mgrin dang/ mgrin pa mtha' yas dang/ mgrin pa sngon bo dang/ mgrin ba bzang bo dang/ mgul bzang dang/ mgrin dkar
dang mgrin sngon dang/ 'jig rten mgrin ba dang/ rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug dang/ 'od zer stong 'dud dang/ rnam par grags ba'i yid dang/ ba dang/ pad+ma'i phyag dang/ yid kyi shing rta dang/

tshig 'byin pa bo dang/ rab tu bzhad pa dang/ sku bzang dang/ skra mtha'adang/ rgyu skar dang/ rgyu skar rgyal bo dang/ zla ba'i bu dang/ skal bzang dang/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ mtha'
mas rnam rgyal dang/ lha las rnam rgyal dang/ 'dod pa phun tshogs byed dang/ legs par 'dul ba dang/ 'dul ba bo zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal bo chu skyes gtsug tor la sog
ba rnams kyis chos kyi sprin gyi 'a mthar laslab ba'i ting nge 'dzin du gyur ba brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig du ma'i rig pas yongs su bskor ba dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal mo du ma dang/ 'jig rten

dbang phyug gi sku'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par spros pa du ma rnams la 'a lta ste/ sgrol ma dang/ bsam pa'i sgrol ma dang/ gar ma dang/ khro gnyer can ma dang/ a nut+ta lci dang/ lo rtswa dang/ sa thob bar byed/
pa dang/ dri ma dang bral ma dang/ dkar mo dang/ dkar sham ma dang/ dkar sham chen mo dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ 'jig rten gos ma dang/ dri med gos ma dang/ byang chub yan lag ga gos ma
dang chu skyes gos ma dang/ stobs bcu gos mdang/ grags ldan ma dang/ longs spyod ldan ma dang/ longs spyod che ldan ma dang/ uts+tshakA dang/ Thalu kA dang/ dri med mthar byed ma dang/ dri
bral mthar byed ma dang/ kun tu mthar byed ma dang/ sdug bsngal mthar byed ma dang/ 'byung po mthar byed ma dang/ dpalamo dang/ dpal chen mo dang/ mtha'i dbal dang/ bstod pa'i dpal
dang 'jig rten dbal dang/ rnam par grags pa'i dpal dang/ 'jig rten yum dang/ kun tu yum dang/ sangs rgyas yum dang/ sring mo dang/ skal ldan shing rtam dang/ shing rta bzang
mo dang/ shing rta ldan ma dang/ klu 'dul ma dang/ 'dul byar ma dang/ 'byung po ldan ma dang/ dbaka mad pa dang/ 'phreng ba ma dang/ longs sbyong stobs ma dang/ 'gugs byed ma dang/ 'od
zer rmad byung ma dang/ ro bzang mo dang/ chang ldan ma dang ]rab tu mgu ma dang/ mchod ldan ma dang/ 'gram ma dang/ kun tu 'gram ma dang/ skor 'od ma dang/ zla ba ma dang/ zla ba ldan ma/
dang/ rmabya ma dang/ nags ldan ma dang/ nor sbyin ma dang/ chang ldan ma dang/ 'jig rten ldan ma dang/ 'od 'phro ldan ma dang/ sdong bu chen mo dang/ che ldan ma dang//
legs par rgyas byung ma dang/ legs par dga' ma dang/ dbyig sbyin ma dang/ dbal mo dang/ ngag ldan ma dang/ nad mthar byed ma dang/ nad thams cad gso byed ma dang/ nad med lha mo dang/ grog

phyud ma dang/ dbang byed ma dang/ myur byed ma dang/ bde sbyin ma dang/ bkra shis ma dang/ bkra shis thob byed dga' ma dang/ zla ba [”] bzang bo dang/ zla ba ldan ma zhes bya ba 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang
rig ba'i rgyal mo ri khrod lo ma can dang/ dug sel ma dang/ yid las byungam la sogs pa rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa mtha' yas ba spyod ba thams cad kyi rnam par
'phrul ba byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag par skyes ba yid las byung ba rnams te/ goltadang/ bo nya mo dang/ sngon pho dang/ bran mo dang/ ci bgyi dong/ ci bgyi mo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mo/
dang/ srin po dang/ srin mo dang/ sha za dang/ sha za mo bad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug pa/ gsang sngags rnam pa sbyong ba rnams gang gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan ba/
la dag pa'i sems can nges par 'khod ba dades rab tu gnas par byed pas rab tshu gnas te/ rang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson pa'i yid dang ldan par gyur to// bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nye logs der gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdos rang gi rig ba'i tshogs la bos par gyur te/ 'dir 'dus bar gyur pa khyed rnams ni rig pa'i tshigs kyis yongs

su bskor ba khro bo'i rgyal bo dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang/ rgyal mo dang bcas ba rnams kyis go nya mo chen mo dran ba tsam nyid kyis rig pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dus pa rnams 'di lta ste/ rig ba mchog dang/

rig pa bzang bo dang/ legs par grub pa dang/ dbung bzad ng/ sde bzang dang/ lha mthar byed dang/ so bzang po dang/ gang ba bzang bo dang/ rdo rje'i sde dang/ rdo rje'i mtha' dang/ dordza'i lag pa dang
jorje'i dpung ba dang/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo'i ba dan dang/ rdo rje'i spyod yul dang/ rdo rje'i mgo bo 'chang dang/ rdo rje mchog dang/ dag pa'i rdo rje dang/ rdo rje'i spu dang/

rdo rje mchod pa dang/ rdo rje du ma dang/ rdo rje go chadang/ rdo rjemagrin pa dang/ rdo rdzogasungab dang/ rdo rje lte bdang/ rdo rdzomatha'adang/ rdo rje gur dang/ rdo rje ra ba dang/ rdo rje mtshon chadang/ rdo rje gzhu dang/

rdorje mda' dang/ rdo rje lcags mda' dang/ rdo rjemtshan ma dang/ rdo dgyes bdang/ rdo rje sa 'og dang/ rdoT+Tha'ajigs spyan dang/ rdoljonor mtha' dang/ rdo rje khro bo dang/ chu'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga bod

'byung bo'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang/ khro bo chen po'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang/ sbyin pa'i bu'idabang bo'i yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro dang/ rig pa
thams cad yid du 'ong ba'i paro dang/ drag po dang/ shin tudrag po dang/ 'phen pa dang/ nye bar 'phen pa dang/ rtag tu 'phen pa dang/ 'dul ba'i mtha'i 'phen pa dang/
shin tu rnam bkod 'phen pa dang/ 'chol bar 'phen pa dang/ stobs dang/ stobs bo che dang/ legs 'byung gsod byed dang/ blog Ti dang/ khro bo dang/ khro bo chen po dang/ khro bo thams cad dang/
[= ]mi rgas pa nyid dang/ mi gnyid ba dang/ gdung ba'i dbyangs dang/ klu'i mtha' dang/ dbyug chu dang/ dbyug pa sngon po dang/ lus sbyin dang/ lus dmar dang/ rdo rje'i dbyug pa dang/ sbyin dang/
sngon chen dang/ nag po dang/ nag po btsugasapa dang/ sna tshogs nad dang/ thams cad 'phen pa po dang/ mdung dang/ mdung chen po dang/ nyam thag pa dang/ nyam thag pa chen bo dang/ nyi ma'i bu mnyam
N+NaM pa dang/ dus mthar byed bdang/ gnod sbyin nag po dang/ drag po dang/ drag bo'i gzugs dang/ rtse gsum kha gdangs pa dang/ mda' bo tshedang/ ba tsan rab 'dzoms dang/ za ba sdud pa'i dpa'
bodang/ dus mtha'i nyi ma dang/ srog 'phrog pa dang/ sgra 'joms pa dang/ zhesda mi 'dzin pa dang/ 'khyil ba dang/ 'khyil ba min pa dang/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang/ mtha' yas 'khyil ba dang/
a/ khrag 'khyil ba dang/ dpung pa dang/ dpung pa chen bo dang/ gdug pa'i nad chesawa bo dang/ me dbal dang/ mdze thams cad las rgyal ba dang/ 'bros pa dang/ rnam par 'bros ba bo dang/ de bzhin
pa rnam 'bros dang/ rnam par bros ba bo dang/ de bzhin rnam bros dang/ tshim med 'tshol ba zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal bo dang/ khro bo tshon bo rnams kyis ma lus shing
lus pa med pa'i sems can gdul ba dang/ skyod pa dang/ gzhig pa dang/ dgag pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ rnam par 'joms ba dang/ pha dang/ zas rnams ster bar byed bdang/ zhi ba can dang/

rgyas ba can dang/ mngon spyod can gyi las rnams shin tu sbyor bar byed pa bo rig pa'i rgyal po byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dum rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang/
byang chub sems dba' sams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par sems pas rang gi rig pa'i rgyal bo rdo rje'i rigs skyong ba la phyag 'tshal te gnang bzhos nas/ rang gi rig
la gnas par byed cing gnas pas rang rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phul ba'i pho nya mo chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gis yongs su
bskor ba'angarang chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin spros pa med pa la dmigs nas gnas der 'dus par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ 'og pag ma dang/ 'og pag ma bzang bo dang/ lu gu rgyud med pa

rdo rje 'od dang/ rdo rje'i rtse ma dang/ rdordzo'i smin ma dang/ rdo rje'i spyan dang/ rdo rje'i lta ba dang/ rdo rje khro gnyer ma dang/ rdo rje snyan ma dang/ rdo rjer mo ma dang/ rdo rje khab mdang/ rdo rje khu tshur ma dang/
[7 ]@#// rdo rje lcags kyus dang/ derdziral gri ba dang/ rdo thog ma dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ sAl ldan m dang/ sA la ba ra ba ma dang/ mchog tu byed ma dang/ 'don ldan ma dang/
rdo rje 'dod ldan m dang/ 'dod pa'i rdo rjem dang/ mthong can ma dang/ mthong ldan ma dang/ mthong ba chen mo dang/ rtse mo'i gos ma dang/ phug len ma dang/ phug ldan ma dang/ phug gnas ma
tsha dang / sgo gnas ma dang/ 'dod pa rdo rje ma dang/ yid mgyogs ma dang/ mi 'am mgyogs ma dang/ myur mgyogs ma dang/ spyan bzang ma dang/ chang gnas ma dang/ bung ba ma dang/ bung ba
il las byung ba ma dang/ mchod sbyin grub ma dang/ rlung ma dang/ gang ba'i gos ma dang/ grwa bzangs mdang/ hiNAn dang/ sdigs mdzub ma dang/ pho mo dang/ pho nya bzangao dang/ mAm kI dang/ g.yon
pa ma dang/ gzugs can ma dang/ gzugs ldan ma dang/ rgyal ma dang/ rnam par rgyal ma dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma dang/ dge legs ma dang/ bzhad ldan ma dang/ bzhad pa'i rdo rje ma dang/ 'jig
chen ldan ma dang/ grags ldan ma dang/ rdo rje ldan ma dang/ ma dul ma dang/ 'jig rten gsum bo dbang du byed ma dang/ dbyug pa ma dang/ dbyug pa chen mo dang/ snyan bar sku bldan ma dang/ skul
tsha ]bzang nyid ldan ma dang/ don ldan ma dang/ don chen ldan ma dang/ gong ma sreg dang/ dkar mo dang/ shin tu sprul ma dang/ shin dri med mdang/ dril bum dang/ ral gri ma dang/ rtse gsum/
kha gdangs ma dang/ kham ma dang/ rgyal byed ma dang/ gos ma dang/ phyag 'tshal ma dang/ mngacan m dang/ gsang ba ma dang/ dbugs 'byin ma dang/ gtun shing ma dang/ bo nya thams cad

dbang byed ma zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang pho nya mo chen mo pho nyamo duma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// ting 'dzin gyi rgyu'athun ba
yongs su bsgoms pa'i yid las byung ba gzungs ma duma'i gajug ba'i sems can rnams tshar gcod cing chad pas gcod ba dang da lta ste/N+Di'i me rab rtsarmongs bar byed bashig 'dam dang/ rirab kyi rtsa
mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs ma dang/ rin chen rtse mo'i khang ba brtsegs ba'i gzungs ma dang/ sa 'dzin ma dang/ legs bar brtsegs ma dang/ mang bor btsugs ma dang/ me tog brtsegs
cha dang/ chad pa'i gzungs ma dang/ tshar gcod pa'i gzungs ma dang/ dgug ba'i gzungs ma dang/ dbung rgyan ma dang/ dpung rgyan ldan ma dang/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dbu rgyan ma dang/ rin
chen rtse mo'i dpung rgyanam dang/ 'jig rten rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang/ ba dan rtse mo'i dbung rgyan mdang/ gsum 'khyil ma dang/ 'jig rten 'khyil ma dang/ stong 'khyil ma dang/ nyim bu 'khyil/
ma dang/ 'byung po kun 'khyil ma dang/ tog ldan ma dang/ rin chen ldan ma dang/ nor bu rin chen gtsug ma dang/ byang chub yan lag gi stobs ldan ma dang/ mtha' yas tog dang/ kun tu tog dang
[©]// nachen tog dang/ rnam par grags pa'i rtog dang/ 'byung bo thams cad kyi tog dang/ ma 'pham ldan m dang/ gos shin tu dri med ma dang/ gdong drug ma dang/ dri bral ma
ma dang/ 'jig rten grags ma zhes pa 'di dag dang/ gzhan yang gzungs ma brgya stong phrag bye ba du mas yongs su bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// sangs rgyas
'a mtha' yas pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spangs pan rang sangs rgyas bcom

pa'ildan 'das bse ru lta bu dang/ tshogs dang spyod pa rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa ni cangam gsung bar gyur ba lhag bar gnas pas chos kyi tshul yang dag par ston par mdzad de 'khor ba'i rjes
su 'jug ba rtag tu yid skyo brgyud la snying rje chen bo spangs shing ma 'dres pa'i sems kyi bag chags kyis yongs su bsgos pa/ sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su bsgos ba'i sems bas sa
gcig dang/ sa gnyis dang/ sa gsum dang/ jisrid byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i bar la lad ma 'jug pa/ 'khor bas yid skyo zhing 'jigs shing 'jigs ba dang ldan pa de rnams kyang 'khor
pa gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ spos dri len dang/ kun nas skye mched dang/ kun tu 'od dang/ tsan dan dang/ dus dang/ mu khyud dang/ nye ba'i mu khyud dang/ 'chi ltas
dang nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang/ logs bzang bo dang/ rngabo che dang/ nye ba'i rnga bo che dang/ 'jig rten grags pa dang/ 'jig rten 'od dang/ rgyal byed dang/ rdul med dang/ rdul dang/ rdul med
dang/ nye ba'i rdul dang/ cha shas dang/ nye ba'i chashas dang/ mtshan ma dang/ mtshan ma bzang bo dang/ nyin mor byed pa dang/ legs byed 'od ldan dang/ 'od byed 'od ldan dang/ 'od khyod dang
'jig rten byed pa dang/ rnam thos dang/ legs thos dang/ mdzes sdug dang/ legs 'dzin mtha' dang/ dul ma sa dang/ mtha' yas mtha' dang/ sridamatha' dang/ tog dkar
bo dang/ mtshan ma'i tog dang/ tog dang/ nye ba'i tog dang/ rgyal dang/ bad+ma'i bla ma dang/ ba'i 'byung ba dang/ rang byung dang/ skyes ba dang/ mdu 'ong dang/ yid las byung dang/ dbang
chen dang/ brtsegs par grags pa dang/ bum pa dang/ mtha' dag spyan dang/ bde byed dang/ phan byed dang/ zhi ba dang/ zhiba'i yid dang/ chos dang/ nye ba'i chos dang/ rnam par snang byed dang/
me tog dang/ legs po dang/ dpal ldan dang/ gnyen las thag ring byed pa dang/ bzod par dkar ba dang/ gser dang/ dri med tog dang/ zla ba dang/ nye ba'i zla ba dang/ sde bzapa dang/ legs

bar sbyangs ba dang/ brgya byin dang/ 'dod pa dang/ nye dbang dang/ nor lha zhes ba 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal gyis mi lang
basmon pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin spros pa med cing 'dus ma byas ba theg pa 'bring la rab tu zhugs shing nges bar bstan te gnas ba/ rjes su chags pa dang
khong khro ba dang bral ba rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgrub ba bzhugs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs bor gyur to// nyan thos bstong phrag bye ba du mas yongs su bskor ba'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun

dang thabs cig ba 'di lta ste/ 'od srungs chen bo dang/ chu klung 'od srungs dang/ ga ya 'od srungs dang/ ltang rgyas 'od srungs dang/ b+har d+h+wa dza bsod snyoms len dang/ g+hor d+hAdzad ng/ mo'u 'gal
gyi bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen bo dang/ shAri'i bu dang/ shA ri'i bu chen po dang/ sna tshogs mdzes dang/ rab 'byoradang/ rab 'byor chen po dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ ka ta'i bu dang ka 'i
bachen bo dang/ nye bar 'khor dang/ bzang ldan dang/ ka ban dang/ dga' bo dang/ kun dga' bo dang/ mdzes dga' bo dang/ nye dga' dang/ rna ba bye ba ri ba dang/ 'jig rten 'byung ba dang/
mtha' las 'byung ba dang/ yid 'ong bdang/ nye ba'i yid 'ong ba dang/ dga' ldan dang/ nye ba'i dga' ldan dang/ ma 'gags ba dang/ rtsa ba kun tu gang ba dang/ nye bar gang ba dang/ rgyal dang/
a nam so dang/ pur dang/ drag po'i bu dang/ ru nu'i bu dang/ kachudang/ lngas rtsen dang/ nye ba'i lngas rtsen dang/ dus dang/ mnyam ba'idus dang/ lha 'dzin dang/ sgra gcan 'dzin dang/ lta sgo/
dang/ nye ba'i ljangasngo dang/ bsam bya dang/ dga' ba sems ba po dang/ 'char ka dang/ nyeba'i 'char ka dang/ dbal ldakadang/ chu'i bu dang/ rgyad kyi bu dang/ nyerdzas ldan dang/ dum budang//

rgyal dang/ nye rgyal dang/ rgyal chen bo dang/ kun tu rgyal dang/ 'bod byed dang/ grags sbyin dang/ gral/sa ldan dang/ nor can dang/ nor gyi rgya mtshodang/ nyapa'i nor can dang/ hi lin+da'i bu pa bal
ka dang/ 'bras bu dang/ nyaba'i 'bras bu dang/ mtha' las 'bras bu dang/ 'bras budang bcas ba dang/ gzhon nu dang gzhon nu 'od srungs dang/ cher sbyin dang/ bcu drug sde pa'i dga' byed dang/

chub 'i dga' byed dang/ yon bol yo ba dang/ rgyal ba'i zhags pa dang/ dbugs 'byin chen bo dang/ be'u budang/ kurukul+la dang/ nye ba'i ku ru kul+la dang/ gro bzhin skyes rnab byo ba rib dang/ khrogo la
yol gyi mthar byed pa dang/ ga'i bu dang/ ri'i bcad ng/ nyeba'i zar ba dang/ dbyaracan dang/ snang ba dang/ mdzes par snangab dang/ dbal spos dang/ 'jig rten sbas pa dang/ blo ma sbas
pa dang/ snang ba la dga' bdango/ zhi byed dang/ phyis ba dang/ nye ba'i byis pa dang/ bye ba nyi shu ba dang/ mgon med sbyin dang/ nye bar 'jug pa dang/ ldog pa dang/ smyo byed dang/ kun tu 'od
dang mtshobazang dang/ legs pa dang/ rab sad dang/ logs 'ongs dang/ nyer 'ongs dang/ nyer 'gro dang/ 'jig rten 'gro dang/ sdug bsngal mthar byed dang/ bskal ba bzang bo dang/
rgyu@#// chen bo bzang ldan dang/ don spyod pa dang/ ba chen bo dang/ 'gro ldan dang/ rgyal skyong dang/ rgyal dang/ gsal ldan dang/ nye ba'i gsal ldan dang/ sman chen bo dang/
gzi brjid chen bo can dang/ gzi brjid chen bo dang/ lha mtshams dang/ sgrub byed dang tshogs can dang/ tshangs ba bzang bo dang/ mdzes bzang dang/ 'jig rten bzang dang/ mnyam pa dang/
yang dag gzhal ba zhes ba 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa rnam par grol ba'i ro'i ro myong ba/ theg pa gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa/ theg ba chung ngu'i lam kun tu thob
rgyabab 'khor ba las bros ba/ rnam par thar pa'i lam gsum gyi bsam gtan bsams pa/ tshangs ba'i gnas bzhi'i spyod lam lasoms bar zhugs ba/ legs bar mnyam bar bzhag pa/ leg
bar bsen par rdzogs pa/leg pa'i tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das ba'i dbyings la mnyam par 'jug ba mnyam pa nyid bros pa med ba blo gros can rnams thams cad dang ldan ba'i
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen bo der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa sa bcu ba'i bar ma chad ba dkon mchog gsum gyi gnas su gnas ba dang thabs cig tu de rnams kyang der kun tu 'khod bar gyur
to[：]nyan thos ma chen mo rgya nalasa'adasaba'i dbyangs la rab tumanyam par 'jug bas rab tu zhugs pa du ma rnams kyang 'dus ma byas kyi lam gyi theg pa la dmigs ba dag cing 'dod chags dang
bral ba/ kun nas snang ba kun tu thob pa sbyin par bya ba'i zhing gi yon tan 'dzin tsang rnam par sbyong ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ 'jig rtena mchog gi bdag mo lhas
mchod pa bsod nams kyi zhing/ rkang gnyis ba dang nang ba'i sar gnangs dang/ rka med kyi sems can thams cad kyi mchog gi bdag mo rnams la 'di lta ste/ grags 'dzin ma dang/ grogs sprin ma dang/
skye dgu'i bdagamo chanamo dang/ skye dgu'ibadag mo legs skyes ma dang/ dga' bo dang/ sbom dga' mo dang/ mdzes dga' bo dang/ sems bamo dang/ mdzes ma dang/ mtha' yas ma dang/ sa ga
mdang/ yid kyi shing rtam dang/ rgyal ldan ma dang/ dpa' mo dang/ nye ba'i dpa' mo dang/ lha mo dang/ legs lha mo dang/ legs dpal ma dang/ dbol ma dang/ rab spyod ma dang/ ba
dgam dang/ snyan bar smra ma dang/ snar ma ma dang/ yul 'khor srung ma dang/ srung ba ma dang/ rje bo ma dang/ phun tshogs ma dang/ lus can ma dang/ dudab ma dang/ dga' ma dang/ ral pa
mdang/ nye ba'i ral pa ma dang/ gnas ral ba ma dang/ 'byung ba ma dang/ snang ldan ma dang/ yid mgyogs ma dang/ sgra ldan ma dang/ khyab 'jug len mdang/ khyab 'jug ldan ma dang/
yid bzas ma dang/ yid mangs ma dang/ dpal ldan ma dang/ sdug bsngal mthar thug ma dang/ las sbyin ma dang/ las 'bras ma dang/ rnam rgyal ldan m dang/ rgyal ldan ma dang/ nor bdag
ma dang/ nor sbyin ma dang/ chos sbyin ma dang/ legs sbyin ma dang/ rab za ma dang/ a ma ma dang/ grags pa 'jug ma dang/ pad ldan mdang/ rab bzhad ma dang//
srid gsum mthar byed ma dang/ 'khor gsum mthar byed ma dang/ sdug bsngal bamo dang/ yid 'byung sa dang/ lo ma gsum ba dang/ par lo ma dang/ pad+maldan ma dang/ pad+ma'i 'od ma dang/
dka' bzlog rkang spyod ma dang/ dka' bzlog dang spyod ldan ma dang/ 'dab gsum ma dang/ 'dab bdun ma dang/ tsa'u la'i mdog ma zhes ba 'di dag dang/ gzhan yang gnas brtan ma chen mo/
tshanyan thos ma chen mo rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar lhags bar gyurato// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de mas nyid byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par
'khrul ba'i mthu mthong bar 'dod nas 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te chos nyan pa'i phyir dang/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub pa la brtson par 'dod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
thub bas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas lhag pa'i bsam ba dag pa dang/ dwangos bo yod pa'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i ngo bo sems can gyi khams lam gsum
gal las yang dag bar 'adas pa mkhyen nas/ sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsalato// sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi don gyi sbyor ba la so so soms shig/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon
bar dga' ba 'dod ba'i las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yang dag par thob pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshig dang/ las kyi tshig dang/ zhi ba'i tshig dang/ thar
ba'i tshig dang/ rtog pa sgrar ba dang/ rnam par mi rtog ba'i mnyam ba nyid thob par byed pa/de bzhin shegs pa'i stobs bcu kun gyi stobs dang/bdud kyi stobs thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed pa

zhes bya ba'ibyang chub sems dba'i ting nge 'dzin sgomashig/ danas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ma thag tuphyang chub sems dpa' sems da bab chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms pa bzhugs pa gyur to//

sbyaras gzigs dbang phyug snyoms ba gzhugs m thagatu/ thiltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stobaphrag ga rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam ba'i stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang dag par bzhugagos tasnab chen bos gsal bar byas nas/rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobasabaskyed bston par gyur cing/ rang gi sngags tshig kyang gsungs bar gyur

to[：]rtog ba'i sngags rnams kyang sngags bum/thun mong ba gcig gis rim pa las ma 'das bar 'byung bani/na mas man+ta bud+d+hanaMab+hAbasA b+hAb/samud ThAnaM/nam breg bud+d+ha Ar+yagla ba kAnaM/na mo bodi sazhan

da sha b+hU mi pra titsitesha ra tshabo d+hisatAnaM/ ma hAsamAnaM/ tad+yathA/ oM kha kha/ khA hi khAhi/ dusatA/ dam ka/ a sa ma sa lo/ bshu/ bAshi/ hin+ta/ tsa [$]pasu 'i/ ShaT tshar Na/ gats+tshagatsa/ma//
bgaM/ big+han ta ka/ bi kr-i tanan/ sArtsa ta/ b+hayaM ka ra/ a/ As nad ni/ bya sgyu tsamanabA sa na/ u ru rusats+tshakamaNaM/ ts+tshi n+da/b+hin+da b+hin+da/ sa lamudra/ A kirA A[']kaN+Da

b+hUt+tan/namathan/ sadzaduts+tshan+ti/ pra bisha la/ maN+Da la ma d+d+haM/ pe ba sI ta tAn ta ka ra ba ru yul ma kAr+ya/da phung/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam+bas ma ya anur/hU~Mkhyu Ta/ spo Ta ya so Ta// saTha AshApa'ipUraka

ho b+ha ga bAn/kiwirA ya simam/sam+baam+basAd+ha ya sA/'di nabcom ldan 'dasam 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo min bosgrol mas gnon ba zhes bya bgapa 'dod ba de 'gugs par byed ci thob par byed ba/dbang po dang gshin rje'i

rgyal bo'ang 'gugs par byed cing 'joms par byed pa yin na/sems can gazhan rnams lta smos kyabadagos/khro po'i rgyal bo chen pos gsungs ma thag tu sems can thams cad nyam thag cing 'jigs skrag ste yid skyo zhing sIngags

b.lu gyur nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dba'asems dba' chen bo ma gtogs pa skyabasagazhan med/skyob ba gzhan med/dpung gnyen gzhan med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye lhags par gyur to//

gnasags las la sbyod pa dang/ mkha' la spyod pa dang/ brtan pa dang/ g.yob dang/ mngal skyes dang/ sgong skyes dang/ drod gsher skyes dang/ rdzus te skyes pa sems can gyi grangs su gtogs ba 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas

shang ma med na rnam pa gnas ba steng dang 'og dang/ thad ka dang/ phyogs dang/ phyogs bral rnams su skad cig dedang/ yud tsam de la gab pa rnams khro ba'irgyal po chen pos skad cig la 'dir bkug par gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal

bsgrub par gyur ba 'di 'dod chags dang ma bral bar gyur ba rnams kyi mdun du bzlos bar mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhan de'ang 'chibar 'gyuram/ bskam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// a tshig byin gyis brlabs nas/ sangs rgyas

kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ring bsrel dang bcas ba'i mtshod rten nam dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam las/ sbyin pas gzigs dbang phyug ga sbyan snga lubazlas brjod bya'i/las gzhan gyi ched du 'am/gang yang 'ju bder klog bar

mi bya ste/ci'i phyi ltas nganachen bodang/ mya nganachen po dang/ bdag nyid nye bar 'joms par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dba'asomasadapa' chen po rnam 'ba' zhig ni

thugs rje mchogadaldan b/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyod pa sgrub cing rjes su 'jug pa sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa/chos kyi tshul yang dag pa gnas bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams ma lus ba mya ngan

las 'das pa thob par byed pa/bstan pa med par bstan ba dang/ lam gsum la yang dag par sbyor ba dang/ dko mchogsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ sngags kyi sbyong ba gsal bar byed pa dang/ thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i

rgyu 'thun pa'i thugs kyis bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon bdang/ bgegs chen po rnam par gzhig pa dang/ gdug pa'i rgyal bo zlog pa dang/ bdag gi stobasa mngon bara'aphel bdang/ gzhan gyi stobs zlog par byed pa dang/

yos pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ nyams ba dang/ 'chos pa dang/ sems pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ rangag grags kyi spyod pa gsal bar byed pa dang/ tshe dang/ nad med pa dang/ rangagadabang phyug mngon bar 'phel ba dang/ myur du
las rjes su sgrub pa dang/ byams pa chen bo dang/ sAng rjechen po dang/ dga'i pa chen bo dang/ btang snyoms chen bodang/ ya jag bar sdom ba dang/ de dag gi rgyu mtshan dang/ glu la thams cad

du rtog go ba dang/ rnam par rtog ge ba dang bral ba'isams kyis smras so// de nas klu dang klachen bo dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin chen bo dang/ srin po dang/ srin bo chen po dang/ sha za dang/ sha za chen po dang/
srul bodang/ srul bo chen bo dang/ lus srul po dang/ lus srul po chen bo dang/ mamo dang/ ma mo chen mo dang/ grul bum dang/ grul bum chen bo dang/ gcan gzan dang/ gcan gzan chen po dang/ ro las

dang molangs chen po dang/ kam po dza dang/ kam po dzan po dang// sring mo dang/ sra mo chen mo dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ mkha' 'gro chen mo dang/ gzhibs pa dang/ gzhabs pa chen po dang/ gnon po dang/

gnon bo chen po dang/ byas pa dang/ byis pa chen po dang/ bran pa dang/ bran pa chen po dang/ nad dang/ nad chen po dang/ brjod byed dang/ brjod byed chen po dang/ gdon dang/ gdon chen po dang/ nam mkha'i ma mo
dang nam mkha'i ma mo chen mo dang/ gzugs can ma dang/ gzugs can m chen mo dang/ gzugs ngan ma dang/ gzugs nganam chen mo dang/ bu'abod dang/ ngu 'bod chen po dang/ grib gnon dang/ grib gnon chan

a bo dang/ spyod gtong dang/ sbod gtong chen bo dang/ ci bgyi dang/ ci bag chen po dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo dang/ sha za mo dang/ sha za mo chen mo dang/ rims nad dang/ rims nad chen mo dang/ rims

0 nyin bazhi pa dang/ rims nyi bzhipa chen po dang rtag pa rims dang/ rims mi bzad ba rnams dang/ rtag pa las byung pa'i mis dang/ yud tsam pa dang/ rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur dang/ bad kan

las gyur pa dang/ 'dus pa las gyur pa dang/ gcong dang/ gcong chen po dang/ grub ba dang/ grubapa chen bo dang/ sbyor ldan dang/ sbyor ldan chen po dang/ drang srong dang/ drang srong chen bo dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ ma 'am

chen bo dang/ lto 'phye chen podang/ lto 'phye chen po chan bo dang/ briwadang/ dri za chen po dang/ lha dang/ lha chen po dang/ mdang/ mi chen bo dang/ ljongs dang/ ljongs chen po dang/ rgya mtshodang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang

chu klung dang/ chu klung chen po dang/ ri dang/ ri chen po dang/ gter dang/ gtor chen po dang/ sa dang/ sa chen po dang/ shing dang/ shing chen bo dang/ 'dab chags dang/ 'dab chags chen po dang/ rgyal po dang/

rgyal po chen bo dang/ brgya byin dang/ dbang po chen po dang/ nor lha'i budang/ sgra sgrogs dang/ 'byung bo'i bdag po dang/ dbang ldan dang/ gshin rje dang/ tshangs pa dang/ tshangs pa chen bodang/ nyi ma'i bu dang/ nor

sbyin dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ 'phags skyes bo dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ lus ngan po dang/ gang ba bzang bo dang/ nor bu bzang bo dang/ lnga rtsen dang/ rmugs 'dzin dang/ rangs 'dzin dang/ ka 'dzin dang

lcangasngo dang/ sgra lnga sdo dang/ seng ge dang/ 'phrog mdang dga' byed dang/ nor byed dang/ chu'i dbang po dang/ 'jig rten dbang po dang/ nye ba'i dbang po dang/ gsang ba bdang/ gsang ba pa chen po dang/ g.yo ba
dang/ g.yo byed dang/ spyod dang/ rtag pa'i dang/ kha ba'i ri dang/ ra chen bo dang/ mig brtsegs pa dang/ mgo bo gsum pa zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi sde

dbonachen po gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/byang chub sems dpas byin gyis brlabs dang rdzu 'phrul gyis stobs bskyed pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

chen po de nyid du 'dus shing 'phrog par gyur to// gang yang srin po'i rgyal potshan bo srin po bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bkug ba 'di ltas bros pa dang 'bros byed dang/ rtag bar

ju byed dang/ gzor gyi rnab dang/ bum pa'i rna ba dang/ kun nas rna ba dang/ gshin rje dang/ rnam pa 'jigs byed dang/ 'jigs su rung ba dang/ drag po dang/ shin tudrag bo dang/ mi bzad pa dang/ sdug ldan dang/

dbang po rgyal dang/ 'thab ba dang/ legs par 'thab pa dang/ mdudang/ mdung rtse gsum ng/ mgo bo gsum pa dang/ mgo bomatha' yas pa zhes pa'i ng chos mnyanapa'iphyir 'dus par gyur to// gang mngasha za dang/ shawa chen

podang/ sha za chen po byab khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dums yongs su bskor ba de rnams kyang 'di lta ste/ 'thung ga tshod dang/ nye ba'i 'thu gcod dang/ legs bam 'thung gcodadang/ mtha' yas 'thung gcod dang/ da kyi shing rta dang/ legs bar

yid kyi shing ltadang/ legs par 'dren pa dang/ tha byed dang/ sprubazang bo dang/ drag bong/ drag po'i gzugs can zhes pa de rnams kyang chos mnyan paphyi 'dus bar gyur to// gang la klu'i rgyal bo chen bo kru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

brag dums yongs su bskor ba khrobe'i rgyal bos byang chub sems dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas bkug ba 'di lta ste/dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo dang/ zla ba dang/ nye ba'i zla ba dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ mtha' yas dang

'ag bodang/ bad+madang/ pang chen po dang/ dung skyob dang/ dung dang/ dung skyor ma dang/ stobs kyi rgyudang/ rigs ldan dang/ bskrun pa'i btub dang/ bum basbyin dang/ rdzordzacan dang/ tsam pa'i bu dang/ yang ldan klu dang/ ngargyal

'joms dang/ kaM ka ra dang/ nye ba'i TaM ku ra dang/ la ku shudang/ la du chen po dang/ dkar bo dang/ dkar po bzang po dang/ sngon po dang/ sngon bo chu sbyin dang/ 'oma'ichudang/ sog ma med dang/ mtshodang/ nyeba'i

mtsho zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po klu brgya stong phrag du masayongs su bsko bde rnams chos mnyan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing 'dug khab gyur to/ gangayang drang srong dang drang

srong chen bod rnams 'di lta ste/rgyun shes kyi budang/ gnas 'jog dang/ go'u lam dang/ skal ldan shing rta dang/ dzahU~Mnudang/ oM gi ras dang/ a mastu dang/ su las dang/ ri byi dang/ rgyas ba dang/ nag po dang/ go tam nag

bodang/ medang/ ma'i rgyud dang/ tAMwag las dang/ dzamad ak+shi dang/ yod pa ba dang/ thub ba dang/ thub mchog dang/ bebamA lan dang/ rtsibs logs skyes dang/ dgra sta dang/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang/ bas la dang/

bag la zab dang/ grog mkhar ba dang/ bdud mdangs zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang drang srong chen po bcastong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba de rnams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der nyebar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das
shAkyathub ba la phyag 'tshanasagasang sngags spyod ba'i don dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyami rjes su yid la bca'adodapas 'khod par gyur to// gang yabalto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po de

! rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khodachen bo de rab tuzhugs shing 'khod par gyurapa 'dil ste/ b+hi ran+tadang/ b+ha rutshudang/ ma ruN+Dadang/ 'od zer dang/ 'od zer 'bar ba zhes ba'o//gangs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po

ngo rnams kyang nam mkha' ldibargya stong phrag du mas yongasasu bskor ta 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus ba'agyur ba 'di lta ste/'dab bzangs dang/ 'dabadaka' dang/ klu dang/ 'dab 'grodang/ 'dab bzang skyes dang/ yid

mgyogs dang/ klu 'jogs dang/ rnams 'dud bu dang/ b+har b+hAdzad ng/ dge mtshan dang/ dgamtshan chen po dang/ 'dab chags rgyal po ste/de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen bodir 'dus bar gyur to// gang yang a 'am

ci'i rgyal bog 'am mi brgya stong phrag du mas bsko bde rnams kya'adi lta ste/ljonab dang/ luba'iljon pa dang/ legs pa'i ljon ba dang/ mtha' yas ljon pa dang/ 'jig rten ljon pa dang/ ljon ba gsal ba dang/

brang rgyas dang/ brang rgyas tshapo dang/ yid kyi gzi brjidang/ gzi brjid chen bodang/ rdzu 'phrulachen bo dang/ rnam pa sgrogs pa dang/ dbyangs bzang bodang/ yid 'ong dang/ sems skyed par byed pa dang/ smyo byed dang/ nganad+ha

tsha tadang/ btabasnyoms ba dang/ snying rje dang/ snying rdzabad ba zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ gzhan yang mi 'ama'i rgyal bo stong brag gis longs su bskor ba rnams chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin du
00mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ tshangs pa chen bo dang/ kun tu 'od gsal ba dang/ sa sku 'od gsal dang/ dag pa'i 'od dang/ bsod nams 'od dang/ mchi ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ 'og minadang/
'og bzas dang/ 'jig rtenamatha'adang/ tsa'ang nadaba'i skye mched dang/ su'angamad pa min ba dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas dang// nam mkha' mtha' yas min pa nyid dang/ rgyanom snapa dang/ shin tu

mtho dang legs khar sprul ba nga longs su sgrub bang/ gas gtsam dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'thabakhrab dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhis dang/ rtag myos dang/ 'phreng thogs dang/ gzhong thogs dang bid/

gsum ba dang/ rig gnas bo dang/ khang brtsegasab la khams pa dang/ rtse mor gnas ba dang lcangalo can na gnas ba dang/ grong na gnas pa dang/ gzhal med khana gnas ba dang/ nan gnas ba dang/ bar snapal ba dang/ san

gnas ba dang/ shing la gnas ba dang/ khyim na gnas bdang/ de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang porab tsham dang/ stobs ldan dang/ thags bzas ris dang/ legs bkra dang/ dag bkradang/ slag can dang/ lag pa la sogs pa'i/

lha ma yin byeb stong phrag dums yongs su bskor ba 'gros rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ no rnam ba sna tshogs dang/ lha dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i lha ma yin de rnams kyang gsargyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul blta ba

dang phyag bya ba dang/ bstan pa kur bya bar 'dod bas 'khorgyadakyil 'khor deba'ajusab gyur to//g.yagakha'adabagaza' chen po'i 'jig rten gyi don dusbyodapa bsnapal spyod pa la 'diwa//nyi dang/ zla ba dang/ mig dmar dang/ lhag
pa dang phur bu dang/ bsangs dang/ sr-in pa dang/ sgra gcan dang/ sa 'guladang/ mjug ris dang/ thog gis 'ams pa dang/ skalam dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ drag po dang/ duldan dang/ dub dang/ rje rjed
drang srong dang/ char dang/ nyeba'i cha dang/ don nyams dang/ nges bar nyams dang/ dgo ba'i mtha' dang/ mAdang/ ri'idang/ dga' ma dang/ 'jig rten mtha' dang/ zad pa dang/ ma
[(]par ltung byed dang/ ma ltung bdang/ tog dang/ glasgang dang/ dus kyi mtha' dang/ dur khrod dang/ ba gitadang/ dragapo dang/ dkar bo dang/ phyi bzhin dang/ phyi bzhin gyi ba dang/
byams pa dang/ phur bu dang/ phur bu gsum pa dang/ lub+hu dang/ po phradang/ brtan pa dang/ nyams byed dang/ stobs ldan dang/ drag po dang/ skya rengs dang/ rnam par dgod pa

[% ]dang / 'chi ltas min pa dang/ skem byed dang/ sde dang/ nye sde dang/ gzhon nudang/ rtsa byed dang/ dgod byed dang/ rab tudagod byed dang/ sems par byed ba dang/ 'thapa bo dang/ gzugs ngan zhes pa ste/

gza' chen pod rnams kyang bstong phrag duma'i 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyus kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis gtsang ma'i gnas der 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to// de nas rgyu skaranam

ma mkha' la 'gro zhing rjes su 'brang ba ba stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'di lta ste/ thaskar dang/ bra nye dang/ smin drug dang/ snaram dang/ mgo dang/ lag dang/ nab so dang/ rgyal dang/ skag dang/

mchudang/ gro dang/ dboganyis dang/ me bzhi dang/ nag pa dang/ sa'i dang/ sa ga dang/ lha mtshams dang/ smonadang/ sgrubs dang chu stod dang/ tshusmad dang/ gro bzhinadang/ mon gru dang/ mon gre dang/

khrums stodadang/ khrums dang/ nam gru dang/ lha mo dang/ byibazhinadang/ slar yang 'byung ba dang/ ska 'od dang/ ang+ging sAdape/ rgyusar ldan m dang/ rtobar sdugagudang/ nyiba'agridang/ 'jig rten rab mchog

dang rab mchog ldan ma dang/ dpalaldan dang/ 'jig rtenamagon po dang/ chapaldan dang/ rgyal ba thob pa dang/ nomaldan dang/ lha'i bzhes pa de lta rgyu skar gyi rgyal poda rnams rgyu skar brgya stong phrag du
mag yongs su bskor te/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gtsang ma'i gnas su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to// khyim sum cu tsho drug la 'ad lta ste/
lugadang/ glangadang/ 'khrig pa dang/ karaka Ta dang/ seng ge dang/ bumo dang/ srang dang/ sdigapa dang/ gzhu dang/ chu srinadang/ bum pa dang/ nyadang/ swa'adang/ skaba'i bum pa dang/ gser
bum dang/ ral gri dang/ glang bo che dang/ ma hadang/ lhadang/ midang/ dge mtshan dang/ dri za dang/ 'jig rten dgongs po dang/ rgyal ba'i mchog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ nam mkha'ang/ grib
ma dang/ sa gzhidang/ mun ba dang/ rdul dang/ nye ba'i rdul dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ bde ba dang/ thar pa'i byang chub dang/ rang byang chub dang/ nyan thos dang/ dmyal ba'i rigs 'dzin dang/ gzi
brjid chen po dang/ gzi brjid che ldan dang/ byol song dang/ la dgas dang/ lha ma yin dang/ shadang/ sha za dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung bo thams cad pa dang/
phyogs kyi glang po dang/ stepa'i gro dang/ thams cad 'gro dang/ rnam dbye dang/ rnal 'byor 'gro dang/ rab tu gnas pa dang/ mchog dang/ 'bri dang/ thag zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ khyim chen po

khyis bats+tshastong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba 'di rnams 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa gang na ba der bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te rang rang gi gnas su 'khod
bar gyur to// gang yang gnod spyin mo chanamoganod sbyin mo brgyastong phrag bye bas bskor pa 'di ltasu/ mig bzam dang/ smin ma bzang mo dang/ skra bzang ma dang/ dbyangs snyan madang/ blo gros/
bzangamo dang/ dbyig ldan ma dang/ mig bkram dang/ bsam rdzogs ma dang/ gsang ba ma dang/ 'og bag ma dang/ 'og bag bzang mo dang/ bad+ma'i dus ma dang/ mi 'jigasam dang/ mi 'gru
sbyin m dang/ rgyal ma dang/ rnam par rgyal ma dang/ nam gru can ma dang/ sgra ldan ma dang/ sku mtha' ma dang/ rlungam dang/ yid 'phrog mdang/ yid ldan ma dang/ ma rtog ldan ma dang/ ma
a tog grong gnas ma dang/ ser skya mo dang/ 'brog ma dang/ dpa' bo ldan ma dang/ dba' mo dang/ dpa' bzangs mo dang/ sna bzangs mdang/ snaldan ma dang/ lha mdzes ma dang/ robazang ma dang/
[ps]]bsang mchog ma dang/ brjod ba la gnas ma dang/ mya nganamed ma dang/ mun pa mdzes ma dang/ snang bar mdzas ma nga/ 'od ldan ma dang/ phul byupaldan m dang gzugs ldam dang/ gzug
mdzes ma dang dkaraman ma dang/ zhi ba mdang/ phrum ma dang/ sngam dang/ dga' byad ma dang nye bar dga' byed ma dang/ 'jig rtan 'das ma zhes pa ste/gnod sbyin m chen mo 'di rnams

gnod sbyin ma brgya stong phrag du mas los su bskor ba de rnams kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal te 'khod bar gyur to// gangayang sha zamo dag shazamo

brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskong ba de rnams kyang/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal te 'dus par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ rgyan pa mo dang/ phyag dar gyi sha zachodang/ drag kho na za mo dang/
ta la la'i sha za mo dang 'bar ba'i sha za mo dang/ thal ba zam dang/ sha la za ba mo dang/ 'dzin daka' mdang/ 'khrul byed ma dang/ rmongs byed dang/ sgrog byed m dang/ skyed byed ldan m dang/ 'jig
rtenamatha' gnas pa dang/ thal ba'i mtha' can ma dang/ 'thung gang ldan m dang mang bo ma dang/ gdul dka' ma dang/ a la mo dang/ mtshan ma can m dang/ duba'i mtha' can m dang/ du ba mdang/

du ba bzang tshom zhes bsha za mo chen mo 'di rnams sha za mo brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor bde rnams kyang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dar ba rtazhugs par gyur to// gang yang mtsho dang ma mo[︽]sha
mo dag 'jigartan gyi rjes su spyod cing sems can la rnam par 'tshebar byed pa gtor ma dang 'phro ba nyid sdud par byed ba la 'di lta ste/ tshangs mdang/ dbang phyug chen mo dang/ khyab 'jug
ma dang/ gzhon nu ma dang rgan byad ma dang/ phag mo dang dbangamo dang/ gshin rjem dang/ ma mo dang/ nyi ma'i bu mo dang/ 'jig rten b.laadang/ chuwa mo dang/ dbang ldan mo dang/ rlabalha mo dang

gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang/ zhul brgyan pa mo dang/ dge mtshan ma dang/ dge mtshan ma chen mo dang/ sbrul mo dang/ lus srul po dang/ skyem byed ma zhes pa mamo chen mo 'di rnams ma mo brgya stong phrag du mas

yongs su bskor bde rnams 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu 'don cipa' bod bar gyur to// de bzhin du mi dang mi ma yin pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang/
sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dzisridaramyal ba chen po mnang med pa nas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar skabs 'dir thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil du gsal bar gyur to//sems can gyi tshogs kyi srog chags/
'ga' la 'ang gnod pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sems can thams cad kyi phyogs bon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/
@# spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs ba yang dag par mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub bas thams cad dpaldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas/

sems dpa' chen po de la bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gangad lta de'i dus la bab par
shesanashod cig/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpasams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes suganangabs// nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi rgyan bkod padoNi

stag cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya pa'i ting nge'adzin la snyoms pa bzhugs so// sems dpa' chen bo snyoms par zhugs ma thag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen bo dethamasacad dbagatshad brgya stong
srogadamar rdo rje'i rang bzhin mababalhag bar gnas par gyur to// deraganod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ dri za dang/ rlung lha dang/ sha za de rnams dang/ mdor bsdus na sems can gyi khams
thams cad byang chub sems dba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal yas khang de ring nor bu rin po che khur yang dgab rab gnas so// 'khod par gyur ba rnams phan tshuna rnam bca' ba med do//
denas sems dpa' chen po des 'khor chen po 'dus bar mkhyenanas/ khrobo'i rgyal po sgrol masanonob la bos bar gyur to// kyang khro'i chon bo sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dbul thams cad 'dus
pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig srungs shig/ dbang du gyis shig/ gdug pa rnams zulacig/ zhib rnams sad par gyis shig/ mdad pa rnams
dad par gyis shig/ srid pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags stod pa rjes su sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dba'i sde snod rgya chen bo de nyid kyi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i
dkyil 'khor gyi chog 'chad pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la srungs shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ khro bo'i rgyal bo chen po bka' mnos nas/ rnam par 'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs

tsha yongs su brtags pasems can thams cad bsrung bar bya ba'i don dang/ brtan par bya ba'i don du kun nas bkod pa chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du khro bo'i rgyal bo sgrol mas non ba khro bo brgyu stong
phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba phyogs bzhi kun dang de ltar steng dang/ 'og dang/ thad kar sgra drag po 'don bzhin bas rngab tshu gnas par gyur to// de nas sems can de rnams zhi ba nyid kyi yid dang
ldan pas yang dag par 'jug pa'i bka' las mi 'da' bar gyur te/ sgra 'di lta bu 'ang thos ba'agyur to// gangadamatshig 'di'ada' bar byed pa 'di dag naaN+Da ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo bo tshel pa brgyar
'gas bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no// de nas gsems dpa' chen bo des rang gi rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi tshig gsungs pa/ chos gcig
in gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig pu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o// chos
[z]gnyis po dag larab tu gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyurataM/ gnyis po dag gang zhen/ bya chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ sems can thams
cad la mnyam ba nyid do// chos gsum rnams kyis rang gi gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i don nges par bstan pa yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhen/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba
