nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba nyid dang/ rang gi gsang sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do// chos bzhidang yang dag par ldan n sems dang bo bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
dpa'i rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhin/ rang gsang sngags rdzogs ba yongs sumi gtong ba nyid dang/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags nye bar gcod pa min pa nyid dang/ sems can thams cad la byams
ba'i sems nye bar gnas pa nyid dang/ snying rje chen po sgom pasems te/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang yang dag par ldan ba'i byang chub sems dapa' gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lngas byang chub

sems dpa'i sde snod la yang dag par 'jug cing gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/ rnam par snatshogs pa'i yul bskonab nyid dang// bas mtha'i dgon babastan
pa nyid dang/ sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang/ 'jig rten pa'i sngogs la mi lta ba da dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ sbyod ba la gnas par byed ba nyidad/ chos lnga po 'di dag gis
sngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos druganagasang sngags kyi spyod pa'i dngos grub yongs surdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug gang zhen/ dkon mchog
gsum 'dad pa nye bar gcod bkang ba nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa gcad pa med ba nyid dang/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das ba'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs

spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang/ thog pa chen po' mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi 'dor ba nyid dang/ skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid kyis gsang sngags kyi spyod pa don yongs su tshol zhibadage ba'i phyogs yongs su

mi spong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di ni rig sngags kyi spyod pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub la gang dag par kun tu 'ajug pa nyid du 'gyur ro// chos bdun rnams rig sngags grub ba'i dus kyi tshog dang/
gsang sngags kyi sbyong ba la rjes su 'jug par byed pa nyid du 'gyur// bdun gzhen/ shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa'i tshul zamo sgom ba dang/ zlos ba dang/ nyan pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/
'dri bar byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pas dus gsum du ston pa dang/ nges par sdom ba dang/ bzlas pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ smra bcad dang/ bka' thub la ma thogs pa

dang/ blo glos dang/ dran b dang/ shes rab dang/ brtan pa dang du len bar byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang theg pa chen po'ichos zab mo'i tshul la yang dag bar rab tu 'jug pa'i tshul dang/
rang gi gsang sngags dang/ sngogs dgug pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ bsgrub pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang/ snying rjechen bo dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po
yongs su sgom par byed pa las dang sems can gyi khams dang/ chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang dag par 'jug pa// gnyis su med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
yongs su tshol ba las dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gto la theg ba dman ba la dga' ba med pa las te/ chos bdun po 'di rnams ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yongs

surdzogs par 'gyur// chos brgyad ni rig sngags dngagasabasngags kyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub yang dag bar 'jug pa nyid du 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhen/ mthong ba dang tsha mthong ba'i 'bras bu la dad
bas ngo mtshar bar sams par 'dod pa nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i 'bras buN+Da'aphrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa the tshom med pa las dang/ phyin cam log pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa las bla

la gus pa las dang/ saargyas dang byang chub sems dapa' rnams kyis rang gi sngags dang/ rgyud dang/ sbyod pa nye bar bstan pa ma spyi bar 'adzinacing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba las dang/ dngos

grub kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmilam du mthong ba bston pa la mkhas ba nyid dang/ ser snadang/ gnyid dang/ rmugs ba mtha'adagadang bral bar byed cing/ rtag tubartson 'grus rtsom lasangs rgyas
bya// dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad labadag nyid 'bul bar byed pa las dang/ mdor bsdusanadage ba'i rtsa ba la ngomasam shes ba'i gom bgos stabagegs thams cad rab tusel ba 'do

ba las dang/ byang chub kyi rgyud gnonabar byed pa dang/ longs spyod chen po dang/ dbang che bar grags pa bdag nyid so sor 'dod pa dang/ dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la yang dag par 'grogs pa dang/

dge ba'i bshes gnyenadang mi 'bral ba dang/ byang chub sems dapa'i chen po dang yang dag par 'grogs pa byed ba ste/ chos brgyad bo 'di ni gsang sngagasakyi spyod pa'i don gyi dngos grub la yang dag par
'jug par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral zhing/ dkon mchog gsum la lhag par mos la mchog tu tshul khrims 'chal pa la'ang skyo ba med pa'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par/

brtson bas pa'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mthar yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyodaba'irgyu 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub bar 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du rtogs par byab ma yin no//
rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du gyur bas nyams sad ba'i rgyur yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no// de nas yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rang

sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams tshig 'di skad du rjod bar byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sems can thams cad kyi don gyi ched du gsang sngags kyi skyodapa sna tshogs pa'i

ba don gyi bya ba'i chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i chos ston cing legs par bstan pa legs so legs so// e ma byung chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston ba'i rdzas
su 'jug pa khyad pa gsang sngags kyi skyod ba dge ba legs par gsungasaso// rgyal po chen po gabal la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang/ g.yul du'ang
thog mar glang bo che'i gang du 'jog par 'gyur ba dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ dri dang/ byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pas mchod par 'gyur bde labadag cag mtshungs bar brtag par bgyi/ phyir/
rgol ba dang dgra bo dag dbang du bgyi/ pha rol gyi dmag dpung dag 'jig cing bzlog par bgyi/ glegs bam du brisanas rang gi khyim du 'jog par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ gas kyi bu mo 'am//
rgyalapo chen po 'og/ rgyal mo chinamo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slog 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma de la bsrung ba chen bo dang/ longs spyod chen po dang/ tshe ring bor 'gyur ba dang/ nad

med par/ rtag tu longs sbyod 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad smras nas thams cad dbaldan pa'i 'khorade ci'angam gsung bar gyur to// theg pa chen po'i rig sngagasadang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa nges
par bstan pa las/ ral ba khyon bsdus kyi rtog pa chen po byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chan bo'i rnam bar 'phrul pa'i le'urab 'byam las/ bcom ldan 'dam 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i rtog
ba las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang ba'o///de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sran ras gzigs dbang phyug thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
rgyadakyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su 'jug cing kun tu lta zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs so// byang chub sems dba'i spyan ras gzigs dbang
phyug snyoms par zhugs ma thag tulte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun nas
snang bar byas nas/ sngar nyid du 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khob chen po kun tu snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phya gnas doN+Dis/ dag ba'i
sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig la rjesasu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byosakyi spyod pa sgrub ba/ sems can thams cad dang

khong du gyur pa/ khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gong du sems can rnams yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas 'jig rtenadang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub yabadag par thob pa dang
a ldan pa khyod smos shig smyos shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi dbang pos de skad ces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mchog tugs ba'i

rakyil 'khor gyi rgyud gsungs ba/ rig sngags thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam bar ston par byed cape lag pa g.yas pabate gnas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor

gyidakyil 'kho la ston bar byed cing/ sor mo'i rtse mo dar 'ag ba'i rgyal bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nges par phyung ste/ phyur nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de snang
ba chen pos kun tu snang bar byas nas gnas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dapa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas non pa'i snying bo las thams
cad pa dpa' bo gcig pa spyan drangs pa dang/ gshigs su gsol ba dang/ zhapa can dang/ rgyas pa can dang/ mngon spyod can dang/ mi snang ba dang/ nam mkha' la 'grobadang/ sa 'og 'jug pa

dang rkang pa rab tu rgyub dang/ dgag ba dang/ rnam bar sdang ba dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ dridang/ 'phreng ba dang/ mar mi thams cad rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis rab tu sbyin par byed/ mdor na riltar

sbyar ba de bzhin deltade ltar bsgrub par bya bzhin pa ni yig gsum zhes bya ba brtson 'grus chen pos don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal bo chen po'o// de gang zhen o~MAhU~M/ 'di'i khro bo
chen bo de'i snying bo lasathams cad bste/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ gsang sngags thams cad spyod pa rnams la byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par bstan pabagegs thams cad
'jig par byed ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas ba brtag nas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skaces kyapasmras so
sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang la la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na nam ba gnas ba'i byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas

'tsha shing chu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dpaldan pa rnams dam tshig la lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras nas khro bo'i rgyal bo da bskor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyalapochen po btang ma thag
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gdug sems can gyi sems can 'khrul chen po de rnams tshar bcad cing bku gnas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dag pa'i
sems can la yang dag par bcug ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas bar byas nas/ sems can gdug pa rnams kyi spyi bor kun nas 'barab 'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa gyur nas gnas par gyur to//
nga nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug gis slar yang 'khor gyadakyil 'khor la gzigs nas sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang pa'i dam tshig 'di

la las 'da' bar byed pade la khro bo'irgyal bos tshar gcodapar 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyidam tshigan 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rigasngags dang gsang sngags
don gyi tshig gsang chen dzaltar byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dpaldan ba rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin nges bar bstan pa 'chad par byed do// de'ags bcol legs par yid l zupazhig dang
sa bshado tshor khayA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+ha la/ tathAg la/ an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma sa t+tAl/ namo b+ha ga ba t+yaM/ Ar+ya tArA yaM/
bod+hisat+tAya/ mahAs taya/ tad+ya thA/ 'dzi ka d+haman te/ tAretut+tAre/ shAnu d+harmani/ tAre e na b+hi lA pa d+harmani te tut+tAretu re ni/ pas nao/ bit+tas na/ o da ni/ mo hani/ dzagani//
stam+b+ha ni/ prab+he/ tson pra b+ha hil hol/ ba le bi le/ ba ga gamin/ kuN+Dim pAkuN+Di/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hun po ti/ tAye hu du hur/ ku ru ku ru ]a ho yA laM/ srin mA mi/ tsit+taM me ka AhA/grog po
dag 'di ni nga'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rtsa ba'i yig sngags las thams cad byed ma/ sring ba gsum gyi chos bar gcod ma/ na 'gro thams cad zlog par byed ba ma'o// thugargya'aba'

rtsa ba'i rig sngags shes rnam bar grags pa de la rab tusbyar bar 'gyur ro// 'di mchog gi sIng go las thams cad byed ba/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob pa byed ba/ zhib thams cad byed ba/ sangs rgyas
mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas ba/ rang nyid pa'i grogs po byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyiramatshog tugasang ba'i rig sngags kyi ngo bo'i nyib gnus pa/ bsam ba
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang dang gang dran pa nyid kyis las thams cad mthar byed// 'jigs pa chen po rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa ste/ bzlas pas lta smos kyang

gyi dgos/ de gapazhen/ na mo rat+ta trayA ya/ nam A ba lo[”]ti shar ya/ bo d+hi sa t+tAya/ mahAsatAya/ tAre tut+tA re swAhA/ phyag rgya'ang 'di ut+pal zhes kyang rnam par grags pa longs spyod thams cad
tsha mngon bar 'aphel bar byed ba'o// 'di'i nye ba'i snying bor gyur bag mchog tu dbal dang ldan pa'i dag byed chen bo ste/ namo rat+na tra yA ya/ namaHsarba bud+d+habosapAnaM/ o ku ru kul+le swAhA/
phyag rgya'ang 'di pa'i 'phreng ba zhes rnam par grags par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed ma'o// 'dang mchog gi sApapo gyur ba'ang/ namaH sarbabad+d+hanaM/ oM gA/ 'di ni snying po'i

mchog ste/ mdor bsdun bya ba thams cad la yon tan chen bo rgyas pa ste// yon tan mur thug pa mthar thug par brjod par na dus bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mi nus so// phyag rgya'ang
'dir brtson 'grus chen po zhes rnam par grags ba bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar byed pa'o// 'dir spyan drang ba'i rig sngags su gyur pa'i ng/ na ma/ sarbabum+b+hanaM/ o de de b+ha ga ba ti

tshel bishA rU pi Nisaphab la/ b+hA Shita/ bra bo d+hin A yAni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ kI Ta ut+pa lad+hini/ ma ma shud+d+haya/ tipatiSh+Tha/ sa maya ma nu sma ra/ a bra tihata/ shAsanahU~M/ mA ba lan ku ru ku rupa
7 sAhA 'di'i bcom ldan 'das ma sbyin drang ba'i rig sngags te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dung/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/
lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri zad ng/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'amadang/ lto 'phye chen bo dang/ shazad ng/ srin po dang/ 'byung po thams cad
kyi'ang yin no// tsan dan gyi chu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas te phyogs bzhi dang/ de bzhin du steng dang/ 'og dang/ thad ka thams cad du gtor bar bya'o// sas rgyas dang/ byang chub
sems dba' thams cad dang/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrolamadong/ 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi'ang gsang sngags 'di yin te/ 'byung bo'i tshogs thams cad dang/
sems can thams cad kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// na maH sarba bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shAs nAnaM/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ra/ snum bAsan mamArtsi ShahU~M/ tiSh+Thas ma ya ma nu smiM ra swAhA/ bdug pa'i rig
sngags te/ tsan dan dang/ gur kumadang/ gakhur gcig lubyas nas bdag ba dbul bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad byon ba rnam
spos kyi bdug pas yid tshim nas khug bar 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ng pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes grags pa sems can thams cad 'gugs par byed cing zhib/ sbyan drang ba'i rig sngags
@# la'ang phyag rgya pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bzang bo 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad byon pa la'ang mchod yonadabul bar bya ste/
ga pur dang/ tsan danadang/ gur kum chudang sbyar nas dzA ti'i me togadung/ mA li ka gsar pa dang/ dbyar gyi me tog dang/ pun nA ka la dang/ ba ku la dang/ rgya sposa rnams te/ 'di dag gang
ba ya'adang ba'i me tog gam/ sa thilta ba'i me tog gom/ dri bzang bo'i me tog rnams dang bsres nas sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul par bya'o// nam sarba bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shAsanAnaM/

dpyathA/ sdebem sAkA ru Ni ka/ bihArU pa par tshia hUMpra tIts+tsas ma ya ma nus+sar/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thade ba tAd+hin/ ma d+h+ya pra be shal/ pra be sha ya/ sajabuSh+Tha// a nu kaM pa ka/ grostsa gra hUM/ amA ri
btsAri misAhA/ phyag rgya 'di'i gangab zhes grag te sems can thams cad kyi rjesasu 'jug cing brtan pa'o// 'dir dri'i rig sngags su 'gyur ba'ang/ nam/ sajabud+d+hanaM/ na mas man+tagan ang

b+haShi takhri ye ta thA ga tAya/ tad+yathA/ gan+d+hagan+ta gAde gasna mno ra ma pra tItsapra tIts+tsha dogats+tsaMs ma panu mAr Ni swAhA/ 'dir phyag rgyur 'gyur ba'ang la ma zhes bya ba bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
bye ba'o// 'di ma tog gi rig sngags su gyur pa'i ng/ na maH sarba bud+d+hA bo d+hisaM pAnaM/ a pra tiha hashAs nAnaM/ nam saM kusum tarA dzA s+ya/ tathAg tas+ya/[S]thA/ kusu me ku su me/
03 gusu ma smyo gsum sU ra bAsi/ ku su mA ba tisA hA/ bdug ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyis sngar bshad pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// rmad byung bsam mi khyab pa'i sku// sangs rgyas sku la phyag
byas nas/ yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i// gtor ma'i rig sngags rab 'chad byed// na ma sarba bud+d+hakho b+hisatAnaM/ a pra ti ta shAs nAnA dpya thA/ he hag b+ha ga ba ti
ma hAs tre sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ki te/ A bi lam i daM ba liM gri pa ya gri pa ya hU~M hU~MhU~MgamararaT phaT swA hA/ lha bshos kyapo'adis dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung bo thams cad ba'agator mar 'gyur
ro 'diralang phyagi rgyu ni dbyug pa ste/ gdug pa thams cad zlog par byed pa'o// na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hisatAnaM/ a pra tiha ta shAsanAnaM/ sarba tamo an kArab si tAnaM/ nam/ sa man+ta
tiganaa ba b+hAs phyi lAl/ ta thAgatAya/ tad+ya thA/ hehe b+ha ga bAn pro tar ga tas ham/ bro ti maN+Di tasharIr/ bkurtsub kupham pUbo d+his dman dzA la tsota chud+d+hi/ khur khu/ a ba
kho ka tsha/ a ba lo ka la/ maNAlaM sarba sa tAnaM swA hA/ mar me'i rig sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul bar bya'o// phyag rgya mkhargyab zhes bya ba sems can thams cad rnam bar snang bar byed ba'o//
nam sa mnabad+d+hanaM/ a bra ti ha tashAsanAnaM/ r+ya b+ho/ dzul dz+wa la/ dzAl la dzA la ya hUMb bob+haka hakrab ng+gA sAhA/ mo'i bya ba byed pa'i rig ljags su 'gyuro// 'dir yang phyag rgya ni
kha sbyor zhes par 'jig rten grags// sems can kun 'od kyis gsal byed// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dang// thub pa mchog gis sngon gsungs pa'o// de nas yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dba' phyag na rdo rje l sbas ba/ gsang ba pa'i bdag bo sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang chen dang bcas shing
mchog tugasang ba yin te/ bu khyod la phanadrag po'i mtha'/ mi bzad pa la rigs su grags// sngags rnams thams cad gapakhon// mkhas ba rnams kyis bsgrub bya 'o// spyiba'i gdu

bzhes grags pa// jo rdza bats+tsha'i rigs dag kyang// de ni ngas bar gzhig don du// rig ba 'di ni yang dag brjod// nam sam+b+ha bud+d+habo d+hisatAnAhUM/ a pra ti ta shAsanAnaM/ oM ka ra ka ra/ kur kuru//

mam karaM dzam+b+ha/ dzam+b+ha/ sarbad had ha/ sarma badzra ba nAgA ka/ mur+Na NAka dzIbasuMtaka rA ma hA pa tIta ru ba ne pa tsang tsa sarbadumaAgi Na ba tidzi ban+ti ta kar/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ sarba gra hA/ khaN mu kha

ra b+hu dzoShaT tsa ra Nar tAmAn ya/ ba man ya/ bra[é]de ba na ya mAbalamAmApi lam b+hu Ta hU~MmaN+Da la ma d+me bra bo sha yas ya ma nu sma ra hU~MAhU~MhU~MhU~Mpa Ta phaT bsngagA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di na mchog tu
gsang ba brtson 'grus chen po sgrol ma'i yan lag zhal drug pa zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyalabo chen bo thams cad rnam bar 'dzoms ba po hU~M/ 'di bklags pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' sa bstsal gnas
pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rnam par 'jig par byed na/ ma rungs ba'i bgegs rnams lta ci smos/ 'dabaklags pa tsam gyis srung ba chen po byas bar 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgyu'apagasachen bo zhes bya/

bar 'gyurato/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jig bar byed pa'o// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyi snying bo ni/ o hU~M TI bkr-i ta na hUMsam+ba sha tuMsam+b+ha yapha pa nga' swA hA/ sngags 'dis ngag thams cad
la gzer chen po'i nad dang/ yang na rims nyin bzhi pas zin par 'gyur ro// rtagatu bzlas pas jisrid snang bar byams pa nyid du mi 'gyur/ 'ban snying rje'i sems 'thob par mi 'gyur te/bzlas pa
na gyi bar dgrol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa la bya'i/ zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan la ma yin no// phyag rgya mdung chen bo'ang sbyar bar bya'o//'dir

nye ba'i snying bor gyur ba'ang/ oM hI ka la rU paM hU~M khaM swA hA/ sngama'i mdung chen po'ang sbyar bar bya'o// gdug ba thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur// mchog gi snying po sangs rgyas thams

cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba ni/ hU~M/ 'di las thams cad byed pa ste/ phyogargya mdung chen bo'ang sbyar bar bya'o// phung krol thams cad zlog par byed ba/ 'byung po thams cad
dbang du byed bste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal bo 'di ni las thams cad la rab tusbyar bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas bsagrubaba'i dus su'apakhyad par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gshigs su
a[©]// gsol ba'i sngags su gyur pa'i ng/ nam sarba bud+d+hanaM/ a bra ti ha ta shAs nAnaM/ ta[SG ]/ dza ya dzaya/ su dza la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ba shArU pi Ni/ gtsugatsasu b+hA ba naM/

sarba bud+d+haMswa bas la/ sa bar ba n+taM/ swa b+hA banItsA nu bra be sha ya sa ma ya mnusmar/ sarbasA ma sits+tsaMzhu/ ba d+hus dA/ mnol thatsam pa ripA ral sAhA/ 'dazhigashagasaMsu gsol ba'asngags ta
las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// phyagargya bzang bo'i gdan zhes gragasab ste/ 'dis gdonayabaspyin bar bya'o// yid kyis lan bdun bzlas pas thams cad gshegs su gsol lo// 'jig
rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa redakyil 'khor rnams dang/ sngags rnams nyid la'ang sngags kyi dngos grub dang/ dam tshig dang/ bzlas pa dang/ dus dang/ nges par sdom pa rnams la'ang
btu sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yang sams dpa' chen pos slar yang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams la kun tu gzigs te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po larang gi rig pa'i tshogs sngags kyi le'u rab

'brug gsungs pa gyur to// namasawabud+d+hanaM/ a bra tiha ta ga tInAM/ oM naTi sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sbyong ba'i sku can m zhes bya ba'i rig ba las thams cad pa ste/ dam tshig chen
bo'i phyag rgya'i snying bo dug ga las thams cad la kun tu sbyar ro// nams sman bud+d+hanaM/ a bra tiha tashAsamAnaM/ o Ti/ 'di ni nye bar sbyod pa'i skra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig ba lasathams cad pa

sku phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bgaza'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shAsanAnaM/ ani/ rig ba 'dan sdong bu can zhes bya ba spyod pa'i dag pa'i las thams cad
byed pa ste/ phyag rgyun bzang po'i gdan gyis gnod sbyin mo rnams dgug par bya ba laspyayo/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a tsanad+ma tarUpa t+taM/ oM swA hA/ mkha' 'gro ma kun 'joms pa yi/ phyag rgya
sbubs can yang dag sbyar// byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yi// rig sngags thod pa can zhes bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi pa nyid// rab bsngags lha yi gzugs can ma// nams man+ta bud+d+ha
no/ a bra hastag ti/tsAr NaM/ tad+yathA oM pa ra de swAhA/ phyag rgya ap+pal nyid ni// dpal gyi bdag nyid spyan la sbyar// gzugs mang 'chang ba'i lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod rab sgrub ba'o// nam
sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ A tsarAtarU pi Ni/ oM su ris hA/ phyag rgya mdung dang yang dag ldan// rigs rnams thamasacad rnam 'joms bgo/ na mas man bud+d+hA naM/ a tsanud+d+ha parU pi NI/ o cu
re swA hU~M/ bsam pa'i sgrol ma ldan ba zhes// rab bsngags las rnams thums cad pa// dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// bgagasa rnams 'dzoms byed ma la sbyaro/ na mas man+ta bud+d+hanaM/

a tsan+tid+d+hA tarU pa N+NaM/ tad+ya thA/ o ba lo ki ni swA hA/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams cad dabang du byed// bde ba thams cad rab spyin pa// ba'i phyag rgyas sgyur bar bya// naMm

sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a tsacud+d+ha ta ru pi N+NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba u0f7a/ ba shAsaM b+ha bebi shwa rwa ba Ni ka ha kAha A ba sha a ba sha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra rumu tiSh+ThasAhA/ rig pa brtson 'grus chen
mo na// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstan ba ste// snying bo phyag rgya mnyam pa nyid// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ 'byung bo kun la mchog sbyin m// sna tshogs zhes bya yang dag b+hA gA/
nams man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a tsanud+d+ha par bi N+NaM/ tad+ya thA/ o'u te phru ba su sA/ paNa'i gdan gyis rnam par dgod// las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// nams man bud+d+hA naM/ a bra tiha
ta gA ti pU hir NaM/ tad+ya thA/ ob/ rig pa 'dan dpal mo che// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa ste// phyag rgyu khasbyor ldan pa yi// rgyal sring che borab sbyin byed/ nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM
[“ ]sachasatAb+ha la pra dA ya kA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te ku ma ra rU pi NI/ a hi A gtsa ma makAt+yaMka rus wA/
ldan ba yos/ dgra rnams thams cad zlog par byed// names man buN+NanA/ a tsanad+ma ta rU pi NaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swA hA/ bi dza ya swA hA/ a dza swA hA/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams mtha' dag yongasargyu zhing/ sems can rjes su 'dzin byed ba// ming bo ma bu ba zhes grags// 'di rnams kyi ni sasu spyod// gru li bzhon ba
ba[d/ ]mnyam zhon nas// rgya mtshol nings bar gnas// khu tshur phyag rgyas rnam bdagod// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// nam/ sa man bud+d+hanaM/ lo kA gA d+hib naM/ dbyawA/ oM ku ma rim
pA mA ri ki ki Ta/ ma ArAkas bod+his wAn dz+hA tam yA rasanugAsha/ sar gsAnarak+ta gArak+ta gasmanu le ban pra yi pri ye/ kha kha khA lAnihU~Mturak+ta puT+ThArtsitanAs ma ya ma nus ra/ sbrum bla ma
thum ya b+ha ma ya/ hu lu hu lu mA ba la// bkamoNim ku ru ku ru/ btsi tArAb d+hA ra Ni/ ti ti/ IhUMs// bud+d+hanu dz+ha te sAtA/ sems can rjes su 'dzin byed pa'i// byang chub
sems dpas bshad pa na// sa rnams ma lus kun nas ni// rnam pa drug tu rab tshugayos// sems can kun la phan don dang/ gdug pa'i sems can zlog byed pa// bdag gi rig pa rtag tagrag
rtag tu srung bar yongs su grags// srung ba ltos 'gro de nyid kyi// 'jig rten mtshan mas legs par mtshan// snying rjes thugs niparlan ba yi// byang chub sems dpa' denas gsungs// byang chub sem
dba' bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams la phan don du// gapalas sems can spyod gsungs pa// 'grob rnams la rnam spyod ldan// phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ldan// bdag nyid chen pos sbyabanas ni// tshad
ba la sogs 'gugs byed na// mi rnams 'bras bu smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i sems sum lus pa'i// rtog pa 'di na bsdus nas su// srin po rnams su rnam grags pa'i// rig sngag 'di yang dag
bstan sems can rjes gzung 'dod pa la// byang chub sems dpas de ltar bshad// yag gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni// rig sngags 'di'i yang dag bshad// sems can kun la
phanadon du//nyebar longs spyod 'gugs pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya dbyug pa'i srog shing ni// rnam bkod las rnams thams cad pa'o// oM hUM// rig sngags 'dis mdor bsdus nas// mi rnams 'bras bu byang ba yin

'tshanams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa man+to byo ti mAn+tinaM/ oM bkr-i tagra ha hUM phaT swahA/ nyaba'i sIngapo 'di yang ni// phyag rgya ngag snyayang dag ldan// da bzhin 'byung bo 'gugs bar byed// de bzhin gza' dang mamor
bcas// thams cad phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa// bkod na 'bras bu bcas bar 'gyur// 'byung bo rnams ni rnam skrag byed// gdug pa zhugs ba rnam par grol// 'di na bcom ldan 'das ma 'bags

ma sgrol ma'i pho nya mo chen mo las thams cad pa ral pa gcig m zhes bya ba rjes su skyod pa las thams cad pa ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed do// 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa dang/

'gugs par byed pa dang/ dbang du byang ba dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad rdzogs par byed do// nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra tiha tanAs nAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM tra su bla sprubra sna
ga brtsa seng+gashAnaM ku ru swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste// byang chub sems dpas bshad ba yin// 'byung po sa pa rapa 'thob// skadagacig nyid la bsil bar 'gyur// phyag pad+mayong
dag ldan// myur du dge legs thob par 'gyur// mngon spyod kyi las rnams la// srid srung gi rig byed 'dod// 'din mdo bsdus brjod pa ste// tshog 'ani mdo bsdus pa'o/ sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/

kha pra ting tas naM/ tad+yathA/ oM ga du za ba hanatsakra pA Nitsa tur b+hu dzahU~MhU~M/ sa ma ya ma nu s+sar/ bod+his tAA dzAb ya swAhA/ byang chub sems dang bka' stsal pas// zhi ba'i don ni myur du
byad 'byung po rnams ni rnam 'jig byed// khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin// phyag rgya'i 'khor lor ladag ldan// brtan pa'i donan gyur du byed// gang 'di khyab 'jugargyud du ni// chog rgyas
bar bstan pa de// sems can kun gyi sgrub byed do// byartsub sems dpas bshad pa yin// nams man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnaM/ ta/ ma sAm/ shAr b+hu d+hi pa tibr-i kha shu/ d+hA dza

bra lamA dza TAmu ku Ta nA ri NI/ si tang+khasA d+hu sa ratu/ mAn+tis oM phaT phaT bo d+his wAkA dzA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis rab tubarjod// mdung gi phyag
rgya mnyam bar ldan// 'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa// 'di yang sngar bstanamog 'di// sems can s skaba gnas pa la// sngonan zhi ba'i rgyud du bstan// yon tan sna tshog sargya che ba// zhi ba'i

rgyud kyis kyang rjod do// nam/ sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti yod 1shAs mAnaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga kun btatab ka Ni/ shaka kha kha/ khAsilAhi hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Thabo d+hisatAA dzA pa ya ti swA hA/
sngags 'di brtson 'grus chenubo ste//nam mkha' ldipazhes rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs can gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya chadang
yang dag ldan// phung krol ma bzad bcas ba 'dzoms/ ban dang g.yo ba'i dug rnams na// gso bar byed par the tshom med// gdul bya'i sems na labartse bas// byang chub sems dpa'i yang
dag bka'/ nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis da// 'dab chagasargyal bo 'od chen ldan// jisrid nam mkha' lding rgyud du// bstan ba'i chog rgyas de rnams// sems can kun la phanaba'i rgyur// bdag

gis kyang na bad pa yin// mkha' ldinga mngon bar brjod rgyud du// khro bo'i rgyal po ma bstanan// gdengs can dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir// 'dab chags gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// srid 'jig rten ba yi sngag/

tshod rnams tshog dpar brjod ba// gdul bya'i sems can don du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par spyod// gang gang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang// rdordzapad+ma'i rigs dag kyang// de rnams tshog rab 'byamA 'dir// sngam
khor gsungs ba yin// jiltar am rnams mang bo// byis ba 'bad bas srung byed pa// de bzhin byisamatha'i blo can l// nga ni rig sngags gzugs kyi rgyu// stobs bculdan pas sngon gsungs pa// da ltar
nga yis bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ma lus pa// rtogs pas rab gsungs 'od chen ngo// rgyal ba mchog gis gang gsus dang// stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras kyis gsungs// rmad byung bsam mi khyab
gzugs can// spyan ras gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o// danas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thum dang ldan pa 'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang// 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor chen po de la kun tu gzigs nas/ mtshig thams cad yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes byuba'i ti po'adzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gang du ting 'dzin la gnas pas sems can malus
pa'i sgrub pa'i spyod pa'i 'dasems can thams cad la rab tu gnas bgyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs ma thog tu thams cad dang ldan ba'i 'khor chen po gnas

rnam bkaba'i phyag na boma'i snying po rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab cing dadu byuba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang
rlabasems dpa' rnams dang/ sa bcudang ldan pas bcu'i ba phyug bganus pa rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'kho 'dabri ba'am 'api 'jug par masan/ so so'i skye bo gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci
dgos/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po ba'i dam tshig sgrub ba'i gnas skabs la gnas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang/ rang
sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos thams tsod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' s bcu la rab zhugs pa rgyal tshab mngon par dbang bskur zhing dam tshig thob pa thams cad dang/
@#bya// spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang/ zag ba dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i sems can thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu 'thun ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gyis thugs las byung ba'idakyil 'khor du rab tu zhugs pa bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes bar gyur to//
so so'i skye bo thamasacad kyis de yid kyis dmigs pa mi tshusan/ bri ba 'am 'dur 'jug ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas yang byang chub sems dba' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/
dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig larjes su rab tuzhugs ba'i sems can de rnams l s+sas pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang
'da' bar mi bya ba'i dam tshig yin na/ sems can rnams dang/ 'phags pa gzhan rnams kyis lta smos kyang cad gos/ de nas yang sags dba' chen pos/ phyag na rdo rje gsang ba ba'i bdag
bo la sbas pa// kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dam tshig yid las byung bani nges par bstan to// mi rnams la de bzhin gshags ba rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'angag du sems can rnams
yang dag par rjes su zhugs nas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig ba da sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan
[s/]dzerdzas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go gan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sas pa/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras pad lta dus la bab par shes nagasungs shig gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge
jig rtenamagon// longs su mya ngan 'das pa na// ma rnams mchog gi sangs rgyas zhing// sems can s stangs khyod dkyil 'khor// mthong ba tsam gyis 'gatanan// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu skya/

marishes chog nyams pa 'am// dam tshig bdag por ma gyur na// tshangs ba bdag nyid chen pos kyang// rig sngags dngosakhrubam 'gyur ro// sngags la mngon par mi brtson dag dam tshig bstan pa ma mthong na// rnam
ba du mar 'bad byas kyang// thog pa'i dngos grub ma 'grulo// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams pa na// brgya byin gyis bar ba bad las// rig pa'i dngos grub gyi 'gyur na// sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos// dam

tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// sbyong ba'i las rnams sgrub ba de// 'jig rten ba dang 'phags pa'i sngags// bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// rab zhugs lasan/
thams cad byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i bstan pa la// de yi rig pa'i dngos grub rtag/ de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdordzis// sems dpa' chen bo de la gsol ba btab par gyur to// kyekya sems
dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog mdor bsdus pas gsungs shigaces so//gsang ba'i bdag pos de skaces smras pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems par chen po 'phagapa sbyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor chog gsungs so// dngapo re zhig cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ nag pa can nam/ sa ga can gyi zla ba'i dkar
po'i phyogs la rab tu bsngags pa'irtim dang gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar dge ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig dang/ zlabatab 'am/ dus gzhan lo dbyar gyi zla ba
kaM sbangs te/ snga dros rab tu gnas par bya'o// grong khyerachen po la brtan pa 'amo/ gang du dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid gnas par te/ rgya mtsho'ajug pa 'am/ chuklungal brtan pa 'am/ rgyu
mtsho'i ngogs dang 'bar grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char ha cang yang mi ring/ hacang yang mi nya bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song nas/ lim bdunanam/ zla ba phyed dumatho' gcig
tu lcang ba 'am/ zho bar byas nas so sor gnas par bya'o// gang gnas nganams su'ang gtsang mas phyogs rdo nga dang/ gyo mo dang/ thal ba dang/ sol ba dang/ phub ma dang/ thodapa dang/ rus

yu/ pa gonas pa dang bral ba/ shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i myul ba byung lnga dang bsres pa'i tsan dan dang/ ga pur dang/ gur kum gyi chus khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol
mas non pa stong phragabargyad kyisa mngon par bsngags pa des bcom ldan 'dasama'i phyag rgya chen po dang yang dag par ldan pas/ sa phyogs de la phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par gtor zhing/
stong dang/ 'og dang/ thad ka dang/ phyogs bral rnams su'ang kun nas gtor bar bya'o// de nas sa phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khu bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyud bya ste/
do'achon po'i khru bcu drug go/ bar ma khrubatsuganyisaso// chung ngun khru brgyad do// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum po 'di// mas cad gzigs pas gsungs pa yani// rgyal srid 'dod phyir chen po ste/
bar ma los spyod 'phel bar byed// chud du rdzogs kyi dmatshig// lasa rnams kun byed shi ba yin// dulayid la 'dod pa gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor bribarabya'o// dalasa'i phyogs der khru gnyis tsam

brkos la/ de rdob dang/ sol ba dang/ thal ba dang/ sa pa dang/ skul sogs pa dang/ srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs pa gal ta mthong nasa'i phyogs gzhan dubarko bar bya'o// gnod pa med pa dang/ nye

bar 'tsho ba med pa der 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo dang/ chu klung gi ngogs dang/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chuklung po'i chu ngogs mas su'ang gang rab tu 'bad pachen pos shin tu sosor brtags tashin tubatsang zhing srog chag

med par byas nas bri bar bya'o// sa'i phyogs der slar yang srog chagasayodapa'i tshul ba'i rnam la bsres pas chu klung gi 'gram gyis gtsang ma 'am/ grog mkharagyis gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang ngar
bya'o// bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas mnyam par byas la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bya'o// sang ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis lan bdun mtshon
par bsngags par byas nas phyogs bzhi rnams su gdab par bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying pos lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas kun nas dkyil 'khor

gru ba'i nga 'i rnam pas dkri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du'ang zur bzhi'i rnam par bya'o// dbus kyi nangan gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ba'i ge pa 'am/ rtsa pa'i snying bo stong phrag

brgyud bzlos par bya'o// phyag chen po dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug tor bcings te khro bo'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs bsrungs nas bdag nyid bsrungs bar byas te/ bzlas pa byed bzhin du phyi rol du byung ste
dkyil 'khorab g.yas su bskor ba byas nas kha shar du phyogs rdo ku sha'i bres la khyabar 'dug nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad pa de 'byas dkyil 'khor de kun nas gru bzhi'i
rnam par dkri bar bya'o// de nyid kyi phyil du ba rnams zhag gcig snang bar gnas pas rab tu gnas par bya'o// de la 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon spyad pa rnams byas te/ rang gi rig pa
dang / sngags dang/ rgyud lamakhas pa'i mkhan pos sems can thoms cad kyi don gyi phyir thog pa chen po la lhag par mos pas zhag gcig smyung bar gnas pas grogs bzang po dang yang dag bar ldan pa

mtshu bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya ba mthong bas tshon sna lnga'i phyem zhib po 'barabs legs par sbyang ba byas nas/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i sngags dang sdong pos mngon par bsngags pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor dbus

0 su gdab par bya'o// phyi rol tubang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba dang/ rta babs bzhis brgyan pa dang/ chushang gi sdong bu 'bras bu'i tshog sakyis g.yur za zhing kun nas 'bras bu'i tshogs rnams kyis

rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa dang/ bo che dang/ rdza rnga dang/ dung gi sgra nges par sgrog pa'i sa'i phyogs su bsgrags par bya'o// sa bzhir rjes su 'thun pa'i bar du bsngags pa'i sgra chos nyan par bya'o// phyogs bzhi

rnams su theg bachen po'i mdosde'i rgyags bam bkrag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'dasashesa'abakyi b.rol tu phyin pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub
phyogs su'o// 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa byang phyogs su'o// 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa shar phyogs su'o// de ltar glegs bam klog pa po med mdo sde bzhi po lhag par rtogs pa'i gang zag chos

sgrub po la chos manyan pa'i phyiragasol ba gdab par bya'o// nas dkyil 'khor gyi slobadapon langs nas tsan dan dang/ ga pur dang/ gur kum rnam par bsres pa'i ma tog dkar po dri zhim pa la tsaba'i rog pa bzlas

to dkyil 'khor de thams cad du gcal du dgram par bya'o// mngon par bkram nas phyi rol dubyung ste zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i kha zas brten pa gnyis sam gsum byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong
bar gnas pa bstan pa la gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan mkhas pa de grogs sam/ slob ma des khas blangs ba rab tu gzhug par bya'o// gangar ba'i ga pa nyid kyis gtsug tor bcing ba byas nas/ de nas gsar/
dngo dngul dang/rin po cho rnam ba sna tshogs pa'i go 'phang rnam par bkra zhing/ rab la mdzes pa'i zas kyi phyig zhib mo so sor bzung nas longs spyodachen po dang ldan zhing/ chos

dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chen po rnams 'drir gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid las nges par byang chub la gzhol ba yin na/ sngags sgrub bar byed pa lta ci smos/ shAkya skye mchog myang 'das nas//
sems can bsod nams chung rnams la// 'di lta'i longs spyod ga la yod// chog 'di zhi bstan par bya// byang chub sems dang la 'od chen ldan// skye bo bkrin pa gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing mdor bsdus/
dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i phyi ma shin tu zhib mo tshon sna lnga ba 'bar bas dkar po dang// sar bo dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ ljang khu'i

kha dog du kha bsgyur la/ sngar bzhag pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya chen po bcis te rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pas phyi ma la phyag byas ba gdab par bya'o//

gzhan zhi ba sgrub pa po'i slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol lho shar gyi phyogs las kyi cho ga mthong bsam thab bya'o// khru gnyis kyi tshad la dpangs khru gangatsam kho ra khor yug du pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam pa/ phyi

rol pad+ma'i ze ba'i rnam par gang ba laga'i yam shang rnams kyis me rab tu sbar te/ shang dpal 'bras kyi sam shing mtho gang tsam gyi tshad la rlan dang bcas pa zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ maral btags pa

rnams kyis rtsa ba'i snyingabos sam/ phyag rgya dang rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis e lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drang nas kyang sngar brjod pa'i yi ge gcig pa nyid kyis rig pa 'am/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'i snying pos slar yang

brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas dkyil 'a khor gyi slong dbon gyis gtsug tor bcing/ de yo byadatshogs bar byas nas/ bdag nyidi dang ri mo mkhan ches mkhas pa 'am slob ma byed du gzhug go/ de nas

dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas nas sngar brjod pa'i bdug pa'i rige bas bdug pa bsreg go/ khral mo sbyar ba byas nas sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub
soms dpa' thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag byas nas phye ma blangs te gzugs kyi rnam par bya zhing/ rimo mkhan mkhas

pas rdzogs par bya'o// chog 'di dag gis dang bo kho nar re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'an po che seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs pa/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnA

na chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa kun du bri// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis kun tu bris nas rjes su sgrub pa pos bdag nyid bsrung ba'i chog dang 'ag ba byas nas/ 'byung po thams cad pa gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/

dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi phyogs ni dang/ steng dang/ 'og tu gtor bar bya'o/ de nas khrus byas nas mo thang dang bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang spra dang srung ba'i cho ga byas te/ rtsa ba'irig pas gur kum

dang bsres pa'i mar gyi srog blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres pa par 'dug ste/ de nyid du bzlas pa byed cing de nyid du gnas par bya'o// yungs kar dkar po la khro bo'i

rgyal bo sgrol masazhin pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du mtshon par bsngags te/ mngon par bsngab gas nas kham phor kha sbyar du gzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnam pa du ma dang/ nga ro drag po nga

rlung dang/ char dang/ yul ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba 'os pa mthong na/ khros pas yungs kar gyi sris blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// danas bgegs rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur ro// mi'i bgegs la ni

'tsho len lnga chang panas sbyin sreg byas na skyes bu de res par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pamed par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chibar 'gyurab 'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ ciltar yang ma yin

no/ brgya byin yang myur du ba chen gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa gzhan lta smos kyang cidagos/ khro bo sgrol masazhon pa'i 'jigs pas phan tshun du 'bros shing nges par rlag par

'gyur ro// de nas rjes su sgrub pa pos de nyid du ku shab khresal te par 'dug nas khro bo'i rgyal po sbrelams non pas bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan

lta 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas gnyis pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa skyil krung gis nye bar bzhugs par bya'o// de dag gi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos mnyan par

thabab dbya'o/ de rnams kyi g.yas sub nga bcom ldan 'dasa'aphags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i sprin gyi mdog ltar dkar ba// bad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs ba/ phyagagayon bas
bar bsnams nas g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo phya gzhu pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas bas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhi pa pad+ma'i

gdan la nye bar nga zhugs ra/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ dar la dkar po'i na bza' bsnams kha/ dar la'i stod g.yogs bla gos bsnams ba/ thalab nag bo'i thig le gsum byas pa'o// de bzhin du brtan pa dang

khro gnyer can ma'ang rang rang gi gdan la rang rang gi spyod lam du gnas shing nye bar bzhugs pa'i ng bya'o// de rnams kyi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin m dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
spyan ma dang/ gtsug tor gyi rgyalamobar bya'o// do bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu bzang bo dang/ sa'ihUMng po dang/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang/ sgrub ba thams cad
rnam par sel ba dang/ nasong sbyong ba dang mas pa phyag rdzayabathogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin pa dang/ dril med pa'i blo gros dang/ dril med pa'i tog dang/ nor bzang dang
zla 'od dang/ drima med par grags pa dang/ nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyag rgyal bo dang/ 'jig rten 'gro ba dang/ blo gros chen po dang/ g.yon par 'dzin pa
zhe sa pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tsa'o//rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang/ rig pa'i rgya lamo dang/ pad+ma'i

rigs gzugs dang phyag rgya rnams lung las jiltar ba shad pa bzhin dang/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri'o/ mtha 'i gnas su'ang grubazhi'i rnam par gnas gzhag par bya'o/ pad+ma'am tog legs par byas pa dang/

rigi ba'i lha gang gis dran pa'i ng gnas de rnams su gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub ba'i g.yas kyi gzhogasasu rangasangs rgyas nam mkha' dang/ yongs su gnas zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ngo/ de bzhin

du shar du kha bltas pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su rang sangs rgyas tsan dan dang/ grub pa zhes pa gzhan gas kyang kun tu bri'o// de

rnams kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po 'od srungs chen po dang ka t+yA ya na dang gnyis kun lubri'o// de rnams kyi yang gzhogs su 'phags pa phyagan rdo rjeut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs su snang ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i gzugs rgyan/

thams cad kyis brgyan pa// phyag g.yasardza yapa thog pa// g.yon pas khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur dang/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang/ dpung bzang dang/ rdo rje sde rnams cha byang ji lta ba dang/

mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bgags rnams 'joms pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po dang rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang/ gzug dang phyag rgyal sogs pa rnams ji ltar dran pa bzhin du bri'o// de rnams kyi yang g.yon du gru

bzhi'i rnam par rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshog sam dran pa de rnams gnas 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// de rnams kyi steng du parol tu phyin ba drug dang/ bcom ldan

'das mnA ma kI kun tu bri ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rab tu zhi ba'i lus so// de rnams kyi yang steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag rgya bcings pa rang rang gi 'khor ba/

sgyur ba'i rgyal bo chen po'i gzugs kun tu bste/ gser mdog dbang po rab tu zhi ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la cung zad blta ba sbyin pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor
los sgyur ba dang/ gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang/ gtsug tor gdugs dkar po dang/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ gzi brjidi phung bo dang/

gtsugo tor mthon po zhes pa sta/ gtsug tor brgyad po 'di rnams kun tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya
ba rab tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pas 'phreng ba 'dzin pa phyag g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhanacung zad khro gnyer dang bcas

pa kun tu bri'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyalal las rgyal ba bri bar bya ste/ rob tu zhi ba'i lus ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ phyag g.yonan dbyug gu dang ral ba
spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas pas bgrang 'a sbrang bzung nasa mchog sbyin pas rab tu spyan bar byed pa/ bzhad nung zad khro gnyer can 'jug pa'i sgrol mngon pa la phyogs pa

kun tu bri'o/ seng ge 'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor la kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs po/ de'i 'og tu rin po'i gzhal yas khang de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'dasam rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo tatsangame/
skam hacang mi sbom pa'i lus su gnas pa/ 'batu zhi ba'i sku/ gzugs mdzes shing cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pa la sngon po bsnyams pa// phyag g.yas pas dpal 'bras bstsams pa/

la byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyisa rnam par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mu tig gi 'phebs mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs ba/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs pa/ kusha sa
'od 'phro ba/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la 'bar bzhugs pa// khro bo'i rgyal por gyur pa/ sgrol mas non pa la gzigs par gyurang/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug ba'i sgo la mngon

par phyob sa pa/ blta na sdug pa thams cad du srin mo ral pa gcig pa byas pa'i gzugs 'chang ba kun tu bri'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi gzhogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po sgrol mas nog pa bri ste/ rnam par
'gyur ba chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bka' so sor bzhes bzhin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur pa la blta ba kun nas 'i// g.yon gyi gtogs su pad+ma'i 'og tu/
[&]/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lta bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri ma med pa dang/ shin tudul ba dang/ dag pa dang/ mun pa sel byed dang/ kun tu snang ba
zhes pa de rnams thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas na 'dug pa/ rin po che 'bar ba du ma'i rdo'i mthil dang 'dra ba/ kun nas 'bar ba rnam par bkra ba'i ma tog rnams kyis gcal du bkram pa/

gzugs mdzes pa kun tu bri'o// phyi rol gyi khor yug tugru bzhi'i rnam pa la phyogs bzhir rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa// rnam par bkra ba'i tshon sna lngas gsal ba/ shin tu drang ba'i ri ma dma' bas nang gi dkyil

'khor bya'o// shar gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbus su ma tog gi rgyal bo'i dbang po pad+d+hi'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shin tu chung tsam du bya

sta kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ phyag mchog sbyin pas rab tu sbyin pa/ sku'i gtsug tor la bzhugs pa'o// de'i g.yas su gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du ga

brjid lung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ma'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbong phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i

phyag rgya ba g.yas su/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bya ste/ phyag mchog spyan pas rab tu sbyin pa// pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'o/
de'i yang g.yas su lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi lag rgya bya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa ni gnas su ba'i phyag rgya bya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i rgyal bo de

bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon dugatsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bu ste/ kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'o// de'i yang gayon du de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gi sku rin po che'i ri la nye bar bzhugs
pa chos ston par mdzad bazhin pa/ ba rlasngon po dang/ mar gad dang/ pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od 'byin pa/ kun nas kun tu 'od gsal ba bI'o// de'i yang g.yon du rgyal ba'i gtsug

ra tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa kun tu bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon du ral ba spyi blugs dang/ bgrang 'phreng dang//

bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// sgo ' gnas su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ka nas kun nas 'bar ba bri'o// bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu phyag rgya chen po dbyug pa can dang/ u

la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di dag phan tshun ma 'byar bar kun tu bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa kun tu bris pa'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de 'ang tshon sna lngas 'bar ba rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/
zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rtababs bzhi'i rnam ba phyogs bzhir ro// nang gi dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste ( gdong bzhi ba/
[n ]gos dkar bo bgos pa// stod g.yogs gos dkar po can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ g.yonan du byug pa dang spyi blugs thogs ba/ phyag
rdo rje'o// de'i yang g.yas su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ lus dar la'i gos bgos pa// dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ bzhin rab tu zhi ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar
po can/ skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug pa// phyag g.yas mchog sbyin pa'o// de'i yang g.yas su 'og min pa'i lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i lus
sems bsam gtan la gnas pa// dar la'i gos kyi bgo ba bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ skyil krung gis rtobar 'dug pa/ phyag g.yas pas mchog sbyin ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar
bo can no// de'i rim pas dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ 'thab bral dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji
lta ba bzhin dang/ cha byad dang dbyibs lta ba bzhin no// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris te/ rtag myos dang/ 'phreng thogs dang/ lag na gzhong thogs dang/ gizang gnyis pa dang/

sa bla ba'i lha'i bu rnams go rims ji lta ba dang chabyad jilta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi chab dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ sha'i du mthong dang/ gya nom snang dang/ dge chung dang//
ka/ bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du dri bar bya'o// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs dang/ de bzhin du yang byang gi phyogs su'ang po// nub
kyi phyogs su de rnams kyi 'og tu 'phreng gnyis la brtan nas bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur te/ phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go rimes bzhin du
bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su nor sbyin gter dang nye bar gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa// byed pan cung zad bcom pa// gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no// de'i

g.yas su nor bu bzang bo dang/ gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dag bri'o// de bzhin du rim gyis gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma bri ste/ gzhon nu dga' byed pangan 'dug pa// dkyil 'khor la nges

par rtog bzhin pa bri'o// lngas rtse na da ra pa 'jigs su rung ba'ang bri ste/ de rnams kyi nye logs su gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du rim gyis nub kyi phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs

pa dang/ klu dga' bo dang/ chu dga' bo dang/ 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'a phreng gnyis pa la brten nas go rims bzhin du gnod sbyin dang/
srin po dang/ driza dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ drang srong dang/ grub pa dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi dang/ mim yazhe pa la sogs pa dang/ sman dang//

nor bu rin po che'i byed brag dang/ ri bo dang/ chu bo dang/ gling rnams go rims pazhin du gtso bor grags pa dang/ mchog tu gtso bo thams cad kyang bri bar bya// lta phyogs su gsha'i rngam mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas

pa bri bar bya'o// shar lho'i phyogs su ma lta kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrug pa/ dbyug pa dang/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs pa// ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ gos dkar po bgos
pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po can/ gser gyi mdog thal ba'i thig le gsum khyas pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang/ mtshon cha dang/ cha byad dang/ dbyabs dang/ kha dog
debang 'phreng gnyis ba la brten nas bri bar bya'o// thams cadran s 'jug pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por dka' bzlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhan pa/ lag na mdung rtsa gsum thogs pa'o// lha mo dka'
bzlog ma'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// sman drug gi bu'ang ma bya la zhon pa/ lag numadung thung thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser bo
bgosapagange stod g.yogs gos ser po can/ phyag g.yon pas dril bu thogs nas ba dan dmar po thogs pa'o// go rims bzhin du blo gi ri shin tu rid pa'i rnam pa dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang/

dga' byed dbang phyug dang/ nag po chen po dang/ ma mo bdun po rgyan dang/ cha byad dang/ dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du mngon bar bri'o// nor lha brgyad dang/ drang srong bdun dang/ khyab 'jug phyag bzhi pa/
phyag na 'khor lo dang/ bcon dang/ dung dang/ ral grithogs pa/ nam mkha' lding gi bzhon pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gza' brgyad dang/ rgyu skarati bu tshu
bdun dang/ gang sa stengs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu rgyu ba'i nye ba'i gza' brgyad po nyid kyang bri'o// go rims bzhin du dkar po dang/ nag po ni tshes bcolnga dang/ khyim bcu gnyis dang dus drug

dang/ zla ba bcu gnyis dang/ lo tshigs dang/ srimo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang/ lnga patshang po chul gnas ba rnams kyang ste/ mdon phyag rgya rnams su rnam par gzhag par bya'o// lha rnams go rims bzhin du/

'phreng gnyis su bya'o//ma 'on dkyil 'khor gsum kha'am/dadakyil 'khor gsum pa la brtan nas mngon pa bri bar byas/dkyil 'khor gsum bo rnam gsu' dgu ba ni rnam par gzhug par bya'o/'di cha ga bcom ldan 'das so/
mdor bsdusan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo nis par mngon par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugan g.yas su nges par bri bar bya'o//

rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ni g.yon du nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtsobo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po' nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nges par
bri bar bya'o// lhagam rnams ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su nges par bri bar bya'o// 'di dag ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar pa pharang shar gyi phyogs su mi mdzad
kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lha' phyogs su 'od gsal ba'o// 'og min dang gzugs can yin pa rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro// 'du shes mod

'du shes med man gyi skyo mtshod ma gsal ba'i lha rnams ni ma yin no// byang gi phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang/ rab 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/

'od chung la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha'i rgyal po re re nges par mngon bar bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams na ji ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su mngon par bya bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil

'khor gsum par yang byang gi phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan dka' thub bzlog pa dang bcas pa nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// sgo gnyis pa'i nyi lags su gzhon nu smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan
la lag na mdung thung thogs pa/ lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag g.yas na dril bu dang ba dan dmar po khregs pa// gzhon nu'i gzugs can dkyil 'khor la nges par

rtog bzhin pa'o// shar kyi phyogs su nam mkha' lding 'dab chags kyi gzugs can dang/ drang srong mAn[？] nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnam par bzhag ba bzhin du phyag rgya rnams su'ang ngo//

lhoshar du gzhon nu ma bzhi dang/ gzhon nu ming bo dang lhan cig pa gru'i bzhon pa la kun tu gnas ba/ chu gtor chen bo la yongs su rgyubar byed pa dang/ me lta'i rgyal po'ang nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o/
de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su lang ka'i grong gi srin po'i bdag pongashin tu 'jigs su rung ba ste/ der shing patsumaN+Dal brten nas gnas pa dang/ rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po zhes bya pa gnod

sbyin gyi gzugs can byung chub sems dpa' nges par mngon par dri bar bya'o// de bzhin du go rims bzhin du gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po can nges par mngon b.ru bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du sha

za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yeng byed ces bya ba nges par mngon par bri bar bya'o// lhagam phyag rgya rnams su'ang rnam par gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs su klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang nye dang 'a bo sa par mngon

bar dri bar bya ste/ gatha'i gtso bo nyima'ang ngo// nub kyi phyogs su thub pa sor skya zhes bya ba srong gi mchog dang/ mu stegs can gcer bu pa'i khyu mchog/ cer bu'i gzugs su go rims bzhin du phyag rgya rnams

sum par gzhag par bya'o// byang nub kyi phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nor sbyin dang/ driza'i rgyal po zur phud lta pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal bo ljon pa ste/ 'di rnams nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni

da byibs ji ltar kun tu gnas pa bzhin du go rims bzhin phyag rgya rnams su'ang mngon par dri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa mngon par bri'o// zhes pa phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor bzhi par ri mo lngas spras pa/

phyag rgya'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas ba/ gru bzhi dang rta babs bzhi'i rnam ba dang/ rgyal bo chen po bzhis rnam par brgyan pa/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ 'jug pa'i sgor yug rgyur

gyur pa na ut+pa la ston por bri'o// g.yas dang g.yon du nu pad+ma dang/ rdo rje dang/ dgu sta dang/ dung dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ ba con dang/ 'khor lo dang/ swasti ka dang/ bum pa dang/ 'dang/
dung dang/ gdub kor dang/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ zhags pa dang/ dril bu dang/ gro dang/ gro ba dang/ gzhu dang/ lcags mda' ste/ 'di rnams rnam pa sna tshogs

pa'i mtshon cha'i mchog gi phyag rgyas khor yug tu grwa ba'i 'phrang bas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir phyag rgya chen po bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs su dkya'o 'khor gru bzhi pa'i rnam
pa can byas nas rdo rje gnyis ka nas rtsomo gsum pa'i rnam pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// shar phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa can byas nas pad+ma kun nas 'bar ba cin gzhag par bya'o// lha'i
phyogs su dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa can byas nas lhung bzed kun nas 'bar ba can gzhag par bya'o// nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i rnam pa can byas nas ut+pa la sngon po rang gi sdong bu dang

'dab ma dang ldan pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// phyogs bral rnams su phyag rgya bzhir 'gyur te/ nub byang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor zlum po'i rnam pa byas nas zhags pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho nub kyi phyogs su
dkyil 'khor ring po'i rnam pa byas nas dbyug pa kun nas 'bar ba'o// lho shar gyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa'i rnam pa ci byas nas dgra sta kun nas 'bar ba'o// byang shar gyi phyogs su ral gri
kun nas 'bar ba gzhag par bya'o// thams cad nas mngon par bris nas steng dang/ 'og dang/ thadakar phyag rgya gsum phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang nye bar phyam da kyis bri bar bya
ba la 'di lta ste/ gos dang/ bsil yab dang/ lhag kun nas 'bar ba de rnams mngon par bri bar bya'o zhes so// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas/ sems can phan don 'dod pa ya/ dkyil 'khor ro

ga 'di rnams kyis/ mdor bsdus 'dir ni bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung bar bya ste/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bram

naze dang rgyal rigs dang/ rje rigs dang/ dmangs rigs byang chub tu sems bskyed pa theg pa chen po'i theg pa pa/ theg pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can gyi sems dpa' chen po dad cing dge ba'i chos can

dang rgyal srid chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang/ longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang/ longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang/ bzang zhing dul la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang/

tshi ku dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan ma sdom pa la gnas pa/ gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang/ phyogs chen po dang/ rigs

dang ldan pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis chos spyod pa/ nyin dang mtshan du smyung bar gnas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ sgra dri zhim pa dang khrus gsum byas pa/ mi smra bar gyur pa/ de'i nyin mo gabur dang/

00/ gur kum dang/ ma la ya'i tsan dan dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa// rtag tu nyerag byas pa/ rtag tu nye res byas pa dang ldan pa/ ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang/ tshas par

spyod pa dang/ bden pa dang ldan pa/ rgyal bar dgongs pa/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du ha cang yang mi to/ ha cang yang mi ring bar gzhag par bya'o// gtsang zhing gtsang sbra byas pa ji srid gcig nas brgyad la

sogs pa'i bar rnams te/ gzhan rnams ni ma yin no// de rnams kyang phan tshun kun tu chags pa/ rgyal rigs spyi bor mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dang/ de rnams kyi bu gzhon nu dang gzhon nu
ma rnams grong pa'i chos mi shes pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal byis pa'i skye bo rab tusad par byed pa/ gzhon nu'i skye bo dga' bar byed pas
so= de nas ches thog mar de lta bu'i grong pa'i chos mi shes pa rab tu gzhug par bya/ rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang/ tshe dang/ nad med pa dang/ dbang phyug dang/ longs spyod chen po

mngon par 'phel ba dang/ khyad par du'ang tshul khrims dang ldan pas rig pa'i dngos grub nges par gnas pa'i phyir ro// de ltar sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs bzang po dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis ga dur gyi

bdug pa bsregs te/ rgyab sa phyogs pam yin par phyi rol tu 'byung bar bya ste/ byung nas kyang ji ltar bde ba'i chu shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa/ srog chags med pa// rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgyu mngon par bzlas
pa phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa'i chus khrus byas nas/ ltareg byas te gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang mas me thab tu song nas/ ku sha'i khres la bar 'dug ste/ byang

shor du mngon par phyogs pas ga pur dang gur kum tsan dan dang bsres pa'i mar gyi srog blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// sngar brjod pa'i cho gas spyan drangs pa dang gshegs su gsol lo// slar
yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas bum pa gang ba brgyud gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shang sa ha ka ra'i yal 'dab dang 'bras bus rnam par rgyan pa/ gsar dang/ dngul dang/ rin po che
dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa de lta bu bcom ldan 'das shAkyathub pa la so sor dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa nisangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni 'bag pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la'o// bzhi
ban byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la'o// lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa na dkyil 'khor
[/ ]gnyis pa'i sgo khang du gzhug par bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thams cad la'o// gnyis na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur par yongs su bsngos nas gzhag par bya'o// de nas sngar brjod pa'i
chog nyid kyis bdug pa bsrog tang ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas slar yang spyan drang bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ byang chub

sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ 'byung po thams cad dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugakyang sngar brjod pa'i cho ga nyid kyis sbyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang/ dadug pa dang/ dri dang dmaram dang/

lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis lha bshos thams cad kyis thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me smos pa nyid kyis mar gyimar me dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa dang 'phags bam yin pa thams

cad la lha bshos smos pas/ sA lu'i zan zho dang sbrang rtse dang ldan pa/ 'thug khyad par can khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyarapa'imar la btsos pa'i snum 'khur gyis mya ngan med pa 'khyil ba dang/ khat+tA la sogs pa thams/

cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// phyi rol gang ba dang/ tsan dan gyi thang chu sbratshu dang 'o ma/ 'o thug tu btsos pa'i bza' ba rnams rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/

byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang/ 'phags pa'i lha rnams la me tog dri zhim po rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o// 'du can dang/ gats+tshat+tA ra kI khyad par dang/ sngar gyi yo byad rnams lha thams cad dang/ 'byung po'i

tshogs dang/ sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du sna ma dang/ rgyu stos kyi me tog dang/ pun+d+ra ga la sogs pa rnams sngar nges par bstan pa rnams sangs rgyas
dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ 'phags pa dang/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rigs la stsama'i me tog dang/ pad+ma'i rigesal pad+ma dang/ de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ut+pal dang/ gzhan rnams la thamal ba'i sngags kyis so// de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rogs la ga bur gyi bdug pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs la tsan danano// de bzhin du gsang ba'i bdag po rdo rje can nyid kyi gu gul du shes par bya'o// sngags gzhan thams cad la bdug pa thamal pa dbul bar
bya'o// 'phags pa rnams n thams cad la// mar gyi mar med dbul bar bya// khaphags pa min pa'i sngags rnams la// dri zhim til mar dbul du gzhug/ cho ga'i go rims bzhin dun// bdug pa mthong

ba'i rgyu yis so// de bzhin kho nar brjod pa'i dri// sngags rnams kun la rtag par de'o// de bzhin gshegs la gang brjod dang// phyag na rdo rje bdung brjod pa// rang rang gi ni rgyud rnams so// sngags spyod don du
sgrub pa pos// 'dir ni cho ga blta bar bya// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khoragyi slob dbon sngarachog mthong bas spyan drang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bdug pa la sogs pa
dang/ lha bshos rab tu dbul ba rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba byas nas/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog mkhas shing skyen pas/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor m sha med pa thams cad rnga pa tadang/
dung gi dga' ba'i sgra dbyangs nges par sgrogs pas/ bdug pa dang/ me tog dang/ mar ma dang/ 'phreng bas rnam par spras pa phyogs bzhi rnams dang/ phyogs bral rnams dang/ steng dang/ 'og dang/

thad ka thams cad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byas nas 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtos rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas slar yang zho dang/ sbrang rtse dang/ mar la btags pa'i 'bras

sA lu dang/ thug po che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am snying pos stod brag brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg rgyas nas kyang sngar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rjes su zhugs pa'i sems dang 'a chen po la srung ba'i

chog rnams byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dbon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid kyi lus

dngos grub kyi don du phul ba/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar lengs spyod pa thun mong bar gyur pa// dran med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gzhon par byed pa// dge ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes kyi/
sangs rgyas thob par 'dod pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bstan pa nyid las sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyang skadatsage de la grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas
dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gos ma nyams pa thag pas btags ma thag pa/ sgra dang bral ba/ rtsa ba'i rig pas lan bduna mngon par bsngags pa/ dri zhim po'i tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bgos ba'i/
dar gyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyi gdong g.yogs nas/ thog ma nas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrub pa pos rab tu 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/
rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan yang spro ba chen po rgyal srid chen po 'dod pa'i ng rang tu gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis par gnas pa gdong g.yogs nas dri bzang po'i
me togatsan dan dang gur kum dag gis rnam par bsres pa byin te/ shin tu gtsang sbra byas pa'i lag pa dag gis me tog 'thor du gzhug bar bya'o// gang du de'i mi rtog babs pa de la de'i rig pa'i
sngags sbyin par bya'o// skyong gzhan dang gzhan rnams su de 'du dad 'di rjes su 'brel ba'o zhes kun tu grags pa yin zhing/ de nyid 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ byang chub kyi snying po gnon
par byed pa dang/ byang chub chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don du mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o/de nyid 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dang/ longs spyod po dang/
rgyal srid chen po dang/ dbang chab r grags pa'i gang zag dang 'grogs pa 'di'i mngon par sgrub par byed pa'o// skyob 'di nyid du sgrub pa gang dang ldan ba lhog par spyod pa las/ las rnams thams cad
'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim gyis de lta bu la sogs pa jisrid brgyad po rnams de srid de/ gzhan rnams ma yin no zhes so// sgrub par 'dod pa gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sdig pa zod

pa'i don du dam tshig tsam du 'gyur zhes pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyani na/ dang po re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang mi ring/ tacang mi lta ba'i byang shar gyi
04 phyogs kyi cha'is khyogs rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i ng sngags kyis dag par byas nas// de nas rgyal po man par dbang bskur ba de bzhin du sems bzhin pas mtha' gcig tu sangs rgyas
dang chos dang/ dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba'i dad pa dang spro ba chen po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi soms dang ma bral ba/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la bsnyen bkur byed

pa dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma smad pa/ skye ba 'di nyid la rig pa dang sngags sgrub par 'dod pa/ bsam pa bzang zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba'i yid dang ldan pa/ dge mtshan 'dod pa'i rang bzhin
chan sad pa'irgyur yang rig pa'i don la rnam rtog med cing/ der gtad pa'i yid can de lta bu la sogs pa ltadzisrid pa ra mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhagaman+nams spang bar bya'o zhes so// shes
rab can dang spyod pa la ma rmos pa'i khyad par las te/ gzhan rnams bsnyen par bya ba ma yin no// de nas rgyal bo thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon dang
mkhan po mnyes par bya'o// de nas bla re bres te rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gdugs dkar mgo bor 'dzin bzhin pa dang/ rdzoyab dkar po g.yob bzhin pa dang/ bkur ste chen pos dung dang/
ja bo che dang/ rdza rnga'i dga' ba'i sgra nges par sgrogs pa dang/ rgyal ba'i sgra dang/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bsngags pa dang/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs
pa rnams kyis mngon bar bstod bzhazhi pas bskor ba dang/ bkra shis re byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//
slob dpon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub pa la yang dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang/ 'jig rten pa thams cad las 'das pa'i gsang chen rnam
bar thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du ya nga dag par rjes su 'jug pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal srid thams cad kyis sangs rgyas nyid mngon par rtogs par 'dod pa dang/ mdor bsdus nas brjod nas nigs rgyas

'a/ ]'di 'byung ba'i phyir bdag nyid spro bar bgyi'o zhes so// de nas ku sha'i bres la nye bar 'dug ste shar du mngon par phyogs pas dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rtogs pa la/ dang po re zhig rig pa'i mngon

par dbang bskur ba ni nas phyag rgya chen po rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa dang sngags dag gang gnas pa gro ga'i 'dab ma la ga da ga des bri bar bya'o// bris nas tsan dan dang gur kum dag
gis lag pa dag dang kham phor kha sbyar ba bkrus nas/ de nas gro ga'i'adabam kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gzhag par bya'o// de nas de la 'o bar 'dug ste rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sam nyid du brjod par bya'o// de nas der ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pa la

[6]]mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor duthams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang ba sgo dang rta bar sngar bzhag pa blangs nas slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas shing spyi bor mngon

par dbang bskur bar bya'o// slob ma ji ltar 'dod pa'i chus spyi bo nas mngon bar dbang ba skur bar bya'o zhes so// danas de la kham bor kha sgyur de de'i ched du sbyin par bya'o// mar me la klog tu gzhug par
bya'o gal te des bcom ldan 'das las rig pa 'am sngags bzung ba nyid yin par rgyun bklags pa nyid las kyang las byed do// rnam pa gzhan du na rim gyis 'bad pas bsgrub pas byed par 'gyur ro//
gzhan rnams na sngags bzlas pa kho nas 'grub par byed do// de nas sngags yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dang po sgrub pa kho nas 'grub par byed do zhes pa rnam par rtog pa med pa las so// de khon sdar
bris pa slob dpon gyi sgrub pa gsum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'dab pa med par ro// de bzhin du thog mar rig pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba spyi'i bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mngon par

dbang bskur ba ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis par dkyil 'khor thams cad la dang lha thams cad la gang rab tu bstabs pa'i bum pa gang pa des snga ma'i cho ga gang yin pa jilta ba de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par
dbang bskur bar byas nas sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang/
dkyil 'khor dang/ sngags dang/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa la'ang lhag par 'dod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon du mngon par dbang bskur ba sbyin no//

dkyil 'khor gsum par kun thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang bacho ga de nyid kyis spyi bor mngon par dbang bskurab bya'o// khyod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul

chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i sngags rnams dang/ dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang/ 'bar ston pa dang/ rgyud dang rgyud kyi phyagargya dang spyad pa nges par

ston pa dang/ rang gi chog nges par ston par rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// skye ba 'di nyid dam/ gang phyi ma gzhan dang gzhan rnams su sangs rgyas nyid nges bar thob bo/ de bzhin du rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal

ba 'a mngon par dbang bskur ba dang/ sngar nges par bstan pa'i cho gsabcom ldan 'das la par phul ba'i bum pa gang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas de bzhin kho nar mngon par dbang
bskur ro// de bzhin du yang khyed la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang/ lus can thams

cad kyis mi thub cing rnam par rgyal ba dang/ khyod sngags rnams thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sgrubs shig ces rjes su gnang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/ de nas da kyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sems can

lnga po nyid re re la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mngon par dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o// de nas de dag rim gyis dkyil 'khor du bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la phul to/ dkyil
'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// de nas nyim gzhan la rim gyis rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rnams la bslab par bya zhange/ rnam par sbyar bar bya'o// skud cig

de nyid la song sa sngar brten par phul ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la sngar phul ba'ichu bum pa gang ba blangs nas/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de rnams la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon par phyogs
par byas nas 'thud du gzhug par bya'o// 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gang gse 'da' bar byed n bsod namasam yon pa mang po skye bar 'gyur ro//
dkyila 'khor gang du 'am/ der yang rigs dman pa gang gis dkyil 'khor du 'ongs ba de rnams kyang dkyil 'khor gyi slob dbon gyis snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas/ grogs byed pa'i lag par gos
dkar po gtsang ma mgo bor bcings pa gzhan gyis sam gos kun tu g.yogs te gnas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas rags dman pa rnams kyis ma rtog gtor bar bya'o// de nas grogs byed pa de rnams

kyis kyang rab tu zhugs pa'isems can thams cad kyis khrus bya'o// de rnams kyi'ang dmatshagatsam de 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i ng grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas pa'i mi'i bya ba'i gnas su song
na rtse mo ma nyams pa'i krung rnams kyis so// der pangam thab rnam pa gsum du brjod do// zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ mngon spyod do// zhi ba'i don du bad+ma'i rnam pa'o// yang na tshim

par byed pas dbang du byed pa'i ng ngo// mngon spyod la zur gsum mo// de la me'i bya ba'i chog thams cad la ku sha dgram par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas shar gyi rtse mor ma'i bya ba

gzhag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nas ma'i bya ba mdzad pa rnams la phyag byas nas lho'i rtsa khor ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas byang gi rtse mor sbyin par

bya'o d bzhi n du yang bya ba rnams grogs byed pas/gnas pa'i deng tshul can gyis mo'i bya ba ku pa rnams kyis so// thog mar rtsa pa'i rig pas so// thog ma zho dang/ sbra rtsi dang/ ar la btags pa'i 'bras

yos kyi sbyin srogati ku rtsa gcig sbyin par bya'o// zhi ba'i don du snying posamar gyis so// rgyas pa'i don du shaji a pa nag gsum gyi sbyin sreg go/ mngon spyod la ka Ta ke yis so// ma'i bya ba'i cho ga 'di'ang

skya thams cad du thun mong ba'i sgrub pa rnams la'ang ngo// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar spyod pa rnams su'ang ngo// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis gnas ga tshang mas gtso bo'i lha nyid bstan nas/
