lhathamasacad dang/ lham yazhi thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyang 'di'i dbang du 'gyur te/ bka' bzhi byed pa la bzha gnas / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos rnams 'di'i sngags grub pa de rnams kyang 'di la byams pa'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ro// rjes su 'dod par 'gyur ro//
sems can thams cad kyis mi tshug par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang las kyi chog mchog gi sgrub thabs su'agyur bzhi ba la ba'i sha ngel gru bo che'i bzhon pa byed du gzhug ste/ shang gtsagagi bzhon pa 'am/

bsdus pa'i ng rung ste gnas chen bo bya'o// gda'i dbus kyi gling der gnas pa'i gru'i bzhin par skyes bu brgya nyi shu lag na sgron la thogs pa rnams gru'i bzhonapa la 'dzegs te/ gosadakar po gyon zhing
bsrungab byas pa ras sa kyi thubosdur gyi tshogs kun tu bzhag pa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o// de nas ras ris la mchod pa chen po byas nas na ga ge sar gyi bye ma rnams dang/ gur kum dang/

tsan dan dkar po dang/ ga pur bsres pa dang/ song ldeng gi srog blugs stong phrag sum tsadrug sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyi'i srog gi mthar gru de skad cig tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'juge rten du 'gro zhing
'ong bar 'gyur te/ jiltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par rgyu'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed de// mthong ba tsam lasathob bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa lnga dang/
sa thun ring du 'chozhing/ bskal ba chen por gnas par 'gyur ro// ga ba'adzin pa'i 'khor lesasgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ma mo 'dzin pa de rnams kyang 'di'i rig ba 'dzin pa 'grub/

bar 'gyur ro// lhan cig sbyod pa de rnams dang thabs cig tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhinadu rnam par rgyu zhing/ rang dgar 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams machod pa dang bsnyen bkur gyis mngon par

dgyes par 'gyur// mthar sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// gzhan ya 'as kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs dam par 'gyurab ni/ chu klung 'gram mamargya mtsho'i ngogs// de bzhin kha ba can gyi ri// riyi rgyal bo

'bigs byed de// der ni las mchog bsgrub par bya// sam layanyid dang// ri bo spos kyi ngad ldangadang// byardo phung po'i ri rgyal du// las kyi mchog ni bsgrub par bya// rgya mtsho chen po'i brag dang ni// shing sogs
matog ldan pa ste// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags rnams ni/ phyogs 'di rnams su bsgrub par bya// rnam paredaben pa'i phyogs gtsangam// bas mtha'i grongapa'ichos sbas par// gsang sngags rgyal po
bsgrub par bya// de bzhin khonar thams cad du// ri bo dang ni tshang tshing dang// bas mtha'i gnasamal nyams dga' ba// de bzhin rgyal bas spungs pa// gdug pa'i sems can rnams bral bar// gsang

sngags rgyal bo thams cad bsgrug/ rgyal bo chos daldan pa'i phul// skye bo gtsang spra spyod la dga'// ma dang pha la gus ba dang// gnyis skyes rigs kyis dor ba ru// lha rnams dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
k+kA

can nyid// chu klung chen bo shI tanyid// 'di dag gru bzhing gzhan mnabar// stobs bcu ldan sras rnams kyis bshad// stobs bcu pa yas gsungs pa'i zhing// byang phyogs lam med ri bo dang// kha che dang ni rgya yul/
adang = bal yul deb ni mang yul dang// rgya nag dang li yul nyidi// de dgamalus grub pa'i zhing// byang gi phyogs su brten pa yi// gangayang rid chu bo yang// bsod nams yul du rab tu brjod// nas dud

gronazab go/ gang du sems can snying rje ldan/ de ru rtag par dngos grub 'gyur// dpalaphyiri bo drag ri tshe// lho phyogs yul du gnas pa yi// dpal ldan 'bras spungs mchod rten ni// sa stengs rgyal ba'i

ringabasrol 'dzin// der ni sngags rnams bsgrub par bya// myur du las dang las rnams so// rdo rdzogadan dang mchod rten che// chos kyi 'khor lomadzes pa dang// gang du thub gtso zhi bar gshegs// dorayang

dngos grub blta bar bya// lha lasababs pa'i mchod cha/ sa pa dang cho 'phrulatshe// sa skya zhes bya'i grong na chog dang// lus pa'i tshal du 'khrung sa pa der// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur//
rgyal bsaMbastod cing rab bsngags pa// bya rgod phung po'i ri dar dang// de bzhin brag dang bsil ba'i tshal// me tog ces bya'i gronga mchog dang// de bzhin rtag tukA sha'i grong// bcom brlag ke bya/
ma kub dzad ng// sa stangs grongani'aphags rgyal dang// mchod rten de bzhin yangs pa can// rtag tus stengs mithi la// grong dang grong khyer gtso bo rnams// gang gzhan rgyal ba yang dag 'byung// rab
bsngags bsod nams yuladag tu/ da rnams su ni dngos grub sgrub// 'di rnams las gzhan yul rnams ni// grong dang ljongs dang ri bo dang// gnas dang gronga mchog gtso bo// 'oma'am 'bab
chu la brtan pa// der ni rnam dbenaN+Das 'jug cing// bzlas dang sbyin sreg dga' bar 'gyur// gnas na bla khab med pa dang// rtag tu khang pa stong pa ru// sngon du bsnyen ba bya ba 'o// sngags rnams
rjesamathun las rnams ni// sngags bos rtag tuyul dbus su// sngags bzlas mang dag 'dod par bya// bzlas la rab zhugs rtag tu brtson// sngags rig gtong ba dag la goms// tshul khrims/
spyod tang gin tu bden// 'byung po kun la phan par dga'// sngags kyi spyod pa la dad pa// brtul zhugs la gyis sngar bzhin 'das// gtsang ma'i yul dang gtsang sbra can// kla klo rkun ma
spangs pa dang// sems can sdig sprul la sogs pa// spangs pa'i sa phyogs 'dod par bya// 'bras bu ma tog yang dag ldan// drimadachu narab bsngags pa// sngags rig pas ni sngagasakhasnyan
bya tshul gzhan rnams su bsgrig mi bya// lha yi gnas sam dur khrod dang// brtan pa'imtshan mgatsage pa dang// rtags gcig depazhin bsamatha'aru// sngags rig sngagasazhi bstan pa bya//
bdag dang grogasa rnams bsrungs byas nas// sngar spyad gsang sngags ldan pa dang// sngags pas rtag tu sngags bzlas bya// dgon khache mchogashing chen dang// ma tog
'bras bu la sogs 'byung// ri yi rtsa dang khung bu dang// chu yi gnas gtsang marab cas// 'bab chu ma'agram yid 'ong bar// sngags rig pas ni sngags bsnyen[S]// sngags shes gnas 'di
sa rtogs byed// shar phyogs suyang nuklung che// lu hita 'gam dpeg pa dang// d bzhi de mar pa'i yul// grong mchog 'phaparabyed pa dgadama'ab gang du 'di 'gro mchog/ 'dug pa dang
ninuklunga mchog gnas dorartag tu zlos pa deng// gtsangag blo grosaldan pas bstan// sngon du bstan pa'i ng der gyis shig/ gang+gA'i sgo ru las rnams kun// dbazhi'i rtagatugad dang// dug can

pa ni khrod pa ru// rab tu sbyor ba kun nyid dang// gtsang ma'i sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// dur khrodacha dang gzhan nyid ni// zlos ngo sa derani rtag tu bzlas// dri mdachudang 'a bab ni// srog chags rnams
kyis spangs paru// danyid phyir nin tu// mnyam bzhag sdag kyizlas pa bya// derani 'jig rten bsam pa yi// ba sonamasamani pa cung zad mthong// 'on kyang sngags kyinyarab stan las// nga na
dus su 'dug par bya// don gzhan du 'gro bar bya// zla ba gzas wani dus der ni// dus la baban dus cung zad// der 'dus bya yi gzhan du min// gzhan du sngags rigami nus pas/ de nas myur du 'gro
bar[S/ ]bde gshegs machod rtan bzhugs pa ge/ sa stenganams su kun tu 'dug/ 'jig rten mu stegs thams cad ni// lta ba ngan par lhung ba rnams/ mu stegs can gzhan gnas rnams//
sngagasaragabs ni rtag tu spang// sngags shes derani mi ba sdad do// skyes mchog blo gros rgyungan pa// rgyal ba mchog gis gang bzhugs dang// rang rgyal bso ru lta bu dang// byang chub sems dpa'
skal brgya// rgyal mchog sras bo nyan thos rnams// de rnams kun bzhugs s stongagi/ yul rnams kun tu sngags shes pas// 'bad pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// mnyam par ba zhig pas gsang
sngagasan// gnas de ni bzlas par bya// gsungs pa'i gnas nii 'di rnams su/ a gsang ba nga sa skad las 'das tha/ gsungs pa'i las rnams thams cad dang// las kyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs rnams//

'di rnams rAdapa mgyur na// gang yang rung ba'i gnas dang ni// gtsangams sngon du bsnyen pabya// dadatsangamos pas sgrub thabs kyi// cho ga mchog gi las brtsam mo// dang po re zhig bris sku'i thubo zhal nubatubastan
nas bzhag sto/ bdagadishar da mngon par phyogs 'grog mkhar gyis ma/ gang+ga'i klung ge 'gram gyis blangs nas/ dushelatsadang/ tsanadan dkar po dang/ gur kum dang/ ga pura rnams bsros la
rma bya'i gzugs byas te/ de bas sku'i spyan sngar bzhag nas rtse mom bcad ba'i shagatsang ma'i phyogs nas byung bas 'khor lo'i rnam ba byas nas bas sku 'i spyan sngar lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/
lag pa g.yon bsan dbyago/ dkar po'i zla ba nya ba'imtshan phudan bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ ga dur gyi bdug pa bsrugs pa'i dri dang/ jisridan langs da 'bar

da srid du bzlas b.rubya'o// de nas tem khachar ba'i dus kyi tshad ma bya'irgyal por 'gyur ro// 'khora'a'ong bar ro// bdaganyidalha'i 'phrang ba dang gos 'chang zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang/ nyi ma'achar ga 'dra
bar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te ras ris la bskor ba byas la/ rasaris blangs nas rmabya'i gdan de la 'dug yudatsam gyisatshangs pa'i 'jigen/

'kholasar ra bar byed do// rag pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrage brgya stong phrag dums yongs su bskor ba'i rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa drug cu'i bar du'atsho bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar
'dod par 'gro zhing ragatuspyod bar gyur ro// thogs pa med par 'gro'o// lha'i phun sumatshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro//
de da 'di'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// mthar yang sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin dudabyig pa dang/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ mchod phyir thogs dang/ ldongares dang/ gi'u wang

zla dang/ ral gri dang/ lcagasamad 'dang/ mtshon rtse gcig pa dang/ dag lta dang/ mtshon cha'i khyad par ma pa sna tshogs pa/ sa'i rang bzhig gyi khyad bar dang/ rkang gnyis pa dang rkangabazhi ba dang//
las/ byo dang/ bzhon pa'i khyad par seng ge dang/ stag dang/ gzago la sogs pa rnams grog mkhar gyis las byas ba 'am/ dri zhim po'i dri ma bsres pa las byas pa 'am/ stan dang/ bzhon pa dang/
mal cha dang/ gdugs dkar po dang/ codapan dang rgyan gyi bye brag thams cad dang/ rin po'i bye brag thams cad dang/ rab tu byung ba'i yo byad kyi bye brag thams cad la bgrang 'phreng dang/ mchil lham
dang gangelhag dang/ lhung bzed dang/ rtogos dang/ khab dang/ gri la sogs kha rgyal gyi lcags lasabyas ba'am/ gzhan yang gdutungazad sems can gyi yo byad snod la sogs pa rgyal gyi lcags las
byas pa 'am/ grog mkhar gyis 'am/ chu klung gi sa las byas pa de thams cad ba'i rnam lngas bkrusazhasa mngon par bsang gtor byas te sngagasazhan du spo ba'i sngags sam/ yig gcig pa'i sngags sam/

sngags gzhan gang yang rung ba brgya rtsa brgyad man par bsngags pa byas zhas/ rtog pa'i rgyal bo 'dir gsungs bam gtogs pa sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang/ tshiltar mngon par dga'
bas bdag nyid srung zha grogs bor ba yongs su bskyab par byas pa/ zhe tugs thub rungesngags dang rgyud shes ba sngarab stan pa'i gnas su bris sku zhabazhub tu bstan la gzhag lta bdag nyidi/

sngarab zhin du'o// bris sku la mchod pa chen po byas nas gtso borag dur gyi bdugag pa bsregs te sngarab stan pa'i mtshon cha dang/ yo byad dang/ somasazhan gyi khyad par rnams sngar bstan pa'i bcos mar
byas la/ yar ngo'i zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo rdzas de rnams gang rungablangs te mtshatsho ji srid du bzlas pa byas n nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshabaraskabs 'dir bris sku la 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba
chen po kun tu mthong ngo// gal te sgrub pa pobazhon pa'i khyad par blangs par gyuran/ de la zhon nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te rgyan gyi khyad par ram mtshon cha'i khyad par blangs
pa 'am bcas bsarig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// jiltar 'dod pa bzhin 'gro zhing lha'i lus tan tim shab dang mtshungs pa/ 'od ze chen po'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ glog ltar

gsal ba'i sku/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag/ ring du 'tsho zhing bskal pa chen por gnas pa// rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dums yongs su bskor ba'i lha'i nor bun po/

che'i gzhal yas khangan sbyod pa// sngar yongs su brtag pa'i sa'i rang bzhin gyi bzhon bgang gis grub pa de nyidamathu chen por 'gyur te/ de nyid 'di'i bzhon pa dang/ de nyid 'di'i grogs bosku/ gzhan gyi
sngags kyi dngos grub bzlog par gyur pa/ bdag gi sngags kyi dngos grub kun tu sbyarab r byas pa byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ ban par 'dod// rtag tu rjes su bsus pa/ de nyid 'di'i mtshon chadang/

rgyan dang/ ni poma'i bye brag dang/ stan dang/ malatshe dang/ sems can la so gas pagangayani pa de nyidi'adi'i bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbabachen po rtag tu rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur ro// mthu chen po dang//

00 brtson 'grusachen bo dang/ lus chen bora'agyuro// 'phags pa spyanas gzigs magsum du mchogazhi'i/ legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste spyi bor khyugs sajisrid byang chub snying borjes su thob kyi bar du dge ba'i
bshes gnyena mdzad de/ stobs bcu po rnams nges par kumakhob ste/ mchodapa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pa dang/ 'byung po thamasacad kyisami tshugs par 'gyur ro// yang
dag pa'imatha'i rogasargyun mi gcod pa dang/ sa thob par yang 'gyur ro// stobs bcu dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid dus pa dang/ ting 'dzin du 'gyur ro// mdor bsdusan las mchog thams cad dang//
ba nas mchogal gnas pas ras pase mchog gi spyan sngar mchod pa mchogalam par dga' bas las mchogagazhananyidabya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i nam mkha'ala'agro ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'jug

ba dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ sa rjes su thob par byed pa nyidadang/ lus 'dinyidakyis 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu 'gro gnyidi dang/ stobs bcu'irgyud yongs su rdzogs par byed panyid kyi phyiradang/

'phags pa byas pa mngon sum du mthong ba nyid kyi phyir dang/ chos bstan pa don yod pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi gcod pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashes kun tu gzhonatsang rjes

su thob par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ chos kyi sprin rnam par 'byorapal sasu 'jug pa nyid kyi phyiradang/ nyon mongs pa'i yos su gdung ba chod cing bdud rtsi richar gyi rgyun gyis rab tu zhi bar byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang
ga// 'jig rtan rjes su'adzin pa la rab tu 'jug cing nan tan byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba nyid kyi bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung don

yod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog rab tu sgom pa nyid kyi phyir dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan

thos bdag nyid chen po rnams 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/ rtog pa'i rgyal bo 'di bsgrub par bya ste/ sngags kyi mthurab 'byamu dang ldan pa ras sikhrubo skrun lnga dang rtobaka'adu gnas / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las

'das pa thamasacad kyi sngags kyi cho ga dang/ rgyud thams cad du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lam ste/ mdoran 'dir rtog pa gzhan dugasungs pa'i las rnams kyis kyang ras ris kyi rgyal po 'di bsgrub par bya

sta myur du de rnams kyi sngags kyi dngos grub tu'agyur te/ gang ngas bstan pa de dag gdonami za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde sgod phal bo theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo lnga/
bcom ldan 'dasama' pagasal sgrol ma ral pa gyen badzes kyi rtsa ba'i chog las/ sa ris mchog gi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa rdzogs so// na sa/ de nas bcom la 'das
yi shAkya thub pas slar yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khochen po de la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po la bka' stsal pa/ sams dpa' chen po khyod kyi ras ris kyi cho gab ma'i las kyi cho ga'i sgrub
thabs khar ma yod do// de mdor bsdus bshad par bya yis/ legs par nyon la legs par yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dapar sams dang chen po spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bem ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par dgyes pa/ bdag cag 'khrug
brtse ba'i don dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la gzigs zhas/ gang de'i dus la bab par dgongs na de gsung du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'ches po
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ dang po'i 'ge tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ gtsang sbra'i kun tu spyod pa
dang nges par sdom pa dang/ bzlas pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ bsam gtan dang/ chog dang/ gadzadu rab tu gnas pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa sgrub pa'i las 'bras bu dang bcas shing
don med par mi 'gyur ba dang/ sngags thams cad kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de gang na/ dngas bdakyi/ sams dba' chen po nyon cig dang po de yi rig pa'i brtul zhugs
dang tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba dang po nyid du yang dag par blangs te// dngapo re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bar ba stan pa'idamatshig yang dag pa rardzasasu 'jug par bya'o//
khyod kyis rtog pa'i rgyal bogasungs ba/ sngar nges par bstan ba gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa dang ldan pa/ slob dpon dudabang bskur ba thob pa/ khyod kyis bstan pa'i cho
spyi ga shes pa/mkhas pa gsalab/chos dang ldan pa/ bdenapar smra ba/ spro ba chab/ byas pa gzo ba/ brtan pa/ sems bzang ba/ hatsang min tsong ha mi gzhon pa/ rnyed pa dang bkur ste thamasar

sbya la 'dod pa med pa/ tshangs par spyod pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ red patsam gyis sam/ las spyod kyi rgyuraram/ rjes suchags pa'i rgyur yang brdzun mi smran/ zhi tuchung du tsam nyid dang/ rnyedapa dang/ rmongs

pa'i rnam pa lta ci smos/ dam bcas pa brtan pa dang/ babyung po thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du snying brtse ba dang ldan pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ sngar spyad pa byas pa khyod kyi gsang ba'i rig pa dang

sngags rjes su zlos pa/ rig pa sngon dubasnyen pa byas pa/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jig rten shesal/ yang dag par rjes su 'dzin par byed pa// 'bras bu dang ldan zhing mkhas pa//

ts+tso legs pa la rab tu zhugs pa/ mi 'jigs shing mi gnod la/ chags pa med pa/ dpa' ba/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ nad mad pa ste/ nad gang gis lasasumi rung ba'i ngang tshul can dang/ rigs che zhing mtho

bar rab tu skyes pa zhes pa/ yon tan 'di rnams dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du 'gyur te/ sgrub pa po'ang de dang 'dra ba 'am/ yan lag cung zad ma rdzogs pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khoragyi slob
ma dbon lamachod pa byas nas 'di'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya sta/ slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dang sems dbang chen po'i rig pa dang/ sngags dang/ bcom ldan 'dasam de'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig
larjes su 'jug par 'atshalan/bdag cagal rdzas su brtse ba'i don dang/ ban pa thugs bskyed nas de slob dpon gyis gsung du gsol/ de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar bstan pa'i cho gas slob ma

ji lta ba bzhazhi rim gyis brtags nas gzhug parubya zhing/ sngarab zhin du mngon paradabang bskur ba byashes 'ge ba dang sngags byi'i la/ rig pa ji lta bar damatshig bstan par bya'o// gsang chen dang/ phyag rgya dang/
rgyud dang/ sngags dang/ las rnams kyang dus ring mnyidi nas yongs su brtags te bsam pa shes nas rgyud dang sngags la sogs pa dang/ las rnams thams cad bstan par bya'o// gzhan dum yazhino zhes
pa'i cho ga 'di rab bsgrags so// de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon la jiltar nus pas gang gis slob dpon dgyes pa 'am bdag nyid dang longs spyod kyang dbul bar bya'o/ des dkyil 'khor

gyi slob dpon des bu'i 'du shes te bar gzhag par bya'o// bu bzhin chu skyang bar bya'o// ma bzhin lengs spyod kyisanye bar bsdu bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po des rig pa dang sngags gang yang rung ba zhig bzung

nas mtha' gcig tu song ste/ sngar bstan pa'i gnas rgya cheragongam bzhin dusbyar bas ragi ba la sogs pa donams nyidakyis spyan drang ba dang/ gshigs su gsol ba dang/ mar tshe dang/ dri dang/ bdug pa dang//
ma @#/[…., ]/gtor ma dang/ lha bshos dag dkyil 'khor dugasungs pa'i cho gnyid kyis rgyas khabyas te spyan drangasazhas gdan phul te/ thun mtshams gsum du khrus gsum bya zhing/ gos lan/

gsum brjes te nyi ma so so la bzlas pa bya'o// de la thun mtshams kyi dus zhes bya ba'i mtshan mo'i mtha' nas brtsams te dzisAd rtel 'chab 'i dus tsamagyi bar 'di la dang por shad do// khyim gung ni khyim
shar ba'i mthadus tsam gyi tshadakyilatshams tima'i dkyil 'khor nas mkhal yang dag par brtan pa'i chog shes pas gung gi thun mtshams su shes par bya'o// nub pa'i dus su'ang lhag ma bzhi
tsama'i thun mtshams gsum par brjod par bya'o// slob dpon mkhas pa shes nyen// tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag ldan// chen po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang//kun nas brtson 'grus brtan
ni stags dang rgyud sogs yang dag ldan// bya ba kun lablo gros kyang// phra zhing mkhas latshod shes pa// chos kyi dbyingasani rtag tu 'dzin// sprob chazhing gzi brjid ldan// 'jig rten chos la ltos
pamed thub pa mchog gi chos la dad// 'jig rten pa rnams dor ba dag/ bzlas pa byas shing rnam dban shes// sngon du bsnyen pa rdzas brtan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gsangs sngags shes//
dolas gzhan pa'i rkyen rnams mthong// sangs rgyas kyis gsung gsang sngags dang/ 'jig rten pa'i rab sbyor shes// bsrung ba byas shamathubashal/ dgatshangasbra'i kun spyodal rtag dgag/sangs
wa rgyus ltar bstan 'am la// kun nas rjes su 'jug pa dang// rab bsngags rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// gsang sngagasazlos la rtag tu brtson// rtag tu mthong chos 'bras bu dang// 'jig rten pha
rol de bzhin nyid// sdig pa kun la 'jigs pa dang// phra mo tsam la'ang de bzhin no// gtsang zhing mkhas la le lo med// yid gzhungs pa ltar sdug pa dang// stobs bcu pas bshad sngags/
gang dang// de bzhin kho nar rgyal sras dang// 'jig rten pa yi sdugs gang nyid// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag la la// ded la rtag tu ngal bar byas// gzhung dang bstan bcosadon 'dzin ba// nad med
nus ba medamin pa/ rga dang nadani rnam par spangs// de bzhinashes nyatsan sngags grub// kun nas myur du byed pa dang// mtha' ra min zhing de bzhin du// ngargyal chung zhing zur gyis go/ tshangs par

spyodacing shes rab che// khyadapa dunashes ba dang// gcig tu 'du 'dzemad pa dang// dba' zhange dbang bskur thob pa dang// de 'dirabyang chub pha rol son// srid pa zhi bar byed la brtson// de bzhin nyid
durig sngags byas// mthu chen 'jig rtenashes pa dang// 'gro ba sems can rjes sams pa// dbu khanyid dang nirab tu ldan// sbyin dang 'byung po phan la dga'// de bzhin khyad 'phags slob dpon la//
rtag tugasol ba gdababar bya// des ni dkyil 'khor bris pa yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ster bar byed// nganyid kyis dbang bskur gyis// 'bras bu chen po sbyin par 'gyur// dngos grub 'dod pa'i slob mas
kyang thub pa bzhin du rtag tu mchod// de yi gsung mi 'gom pa// slob mas 'bad pas bya ba yi// jiltar 'byor cing bdog pa yi// longs spyod de la dbul bar bya// nyung du
tsamamatshamang yang rung// gangagasimanyes par 'gyur ba dang// lus 'tsho ba'i rgyu yi phyir// pha non star ba ltar// de bzhin slob ma chos shes pas// slob dpon la ni noradabul bya// mtha' yi dbang

phyug dngos grub thob// tshe dang de nga zhend med dang// rgyas ba'i 'gro 'thob par 'gyur// slob mas bla ma de mchod// de yis sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur// lam dang cho ba nyera mthong dang// bsnyen pa
las dang brtan pa las/ de bzhi'i mor byas chod las// sa ga rgyas thams cad dgyes bar 'gyur// de bzhi rgyal mchog sras rnams dang// lha rnams thams cad dgyes par 'gyur// bla ma rtag tu
bsnyen bkur na// blomasngags rnams mthong ba yi// 'di dag/khramA cad brtan par 'gyur// sgrub bos sngon dang thog mar ni// dmatshig la'i rjes 'jug bya// dman nam de dgamanyam yang rung// gal
tachos mchog gyur ba 'am// rmongs pa'i m lhag par khro ba yis// rtag du bla ma par sami bya// des kyang rgyud 'dir de lan man ngag rtag tu sbyin par bya// gang tshe sngags kyi dngos grub byin//
'disazhisar sna byas pa mazhi// sngarab stan slob ma de la// lus can zhan pa 'phel byed pa'i// mgan gang la yod gyur ba/ danyid slob ma nyid bya'o// slob dpon 'amani slob ma'i rgyur// ban

bas/ tshun rjes su 'jug byed pa// gang du zhen pa'i rgyun skyong ba// 'jam bo'i rgyun 'dzin pa ste// de la sngags ni sbyin bar bya// slob dpon de bzhin slob man// glo ba ma bla mar mthong ba la// rtag
tu spro bar 'gyur ba ma/ gnyis kas dngos grub yang dag 'byor/ de la rtag tu lam nyid dang// sngags kyi spyod pa rjes bstan bya// gnyis kas pha dang burashis pas// sdug sani 'bras
bcas rjes 'jug pa// brtan dang dga' ba de bzhin thob// rtag tu slobabs blaman/ rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// bun bdag nyid chen po rnams// sangs rgyas chos rgyun mi 'chad 'gyur/
mdamagonamed de rnams la// skadagasus pa'i sngagasa rnams sbya/ sems can bkren dngamanang la'ang// thams cad lane khyad bar du// sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'phags// bram mchog

dngabraram la// dus rnams kun tu bya ba'o// yongs su thob pa'i chos rnams la// rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur bya 'o// 'gro ba blo gros nges pa yi// 'dod pa rnams la'ang rab sbyin bya// de phyiraji ltar 'adod
ba'i sdugs// slobam nyid kyis blang bar bya// de nyid kyis ni bstan pas// lam nyid yin no gzhan du min// dngos grub 'dod pas gangad la// ba'i pha rolasong ba na// pa bzhin mgo bos phyag byas
ta[：]dogs ji ltar 'dod pa ra 'gro// nga nas 'dir ni gong na// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags bzlas// slong mo slong ba'i rjes 'jug cing// sgrub bcad de dus gsum bzlas// de ltar/
bstan pa nyid du 'gyur// ji ltar lam la rab 'jug pa// de tsho rnam 'gyur de gcod pa// khang stong dang dgon pa// ri bo che dang chu klung ngogs// gtsub dang ba lang

y+Ya gnas mtsho chen// rnam dban skya bo sbyangs pa bstan// lha khang dang ni shing drung dang// mtshan gcig ri mthon po dang// rgya mtsho cha 'gram nyams dga' dang// chu gling ngamani gling rnams dang/
rnam pa sna tshogs sngar bstan pa'i// yul rnams sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// 'di rnams la sa kyang phyogs gzhan du// mnyam par bzhi g pas sngags bzlas bya// grogs po mtshan nyid ldan pa'i//
sdugs don nges pa'i rtog ga ba// ltas kyi rnam pa de nyid shes// dpa' zhing g.yul las rnam la ba// snying stobs ldan zhing bzod pa can// dad dang tshul khrims phun tshogs ldan// rgyal bas gsungu
pa'i yul 'diran// ba bsngags mtshan nyid dang ldan nga// bzodadang ldan pa'i grogs po yis// 'bad pa med pa nyid kyis de// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tho rangasamal nas langs nas nii//

'bab chumatsho chen las byung ba'i// srog chags med rung dri ma med// chu nyid la khrus byas nas// sa dang ba byung ma yis// sngags shes lus ni dril phyis bu// nga nas sngags kyis sdu byas pa'i// chunying

du drimad la// zlos po brtson pas khrus bu 'o// hacang yun ring khrusam bya// de nas langs la lag pa dag/ sa dag gis kyang bakru bar[S]// bdun dang bdun dang yang lan bdun// ti shu rtsa gcig nye rag bya//yang

mtha0 der shing kun tu spyad// so sbyang sanasazhi dor bar bya// de nas skyob la phyag byas shing// 'jig rten mgon la phyag byas nas// sngags rig mchod pa yid 'ong bya// rnam pa sna tshogs bstod mchod kyis// yang

dang yang du yang dag bstod/ de bzhani dri zhimam tog gis// ston pa skyob la mchod yon dbul// sangs rgyas rnams la mgos phyag byas// detshe slobamar gyur pa rnams// 'jig rtenamagon po de rnams kyi// spyan
snga nyid du sdig pa bshags// bdag nyid dag kyang phul byas nas// sa sa spyan sngar 'khod par bya// ku sha'i khras la bar 'dug/ sngags rig gnyis ka 'dug nas ni// mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin te//

de ni bgranga'aphranganyid kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bzlas pa bya// detsho sngags gzhan mi bzlas sa// chog dman pa yang spang zhing// hacanga mchog kyang de pazhin no// ba'am bar ma'i las dag la// brtul
zhugs can dag sngags bzlas bya// ha cang mthon po spang bar bya// gal te tshogs dma' ba'ang min// bar ma bar ma'i las rnams la// rab tu bsngags par rgyal bas gsungs// ha cang mtho min dma' ba
min bar ma rtag tu bzlas pa bya// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// tshig ni dpal dang ldan par gsungs// gzhan gyi drung du mi bzlas shing// gzhan gyi las lam rtag tu gsang// bdag nyid
rig pa'i yul du bzlas// sngags ni bar mde bzhin du// bzlas pas rab tu 'byor par 'gyur// sngags don legs par thos pa 'ga'// dngos grub 'brang bo 'dod pa nyid// sngags dge bar bzlas
par da6 skye bo dang bral bar// sngags kyi de nyid don legasathos// tshogs dang bral zhing nas dben par// zlos ba pos ni sngags bzlas bya// mtshan mo yi ni ba'i chu dang/
de yi byed kyi phyed nyid kyi// sku rangs dmarapo'idus tsam ste// khyim 'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na// thun dang por de bzhin du// thub pa'i skyes mchog gis gsungs so// dus kyi tshadani bzhi yin
ta/ badzamar yongs su bsgrugs pa yin// de nas rim phyadanuban// sngags kyi bzlas pa de tsho btang// sngags zlos bor ba de yi tshe// mchod yon phunas gshegrasu gsol// brtul zhugs can
gyis rnam gzhan spang// datsha bor ba'i dus lhagan// thub pa'i bstan la dag tu bya// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// dam pa'i chos ni klog pa dang/ sa bsu pa yi glegs baman// mchod dang
klog pa rtag tu'o// de nas dus la bab gyur na// rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po dang// thub pa skyes mchog phyag byas nas// de nas 'tshob la 'gro zhing// de bzhin dus su spyod par ldan// dus su
za zhing dbang por thul// sgrub po chos dang ldan pa dang// sangs rgyas bstan la rab dad brtson// grong gzhan du mi 'jug pa na// mi smra gtsang sbra spyod la dga'// soms can rtag tu chos ldan pa'i//
ma khyim du bsod snyoms dag lo 'jug/ zlos po srog chagasamed pa'i chu// tshos par grub pa gtsang mar 'dod// yang dag ltab phun sum tshogs// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu dad// de lta'i khyim du/
mtha rtag tu ni// bsod snyoms don du slong mo bslang// dper na brtson pas gos bgos te// nyam nga'i g.yul du rab 'jug pa// rtag tu dgrani 'joms par byed// dgra rnams kyis gzhom mi nus
pa de bzhin sngags pa slong mos 'tsho// rtag tu grong du 'jug pa na// de bzhin chags par 'os pa yi// gzugs sgra mthong nas mi dge ba// 'dod chags zhi ba'i don gyi phyir// mi sdug dge ba bsgom
par bya lang tsho'i rnam pas brgyan pa ya/ budachad lus zhi mthong nas kyang// spyad cing rul ba'i lus rnams ni// srin bus zos shing dur khrod gnas// lus/mi rtag sdug bsngal lo// mi gtsang dri/
mi zhim par bsgom// gangal byis pa rmongs pa yi// 'gro ba lnga por 'gro zhing 'khor/ las kyi srad bus brgyus pa na// yun ring dus su mya ngan byed// mishes sgrib pas rmongs pa'i// dmus long
sdug bsngal rgyu can no/ gang du blo ni phyin ci log/ chags pas skye ba 'phongs par 'gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs las lam gyis// rnam pa dumarachags gyur pa// ming nas khyogs kyis 'gro pani//

'gro dang 'ong ba rgyudapar byed// rtag pa nyid phyir rjes chags pa// 'dzin pa'i kun tu sbyod pa spyod// gong du masacan gi dge 'ga'// lam du yun ring rgyu bar byed// thornyan khyadamo'i rnam pa bzhi// sring
pa'i mtsho chu 'byung ba rnams// 'gro ba de rnams mi bzad pa'i// sdug bsngal chu bos kun tu g.yongs/ dbazhi khud chod sdug bsngal gyi// rtsa ba 'ba' zhig 5tsi pa ru// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
dpa' dang/ de bzhin nyan thos rang rgyal dang// thub pa rnams kyis gsus pa yin// srid pa'i mtsho mi 'khrugs pa'i/ mtsho chen 'di dag bsam par daka'// bud med sam
kyis bslus pa yi// sems cakha nas gang bying ba de// myal ba dud 'gro'i 'jig rten dang// yi dgas 'jig rten lha ma yin// de bzhin mo yi 'jig rten nyid// lha yi 'gro bar 'gro bar bya// rtag tu kun nas
yongs su 'khor// bud med chags pas bslus pa ni// 'khoranga'i mtsho btson ra yi// 'dam rdzab chen por bying bar 'gyur// bud med chags pa'i blun po'i mi// ro la chags pa'i ri spyang bzhin// gang la
sems can rtag dga' ba// mi bzad sdug bsngal bzod par byed// dkarapo tshos las nges par nyams// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu la nas// srid pa'i mtsho yi sdug bsngal nyid// thams cad zlog pa

byed pa yin// sngags zlos pa la dga' zhing brtson// dbang cher grags shing yid dang ldan// gzi brjid ldan zhing sngags thub pa// de rnams la sdug bsngal mang// yang dag sdom dang tshangs bdon shes// bla
ma lha la mchod pa byed// ma dang pha la gus pa rnams// gsum po rnams la sdug bsngal med// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa dang// gzhan gyi don la rjes su bstan// bud med lus la 'byung po'i gzugs/
de bzhin 'bras dang zug rdu dang// blo ngan phung po'i lcags kyus zin// 'khor ba las ni mi 'da' bar// rtag tu bud med chags gyur pa// de la dngos grub yod pa mno// de la mchog 'gro yod ma yin/
'gro ba 'brong yang yod ma yin// das grub chung ngu'ang yod ma yin// 'dir ni zlos po khrims 'chal na// tshul khrims 'chal la thub dbang gis// sngags kyi dngos grub ma bstan no// mya ngan 'das
grong 'gro ba yi// lam pang gad cing phyogs dang bral// 'dir ni byis pa smad pa la// sngag grub pa ni ga la yod// skye bo tshul 'chal 'del// de la bde 'gro'ang yod ma yin// mtho ris rag nga/
yodag yin/ bdag nyid la gzhol ba'ang med// de bzhin rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags// grub par 'agyur ba smos ci dgos// ta la'ishing gi mgo bo ni// gang tshabacad na slar yang ni// sngon po/
nyid du mi 'gyur zhing// myu gu slar yang nam zhig 'gyur// de bzhin sngags grubarmongs pa ni// tshul khrims 'chal zhing sdug pa'i las// rtag tu slar yang bud med chags// mi dga'i grogs dang phrad/
pa la/ sngags kyi rgyal po ga la 'grub// de bas gang tshe zlos pa pos// bde bar gshegs pas spangs pa yi// bud med nyes pa rnams spyad de// gang gi dngos grub bsgrubabya ste// byis pa bud
mad la rmongs pa// gzhan gyis grub par ma bstan no// de nas dang por blo ldan pa// gtsang zhing 'du 'dzimad la dga'// rigs ldan brtan zhing dpa' ba dang// sems bzang ldan zhing mthong na dga'//
chos dang chos min rnam dpyod shes// de rnams grub pa red mi dga'// de ltar sngagasashes zhugs pa ni// grong du bsod snyoms phyir du 'jug/ jiltar 'dod pa bzhin song nas// sdug brtags
pa'i gnas dag tu// mkhas pas dag pa'i blos bzang ba// bza' ba phyogs su bzhag nas ni// phyi rol song nas rkang pa bkru// de nas slar yang gnas de ru// srog chags
y+Ya med pa'i chu rnams kyis// dang po 'dren pa nyid yin te// gnyis pa la ni lag g.yon gyi// kod pa man chad dril phyis bya// kun tu g.yas pa sur byin nas// lag pa sa yis bkru bar bya// sngar gzhag/
pa yi dag pa dang// gtsang ma rnams kyis bdun nyid du// bzapa'i ng dag chus gtsang sbyar byas// saraskya'i ba las byung ba yi// ba yi lci ba gsar pa dag/ gtsang zhing dri med sgod blangs la// srog
@# chagasazhed pa'i chus sbyar te// dang por ston pa thub pa yis// mchog la dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// khyad par khru gang tsam du 'o// gnyis pa rang sngags mgon po la// gsum pa rigs kyi lha mo la/
gang zhig sngags pa zlos pa po// slar yang rtag tu bya ba yin// bzhi pa sems can thams cad kyi// zhabar longs spyod don du grags// g.yas su 'jig rten mgon po yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rtag
tu dkon mchog gsum gyi ched dun// dkyil 'khor dan khru bzhi 'o// gnyis pa rang sangs rgyus rnams dang// gsum pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bdun po 'di dgazhi//
a kun nas gru bzhi pa ru 'o// khru gang ngamani khru phyed rung// nyin re'ang yang bya ba 'o// zlos pos do tsi sbas pa'i phyogs// sdig pa 'joms byed nyin re bzhani// de nas sngags pa thub pa langs/
lag gnyis khab dpas bkrus nas ni// gtsang ma'i chu yis nye reg bya// dag cing srog chags spangs pa yi// dri ma mad pa'i gtsang man// 'bad pas gtsang ma'i snod du byas// mtsho
dngan 'bab chu'am// chu mig chu bo la gnas pa// gtsang ma'i phyogs nas byung ba yi// sems can gtsug lag gis bcus// sngags pas slar yang nyareg bya/ gnyis sam gsum du rtag tu yang// de

nas kha la reg bya zhing// de bzhin nyid du rna ba'i rgyun// mig dang sna yi bu ga dang// spyi bo lta ba'i phyogs reg bya// dge ba spyod pas lan la 'am bdun// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// gtsang sbra'i spyod
pa phun sum tshogs// zlos pogatsangamar gyuranas ni// bsod snyoms snodani blangs nas su// chu yi gnas su 'gro bar bya// gang du chu bo rab gnas pa// de bzhin dma' bar gyur pa dang// chu klung rab
tu 'bab la sogs// rtag tu blangs pa bkru bar bya// slar yang de nas langs nas nii// gtsug lag khangangam gnas su 'gro// gang du sngon na yang dag bstan// gang du gnas pa der 'gro byu// son gnas /
zlos pos phyogs de ru// lhung bzedade ni gzhag par bya// de nas myur du rta rag bya// de bzhin slar yang lhung bzed blang// lhung bzed sa 'am lam 'am// dngul lam de bzhin gsar nyid dang// zangs sam
gange shun dag kyang rung// ston pa la ni lha bshos dbul// ston la lha bshos phul nas ni// slar yang rang rig sngags rgyal lo'o// 'gron po gcig n 'ongs gyur dang// sdug bsngal can la'ang cinus spyane
bshos nyid kyang ni thams cad du// kun nas nges par za' ba nyid// hacang mang po sprin mi bya// sngags shes 'di ni gdung mi bya// ku gnas rigs pa ldan par bya// lte ba'i tshad

tsam bzhu gnas ni// gzhan pa'i branani rtag tu'o// bkras dang skom pas nyen pa yis// sngags don sgrub par mi nus te// tacang mang dang nyung zos na// sngags don bstan pa mi nus so// de nyid phyir na rgyal
dbang gis// sems can zas kyi gnas so zhes// lus can kun la gsung pa yin// gang gis mi rnams 'tsho ba dang// khyu dang lhaman dri za dang// klu dang gnod sbyin ma 'am mu/ srin po pa dgas sha za
dang/ 'byung po skar ma gza' dam ga ni// gang zhig zas la mi ltos pa// de'i 'ga' yang yod ma yin// rtag tu khazas rags pa ni// kham gyi zas zhes grags pa 'o// sems can phra mo'i zas can
yang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs ba ni// bsam gtan zas can rtag par ni// gzugs ma spyod cing g.yo ba ste// gzugs med nyid kyi lha rnams kyang// ting 'dzin 'bras bu snga ba 'o// srid pa/
bar ma'i sems can yang// dri za bar na rab tu grags// de bzhin 'dod khams sems na rnams// zas ni rnam pa sna tshogs za// 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi// kham gyi zas za bar byed de nyid
phyin thub dbang gis// sems can zas kyis gnas pa zhes// chos kyi rgyu ru bstan pa yin// gang de rnams ni rab tu grags// zlos po rtag tu brtson pa'i// zas kyi tshon rig par du/ gang phyir rig
wa05 pa bstan pa ni// sa 'di la rab tu gnas// kun sbyodam nor dag pa dang// dge zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang// zas kyi tshod kyang shes pa la// de yi dngos grub nad mi dka'/dpan khur ni drang
ba'i rgyur// shing rta yun rings gnas don du// shing rta'i na gzhi sku bar byed// de bzhin lcags pa sngags rig pas// zasazhi gnas pa'i ched du spyad// lus ni gso ba'i don du ni// zlos pos rtag tu
gso bar bya// sngagasams sgrub pa'i don phyir dang// byang chub tshogs kyi rgyu yi phyir// mi yi 'jig rten rdzas gzung rgyur// de bzhin rtag tusngags bzlas bya// de nyid phyir na thub pa'i gtsos//
brtson 'grus chen ngos 'digasungs so// mtshan ni 'od srungs zhes bya bas// sngonani de tshos stangs der// sgrol ma'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i// 'byung po rnams la legs don du// sngagasazhi/
rab tu gsungs pa yin// sdug bsngal gyur pa'i 'jig rten kun// dbul zhing skyo la sha thang pa// mchog tu nyon mongs gyur pa rnams// 'di rnams don du gsungs pa yin// 'byung po/
rnams la legs pa nyid// slar yang kun tu brtan pa rnams// 'byung po kun gyi zas don du// gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsungs// nga yis gsang sngags 'di brjod kyi// byung sems la brtson tha
cad dang// nyan thos rnams mnyan par gyis// nad kyis zin pa 'joms byed cing// bkros pa'i nad kyis gatha'i ba dang// gang yang sems can skom pa dang// sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ngen dang// 'byor pa
'dod rnams mnyan par gyis// 'od srungs 'od ni chen po pa// thub pa'i gtso bos de skad gsungs// nyan kros rnams zhi yang mgu nas// khyab ngangag de la gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi
rgyal po thub pa che// chos mkhyen gsang sngags bshad du gsol// dam tshiga mchog lanyir gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la rjes brtsar mdzod// de skad gsol nas thub pa yis// sngags mchog

rgyas par gsung bar byed// ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs dang// rnga bo che drang sprin gyi sgra// tshangs dbyangs brtson 'grusachen po dang// tshangs pa'i sras gang rgyal mchog gis// gang yang nyung zang 'dir 'ongs/
ba nga med pa dang rkang mangs dang// rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun nyeg cige/ mdor na sems can kun don du// bad 'byung sngagasani bshad par bya//'das dang
ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// sems can la sogs bdir lhags pa// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// khyorang 'dod pa rnams nyon cig/ ra mas ran+ta bud+d+hanaM/a pa ti ha ta shAs hU~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga ga ne/

ga ga na gan+d+ho/ A nAyA/ sarba lasu la hu/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra/ A karANaM/ mA Ti lam+b+ha/ ya the pU dza ma su pA dA ya sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis de skad ces gsungs nas// cung mi gsung bar
gyur to// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis rig pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rgyu charagasungs pa'i bar skabs 'dir// nam mkha' thams cad chen po 'a 'os pa'i bras kyi

sngon gyis yongs su gang bar snang bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha'i mthil thams cad zas kyi sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs par snang ba'agyurato// bsam pa ji lta ba

bzhin du mngon par 'dod pa'i zas thams nyidadang/ ji ltar mngon pa'i sred pa'i bza' ba de do rnams su char 'bab par gyur to// ji ltar mngon par sred pa'i bza' ba de rnams kyi zas kyi bya ba bkris pa'i sdug bsngal zhi ba'i don

dang skom ba rnams kyi btung ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chubo'i rgyan lta bu batung bar byab khong yade la 'dod pa bzhin du der bab par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la bkris pa'i nad thams cad rab tu

zhi bdang/ skom pa thams cad bsal bar byas par gyur to// thamos tshad dang ldan pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang ngomatshar thob cing tshim pa thob nas/ bcom ldan bdas kyis gsus pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes
su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la yongs su bzhugs so// bcom

ldan 'das shAkya thubapa ngas kyang de ba tsho gsungs pa la mngon par N+Das suyi rangango// rtog pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di la sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang// bkres pa dang skom pa bsal ba'i don gyi phyir dang/

khyad par du sngags zlos pa po thams cad kyi phyir ro// dang bo re zhig zlos pa pos sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// gal tangasodasnyom la 'gro bar mi spron/ ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs pas 'bum phrag bdun bzlas par bya/

btsal rgyu/ de nas nga kar gsum bza' ba bam/ khom btung ba'o// ri'i rtse gro de nyid du kho pags ma sgrol ma'i las ras pa'i m sngar bzhin du bzhag na sa mchod pa chen po byas te/ gtor ma dang lha bshos

chesargya chen po byas nas// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas 'od srungs kyis gsungs pa'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis seng ldeng gi yamangashing rnams kyis sngaras// u dum ba ra'i yam shing 'a zhong sbrang

rtsi ngang maral btags pa rgyan dang bcas pa 'am/ dpal 'bras kyi yamangashing yang rung ste stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tsha nanag po chen po dang nang gi dkyil 'kho
khongapar 'gyur te/ 'jigs pa mi bya/ langs nas bgro bar yang mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phagasam sgrol ma'i snying pos bdag de bsrung bar bya zhing/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang grogs rnams

kyang sngar bzhin bsrung bar bya'o// de nas rlung nag po'i dkyil 'khor mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyang rgyun thamasad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od kyi 'phreng ba dang pas phyogs rnams kyang kun tu snang bar
byed bzhin pa sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dug sta/ kyakyasam nan po longs shig/ grub pa yin zhes so// de nas sgrub pa bos snyam 'i me tog dang bsres pa'i dri chus mchod yon dngul 'go/ de nas de nyid mi

snang bar 'gyur ro// nyim de nas bag 'di dam 'di'i grogs po ti gu rtsa lnga la deng nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod ba'i bzang bo rnams rab tu ra bar byed do// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yo byad rnams kyang kun tu phyin par
byed do/ de nas sgrub pa pos mchod yon lulazhas shegs su gsol bar tu'o// ras sa laskor ba lan gsum byas nas ras si blangs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dang bzams cad la phyag byas zhas/
denas 'go 'am mi med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o// der bdag nyid dam grogs pos phyag bdar byas nas dgram par bya ba rnams bkum la/ gnas der nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i las mas

bya'o/ de nas sgrub pa khos sngar bzhin du bsha'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ ras sa bar ma sngar bzhin du bzhugs su gsol nas seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la thun gsum du pad+ma dkar po'i ma tog zho dang/ sbrang rtsi
dang mar la btogs pa rnams kyis ma rtsa gcig tu rtsa ba'i rig pa 'am/ sAng po 'am/ nyiba'i snying pos las chen po thams cad kyi chadadu 'am/ yi ge ga tsag pa ched du stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg

bya'o danas mtshan phyed kyi dus kyi tshe sbyin sreg gi mthar bcom ldan 'dasam sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ 'dod ba'i mchog gnang bar byed do// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/

byang chub sams dpa'is bam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ nyan thos nyid dam/ mngon par shes pa lnga nyid dam/tsho ring ba nyid dam/rgyal srachen po dang lo skyod chen po tokyi chab dams/ rgyal po chen po mnyes pa[”]da dam/ 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rjes su rnam par spyod pa nyid dam/ mdor na yade la 'dod pa de thams cad gnang bar byed do// gang bas kyang rung ste/ de mthun par gnang bar byed cing grub pa'i rdzas
@#// rnams thams cad kyang thob bo// samasacan chen bo rnams 'gugs par byed pa 'am/mdor na ji lta ji ltar zhus pa de thams cad mdzad do// las kyi nyes pa rab tu sngags pa'i ng
yang dag par sbyong bar byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas gsungs so// las kyi cho ga gzhan pa bar ma'i sgrub thabs su 'gyur ba ni/ dang por zhig khyad par gyi gnas sam/ gtsang ma'i phyogs

sam/ chu klungangs/ ru gling gi 'gram du sngar bzhin du thams cad byas nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par gzhag la/ bdag nyid kha shar du phyogs par gnas nias kung 'a'i khres la nye bar 'dug ste/ rgyas

par go bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/ thun gsum du bum phrag drug bzlas par bya'o// bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ dang ka'i me tog tsan dan dkar po dang bsres pa 'am// gur kum dang bsres pas snga ma de bzhin

N+NaM kho nar ma spar nas stong phrag brgyud sbyin srag bya'o// sbyin sreg gi mthar sa raMs 'gulan blon po nyid do// ras ris la 'od kyi snang ba byung na bod las rgyal srid do// ras ris kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrug

na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs kyirgyal srid do// ngas dzas la ma byug sumacu rtsa gsum gyi dbang phyug nyid de brgya bya nyid do// ras so chos ston par byed pa byung na byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi dbang phyug

nyid do ras ris kyi phyag spyi bor rig na mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ sa bdun rjes su thob pa dang/ stobs bcu nges pa nyid rim gyis thob par byed pa nyid do// de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs

kyis gsungs pa'i sngags bsgrub tu bkres pa dang skom pa phyir gzhil ba'i bon rjes su thob pa de nyid kyis dang/ cho ga de nyid kyi yo byad kyis rig pa'i spyod pa'i don sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i chos la
yang dag par nan tan bya'i/ gzhan du grub par mi 'gyura'o// de ltar lam gyis sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su 'jug cing mdor na nan tan gyis nges bar sgrub bar byed de/ rdzas dang/ sman dang/ sokhyad
kyi khyad par dang/ nor bu rin po che rnams jiltar sngaranges par bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed do// sngags shes sngags ni zlos pa po'ang// chog bde ba la sems nga// sngags pa de tsho phyogs su//

gtsang ma'i 'gro bas zas kyang ni// zos nas yid ni dga' ba dang// dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa dang// lhung bzed lhag ma rtag blangs te// sems bzangachu bo gtsang mar 'gro// mtha' gcig tun bor nas ni//
brtul zhugs can gyis dud 'gro spyani// dud 'gro rnams la 'thunabyin nas// 'bad pas lhung bzed bkru bar byed// lhag ma lhung bzed bya ba na// snum med zas dang dri bral gang// lhung bzed lhagamar thub
pas gsungs// bod du slong ba'i snod du ni// de ru zagazhim bza' ste// de ni bza' ba 'bras bu dang// rdzasa rnams rtag tu bzami bya// pad 'dab kyis kyang ma yin te// ut+pa lalas byung
bas sam// dri bzang ldan rnams spangs pa ste// sngags pas de ni mibaza' 'o// gang yang sngags bas kuzhud// pa u dum ba ra las byung// ba Ta'i 'dab ma dang yang 'i tsher ma'i yal ga ri
khrod byung// Amra'i dbam ruyang mne// de bzhin pa Ta la las byung// sA la'i 'dab ma shi ri// byang chub shing las byung ba dang// gang du bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni//
shAkya seng ge bzhugs pa yi/shing de 'bad pas spang bar bya// gang de yin yal ga dang// na ga ge sar shing la'ang min// gang du nam yang bza' mi bya// mkhas pas de kun rus kyang spang//
thub pa'i lo ma'i spyil pon// rmongs pas nam yang 'gomami bya// sngags pa dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// zasani lem de rnams las// gzhan pa'i lam rnams su bza'// sa byung zas su
ngos bstan dang/ de bzhin gser dang dngul las byung// shel dang rdo ba las byung ba// da ba'i bza' ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu sngags pas der mi bzag/ lema'i rgyab tu me bza' ste// de bzhin
lag pa'i mthil du'ang min// stobs bcu pa yi sras rnams dang// rang rgyal bas ru lta bu gang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i nyan thos gtso// lam gzhan dang lha bshos 'byung// zlos pos de rnams
spang bar bya// yi ge rkang pas kyang mi 'gom// sna tshogs bza' ba snum 'khur dang// de bzhin btung drang bza' ba rnams// sngags pas 'bad pas blang bar bya// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchog rnam
dang [：]re bzhin nyan thos skyes bu mchog/ dkon mchog gsum la phul ba yi// lha bshos thams cad nyid kyang// zlos pos rtag tu spang bar bya// chung ngu tsam yang lus can la// sngags rnams
sa de yis mi 'grub ste// kun nas bkra shis thams cad dang// rtag tu dbal ni smos ci dgos// rgyas pa can dang ga ba can// lha bshos gtor m za byed pa// de ched yi kun mi 'grub// gtsang zhing
mkhas la tshul khrims ldan// snying rje snying rje'i las can dang// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa la dga' ba// rig sngags kun tu sgrub par byed// samasacan gzhan la byin pa'i zas// zlos pos de ni
bza' mi bya// gzhan gyis rab tu ma brtags pa'i// zas gzhan bza' bar mi bya'o// rang la byan pa'i kha zasani// cung zad tsam yang byang bar bya// sdugs shes de ltar 'jug pa// de yi dngos
grub sdig nga bo dgra// yongs su rdzogs par byed par gnas// zlos ngo sa chog 'di yisan// bzab len pa'ibartulazhugs can// thub pa rnams kyis legs par bsngags// sngags rnams thams
cad sgrub pa la// mdor na chog mthong ba yiso// bza' ba kun dang lasa rnams la'o/ de nas gzhan yang rab 'chad byed// sngags thems cad sbyong bar byed// de nas zlos bos te rag bya// de tshe sngags ni
brjod par bya// detsho sngags ngas lan bdun du// lus sbyong byed pa bzlas byas nas// 'byung po'i tshogs dang lha rnams 'dir// de don rgyas pa mnyan par gyis// lus kun nyareg byas nas su// thub pas

sngags 'di brjod par bya// nam sarba bud+d+hanaM/ A pra ti ha tagasanAnaM/ ta wA/ oM sarba kiwA Na/ nAshani/ nAshaya/ sarba duphra yut+taM/ sam ya ma nu sma ra hU~Mdza/ sAhA/ sngags 'dis bslangs nga 'i
zas gzhan gang yang rung ba yongs su spyod pa na sngags lan bdun mngon par bsngags ba byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// zos nas snga ma bzhin du nye reg byas te spyi bo la
sogs pa lus thams cad du phyugs nas de nas ngal bso bar bya// ngal sos nas yud tsam phyad dam thun gcig pa'o// de nas ras bse dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/ dam
pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'phags pa sa bcu pa dang/ 'phags pa gsar 'od dam pa dang/

'phags pa rma bya chen mo dang/ 'phags pa rin po che tog gi gzungs te/ 'di rnams las gzhan dang gzhan gang yang rung ba bklag par bya'o// nyima'i dus kyi tshad bzhi cha tsam du'o// danas yongs su zhi nas ji

ltar 'dod pa bzhin duklag par bya ste/ glegs bam brtulangs gos gtsang ma bgos te dam pa'i chos la phyag byas nas/ de nas khrus kyi ched du chu klung gi 'gram mam mchodran chan por 'jug pas song nas// srog

chags med pa'i sa blangs te lan bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas rig pa 'dis chu la gdab bo// gang zhe na/ na mas man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ o tha duShA su myu ya hU~M/ na de ba ra d+hA

tshulta ra Na/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra phaT baT swAhA/ 'dis bsang ba byas nas phyogs rnams bcing pa dang/ grogs rnams dang/ dkyil 'khorobatang ba dang/ kha bcing ba dang/ gdug pa dang/ rab du gdug pa rnams
thams cad dang/ las thams cad 'gugs par byed pa dang/ bgags bcing ba la'ang srad bu la lan bdun bzlas nas skad pa'i phyogs su bcings pas thams tshud du yongs su chags pa dang/ bzlas
ba'i dus thams cad dang/ khrus kyi dus thams cad dang/ gdug pa'i bgegs rnam par gzhom pa dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i don du sngags 'di stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad byed do//

pad+ma'i gdan la phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// las rnams thamAr du thams cad byed kyi/ rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// donas sgrub pa pos sa las byung ba'i phyi ma la sogs pa rnams byas
nas dziltar bde bar khrus bya zhing srog chags bod pa'i chus khrus byas te/ thams cad du las thams cad la sogs chags med pa nyid kyis bya'o// de nas khrus byas nas sa'i rang ngazhan nam/ gzhan dri

zhim po dang ldan pa'i dro dong yo byad kyi khyad par gyis rjes su byug par bya'o// tshu'inang du mchil ma dang/ bshang ba dang/ gnyib la sogs pa'i ng dor bar mi bya'o// rtsa bar yang mi bya'o// snying rje dang ldan

pas bdag dang sems can thams cad la so sor brtag par bya ste/bdag med pa dang/ stongal dang/ sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang/ sdug bsngal nye bar 'gags pa dang/ tshor bsa mngon par non pa dang/ chu rlabs
bzhin du mngon par 'byung ba'i rab tu sbyor ba'i sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'di ltar sgrub pa dang bral ba sngags shes pas gang de bzhin du dug dang/ gcod pa dang/ ltung ba dang/
rnamapa 'khor ba dang rnam pa 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags bsngal gyi phung po nye bar 'gag par bya bzhin pa/ 'khor ba'i mtsho thibs po gnas pa'i bdag nyid du mthong zhinga gnas
pad pa dang/ skyob pa med pa dang/ skyabs med pa dang/ shin tu dam pa'i yid can gyi bdag nyid dubartags nas sgom pa po mgrin pa nub tsam gyi rgyun gnas pa lam/ lte ba tsam du gnas pa'i chu

nyid kyi nang du sems rtse gcig tu 'o bar gzung bar bya'o// dang po re zhage pad+ma chen po'i 'dab ma la me tog chen po dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i lo mas nye bar mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che po

nyurla'i rang bzhin las byung ba'i sdong bu dang/ rin po che ma da ka las grub pa'i pad+ma'i ge sar dang/ shel las byas pa 'dab ma stong legs pa'i kha phye ba dang/ de'i rjes su skyes pa'i shel dang pad+ma

ga'i me tog rnams kyis mdzes pa'o// de'i steng du seng ge 'i khri rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa// rin po du mas nyab mdzes pa ras bcos bu zung gis bkab pa'o// de'i steng du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya ste/ chos ston par mdzad cing bzhugs pa// gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i 'phrengabs khyab pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa tshad chen po nam
mkha' lta bu mchog tu bris bzhin pa/ skyale mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ pad+ma chen po'i gdan
la bzhugs pa/ rnga yab bsnyams pa/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i sprin 'khod de/ lus dmar ser gung kum btags pa'i kha dog lta bu 'o// g.yon du 'phags pa mthu chen po thob ston ka'i
sngan ltar dkar ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' brgyud la/ 'phags pa byams pa dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha'i mdzod dang/ sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par sa la ba dang/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang/ 'phags pa phyagan rdo dzad ng/ nor bzang zhes pa byang chub sems dpa' bcu po 'di rnams kyi g.yas su rang sangs rgyas brgyud bsam par bya

ste/ tsan dan dang/ spos ngad ldan dang/ tog dang/ tog dkar dang// 'dod pa dang/ nyaba'i 'dod pa dang/ mu khyud dang/ mu khyud brgyad do/de nyid du nyan thos chen po brgyad gnas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa mo'u
'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang/ ba lang bdag dang/ b+ha ra d+hAdza bsod snyoms len dang/ pa len da'i bu dang/ 'phags pa sgra gcan zin dang/ 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po dang/
'phags pa kun dga' bo zhes pa'i nyon thos chen po de rnams dang nye bar dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar rang sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa bsgom
bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po rnams kyi gnas su'ang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mtha' yas pa bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du kun nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdag nyid kyang lte ba tsam gyi chu la gnas bzhin du lha dang mi'i to pa sna tshogs pa la

ma tog maN+Da ra ba dang/ man+da ra ba chen po dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ ng+hanu sku ri ka dang/ bArI ka dang/ iN+Da ba ra'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa tshad chen po phung po chen por gnas pa'i rab
tsam gyi me tog gi phur mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya zhing/ 'gas pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams la phyi ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs

dang rgyal mchog dang/ ba dan rnams dang/ lha dang mi'i mar ma mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de bzhin du gtor ma dang bdug ba dang/ lha bshos
dang mchod pa dang/ bstan bkur la sogs pa yo byad lha dang mi'i nyer mkho rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das pashAkya thub pa'i smagamachoms kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer mngon par 'phrala'i
pas bdag nyid dang phyogs thams cad kyang kun tu snang bzhin par bsgom par bya'o// sgom pa po bsam gtan la zhugs ma thag tu/ tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi 'brasabu thob bo// nges bar byang chub 'a
mchog tu gzhol bar gyur ro// de lta bu sogs bsam gtan rnams// 'jig rten skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// 'byung po kun kyang legs pa dang// sngags pa rnams la phan don pa//
sam/ de tsho bsam gtan dang po'i gtso// sngags ba kun la phan don du// sems can rnams kyi phyir gsungs so// de nas thub mchog bdun pa yi// dkyil 'khor rnam par brjod par bya// thub pas dang bor
gsungs pa yin// gnyis pa yi'i dkyil 'khor dang// gsum par yang de las gzhan// dang khor mchog gi dngos grub ste// bar ma lag de bzhin gzhan// chudadu la shi phran tsheg 'grub// thub pa
mchog gis nges par gsungs// de bzhin sa ris bsam gtan ni// thu bo bar ma chung dus// thamasacad sdug ba 'jig byed pa'o// de las gzhan yang mkhas pas ni// bsam gtan rnam pa rab bsgrub bya//
bsam gtan de la rab gnas ni// sngags rnams de la bgrub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa 'o chog bshad// zlos pos bsam gtan bsgomasanas// sngags kyi mchod yon dar phul nas// ji ltar bde bar
gshegs su gsol// chu tshogs de las bsgral nas ni// de nas ji ltar bde bar 'gro// gnas sngon du ngas bstan par// cho ga mthong bas legs zhi bar// de tshe sngags pas gsang sngags bzlas// sdur
las jiltar brjod pa bzhin// rang gi lha spyan drangs pa// de ni sngags kyis gshegs su gsol// de nas bdag nyid de bzhin nyid// grogs po rnams ni bsrungs byas nas// dge ba'i las kyis de nyid shes//

cho ga'i las la dga' zhing 'dud// rnam pa sna tshog sabastodamachod kyis// gang zag mchog la kun bstod nas// rang sngags sngags kyis ma'o/na po dang// nyan thos rang rgyal bas ru dang// byang chub sems
[©]// dab gsems dpa' che// 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin bzod// de nas gsang sngags zlos pa go/ stan de la ni slar las nas// thag ring gnas su song nas// phyi rol rlung gi
ma par spangs// snabs dngamachil ma rnam par dor// bgong dang gci ba dang de bzhin no// nyin bar byang du kha phyogs shing// mtshan mo lhoru kha blta'o// sngags zlos posani nag yang der// don rnams/
bsam bar mi bya'o// de ring las byed gsungs pa// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya'o// rab bsngags 'gro ba mtshan sogs kyi// dngos stong nyer 'dug ste// dab pa'i tshuyis nyeg bya// gtsang ma'i gos/
mtha'achur gzhug bya// sa yi phung po bdun nyid kyis// 'bad pas rkang pa bkrus byas nas// rab tu 'phrog pa bdun zlangs nas// bshangab 'jug la sumachu ste// gnyis kher tha' la lag pa dag dmachis
mdor ba nyid dngani// sbubs la'ang gnyis te de bzhin no// de nas 'bad pas nye rag bya// gnas las ring du song ba'i sar// de bzha'i sgra tsam son gnas agi/ lam la sogs pa spangs pa ru// de nas

gzhan gyis ci bdod pa ni// lho phyogs mtha' yi phyi rol tu// chu dang g.yang samad pa dang// de bzhin khrims khyab pa dang// chu klung sbangs shing rtogs kyang sbyangs// 'bad pas mi gtsang chu sbas par/
bsang gi shin tuphyungs pa dang// bsamatha' ljongasazhi sbas pa dang// rnam par dben ba'i sar song nas// sngags pas mi gtsang dor bar bya// zlas po dus shes byas nas// ji ltar 'dod pa shugs
dgagamig/ de nas dag pa'i phyogs song ste// bsam mthar de bzhin bshang ba dang// gci ba'i bya ba byas nas// darulus s ci bde bar// gnyis ka'am gsang g.yogs smras pa dang// skye bamed
pa'is gzhil// mi skya reg pa spangs nas ni// rtag dugacib bya ba yin// lus la lhag gnas bshang ba dang// gartul zhugs can rtag gtsang sbra bya// rogazha gzhon sha can rnams 'dod// srog chags
sbyangs pa'i sa rnams zhi// gsum po de bzhin blangs nasazhi// rtag pa kho nar bshing 'am la'o// de bzhin gnyis ka'i mthar lag pa// sngags pas rtag tu sa dgage/ sngar bstan pa dag blangs nas/

zlos pos rtag turkang nyidi// g.yas dang de las gzhan pa'i// phan tshun nyid du kun bzhag nas// 'bad pas rkang pa bkru bar bya// rgya cher sngarani brjod pa bzhin// sngags zlos po yi gtsang sbra yang/
dri med pa'i gtsang sbra ste// rtag tu thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// 'di dag mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// rgyud rnams kun tu mthong ngo zhes// mnga' bdag thub pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas zlos pos nye
rig bya// sdom brtson dngos grub las la dgag/ sdur brjod pa yi cho ga yis// yid kyisenang gi dag pa yin// gtsang sbra rnam pa ru brjod// sngags pas sngags rnams thams cad du// lus kyi
gtsang sbra de bzhin du/ ngag yid kho nar rab tu bsgrags// bzhi pa bden pa'i sa gtsang spru sto/ mun lnga par brjod par@// bden pa'i chos zhi khrob thul// rgyud shes bstan bcos mthong
ba dang// phra mo'i de nyid don la mkhas// sngags shes las la grags pa dang// rgyu yisanang la mkhas pa ste// de la dngos grub da mi dka'// bden pa'i chos rnams spangs ba'i//
brdzun pa'i tshig ni mi bya// bden pazams chung mas sbas pa'i// marus rab tu ma rungs te// rnam par sdang dang 'khrug bcas dang// gtsubanying gnadazhi 'gams pa dang// bden pa'i chos rnam
paranyams// sems can gzhan la gdung bar byed// phram nyon mongs can sems dang// chos rnams thams cad spangs pa dang// de bzhin 'tshaba'i bdag nyid can// rtag tukhrims 'chal chos min spyod//

'a sngags zlos pa yis spang bar bya// de ba de nyid du grong gi chos// khro ba brnabasams 'byung ba yi// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa rnams// blo ldan rang rgyal bse ru dang// slar yang rtag tu nyan thos dang/

sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis smad// de bzhin rtag turdzun smra ba// 'jig rtan dngos grub 'dod don gnyer// sa stes rdzun smra nye bar smra// mi bzad domyal ba chen por ltung// sngon gyi nges pa las de bzhin/

dgab bas gzhan rje'i 'jig rten du// rtag tu slar yang der 'das so// rtag tu rdzun smras nyer 'tsho ba// mi bzad ngan 'gror ltung bar 'gyur// thig nag rab tu tsha ba dang// yang sos ral gri lo ma dang//
de bzhin shal ma li yi nags// der ni bskal pa mang por gnas// rdzun du smra ba'i skya bo'i// gsang sngags log par smra ba dang// rmongs pas log par brjod pa yis// 'byung po rnams la slu byed pa// del

bal la grub pa ga la yod// de phyir rmos pa las 'di yi// sngags kyi dngos grub ma mthong nas// sngags pa'i dngos grub med de zhes// 'di skad du ni tshig smra ba// gang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa'i// sa stengs 'dir
ni rab spangs pa// bskal pa bye ba mang po yis// de yis grub par ga la 'gyur// de phyir 'di mi bzad pa'i// 'jigs chen mnar mad 'tshadapar 'gyur// yang sos dang ni thig nag dang// rab tutsha ba'i
ngamyul ba ni// der ni bskal pa chen por gnas// dam chos snang ba bral ba'i phyir// dmyal ba mi bzad mun pa ru// byis pa'i skya bo 'tshad par byed// dam pa'i chos la banas pa dang// mi shes mun pas

bsgrubs pa ste// yegs byis pa'i ngo bo 'am// rmongs pa log pa'i nga rgyal can// rig pa'i rgyal bo bas byed pa// mi khazad ngastsal bltung bar 'gyur// de phyir sdug pa ma bya zhing// log par sla ba'ang
smad ba yin// dam pa'i chos la zams pa dang// log par blta ba spyad pa na// de phyir rtag tu du gyur nas// gsang sngags cho ga rtag tu bstan// bden par s zhu chos gs pa// sems can rnams la ga
tu phan// sngags shas sngags ni ston par byed// de yis dngos grub nges par 'gyur// mchog dang 'bring dang zam yi// las rnam pa sna tshogs byed// las rnams bya ba masakyis byed// rtag tu ngan pa'i

bya ba yis// bya ba'i las dang yang dag ldan// de la rtag tu grub par 'gyur// bya ba'i don dang don kun phyir// las don rtag tu bya ba go/ bya ba'i don du bya gzhi gang// bya ba las la sbyar bar bya// 'bras bcas
nyid kyi bya don gyi// bya ba nyid ni rtag tu bya// bya ba las dang 'bras bu nyid// bya ba las 'bras rtag tu kho// 'bras med 'bras bu nyid bgyu zhing// 'bras bu nyid kyang rtag tu 'bras

'brasamad 'bras bu bcas pa nyid// thams cad nyid kyang 'bras bur bcas// rnal 'byor sngagasazhi bsgrub bya ste// yang dag sbyor dang bral ba yang// bral dang yang dag ldan sgrub po// bsgrub bya sgrub byed mod
bar ni// de la grub pa yodam yin// grub pa'i rdzasazhi khrams cad kyang// grub pa'i rgyudang 'gal ba yin// sngags kyi dngos grub ma grub pa// sngags sgrub par byed pa'irgyu// khyod par 'dod pa de las

ta 'dod pa'i lasazhi bya bar 'gyur// lasain lasani thams cad la// las kyi rgyudazhim bya 'o// sngags dang rgyud kyi don ldan pa'i// las ni mtha' dag brtsamo par bya// brtsams dang rtsom pas 'dud pa yi//

b+ha las nyid brtsam par mi bya'o// bya ba ma brtsams grags rnams ni// lus can kun la bgrub 'gyur// sems can kun rjes sbyong ba yis// thub pa'i gtso bos sngon gsungs pa// gsang sngags smra bas bstan pa

yi[：]rgyal ba'i sras kyis yang dag sdom// sgrub po sngags ni kun shes shing// rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di la tshag/ sngags kyi tshul gyis bstan ba yin// lam ni byang chub rgyur gyur pa// sngags kun nyir ni
sgrub par byed// rig pa mnyam par 'gyur ba yine// den rong po mi thogs par// mkhas pas dngos grub 'gyur ba yin// 'byung bo thams cad zhi don du// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bsgrags//
gsang sngags skul gyi lam 'dis// mya ngan 'das grong 'gro ba yin// de bzhin rtag tu byang chub lam// chos don thams cad rdzogs par byed// de yi mthar thug dpung gnyen ni// dang po'i gnas ni
sangs rgyas nyid// de bzhin 'dir ni lhun grub tu// 'bras bur bcas pa'i dngos grub thob// sna tshogs las dang chos shes pa// sngags rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin// tshul khrims bsam gtan
rnam thar rnams// 'di rnams mdor bsdus thob pa yi// dngos grub don kun sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba gtso bos gsungs pa yin// gang zagarkang pa'i don thob pa// dam pa'i 'gro bar gnas pa dang
de bzhin rtag tu gnod sbyin gtso// thams rgyal srid rgyu yin te// lha min lha yi 'jig rten gyi// de bzhin de rnams bdag po ni// sngags pas thams cad thob par 'gyur// bya ba 'bras bcas byed par 'gyur/
gtsang sbra'i kun spyod yang dag ldan// tshul khrims bsaMm gtan rtag tu dga'// sngags rnams kun tu gsungs pa yi// donas sngags pas sngags bzlas bya// sngags pa 'byor la 'dod pa yis//
rnam pa sna tshogs las byas te// de bzhin mchog dang bar ma dang// tham nyid kyang bya ba yin// thams longs spyod 'phal ba ste// bar mas gong ma'i lus can nyid// mchog nyid kyis ni ldang ba
nyid[：]zlom bos rtag tu thob par byed// sngags pas bzlasa mthar ngal bso zhing// ji srid dus su brtag par bya// bzlas pa'i dus la bab pa na// dar ni bsgrub pa bya ba yazhi// de bzhin las rnams
bya@#// sgrub par byed// de la rtag tu bzlas pas skyes bu rang gi sdig pa zad par byed do// sngags pas sngon las kyi cho ga gang byas ba skye ba brgyud pa rnams su grub par gnas pa de/de
bzhin du las tshogs parnyed par 'gyur ba de skyes pas sngags bzlas pas/ slar yang sngags zlos pa po'i sdig pa zad pa'i don dang/ las de 'joms shing sngags grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du
mchog dang/ bar ma dang/ thami'i 'jig rten gyi mchod ba dang bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus ba zad par byed tsang/ skye ba brgyud pa rnams su gang byas pa'i sdug pa de thams cad 'jig par byed de/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngags bzlas pas lus rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ thub pa rnams kyis gnas pas dga' ba dang/ yon tan thams ud kyi grugs par

'gyur ba dang/ gnod sbyin gyi khang par gnas pa'i rgyal po nyid de dang/ rtag tu don thamasacad kyi dngos grub kyang thob pa dang ldan no/ byang chub sams dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po ni tu
rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras ris bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam ste dgu pa rdzogaso// donas
as+sa yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
bam/ bkab stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod nyon cig/ khyod kyi rig pa'i sngags rjes su spyod pa/ sems can mtha' dag gi don la brtson pa/ sems can rnams gang gis bzlas par bya ba'i

rig pa'i sngags dang gang dang ldan pas bgrang bar bya ba'i bgrang 'phrang gichog/ rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga/ sngags thams cad kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga de legs par nyon la legs par
yidal thuba'age bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ sems dpa' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
la rjes su brtse bas nye bar blangs nas rig pa'i sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang dam tshig la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can rnams dang/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyire yang de bka' stsal du
gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po rnam

par dbye ba rgyas par ba shad par bya'o nyon cig/ gang gis sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa// sems can gyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa de gang na/ dang bo re zhige sngags su 'gyur bde

na maH sarba bud+d+hanaM/ a tshi d+hu ta/ rU pi hU~M tad+ya thA/ oM ku ru ku ru sarba arba sA dA ya/ sarba du zhwa bi mo ha ni/ ga gnA ba lasbe/ bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ rig pa 'das bgrang 'phreng thams cad la las bya'o// sgrung
ba dang/ dbug pa dang blang ba dang/ rgyu ba la sogs pa'i las rnams bya'o// dang po bgrang 'phrang shing lani// lan grangs sum cu rtsa bdun du// de yis mngon par bsngags byas
nas brtul zhugs can gyis bsrung ba bya// mtshan mo gcig tu gnyid log nas// de ni rmi lam brtag par bya// mi ma yi'i gzugs kun rdzogs pa// mi sdug lhag bar mar ba gtsags// sngags pa
la des smras pa// bcom ldan soms pa ji bzhin long// sgrub po tho rangs langs nas ni// shing de ru 'gro bar byed// mi sdug gzugs ldan gcigs pa che// rmi lam du yang ma mthon// sngags
thabs shing de bor bar bya// de nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// dang po du la klu yin te// de las gzhan pa dbang po'i shing// bo de'i 'dod pa 'o// gzhan yang 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// ging la 'tshogs pa
legs rdzogs pagi/ grogs dang lhan cig 'dzeg bar bya// grogs po yod par gyur ni// rang nyid de la 'jig par bya// steng gi yal ga'i se 'bras gnas su// 'dzegasan sa phun tshogs
brtul zhugs can// de la rtag tu bag yodapas// stong gi yal ga'i 'bras bu blas// steng gi las la legs sbyar bya// stazhi mchog gi dngos grubatu// gang zag mchog gis gsungs pa yin//
bar maradas grub 'drang bo ste// tha ma la bog ma 'o// srog chags rnams kyis ma smad pa'i// 'bras bu de rnams yang dag blang// nub kyi yal ga las thob pa// rdzas kyi rgyur ni bsgrub par bya// byang
gi gnod spyin mo la sogs// lha rnams lhan cig 'gugs par byed// dgug pa'i bya ba bshad pa ni// kun gyi don du zhi phyir ro// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed dang// mi 'am ci dang srin po rnams// 'dod pa
rnam pa sku tshogs byed// 'byung bo thams cad rgyas pa'i phyir// 'bras bu dang bcas las rnams// ma lus spyod pa byed pa go/ shar gyi phyogs kyi yal ga la// der gnas 'bras bu 'byung ba rnams//
de bzhin 'bad pas byas gyur na// tshe ring po yi don gyi rgyu// rtag tu sngags kyi dngos grub 'bras// rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yin// gang zhig lho 'gro ba yi// yal ga lamar rab ldan pa// sems
can rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed// ngan zlos pos 'bad pas spang// lho ru brtan pa'i yal ga la// 'bras bu gang du yang dag brjod// phyogs des gdung byed gra rnams kyi// srog ni 'jig par byed pa yi//
bsod nams ma yin mang po'i rgyu// doni zlos pos 'bad pas spang// 'og tu 'phyang ba'i yal gar gnas// 'bras bu gang zhig rab bsgrags pa// lha ma yin dang ldan pa yi// sa yi 'og tu de rnams 'gro//
de rnams 'bras bcas 'phreng ba'i/blas nas yang dag rab bsgrags pa/ 'og tu 'gro ba'i 'khri shing la/ dusazha de lha sa 'og 'gro// de ru rab tu zhugs nas lha'i// bde nyid blos ngos dang 'gyur ro//
lhamon bumo yang dag ldan// nga ni bskal par gnas par byed// bgrang 'phrang 'bras bu kun byas nas// nas zlos pos bzlas pa bya// lhan cige bsrung ba byas nas// ngonas ji ltar bdebar
'gro de nyid ring ba'i gzhas su gtsang ma'i phyogs der sngags pa/ de bzhin rtag tu 'dug par bya// bgrang phrang skyes pa sgrung bar bya// brtson pas bgrang 'phrang 'bras/
bu blang// de nas kun tu yang dag sbyang// derazhi 'phrang dngug par grags// gsum bdun brgyud dang gtsag dang/lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu// sngags shos der sbyang bar bya// rtag tu snga
ma'i sngags kyis ni// brgyad dam bdun du bzlas byas pa// de nas de'i dag par 'dod// pad+ma'i rtsa lag legs brjod pas//bumos bkal ba'i srad bu yis// sum 'gyur lnga dang ldan pa yi// brtul
khugs can gyis 'phreng thag bya// sngags kyi de nyid shes pas bslu// 'bras bu phra mo zlum por bcas// rtag tu srog chags bu ga mad// yan lag ma nyams ma slang nga// mdzes shing kha dog sdug pa

dang bu ga med cing gas pached// ril bu zlum po ji bzhi ba// dbazhi'i 'du la dang ni// kho datsi dang in+d+ha/// 'bras nyid rtag tu lung thang mdzes// 'bras bu dam pa'i m gang gi tshe// sngags pa mchog tu

brtson pa yis// 'bad pas bgrang ba phreng brgyu bar bya// gsar ram yang na dngul dag gam// nor bu shel las byung ba dang// mu tig dung nyid mu sa ra// byu ru yis kyang bya ba ste/ 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshog/
bya gzhan yang ran chen las byung ba'i// bgrong 'phreng bzang po bya ba dang// sa las byung ba'i zlum po yi/ ril bus bgrang 'phrang can dag/ ]/mnyam par bzhag stasrad bu brgyu// gzhan yang ril bu

mam/ 'ga' zhig gam// 'bras bu'am khams las byung ba yis// ku sha'i rtsa chos brgyus pa yang// zlos pos 'bad de bya ba yin// brgya rtsa brgyad dam lteshu lnga// lnga bcu 'di dag bar ma yin// sngags pa//

mnyam par bzhag pa yis// 'bras bu'i tshad rnams brgyu bar bya// stong rtsa brgyad po 'di bya ba// 'phreng ba 'di'i thu bo yani// 'phreng ba rnam pa 'di bzhin// sngags pas rtag tu bsgrub bya// da nas brgyus
te sngags rnams// phyi ma gsum mam gnyis nyid dang/ rgya lcags las byung gdu bu dang// de bzhin gser dang dngul dag dang// de nas zangs byung gdu bus kyang// 'phreng ba kun nas brgyubar bya// de nas
mtha' ru yang chig bya// de larim gyis dgod par bya// 'bad pasamadzes par dkri bar bya// sas rgyas ma lus bzhugs bar gi/ yongs su gsal bar byas de nas// rakyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba yin
sbrul gdengs ka'i rnam pa bzhi// yongs su dkris pas brgyan pa yi// mu tig do shalanams mtshungs shing// mgul rgyan rnam par sprul pa 'o/ de nas 'bab tshudage ba'i mthar// drim ched la khrus byas

nas/ go rims ji bzhin khrus byas te// chu yi gnas las ldang bar bya// de bzhin brtson pas nyerag bya// bgrang 'phrang srad bu blangasaMskasazhi// ba yi rnam lngas rab tu bkru/ sa yi phye mas 'ab bkyus
nas gtsang ma'i gos la dri bzang gis// rjes su nye bar byugs pa dang// rab tu bsngags pa'i kha dog kyang// tsan dan dkar po gur kum dang// 'bad pas dron mos bkru bar bya// do bzhin gnyis
ka bgro bar 'gyur// ji lta'i gnas su song nas// gang du gras ris bar pa ni// rgyala mchog thub pa'i gtso bo// shAkyasang ge mi ma mchog/ ston nga'i gzugs brnyan/
da bzhin du// sa steng rgyal khab ring bsrol// mchod pa de yi spyan sngar dgod// de dang nye bar bzhag nas ni// de tshade yi spyan snga ru// dam tshig la gnas stong rtsa brgyad// son pa'i m brgya
yang gcig tu// brgyad dang bcas ba bzlas byas nas// nyin mtshan smyung bar gnas gyur nas// bdun pa'i thub la 'phreng ba dbulaM// snga ma de bzhin bzlas bya ba// tshad nyid de dang mnyam par
bya dadas 'phrang la yongs su bzlas// mtshan mo de nyid du 'khod de// kun bting ba'i sa gzhi la// sngags shes dor ni nyal bar bya// rmi lam gang dang gang mthong ba// dag ba'i rmi lam mthong ba ni//
rmi lam nges par bstan pa yi// dngos grub de yase bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas nyan thos bse ru rnams// gal te rmi lam mthong gyur na// sngags pas 'bras bu bcas par 'grub// nges par de yi chog/
[g/ ：]dge slong gzugs dang bram ze yi// gzugs bsnan sna tshogs mdzes pa mthong// gal te rmi lam de mthong na// 'phreng ba dbul bya de bzhin du// sngags kyi don kun sgrub pa po// de yis gdon
mi za bar 'grub// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal bo che theg pa chen po ni tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma ral pa gyen brdzas kyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ ras
se bar ma'i cho ga rab 'byam las bcu pa bgrang ba phrang gi cho ga'i le'u rab 'byam rdzogs so///de nas yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas slar yang thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' chen po khyod kyi

rig pa'i sngags kyi le'u rdzogs pa'i khyad par gyi chog dang/ spyi'i srog gi las la rab tu sbyor ba'i rig pa'i sgrub pa yod do/ ma la nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par gyi cho ga las gang du rig pa'i spyod pa la mngon

par brtson pa'i sems can rnams rab tu sbyor zhing gnas par 'gyur ba de gang zhe na/ rig pa'i sngags kyi tshigs gsang chen na/ tapya thA/ o tiT+Thaha ri pad+me le/ hirakA diha da dA pA ya hU~M phaT phalasAhA/ spyan
ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di'i mchog gi snying po las thams cad byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad ltar ba'o// dang por zhagi sgrub pa pos ma'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pas mar gyi srog blugs gsum ma la

ni sreg bya ste/ ma lto spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rab tusbyar ta zhi bcan dang/ rgyas pa can dang/ drag po'i las rnams la yamashing rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro// mya ngan med gang gi don du// khyad

bar sman dang bcas pa nyid//mtho gang ngamani khru gang tsam// sor mo gsum du'ang mtho ba yi// snum pa'i ma rab tu shis// chog 'di'i bya ba yin// bu ga med cing saraka med// de bzhin ne tso'i gshog pa 'dra/
ljang dang dkar ba'i kha dog gam// kha dog nag po spang bar bya// srin bu rnams kyis zos pa spang// bu ga med pa'i ng yang dag sbyin// gzhan yang kha dog mchog min pa// tha ma'i chos kyang

spyas pa 'o// de rnams skam dang rlon pa'i ng yin// de yi tsho yang brtsam par bya// ma rul yon po man nyid dang// shin tu ring ba'ang spang bar bya// nasal thababyas nas ni// kun nas zu na bzhi pa ru// 'og
ted du 'bad pas bko/ khru ba'i pa yi tshad dang ni// khru gsum khrun gnyis pa dang// de bzhin nyid du khru gcig pa// rtag tu srog chags spangs pa dang// byems legs par sbyar ba de// de nas pad 'dra'i

kha khyer ni// kun nas dkyil 'khor rnam pa 'o// yan 'bad bas zur bzhi pa// 'dab ma gsum du bya ba 'o// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// 'di yang yang dag bsgrags pa yin// mngon spyod la ni sa'i dbus su//

rdo rje bya shing rtsa gnyis su// rtsa o gsum du bya ba yi// gzab rgyu la khru gnyis re// gtsang ma'i phyogs su de bzhin bdar// chu klung 'gram du de bzhin spyod// bstan pa gcig gi phyogs rnams dang//dur

khrod khang pa stong pa ru// sbyin srog legs par brtsam par bya// de bzhin ri bo'i rtsa nyid dang// rtag tu lha khang stong pa dang// de bzhin nyid du dgon pa che// gang yang sgrub pa'i phyogs rnams na// gang zag
mchog gis gsungs pa dang// sbyin srog las ni thams cad la// de rnams gnas su gsungs pa yani// khru gang tshad du gnas pa yi// kusha'i khres la nyar 'dug nas// der ni sngags shes khyad/
par du/ sbyin sreg gin las bya'o// gnas de nyid du 'bo gzhus pas// myur du dngos grubaze tshom med// shar dang byang du kha phyogs pas// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa bya// lho ru drag po'i las rnams te/
de'i sngags pas spang bar bya// shar bltas zhi ba'i dngos grub ste// rgyas pa can yang byang du phyogs// de yis sngags ni dus rtag tu/ rig pa'i bzlas pa brtsam par bya// bal ya arga pak+Sha dang/

rgyu gro dru yas rgyas las bya// mngon spyod gang na skam po dang// tsha ba skyur dang rnon po rnams// de dag thams cad spang bya ste// thub pa rnams kyis rtag tu bkag/ zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// rlon pa'i
gang gis rab tu shes// de bzhan drag las la shing skam// rtag tu thub pa rnams kyis sbyangs// yam shang de rnams med na ni// gang la de rnams su brtag bya// rtse mo gnyis su brtag par bya// sngo

dang snum dang 'dra ba dang// rma bya'i mgrin pa dang mtshungs pa// rnam pa de lta'i ku ga yis// kho ra yug tu ku pa ni// rtag tu dgram par bya ba ni// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can// mar gad dang ni mtshud
pas so= de bzhin rtag du skam po'i nus// sdig pa'i lasani bya ba ste// 'dis ni rgyal ba mchog gis bkag/ dri mad tshun dag pa la// rtag tu srin bus spangs pa yi// dunas kun nas bsang

gtor bya// g.yas phyogs su ni bskor byas te// brtson pas me na sbyar bar bya// cho ga ji bzhi zhe nye reg bya// gtsang ma'i rtswa yi rtsa ba yis// sgron ma tshad dang ldan byas nas// de nas khu tshur brtsams
byas nas// 'bad pas ma 'a sbar bar bya// kha yi rlung gis mi bya ste// rtag tu gus kyi mthas kyang mni// sham thabs bla gos mngon par spang// gos gzhan gyis kyang lag
pa yi/ rlung gis nye bar gzhom pa la// mngon par dga' bas ma yin no// gtsang ma'i rlung yab de bzhin gos// nor bus kyang ni rlung yab bya// rlung ni yang dag 'byung ba 'dis// man mnyam par
byus pa la// sngags shes pas na mi sdur ro// sbyin sreg don du mnyam bzhag pas// de nas g.yas pa man pa yis// derab bsang gtor byas zhu sa na// der ni ba yem gyis ni// srog blugs gsum ni

sbyin pa bya// de nas kyang n phyag bya ste// sangs rgyus kun dang skyob pa dang// rang sngags sngags kyi mgon po la// donas ci 'dod phyag bya 'o// de ma yi snying po yi// sngagasan lan brgya bzlas pa
yas brtson ldan dri zhim ma tog gis// rtag tu ma'i spyan drang bya// sngagasashes rtag tu spyan drangs nas// gnas la mkhas pas gdan ngang gnas// sngags des dbul gyi gzhan gyis min// zho dang
