srog blugs kyi sbyin sreg brgyad bsgrubyas n Ti khar 'gyur ro// rgyas par 'dod na 'o ma can gyi lam shing gisam sbyar nas rtal da'abras thug potshes thunagasum du sbyin srug brgyud brgyar bya'o//

nyi ma gsum du a rgya'i yam shing gis ma sbyar nas durat+ta dang tshor macan gyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// rtsod par 'dod pa rnams kyi skya ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// nyi ma so sor 'bu rmon pa dang
rgyu phub ma rnams lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg byas na ming nas smos nas mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ rgyal po yam shing gis me sbar nas til dang 'brasazug po che'i sbyin sug thun
mtshams gsum du stong phrag brgyad bya'o/ nyim gsum du a ma yam shing gisaMm h+pharanas dur phyu dang tsher ma can gyi sbyin sregastong phrag brgyad bya'o// khyim bdun gyis skyes bu chen po rnamA
dbang du 'gyur ro// 'om dang/ ba lang gi gcin dang/ nas zan dang/ bsod snyoms za ba'am mi skya ba'i brtul zhugs kun tu spyad cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma dang shing shun 'tshang
watshabs bsgrub pa byas te/ gang gar gtun shing gi sgra dang bral ba gtsang ma'i phyogs su chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi sa khus nas khru bdun pa'isa'i gong bu bzhi byas nas dbus su'adab ma stong
gi pad+ma byus te/ de'i stang du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi lcags lnga las byas pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bzhag nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus subris sku'i spyan sngar bsgrub par
bya'o/ dri zhim po'i dri rnams dang tsan dan dkaradamar gyis mchod nas man da ra ba'i me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phrang ba brgya yul nas bcom ldan 'das ladra ding/ ma tog dang bdug pa
lasogs pa'i mchod pa bya'o// mar gyi mar me'i phreng ba bdunadabul bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir mar gyi bum pa bzhi rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// phyogs bzhir bum pa bkas bon thams cad kyis gang bar/
rin po che rnams bcug nas gzhag par bya// a ka ru dang/ kun n ru kadang/ dpal mas btags pa dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// gtor ma'i chog byas nas phyogs bzhir sngar brjod/

pas zho zan sngonam can bul bar bya'o// ltor nin t+tA ta 'dar ba chudang bgres pasbyin par bya'o// byang phyogasasu'o thug gis gang ba'i gtor mas nye bar mchod par bya'o// sems can thamasacad la phyogs

bzhir rgyun mi 'chad pa 'byung bar bya'o// da la ga'i las shing gis me sbar nas a pA mAna'i yam shing lamar gyis btags la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te sbyin sreg brgyad bcu bya'o// ming nas smos ba de
tham@#/// dbang du 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yam shing gis mesbyar nas lan tshu las byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ mgo bo nas brtsams te ji srid nang ma'i bar du srog khrugasare re laman
bdun bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas srog blug sastong phrag brgyadabyA'o/ ming nas smos pa'i rgyal bo dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i btso lngalamanalag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong can gyis
nyin mtshan du snang bar gnas te/ sa la ma lhung ba'i 'byung gis ba lang gi bags pa'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du gsar dngul gyi snod du sor sgyur rgyur mtshungs pa'i ba'i ara gzhon nu mas bsrubs pa blangs nas ku sha khris la nye bar 'dug ste lag pa g.yon pas stod gzung/ lag
pa g.yas pa'i ming med kyi sor mos dkrug par bya ste/ srid dro bar gyur pa de srid du'o// de nas btung bar bya ste/ yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// lan cig brjod pas thos pa 'dzin par byed do// de la
ba'athul bstan dbang du byed par 'gyur// 'bar bstanami snang bar 'agyur ro/ yan lag thams cad na bde bar zhi bar 'dod pas dkar po'i brgyud pa lagaso sbyongs gyis sngagrolas brtsam par bya'o/

shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyi dkyil 'khor nya bar drug nas dbus su nad pa'i so phag gzhag par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnams su khum pachus gang ba bzhi la brgyad brgyar mngon par bzlas lagazhag
khamakhar bya'o/ so phag rnams kyi stang du sen gis gzhag par bya'o// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i tshon sna lnga'i sud pas yongs su dkras te dra bam pos yongs sub kang pas so// phyi rol dud kyis
'khor bya'o// phyogs bzhir chang dang sha'i gtor mdabul lo// dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pakhyasanas gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// zas kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba gzhag par bya'o//
de nas nang pa so phag gi steng du gzhug par bya'o// de nas galjang khu bzung nas nid pa gos dkar pocan la ji srid nang pa'i bar dbyab par bya'o// mar gyi stong du ku sha dor bar bya// de bzhin du

brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas mar zos pas blta bar bya'o// de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas zlos bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// sbyangs pa las sbyang ba'i snod dang gos byas nas/sangs rgyas dang byang
chub sems dpa 'thoms cad kyi zhabs la phyag byed du gzhug go/ de nas dri yang ku dang/ nA ga ge sar dang/ sbrang rtsa can dang/ bzhi po gtsi@#/tu byas nas ma nyam par thob par byas la/ mdzad ng/
lhag pa'i bsa mchogazosananadamed par rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyu/ skud pa sngon po la lan bduna mngon par basngags pa byas nasakod palatsang bar bya// grub mched partakhar
zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du mgrin pa la nye bar bcing bar bya'o// dbugs mi bde ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// gso sbyong can gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor nye
bar byugs nas/ dri bzang po' ma tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas te mar gyi mar me dbul la/ de nas byang chub shing gi yam shApagisame rab tu sbyar ro// sdur nasasu
rtsi phog la lan bduna mngon par bsngags pa'i srog blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// nad nye bar zhi bar byed do// rig pas bgegs nye bar zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'gro
ba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nasasang ge dang/ stag dang/ phagadang/ lug gi gdong pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyi shu rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o// de nas nag po'i
brgyad pa la gso sbyong can gyis mtshan mo phyogs gtsang mar bla ro dmar po bris la las yang dag par brtsam mo// son rtsi 'i gos bcu bzhi la 'gogs gzhug par bya'o// dbus su bgegs
rnams kyi gtsolog 'dren gzhag par bya'o// tshon sna lnga'i phyi ma la lan cig mngon par bsngags pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bdun bya'o// dri dmar po'i ma tog rnams kyis mngon par mtshon
bcas nas mar gyi mar mebcu bzhi dbul la// gu gul gyi bdag ba dbul lo// sha dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bcu ba'-i dbul lo// rgya skyegs kyi khu ba'angabcu bzhi gtor bar bya// de nas srad bu
dmar po la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mtshan ma bcing bar bya'o// 'byung po dang bgegs kyi rgyal po'ang bcing bar bya'o// de nas u dum wa ra'iyam shing gis mo sbyar nas bgegs rnamA
tsa00nga bar bya'o zhes brjod de/ sAtsA'i yi ges dkyil 'khor ba rnams la sbyin srag stong phrag brgyar bya'o// der bgegs dang log par 'dren pa bcings par 'gyur ro// rig pa rnams thams cad sgrub par
byed pan bgegs rnams 'phrul byed do// des n bgegs dang lag par 'dren pa rnams sa'i snod gcig tu bgegs thams cad gzhug par bya'o// gcig tu log par 'dren pa chen po'o// de nas/
bgagasa rnams thams cad la me tog thams cad dbul bar bya zhing/ leg pa 'dren pa chen po la tsan dan dmar po dang/ ka ra wA ra'am tog dmar po dbul la// bgegs rnams thams cad l
rdzas thams cad kyi bdug pa dbul lo// log par 'dren pa chen po la gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul la// mar dang bsras pa dbul lo// de nas lte ba'i tshad kyi dong du sosor gzhug par bya'o// sar
yang sas dgab par bya'o// de lta bu s bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro// gso sbyong can gyis dkar po'i bco lnga la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchodarten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi
lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs ra byas nas me tog dang/ deng/ bdug pa dang/ mar gyi mar me la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ u dum wa ra'i shing gis me sbar nas tshangs ma'i
yam shing gis sbyin sreg bya zhing lha la phul ba zosanayid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na bram ze rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// lha la phul ba'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal rigs
dbang du 'gyur ro// nas dang/ zho dang/ lha la phul ba gcig tu byas nasaspyanasrug byas n rje'u rig dbang du 'gyurano/ dgra la bltas nasabazlas pabyas
na rengs par 'gyur ro// lan bduno mngon par bsngags pa'i rgyus thams cad 'babs pa dang norobyed do// dug thams cad la yang nye bar byugago/ zhuna mkhan gyi ril bu byas nas
lan bdun mngon bar bsngags pasaMmag gi nad sel bar byed do// na bal skud pa btsang bar bya ste// gdon thams cad mi 'byung ngo// gtsug phud bcings pas bdag nyid bsrung ba'o// thal
bsadakyil 'khor bcing ba'o// bong ba la lan bdun bzlos pas phyogs bcing ba'o// bud mdabya thon pa la til la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/ bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// rmongs pas la

gyi zla mtshan gyi dus las 'das pa na khrus bya zhing rgyud mtshungs pa'i ba'i 'o ma la brgya rtsa brgyud mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ bcung bar sbyin zhing bza' ba mchog dang mar bsros la bza' bar bya'o//
denas bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro// bu mang pocan gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// thal ba de chu'i bum pa bzhi dang kun tu bsrasanas gzhag par bya'o// shudagalalan brgyar brgyar bzlas talag

tshal pa g.yas pa la bcings pas ji srid skya ba thams cad kyi mchogatu'agyur ro// gzhan gyis mi thul ba'i mi tog gis sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad byas n g.yul dugazhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// gzhon
shums bkal ba'i skudar la mdud pa byas te lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas lag pa la bcing bar bya'o// brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mi 'byupa// de nas ma rung pas mche ba'i ming nasasmos te tshul
na bdun mngon par bsngags nas khyor chu 'thungs pas de lta bu s shi ba'ang ldang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcu bzhir mngon par basngags par byas nas btung bar byin par bya'o// 'jog pos kyang g
ba sos par byed do// chang gi thabs la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pabyas nas shi ba lasbyin par bya'o// gal te phyis ma 'byung ngo// demasasamasadapa' chen pos slar yang rig pa thams cad yang

! dgayar skul bar byed pa zhes cu pa ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas sgrubapa'i tha sa thas can gyi spyi'i rig pa gsungs so// na mo'atA trayAya/ na mo ami ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya achu te/ samyakasaM

bud+d+hAya/ namaAr+ya a ba lo ka ti shA rA ya/ bo satwAya ma hAsatwaya/ ri dzu ka/ tAre/ shAn+te/ tut+taro/ an g+ho/ lasu/ tu re swAhA 'di ni'iphags ma sgrol ma'ospyi'i sgrol ma zhes bya'o// rig pa 'dis

rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i nuklung du phrag pa'i tshad kyisachur zhugs nas rig ba stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid nam mkhar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bug pa mthong ba'i bar du ste/ de lta bu byas pas las 'grub
par 'gyur ro// gal te ma mthong na slar yang bsgrub par bya'o// de nas lan bdun du mar rjesasu song nas dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ gtor ma'i cho ga bya ste/ lag pa ga las man gnas mtshan
thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// ji srid dbugs 'byin no zhes brjod pa'i bar du'o// nyim so sor dngul brgya sbyin par byed de/ de yang zad par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ namo
ami tAb+hAya/ tab+hA ga tAya/ arnyate/ samyaka saMbud+d+hAya nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti hA rAya/ bod+hisatAya/ ma nAsat+tAya/ ma hAkA ru Ni kA ya/ ra dzu kaM/ tAre/ shAn+te/ tAre ]an/ lA gyetut+ta
re agra/ rmanir+ya te tu re swA hA/ 'dani 'phags masgrol ma dag pa zhes bya ba ste/ rig pa 'dis dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba la zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg stowaM
tsho brag brgyad bya'o// dus gsum du b.lang bam rnyed do// zhamo rata trayA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti sha rAya/ bod+hisatwaya/ ma hA sa taya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/lamyu/ pra la// a laN+Da/
lam rimya/ sarba sid+d+him+ma ku ru swAhA/ 'din 'phags ma sgrol ma 'byung bzhes bya ba ste/ rig pa 'di ka ra wA ri'iyam shing la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad bya sta/ ji
srid rgyal po dbang du 'gyur to'ong bar byed do// sde stod smra ba'ang bsgo ba'i las byas pa 'ching ba grol ba la sogs pa de'ang sbyong du 'jug go/ de ma grol bar du mang du dngos grub thams cad

nyid kyis grub pa'i ng sngar brjod pa'i rig pas/ sarbasid+d+hiny+tsa/ ma su ru sut+tha/ zhes byin nas rtag tu bzlas pas 'ching ba grol bar byed do/ yang na gtsang mar gyur pas mtshan thog tha bzlas par

[bya ste/ 'ching ba grol bar byed do// namo rat+na tra yA ya/namo amitu byAya/ tathA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAya/ ba dz+ha sa tAya/ man+tas tAya/ ridzuka/
ta[& ]/tAre b+hAgAn d+harma tut+tAre/ a na b+hi lA s+ya/ rAture sA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma zhu ba zhes bya ba'i rig pas/ 'das ma da lung ga dang/ d+hAlA nA dang/ sog me'am la sbyin saMg bya ste/
rdzasrid log 'dren 'ong bar byed do/ de brjod par bya'o// khyim so sor bdagal dong tshe re sbyin no// de'ang zad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la reg tu gzhug par bya'o// de nas grub par 'gyur

ro// rnam pagazhan du na mi sdod do// na mo rat+ta trayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ yan te/ samyaka saMbud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ka tanArAya/ bo d+his tA la/ ma hA satAya/ ri dzu ka/

rnyamani tu de tut+ta re a na b+hi lA s+ya/ d+harmanaM ta te/ tu re sa/// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma drang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ 'dis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du de kaM ka ta'i pam shing
gis mgyur nas/ bil ba'i 'bras bu la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang dmar gyis btegs pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad khya'o// 'dis las rnams dpal dang ldan pa'i m yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro//
namo ratAtra yAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAyaM/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Amyaa ba lo ki te kAr ya/ bo d+hisat+taya/ ma hAsatAya/a gra rnyam ni tatotu re/ ridzug/
tshamanit+tate/ tut+tare an b.lAkye/ d+harman tu tatAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mchogaces bya ba'i rig pa ste/ 'dis rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung du zhugs te/
ki ra d+ha'am tog gis sbyin srog stong phrag brgyadabya'o// nyim soso'amanyin zhagalatshal bdun nam brgyad rnyed de/ yang na dngul brgya mthong ngo// rig pa de nyid kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

tshu/ dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi shing gis me sbar nas mar gyi sbyin sug bya'o// dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// namo rat+ta trayAya/ namo a mi tAb+haya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ artsate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya

'khaM namaAr+ya a ba lo ka tisha ra ya/ botshusatAya/ mahAsatAya/ a gro tAre/ ra dza ga tA'e/ shAn ny+tsare/ a na b+hi lA/ tur suny+tsa/ 'di ni'i yog sa ma sgrolama mngon par rjod par byer ma zhes bya ba'i
rig pa ste/ 'dirtag tubazlas par nad med par 'gyur ro// na mo rata yA ya/na mo a mi tAt+taya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki tanA ra ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ ma

satAya/ a gra tAre/ a na b+ha lAkye/ d+hamatut+tAre/ an b+hilAkye/ d+harma ni tetureswAhA/ 'di ni lophags ma sgrol ma nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tubazlas pas 'dod pa nyo bar rdzogs

par byed do// na mo ratwA prayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tAya ]artati/ samyakasaM bur ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwa rAl/ bod+hisatuya/ ma hAsatAya/ a gre tAre/ ra dzu ka rnyamatut+tAre/ an hUM/

lA s+ya demadu reswA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mngon par brjod pa byar med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dgra thams cad las mchog tu rgyal bar byed do/ na mo rat+tatAyA ya/ namo

lami tA ya/takhyug khyug/gat+ta te/muny+tsi kasaM bud+d+hAya/namasaa b.lokiteshugabod+hisatuya/ mahA satAya/ a gre tAye/ shAzhed+harmat+tare/ shAn d+harma te tu re su[%] ]'din zhi ba'i chos nges par 'byung ma rig pa ste/

rtag tu bo zlas paso ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro// na mo rit+tatrayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ ta thA ga tAyaM/ a te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a b.lekatishA rA ya dbo d+hisatuya/

satwa swAtAya/ mahA kA ru Ni kAya/a gro tA re/ ridza kA rta/ mu te/ tut+tA re daa nab+ha lA s+yad+harmani// tut+tAresatwA/ 'di ni drang po can gyi chos kyi mchog nges par 'byung ba'i rig pa ste dartagatubazlos pas

don thams cad thob pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'am/ rinapo che red do// na mo rat+naNAyA ya/ na mo sa ma ti b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya/ madz+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti nA rAya/ ngo tshu satA

ya ma satAya/ a gletAre/ midzuka d+harma/ ni te/ tut+tAre 'i dzra ka d+harma nirAte tut+tA re sut+taM/ 'di ni pags ma sgrol ma thams cad drang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas skye bo thamasaM
cad dga' bo 'gyur ro// na mo rat+tarAyAya don mo a mi tAb+hAyo/ ta thA ga tAye dau0f00rtato/ samyakasaM bung buya na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shA rAya/ bod+hisaya dam hA satIya/ a gro d+harmazhi
te tu resAt+tA/ 'din 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phos pa las sgrol ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas skye brgyun michad par byed no// namo rat+tatrayAya/ namo

a ma tAb+hAya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ardate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti nA ra ya/ bo d+hi satwAya/ ma rgyusatAya/ a gro tAre/ an tsAl s+ya tAre/ an tsAl s+ya tut+tAre/ an g+ha lasu d+harmani

ti tu sutA 'don 'phags ma sgrol ma mchogaces bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas mchog gi 'bras bu star ro// namo rat+na trayAyaM/ na mo a mi tA b+hU ya/ tathAgatAya/ u0f00 te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/

nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishar ya/ bo dz+hasatuya/ ma hA satuya/ shAn+tarnyam dut+tA re/ shAn d+ham ni te tu re swAhA/ 'dani 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas zhi kho'i

zla/ sems skyed par byed do// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi tAd+hiya/ ta thA ga tAya/arta to/ samya ka saM ban+d+hiya/ nam Ar+ya a ba loki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satuya/ ma hA satAya/ ra dzu'o tA re/ ri dzu ka

tut+tAre/ ridzukarnyamani tureswA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrolomadrangapor ldan m zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtagau tu bzlas pas drang po'isims spyod par byed do// chos thams cad ces bya ba'i rig pa 'di rnamA
bklags pas 'grub pa/ bdag nyid srung ba dang/ gzhan srung ba dang/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa// 'bum phrag gcig brjod pas sngar brjod pa'i las thams cad bsgrub par bya sta/ stong phrag bcu bzlas pas
tsa bsod nams 'phel bar byed pa/ stong phragasum cu bzlas pas bsod nams dpaldan pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlasan mtshams med pa byas pas kyang 'grub bar gyur te/ mdor na ma nor bar yan
pa sgrub pa'i sams na po/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can yang ng// rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ yams thams cad mi 'byung ngo// nye bar 'tshapo thams cad 'byung bar mi
'gyur ro// zhes de bzhin du rtogs par bya'o// de nas 'di'i chog phyogs tsam du 'gyur te/ 'bum bzlas pas las thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlos pas
sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas mchog rnams sgrub par byed do// 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas pas mngon par shes pa so sor red do// 'bum phrag lnga bzlas pas lha'i
shes pasasorared do// 'bum phrag drugabazlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po tshord do// 'bum phrag bdun bzlas pas mngon par shes pa lngar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag bcu bzlas pas rgyalasrid chen
paso ser red do// 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas pas rig pa 'dzan par 'gyur ro// de nas mig sman ldong ros sa shAtA'i 'dab ma bdun gyi nang du gtums te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji srid dro ba

dang du ba 'khrul ba dang/ 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de la dro bar gyur pas nadibang du byed do// du ba 'phrul bsan mi snang ba'o/ 'bar bas ni nam mkha' la 'gro'o// mar gyi srog blugs 'bum[E]
sbyin sreg byas n gapa 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do// 'bum phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya ste/ laphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthopo// de mthong nas gang tshol ba de red
de tsanadan dkar po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad bya'o// tshig gam zhabs 'ching ba thob cing yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// a ka ru nag po'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// rgyalaM
tsa po dbang du 'gyur ro// rgya chen po rnyed do// tsan dan dmar po'ayAm shang gi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// grub pa thams cad la grong stong phrag bsdus pa red de// byang chub shing gi 'og tu 'bum
phrag bdun bzlas par bya'o// bcud dang bcud kyis len rnams rnyed do// zos pas skra dkar dang gnyer ma sbyangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas pas bya rgod sel bar byed do// 'bum phrag gnyis

ts+tshe bzlas pas rgyal po'i btsunamo mchog dang+ka rnam par 'phrul bar byed do// yungs kar rgyal pos rtag tu sbyin sreg byas n rgyal po dbang du 'gyur ro// til la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o//

rtag tu nor rAd do// gso sbyong can gyis 'bum bzlas par bya'o// bza' ba dang btung ba zhim po byung bar gyur ro// asgo'i yam shing gi sbyin sreg 'bum bya'o// gsar brgya rnyed do/ pi T+ThakaM gi sbyin sreg
bya rtsa'o// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// yadi la byas nas bzlas pa bya ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas nad thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ gdung bzams cad dang/ nye ba'i 'tshub dang/ 'jigs pa

thams cad 'joms par byed do// gu gul gyi ril bu la mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin grog stong phrag brgyad bya'o// nor 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum gyis rgyalagrid rnyed do/ rgyu skar gyis gnod pal

'om dang pan tshun bsres pa'i zhe'ispyin sreg bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid dam gzhan gyis snama'am tog gi sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// dur ba'imyu gus sbyin grago bya sta zhi bar 'gyur ro/

bdag dang gzhan gyis rgyas par 'dod na til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sregabya'o// nor chen po thob par 'gyur ro// bA ladang soso la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ 'byung po'i nye bar
'tshongs btab pa'isems can thams cad la ston du gzhug par bya'o// mthong ba las rang gnas 'gro'o// mig la brgyad brgyar bzlas na dang po gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// chu la yos su bzlas nas

gdong bkru bar bya ste/ skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// bya rog ma 'phur ba la rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod bde red do// chu la lan bduna mngon par bsngags pa'i khyor chu nyam sasor tho ras btung bar bya'o//

dmed par 'gyur ro// de nas bud med dbang duca bar 'dod pas lan las byas pa'i gzugs bar nabyas nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnanate/ spyi borastong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya ste nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/

nas pa sgrub thabs kyi grub pa dang/ yid lagrub pa'i don thams car sgrub pa 'di rnams sad pa'i rgyur yang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin duyang 'a phyogasacung zad tsam zhig byas pa las sgrub thabs kyi nya bar sbyor
ba'i khyad par gyi stobs su 'gyur bar bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs tsam gyis// sgrub pa'i yang dag dngos grub sbyong// shin du stong min gang ba min/ brda' pa kun nas sbyin
par s+ya tshab mngar skyur la sogs pa'i/ ro las yul bral lnga la yang// sred pa ldan pas rol// srid pa gang phyir skye bar 'gyur// srid pas bak+khas dang sbyin sreg sogs// 'dir ni cung zad brtsam
zla ma 'dir phyogs 'dir rnam par shes// lag pa bldag la sogs brjod pa dor bar bya 'am der bya min// nang du g.yog po'i lha rnams ni// phur bu gnas par yongs brtagacu// lha rnams kyi

ni khang pa las// khang stong dang ni phug gi nang// shing gacagi gamani dur khrod dang// ri bo dang natshang tshing du// bzlas dang sbyin srog sgrub pa yang// rtse gcig yid kyis bya bayan// mdag ma dag
zla kun dag la// dag pa rnam par sbyong pa yin// gnyis ka yis kyang gnyis ka la/ dngos grub smra bas bsgrub par bya// gang yapari ya srid bu dang// ltag ma de nas 'gongs pa dang// zlumtshan
ldan pas kun tu reg/ gdol pa'i spyi bos bskol ba yang// rul pa'i dri daArayang 'byung// legs byos 'dod pas sbyin par bya// lha rnams ched du bsnyen pa las// de lta la sogs yon tan
ldan/ las samamal stan la sogs pa// sgrub po rang gis blangs pa'i m// min pa nyid nibasnyen par bya// btung ba ldan pas gnas dang dga'// skya bo ngan pa'i sems can bcas// phyir kun tu
kha brtags pas byas// mtshams med lnga po byed pa po// nad dang 'byung chen byed pa dang/ med pa 'amayang namang nang// rdzas dang le les bcom pa dang// dge 'dun 'khu dang ngo tsha med// ser sna lhur
len mtshon gyi 'bugs// rtag tu log par lta ba gzhan// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// kun tu gsungs pa mdzes pa'o// dus min khrus ni mi nus na// rang gis nus pa ma yin pa// rang gi rlung ni mchog
du bsgrags// dus gsum min par de yod pa// gcig tu theg gsum bral ba dang// khrusanyes pa dang chubo rinang// nyes pa gsum zhes bya ba'ajoms// khrus ni mchog tu rab tu bsgrags// de phyir dus kyang

kun bsams nas// ma des sam ni de nas kyang// chuyis khrusani dngos grub kun// sgrub pa po la bstan pa yin// de nas kun tu nad pa las// gsang ba'i sngags kyi khrus rnams ni// rab tu bsgrags par gyur pa

yin/ yapa'i dir sngagasan/ namo rat+na tra yA ya// na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ a te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha shurtsi/ d+harma shutsa/ saM gru shu tsa/ a nen par/ pA kya na/ a ku shutsir/ b+ha bAmi sdu

sngags 'dis chu la lanacig yongs su bzlas nas bkru bar bya'o// sngon du bsnun pa dang/ sgrub pa'i dus su dang/ nad pa'i sngags 'di khrus byas pas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i stod du thun gsum du dam pa'i

chos kyi kha tonal sogs pa rnams kyis dub pas mtshan mo'i gung la ku sha la sogs pa'i ston la gtsang sbra dang/ srung ba'i chog dang/ phyagargyas yongs su brtags te sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga bya'o// de'i tshe bsrung
ba byas par 'gyur ro// seng ge 'i mal du sgrub pa pos rtag tu sang ge'i stabs kyis lho 'am shar gyi phyogs su mgo bo bstan nas rmi lamadame zhi ba can nam rgyus patsan gyi sbyin sreg gal te

gyur na// shar dang lce'i rtse ru kun tu gnas nas niang pa rab tu brkyang bar bya'o// nub kyi phyogs su mgo bo byas nas lce phyogs su kha bltas lanyal kharabyakaM/ gi pa rnams dang yanagapa ldan pas gang

yang tsan dan dang/ pilakhalasogs pa dang// mya gro d+ha dang/ u dum ba ra lasogs pa rmi lam du mthong na/ bdag nyid yang dag bar 'phags pa'idangos grub kyi mtshan maro// ngang pa dang/ byaka ra ba dang/

khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ bya ro tan rmi lam du byung na de'adingos grub myur du bdag la 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gos dkar po dang mnyam par kun tu ston pa 'di yang bdaganyid kyang gang gi tshe'aphel bar mthong n gdonami za

(bar dangos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi 'phrang bas khyab pa dang/ rmi lam du khang bzang la 'dzegs pa ma/ mnan pa la sogs pa byung na dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid de/ grul mngon pa'i dzegs pa dang/

de bzhin du de'i piwang 'dzin pako/ rgyalamtshand khyil sogs pa rmi lam du reg pa byung ba dang/ chu da til mar gyis reg payang dag par grub pa'i mtshamanyid do// rmi lam du bong bu dang// rnga modang
a shang rta la sogs pa rnams mthong 'am/ rig pa la sogs pani dngos grub la bar dugachod par shes par bya'o// nges par yang 'dod do// del sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// dge ba'i las dang/
rtsa dag las gzhan// de rnams thamasacad sgrub pa'i// de phyir milam shes nas bya// rmi lam srung dang phyag rgya ni// phan tshun nyid du rig pa 'dzani// bgegs rnams rtag tu gnyid log khyed// rnam
par gzhom bya rnam 'dzoms pa/ yang dag gter nas de yi phyir// bzlas dang sbyin sreg lasogs kun// sngar brjod bsrung ba sbyar bar bya// srung ba'i cho ga'i dbye ba las/ de 'dis yang dag 'grub
par 'dod// mkha' la rgyu ba'i lhaganod sbyin/ rang grub yi dgas srin po dang/ dgun tu rgyu byed rnama'joms phyir// rang gi gnas dang saMms kun g.yo// de phyir thog ma nas bya ba// bdage
nyid srung dang mtshan mni// nye bar mtshonapal sogs pa// sgrub pa kun gyi tshe na 'gyur// mtshan ma mad par gyur nan// bgegs de las 'bras skye ba la/ khyi ni g.yon nas 'byin pa dang/
pa lang sbyin dang mdzes pa yi// 'dab brgyan dang rna ba can// dri dgosartse sbyong bya rog dang// khyim gyi phag pa de bzhin nyid/ rtswa sa pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang// ba dan la sogs thams cad
nas gtso bor brjod bya dge ba'o// dge ba la sogs rig pa yis// mi dge ba yis mi dag la// de bzhin mchog dang mchog man dbye// shes nas dang por sbyang bar bya// bil ba sang+ga'i me tog ni//
min nyidi 'dod dang a ram pa// khyad par las de byin cig/ bloldan sngags pas las kun la// me thab rnam pa gsum pa'o// lto ru mngon par kha phyogs bar// gyur pa'i hU~M phaT yi ge ni// sA tsAri gnas
0 @#// sugazhag par bya// yid kyis kun tu bsams nas bya/ mngon spyod chog pa cig shos// mngon spyod sman gyi tshogs bya// byang du mngon par phyogs gyur nas// sut+tA'i yi ge dang
ldan bazlas// yid kyis bsam nas zhi ba mya/ dge ba mngon par mdzes pa can// shar du kha bltas nyid kyis bya// zha ba can dang rgyas pa can// bye brag tu ni brjod bya ste// 'og tu kha bltasabyas nas

kyang rgyas pa nyidi la rab sbyar bya// mngon spyod snyan la skyal krung ste// zhi dang rgyas bcan brjod pa'i ng// rang gi stan la tsog pur brjod// mi dga' las kyi kun spyod ni// skadang sen mor brjod pa

mi bcing bar mi bya gang gi phyir// gal te sgrub po tshangs spyod dang// ldan gyur de tsho nyes pa med// bzlas dang sbyin sreg sogs bya la// 'thub mo 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// yongs su dag par bya bzhin pa'i//
sgra rnams mkhas pas tshul de nyid// spu gris skun brag par bya// bsagapar bya ba yang ma yin// dngos grub 'dod pas gnas pa ni// lta rnams ma chodapar yongs su bsgrags// 'dod
pa'i ng min yang stobs bsags pa// de nyid phyireyang nyes par sa'agyur// sen mo'ang yongs su 'chang ba dang// de bzhin so dang spyi la sogs// drimanyid ni bcang mi bya// shag la sogs
gas 'byung// zin pa de nibaltamica// snang byed gzas zin gnas pa na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig pa ni// dngos grub 'don pas nyams ma bya// lha
masamachod pa'i dus su yang// bram mngon m gyur lca rnams la// shes rab can gyis mchod mi bya// gal tegazhan du bla ma'i bka'adi/ dam tshig las ni 'das par 'gyur// sngon dus chos rnams thams
car// nyan pa sogs kyis mchod par 'gyur// rig pasagazugs na spros nas ni// bstod pa nyid dang bsngags par bya// de nas gcig tu bsams dmigs bya// brjod pa'i rim pas rang nyid kyis//

tshig 'di kho nas smra bar bya// sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems// rdzu 'phrul che ldan srid pa yi// rgya mtsho 'di la dgongs su gsol// zhes pa nyid ni slar brjod nas// rmi lamartag tu nyi ma ya// tho rangasal
yang yang bsngags 'gyur// mar gyi sbyin sreg rtags sbyang rtsa// don med min par bzlas byed pa// sbyin sreg mngon par mdzes panadi/ bgags gzhom don du brjod par bya// so sor dgag pa'i don gyi phyir//
zhiba'i sems ni bsngags pa ste/ dngos grub 'dod pa'i don du bya// rgyas pa can yang bshad bya ste// de bzhin kun tu yang dag bsams// sgrub pos legs par bsgrub par bya// de nas mdzes pa'i
sbyin sreg ni// rtag chu'abad pas bya ba yin// nges pa kho nas rdzu 'phrul 'gyur// skye ba 'di yi dbang skur don// bal ba mya ngan med la sogs// rab brjod pa la shi dang ni// a shA dang pa rdzu ka/

rgyas pa can la sbyin sreg kun// de yi yam shing bya ba ni// u dum wa rin+ya gro d+haM// a shAny+tsa dang 'amar bcas// gang yang zhi la grags pa nyid// las rnams kun la yam shi don// sgrub pa seng ldang
a Ti// nim pa dang na tshar can bshad// de bzhin gzhan du mngon mdzes pa/ yang dag sgrub byed the tshom med// ba zla mig sman la sogs pa// rdzasa rnams sgrub pa la
yang n ba byung lnga yi gtsang sbra dang// de tshe rig pa ldan pa yis// yang na lha ya chulani// drizhim drisogs yang dag sdom// u dum wa ra der 'dub bsam/ yang naa shA las byung//
[– ]me tog can gyi sngags kyi nang// bla na tu'am bshol ldan la// yongs su srung ba'i choganA// byas nas cho ga las bsgrub bya// gso sbyong can gyis srid du// 'char ba 'byung ba de srid du// nges/
par sgrub bam mug 'di ni// nye bar blang phyir blang bar bya// bar skabs 'dir bdag nyid la dgongs su gsol// zhes pa ni srog chags thams cad gsod pa dang// rtag tu gzhan gyi noraphrog pa las

kyang mi tshangs par spyod pa las dang// lag tu phyin pa nyid las kyang rtag tu myos byed 'byung ba dang/ skye bo rnams phan tshun gnyis 'thab par byed pa dam pa gang las 'phra ba dang// kha dog dang/
zagar gyi rinadang/ rol pa dang/ dregs pa dang/ mal stan chen po dang/ mthon po can las log ste/ gangad lta dgra bcom payan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o//
bsdu bar bya'o zhes brjod par bya ba yod pa bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du'ang mgron du gnyer bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas byang chub kyisems kyis bsdu bar bya'o// rtag tu dkon mchog
mtha0 gi rang bzhin gyi skyabs 'gro sngon du 'gro bas yang dag par bskyed nas/ sgrub ba po rnam pa 'das thams cad mtshams sbyar nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes ba'o// nam ratu pad ya/ na mas mi dbyu ya/
ta b+hag tul/ arta te/ samyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+yaa ba lo ki te shwa rAya// kho d+hi satAya/ mahA satwAya// su khyu ge raM/ dan tu tA'i/ a po bti sAny+tsa/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skal
ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtogatu bzlas pas skal ba bzangabo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// na mo rinatsayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tathA ga tAya/a tasamyaka saMbuN+Daya donam ur

a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ masatwA ya/ su ga ta d+harmakIr/ nad+harma tut+tare/ a bo 'ju kad+harmakAn+ti/ ka d+harmatu'i sut+tha/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba phyi
mi ldog pa can gyi rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas gos kyirid pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// namor pAyA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ad+ha te samyakasaM bud+d+haya/ saAr+yaabalo
gi te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satuya/ masatwA ya/ su kho d+ham te/ tAre/ dAn+tatsamanatsite/ dAnAn+tarmani te ut+tare/ a bo btika/ mnar ta tu re swAhA/ 'di 'phagaMsamasgrol ma nor thams
cad bde blag tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas gdug pa thams cad res par byed pa'o// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ tathA ga tA5 argyu te samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/
danam Ar+yas pale ba ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satuya/ mahAsan+taya bu ture/ a bo brti ka d+harma tut+tAre swAhA 'dan 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas kyi bde ba sbyin pa
nas bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas khyim 'byor par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga ta ya/ ad+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lokiti
shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahA satuya/ bud+d+he tAre su gad+harmataste/ dAnan+tamanar te tut+tAre/ a ba ban+ti['] d+hem tu re swAhA// 'dani 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sangs rgyas kyis dul ba zhes bya
ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas 'bras bu 'phal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na mo ratitra yA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ arta tasamyakasaM bud+d+ha ya/ nam Adz+dza a ba lo ki ni
shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satAyA/mahAsaya/ bun+te tAn/ ni dAn d+hamanir+yate tut+tA re/ a ba bti rnyam ni te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sangs rgyas ldan mkhas bya ba'i rig pa ste//

sh+tsa rtag tu bzlas pas rab tu mi gnas pa'i bza' ba'abyung par gyur ro// na mo rataMtra A ya na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tiya/ ad+hate/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba leka ti shur ya/ bo d+hi satwA

tsha@# ya mahAsatwAya/ bud+hu tA re/ brtad+harma teture/ bud+d+hAn+ta nir teture sAtA 'din 'phags ma sgrol masangs rgyas kyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pasaThabs mkhas pa rnams la blo skye bar

mar byed do// namorat+na trayA/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya an te/ sa la saM bud+d+hAya ma Aa ba le ka ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatu ya/ mahA sa ya/ su kha de ba tA re/ su khat+ta tut+tA re/ su la

rnamanir+ya te tureswAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrolam bde ba dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tubazlas pas nas 'phel ba skyed par byed do// na mo rat+tatrayAya/ nam a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ma

te sargyag saM ban+d+ha ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwarAya/ bod+hisatwA ya/ mahAsatwAya/ mni tAre darnyamani te/ tA re tu'i sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma ma dul ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas

pas dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yAyaM/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga ta ya/ a to/ saNog so bud+d+ha ya/ nam Argyas pa lo ki te shwa rAya/ bod+hisatAya/ ma satAya/ a nan tA re/

de tse tut+tAre a nut+pan ke tut+tA re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mtha' yas ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas bsod nams mtha' yas pa skye bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo a mi tA
ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ saMto samyakag saM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satA ya/ mahAsatAya/ a nan d+ha tun+te/ ri bye rtsame tut+ta re a nut+panIka d+hame tu re su/ 'di mtha'

yas shing mumed zhes bya ba ste/ rtag subazlas pos mtha' yas pa 'di sod nams skyo bar byed do// na mo ratra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ tathA ga ta ya/ sanya te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA yaM/ na/ byas ba lo
dkati shwa rAya/ bo rdzusaya/ ma hAsaa/ anan tA re a nan tan tut+tare a nan d+harmani te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma mtha' yas pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa
[N/ ]rtag tu bzlas pas nor thob par byed do// namo rataNAyAyaM/ namo a ma tA b+hAya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyako saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tAshwa rAya/ bo d+hi satAya/ mahU
satu ya a nan+tadz+ham re/ da byi d+harmani ta tut+tar/ anut+pan+tika d+hamanir+ya ta tu ra sA// 'di ni'aphagasam sgrol mamatha'ayasaM pa can du bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas
'tsha 'khyami gyi 'byor pa mtha' yas par 'gyur ro// na mo red+ma trayAyaM/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/arta te/ samyagasaM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo kati shA ra ya/ bo d+hi satAya/

mahAsatu ya/ sid+d+hi tA re/ sid+d+harnyamatut+tAre dasad+d+had+harmani te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa lta/ rtagatubazlas pas 'dod pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar byed do//
namo ratra yA ya namoa mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tAya ]ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ kho d+hisatwAya/ mahU satwaya/ sid+d+hA tAre a nan+titAre/ de btut+ta
la re a nut+pan+tikeng tureswAhA 'din 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas thabs la mkhas pa'i dul bas sems can ma 'a yas pa 'dul bar
byed do// na mo rat+na tra yAl dan mo a mi tAb+ha ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya bo dz+has// maltas tA ya/ sid+d+hA sid+d+he smaro/
anan tAredi byatut+tAre sitA/ 'din 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas lha'agro ba thob par byed do// na mo rat+tatra yAya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ye/
ta thA ga taya daarnyate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/name Adz+dza al le kiteshwarAya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hAsatwAya/ sid+d+hitA re anan re an d+ham re/ di byi d+harme tut+tA ri/ de bye d+harmatut+tar
a nut+pan+te tut+tAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags mo sgrol ma grub pa'i chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dmyal bar mi ltung bar 'gyur ro// namo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/

ta thA ga tAya/arta te/ samyakasi but+tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ kho d+hi satwaya/ ma hA satul/ sid+d+haMtAre/ a nAn d+hamani pati ta'i de cad+han nor tetut+tA re sa nut+panIka d+ham myu/
tureswAhA/ 'di ni 'phagasam sgrolamo grub pa skya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i rig paste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo// na mo ratA trayAya/ namo a mi tAb+hA ya/
ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAyaM/ bo d+hisatA ya/ mahA sataya/ da bya tAre di phyirnyam tu re/ nirAd+harmanir+ya te tu re sutA/ rig po 'di
rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams lta nyid du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na moa mi tAb+haya/ ta thA ga tAya ]ad+ha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar
a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ sid+d+hi'i anan d+harma tur/ onan d+hamani tatu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig paste/
rtag tu bzlas pas rta rnyed do// namo rit+ta trayA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+ha yaM/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rwaya/ bod+hisatAya mahA satAya/ sid+d+hi
tAre di rnyame tu re da bya d+ha ni te tu re satwA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas bas glang po che nyid do/ na mo ratA tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta/

ga tAya/ marta te/ samyag saM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwaya/ mahA sat+taya/ sid+d+hi tAre/ a ba bcu ka d+hani te tu re sat+ta/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mgrub pa myur mazhes bya

ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas pa longayang dag par 'byor par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+nayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ta thA ga tAya sad+ha ti/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ nam ar+yaa ba lo ki tishA rA ya/

bo d+hi satwA ya/mahA satAya/anut+pan+tika nyame tut+tA re/anut+pani karnyaman+tirahetut+tAretureswAhA/'di la phags ma sgrol ma skye ba chen bzhi'i bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtagatu bzlas pas gos 'byor par 'gyur ro// namo rat+na tra yAya/ namo

[n a mi tA b+ha ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ arta te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka tishA rA ya/ bo dz+ha satAya/ ma trA satAya/arAye tA re/udwayad+harmatut+tAre/a dwa ya d+harmatatut+tAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags
ma sgrol ma gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po dang blon po gnyis su med par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tAb+hAya tathA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka

saM bud+d+hAya na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ ma sUsatAya/ a dwa ye tAze/ ma hItut+tAre shA rag me tut+tA re swA hA/ 'dini 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis sumed par byams ma zhes bya ba'i
rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bodag nyid can du 'gyur ro// na mo pany+tsa tra yA ya/na mo sa mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/
nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishA rA ya// bo d+hisatuya/ ma tAsatwA ya/ a dwa ya d+hamani te/ tAre ma tri/ d+harmani te tu re swAt+tA 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gnyis su med pa'i dwapa'i mo zhes bya ba'i rig

pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas sbyo ba dang ldan zhing dpa' bar 'gyur ro// na mo ratAtra yAyaM/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ tathAgatAya/ad+ha te/ samyas saM bud+d+hA ya/nam Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwa rAya/bod+hisatwA ya/mahAsatA ya/ a dwa ya
rma tu re mdzad+hemetut+tAre/shar Mgam yartag tu reg tshiphags ma sgrol ma gnyis su med pa'i chos ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tubazlas pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na yA ya/ na mo
]ami ta b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya daad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kati shar ya/ bo d+hisatwAm/ mahA satAya/ kazhetAre a nAya tA'i/ mo tri tut+ta re/
shA rig ma tut+tAre swA/ 'dini 'phags ma sgrol ma bzodamazhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas zhi ba'i sems nyid do// namo ratwAtrayAya/ na mo ami tA b+ha ya/ tawe ga tAya saMb+ha te/
wA brgyag saM yaM/ nam Ar+ya a ba la[']ta shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwAya/ kane tAre shar M ga ma/ cha mnar ture sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa'i dpa' bo zhes bya ba ste/

'a rtag tu bzlasanami thub par 'gyu'o// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ na mo a mi ta b+haa/ tathA ga tAyo/ at+tati/ samyaka saM bud+d+heya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishwa rAya/ bo d+hi sat+tAya/ mahA satAya/ kAnye
tAre mi trid+d+hamanar tatu re su/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol mchos m zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pasadran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+thA yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+ha la/
tathA ga tAya/ acha te samyaka so tshaya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hisatwaa/ ma AsatwA yaM k+Shan+titAre/ a dwa yan+tarma tut+tA re/ a dwa ya rtam rate/ tu re sa/ 'di ni 'phags
masgrol ma bzod pa dang gnyis su mar ma zhisabya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag du bzlas pas rgyal po'i mdunana'adon du'agyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya tathA ga tA yaM/ arta te/

samyaka saMbud+d+hA ya/ namaAr+yaa ba lo ka ti shar ya/ bod+hisatwA ya/ ma tAsat+tAya/ kachu tAre/ a dwayan+tamatA re/ ma tri d+harma tut+tA re shA ra ga ma d+harmetureswAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma
bzod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal por gnang chen du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ tsathA ga ta ya/ an+ti ti/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya
a ba lo ka ti shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahA satAya/ kAn+yatAre/ a dwa ya tAre ma tri tut+tA re/ shA rag tshe tut+tAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig
pa rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i pho brang du skya pa'i mchog tu'agyur ro// na mo rat+na pAyAyo/ na mo a mi tA d+hAya/ tathA ga tA ya/ arta to/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo
ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satu ya/ ma hA satu ya klane t+tAre/ ne tAre/ klan nyame tut+tA re/ kachu d+harmanir+ya te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bzod pa nges par 'byung ma zhes
byu ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas nor thams cad 'dzan par byed do// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ ta thA ga tAya/arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo
ka ti shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satAya/mahAsatwA matA khaye/a dAmam+mehur/ a dwa ya d+hamanits+tsata tu re swAtA/ 'di ni 'phagasaMm sgrol ma gnyis su med pas 'phongs pa las sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste
rtag tu bzlas pasasems can thams cad dang gnyis su med par 'gyur ro// na mo ratwA tra yA ya/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te/ samyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ nam
Ar+ya a ba lo katishwa rAya/ bo d+hi satAya/ ma skasatAya dam tritAre/ dmetut+tAre/ ma hrid+harmani te tshur sA/ 'di'i 'phags ma sgrolamabyams ma zhes bya pa'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas
paN+Da pas sems can thams cad la khyams po'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+taM trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+haya/ ta b+ha ga tAya/ ad+hate/ samyakasaM bud+d+haya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti
tsha shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ ma hA satuya/ shA ri ga ma tA ro/ shA rig me nyame tut+tAre/ shA rig man+tar ni te tu re swA hA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dpa' bar 'gro mazhes bya ba'i rig paste/

partag tu bzlas pas chu rimatha' ji ltar bde bar rnyed do// na mo rat+thA trayAya/ namo a ma tAb+ha ma/ tathA ga tAya/arta te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yaa ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwAya/
ma hAsatwaya/ shar tse tA re/ bo d+hi wut+tare/ pUr sotu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs 'os ma zhes bya ba rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlasaM pas sems can thams cad kyi skyabs kyi 'os su yong

tsha dag par 'gyur ro// namorat+tatra yA yaM/ namo a mi tA b+hA yaM/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ namo Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ral/ bo d+hisatAya/ ma hA satAya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kAya/

sha ra Ned+ha tA ra bo d+hi d+he tut+tA re pA rA sha/ d+harmatureswa/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgro ma skyabs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig paste/ rtag tu bzlas pas chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ na mo rat+tatra
yA ma namo a mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga ta ya ]an ti/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kati shu ra ya/ bo d+hisatuya/ mahA satAya/ sha ra Ni tA re tut+tAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma
sgrol ma skyabs kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tubazlas pas so so'i skyo ngor yang dag par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad ba lang du mi 'gyur ro// namo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/
tathA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo rta satu ya/ mahAsatwAya/ sha ra Nad+ha ni te tAre/ bad+hin+d+rir te wAre/ pU ru sha rnaman+tirAte tu re sU
'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma skyabs myur ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tubazlas pas thams cad du legs par 'ongs pa brjod pa so sor red do// na mo ratu tra yAya/ na mo a mi ta b+haya/tathA
ga ta ya/ sad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shA rA ya// bo d+hi satwAya/ ma hAsatAya/a maM ta tAre/ so mya tA ro/ a saM kr-i ta d+harmatu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma
sgrol ma bdud rtsi ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas sems can thams can la bdud tsa rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/

ad+hate/ samyag saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+his tAya/ mahAsatwA ya/ a mi tad+hamanar te tA re so mo/ d+ham ra tetut+tAre/ a saM kr-i tad+hamatu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol

ma 'dud rtsi'i chos nges par 'byung ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas bad rtswa dang ldan bar 'gyur bde ba thob bo/ na morat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+hA ya/ ta yA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samya saM bud+d+hA ya/

nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka tishA rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twAya/ mahAsatAya/ a mr-i ta rnyaman te tAre so mya d+harmani tatut+tAre/ asaM oM hacha mnar te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba nyid ces bya ba'i rig pa//

rtag tu bzlas pas 'dod chags nya bar zhi bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA n+d+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi satAya/ mahAsat+taya

dri rnyetAre/ shar Ni tAre/ bo d+hi tut+tare/ su ra sa tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags masgrol ma brtan m zhes bya ba'iyig ba ste/ rtag tu bak+kus bas nad med cing lus brtan par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ami

ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ artate/ samyakasaM puN+Dal/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo rdzus tA ya/ mahAsatAya/ drit+ta trA re/ sha ra tsernyamani pe tu re/ bo d+hid+haman hetut+tAre/ bod+hed+hamani tetut+tAre/ pA ra sa rnyaman+tIpatatu

reswAhA/ 'dana'i phags ma sgrol ma brtan par 'gro ma zhes bya ba rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas tshir 'gyur te mchod rten gyi las la sogs pas tshe 'phal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+hi/

kha00 samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satAya/ mahAs tAya/ srid+d+ho tAle/ po rnyarnyam tut+ta re bo d+hi sha ra Ned+hamani te/ pu rased+harmatu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma brtan pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa

ste rtag tu bzlas pas bcos ma dang/ bcos ma ma yin pa'idug thams cad sel bar byed do// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ tathA ga tapa/ ad+ha to/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ba/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta

rAya bo d+hisatuya/ mahA satAya/ dza rgyu ste/ r-i D+ha d+hame tut+tA re/ dr-ib+ha rnyamanar te tu re swAhA/ 'di 'bag ma sgrol ma bstan pa dpaldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu blos pas 'jigs pa chen bo rnams
sal bar byed do// na mo ratA tra yA ya/ na mo ami ta b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti/ shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwAya/ mahA satwA/ d+harma tAre/
am tan+tamanir+ya tatAre/ so mya d+harmanir+ya te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bdung rtsilegs par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas 'ching ba rnams grol bar byer ro//
na moran+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ achu te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ ahA satwaa/ so mya tA re
so mya d+harma tut+tA re so skye sAhA/ 'di na 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba nyid kyi bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas mdzes thams cad sel bar byed d// namo ratAtArAya/na mo
mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ arta te samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Arlus pa lo ka tinArAya/ po dz+ha sat+taya/ ma tA satwA ya/ d+harma tAraM/ a mr-i te d+hame t+tAre/ so
mya tut+tAre/ sos te tut+tA re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa sa/ rtag tubazlas pas sor mo'i nad thamAhad 'dzoms bar byed do// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+haya/
tathA ga tAya/ ad+ha to/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/na mo Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwa rAya/ bo d+hisatu ya/ mahAsatu ya/ rtemare/ d+harma d+harma tut+tare/ d+hamanar tetureswAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma
sgrol ma chos dang chos ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas gsar gyi snod pa 'byung// namo rat+taM trayA ya na mo sA mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka/

si but+tA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shA ru ya/ bo d+hi satu ya/ mahAsatu ya/ d+harmatAre/ a kr-i ta d+harmatA re so mya d+ham b+ha ti tAre/ a saM skra ta d+ha tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma/
'dus byas pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dngul gyi rnyed pa 'byung ngo// na mo rat+na tAyAya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta tha ga tAya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/
na ma Ar+ya a ba lo koti shwa rA ya/ bod+hisatu ya/ maAsat+tAya/ a mr-i ta re ]a mr-i te d+harma tut+tAre/ tu re a mi tA d+hamanimyutatu ri sAhA/ 'din 'phags ma sgrol ma bdud rtsi thams cad kyi
0 chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dbyig 'byung ngo// na mo ratA tra yAya/ na mo a mi ta b+haya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyakAsaM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/
bod+hisatA ya/ ma hAsatwAya/ d+hame tAre/ a mr-i tan+tamAtAre lcaa mi tadz+harmani taturje sAtA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rgyu ba thams cad
mthong bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a ma tu t+taya/ ta thA ga tA yaM ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shar ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahA satwaya/ asaM
sgo ha tAre/ saM kr-i tan+tamo tut+tA ri/ asaM sa ta rnyam nir te tu re sANA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pos mkha' 'gro mas zin pa/
rnams la bltas pas grol bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ad+haM te/ samyakAsaM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwa ya//
mahAsahAya/ d+harma tAre/ so myu d+harma/ rtam nir+ya tatu re swAt+tA/ 'di na 'phags ma sgrol ma zhi ba'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas srul po'i gdon gyis zin pa thams
cad la bltas pas grol bar byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tathA ga tA ya/arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA yaM/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwAya/
mahA satAya/d+harme tAre/ a saMa tad+ha tut+ta re/ asaM ta d+harmar te tureswAt+ta/ rtag tu bzlas pas tshas pa'i srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams l bltasapas grol bar byed do/

@# na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo ami ta b+hAya/ ta thA ga tAya/arga te/ samyokasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yaa ba lokati kA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ matAsatu ma/ a ra Nadz+ham ni tetA re bapyad+ham tut+tA re/ Arar nad+hamaN+Da
te sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'bab pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig paste/ rtag tu bzlas pas brtan pa dang g.yo ba la sogs pa'i dug thams cad sol bar byed do// namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo

mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya/arta te/ samyaka saM but+tA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahAsatwAya a ru Ne re bir+yatut+tAre/ a ni rAn tu re swAt+tA 'di na 'phags ma sgrolam skya

res dang po mthong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas yul gru sbyin par byed do// namorany+tsa tra yAya/ na mo ami tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ arta te/ samyaka saMbud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yaa ba lo ki te shwa rA ya

bod+hisatAya/ mahAsat+taya/ a ra Ned+ha re ba d+harmadut+tAre/a ni darAn d+ha tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags masgrol ma chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas lo thog thams cad yang dag par 'byor

tshathu par 'gyur ro// na morat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA yaM/ ta thA ga tA ya/an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi saya/ mahAsatwaya da bir+ya tA re a ra Ni tA re/ bang rgyu/

'i anar natu res/ 'di ni 'phagasam sgrol ma rig pa gsum gyi chos shes bya ba ste rtag tu bzlas pas mtha'a mthong ba rnyed par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+nayA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+haya/ tathA ga ta ya/ atshate/

samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam sma a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bod+hisatwAya/ mahAsatiya/ tAb byAtAre/ a ra Nad+harma tAre ba rume tA'i bar d+harme hAt+tA re trab iradz+dzamanar te tu reswAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol marig pa gsum

pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i bu'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ta thA ga tAya/ a te samyakas bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/

bo d+hisatwA ya/ mahA satwaya/ trabid+ya re a ra Nan+tame tAre dbang d+harmatut+tAre/ an daran d+harma tu re swAhA/ bdun 'phags ma sgrol ma nyon mongs pa med pa'i rig pa gsum zhes bya ba ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas bumed

thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+tatra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ab+hato/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya nam A a ba lo kiteshwa rAya/ bod+hisatAya/ maN+DasatwA ya/ tri pid+d+hA tAre/ ani dar ni d+hamahut+tAred
a ni dar madz+harmanir te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum bstan du med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas gzhi thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na pAyA ya/

! na mo a mi ta ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM ban+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo kati shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ man+tA satwAya daNi bti tA re/ar Na d+harmani te tAre/bcud+hamanepatat+tatu ye/ a ni rarAn d+harmani te
tureswAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum gyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi tA b+haya/ tathA ga tAya/ man+ta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam
Ar+ya a ba lo kAte shur ya bad+hisatuya/ mahA sat+taya/ tra bar+ya tAre/ bdu tAre/ birU d+harma tut+tare/ bing cha mnita tu'i sut+tA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma rig pa gsum zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/

tsha rtag tu bzlas pas grong stong sdom pa red do/ na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+haya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kaNishA rwaya/ bo d+hisatwAya/ mahAsatwA
ya tA r+ya tAre/ a ra Ned+harma tut+tAre a ra Nadz+ham ni tangur sA// 'di ni 'phags masgrol ma gsum rig ma zhes bya ba'i rig pat+taM/ rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal po'i pho brang na yod pa thams cad kyi
gnang chen por 'gyur ro// na mo ratwAtrayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ta thA ga tAya ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar a ba lo ki ti shu raya/ bod+hisatwA ya dmahA satA[j]a ra Ne ta'o/

a ra Nan+tatshe tut+tA re/ a ra Na d+ham ni te tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags masgrol ma 'thab pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas bas smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo amaM b+ha

ya ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyakasi bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwAya mahA sat+tAya/ ba tu re dang tadz+harman+ti ta cu re swAt+ta/ 'dina' phags ma sgrol ma zhes khu ba'i rig
bste rtagatubs pas sems can thams cad la rig pa slar yapa'i byung bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/
na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kA hi shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ar Na tAre da d+hame tut+tAraM a mi tAb+ha tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma nges par shes pa zhes
bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas yul gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayA a/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tAya ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya na ma Ar+ya
a ba la ka ta kwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya ]a ra ne tAre da d+harman ri te tA re ni ra Ni d+harmatut+tA re tu re swAhA/ 'di na 'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon med pa zhes bya ba'i
rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dbang du byed do/ bdan mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA yaM/ an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka shA rA
bo d+hi satAya/ mahAsatwA ya/ni raM Na d+harma tAre/ shAnu d+hame tut+tAre a mi ta b+ho d+harma tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon dang bral ba'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pasku//
rtag tu bzlas pas dri za rnams dbang du byed par 'gyura'o// de rnams lha'i sman rab tu sbyin te/ de rnams zos pas lo steng du 'tsho bar byed do// de bzhin du thams
cad du'o// namor/ trayAya/ namo a mi ta ya/ ta tha ga tAya/ ab+hate/ samyaka saM bad+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ka ti shwa rAya/ bod+hisatu ya/ mahA satAya/
raraM Narnyam ni te tut+tAre/ a mi ta b+ha d+harmanir de tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bu lon med pa'i 'od dpag med kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlasaM pas tshangs pa'i srin
po dang bcas pa rnams dbang du byed do// na mo rut+tAdza?yAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hU yo/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+na te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Amyaa ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bod+hisatAya/
mahA satwA ya/ satA tu re nir Na/ nir Nanir ro tsirnyam ni te tAre/ d+hamanyaman tso tut+tAre/ ami tA b+ha d+harmanir te tu re swAhA/ don 'phagasam sgrol ma snying stobs zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/
klu rtag tu bzlos pas gzhan rnams dang/ rang gis byas pa'i anamA dang/ rdzas rnams thams can la dbang byas par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+hate

samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ka tishA rAya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ mahAsatwA ya/ satepAr na ro tse tA re/ d+harma tut+tA re a mi tA b+he ut+ta re tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs/
kyi 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed do// na mo rat+ta tra Iya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saMbut+tA
a nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka tishA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satAya/ satwe tu re satAd+harma tut+tA re/ satA d+hanir te tu re swAt+tA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs kyichos zhes bya ba'irig/
ba ste rtag tu bzlas pas srul po thams cad dbang du byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ tathA ga tA ya an+nate/ salcag saM bud+d+hAya/ namo Ar+ya a ba le ka tishar ya/
bot+taMsatwAya/ mahA satuya dasatwe tA'o/ ni ri Nad+harmani taM/ rtamad+hamani patatut+tAre/ a mi ta b+hAdz+ham ni te tu re sA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma snying stobs thob pa zhes bya ba'irig pa ste/
rtag tu bzlas pas rig pa thams car dbang du byed cing mi snang bar yang 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi t+yAt+taya/ ta b+hA ga tAya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a
b.lokiteshwarAya/ bo d+hi sata ya/ ma shusatwAya/ d+harmatAro/ d+hartsetut+tAre/ d+hamad+hananir tu ri sAwA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste chu bzlas pas

lha dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams dbang du byed do// na mo rat+na tra ya ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hAsatwA

ya tAre/ d+harma d+harma tut+tAre swAtA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi rig pa can m zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas klu'i bu mo thams cad dbang du byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo a
mi tAb+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ad+ha te/ sagyuka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishar ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ man+tasaya/ d+hareture/ d+harma d+harma tut+tAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phag

masgrol ma rtag pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig bste/ rtag tu bzlas na khyim chen po'i bdag por 'gyur ro// nAmorat+na tra yA ya/ na tsho a mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAyaM/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saMbud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya/

N+Da a ba lekati shwa rAya/ bo d+hi sa twaya/ mahAsatwAya/ d+harmatAre/ d+harmani ri Ne/ d+hamatshigasaN/ d+ham nirahatu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'od dpag tu med pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/
rtag tu bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de 'gugs par byed do// namo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ ta thA ga tAyaM/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saMbud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka tikArAya/ bod+hisatwA ya/
mahAsatwAya/ d+harma tAste/ martan n ture sAdA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma chos kyi sams ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas sems can rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur
ro na mo rat+na pAyA/ na mo a mi tAn+ta ya/ ta b+hug tu a/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rwaya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ mahA satwaya/ amok+She tA re/ saMb+he tut+tAro/
ri su kha ba ti'u res// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas stobs dang gzi brjid rnams gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyura'o// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ namo

ami ta b+hU a/ ta thA ga tAya ]an te samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka tsIshar ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mad+masataya ]a mo g+ha d+harman+nAmI tetAre/ saM g+ha rnamanar ta tu'i su kha ba tid+harmanimyute

tu re swAtA/ 'di// 'phags ma sgrol ma 'chi ba 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'ab tu 'jug pa rnyed do// na mo rat+tA dza?yAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tathA ga tAya

arda te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satuya/ mahA satwAya/ a mo g+ha tAre/ a mo g+had+harma tut+tA re/ a mo g+ha b+hamanar te tu re swA// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrolam
'chib 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+ta h+phayAya/ na mo ab tA tsAya/ tathA ga tAya/ arma te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/nam Ar+ya

a ba lo kati shA rA ya/ bo d+hisatu ya/ mahAsat+taya/ a nan+ti tAre/ a mo g+ha d+harma ta tut+tAre/ su kha ba ti d+harmani'u pachu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phagasgrol ma rig sngags mazhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/
rtag tu bzlas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yAyo/ na mo a mi tA b+hA a/ ta thA ga tAya/ arma to/ samyakaM saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rwaya/ bo d+hi satapa ka
mahA satwA ya tsitAraa mo g+ha re/ su kha ba ti tu re swAhA/ 'di na 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rang gi khyim dugater mthong
[n ]@#// ste zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// na mo rasna trayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tathA ga tAya/ sadz+dzate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hisitu
ya mahAsatAya/ a tsin+titAre/ a tsin+ya tut+tAre/ atsinu d+harmani te tsu'e sA/ 'di ni 'phagasam sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bdud pa'i chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas
pas lha'i bcud len du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi ta khyu ya/ ta tha ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sat+taya/ mahAsatA ya/

a tsin+tu tAre/ a tsin+ti d+harma tut+ta re/ a tsin+ti d+hamanar tetureswAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba nye
bar zhi bar byed do// na mo ratrayAyo/ na mo a mi tAb+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA la/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki teshwa rAya/ bo d+hisatAya/mahAsatAya/a mo g+ha

d+harma tAre/ saM g+ha d+harmatut+taro/ su kha ba ti d+hare tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'idge 'dun zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas tshe ring por 'gyur ro// namo

rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/ tathA ga tA ya/arta te/ samyaka saM buts+tshaya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwAya/ ma hA satwA ya/ a tsaN+Di tA re/ saM g+ha rnyam tut+tA re/ si g+hadz+ham
nir+ya te tu ra sUtwA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// nam rat+na tra yA

ya na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ tathA ga tAya/ arta te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwarAya/ bo d+haM satwAya/ mahAgatAya/ a tsan+d+he ta'e/ a mo g+hadz+harma tut+tare/ a mo g+ha d+harma
nir+yate tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bsamagyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste// rtag tu bzlas pas bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang 'chiba'i dusa mngon sum du shes par byed do// na mor/
trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tAya/ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka tishA rA ya/ bod+hisatwA ya/ mahAsat+taya/ a tsin+ti tAne/ su kha ba ti d+harme tut+tAre/ su la

ba tid+harmanir+ya te su'e sAny+tsa 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bezlas pas rang 'chi ba shes par byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/

tab ga tA ya/a/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahAsatwA ya/ su kha ba ti d+harmetAre/ su kha ba ti d+harma tut+tAre/ su kha ba ti d+harmanatsetuture swAhA/

'din 'phags ma sgrol ma bde ba can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// na mo rat+tatra yAye/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ tathA ga tA ya arta te/ samyakasaMbud+d+ha
ya nam Ar+ya a ba lekati shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwAya/ saM g+ha tAre/ saM g+ha d+harma tut+tA re/ saM g+ha rnyamAn ta tureswA// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dge 'dun
zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa byed pa'i ng sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// namo rat+ta trayAya/ na mo a mi ta ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka
saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishA rA ya/ bo d+hi satAya/ mahAsatwA ya/ a ba lo ki te tAr/ Ahitut+tAraM/ an gan tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma sbyin ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i
rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas 'tshiba'i dus su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar byed do// de nas lha'i 'gro ba kun nas thob par byed do// na mo ratra Aya/ na mo a ma tA b+ha ya/tathA
ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba le ka tishar ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ mahA satAya/ a ba leka te smin tat+tA re/ I sha d+harmanir+ya tetut+tAr daanaM gad+harmanir+ya ta tu re
sAt+taM 'di ni 'phagagalam spyan ras gzigs kyi chos zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste rtag tu bzlas pas nor dpaldan par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/
samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rA yo/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahAsatwAya/ a ba lo ka ti d+hamatAre Ishar d+hatshe tut+tAre/ a gan d+hare tu re swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma
sbyan ras gzigs lus med ces bya ba'i rigapa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dar la dang dri thob par byud do// namo rats+tshatAyA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/an te/ sam+buka saM bud+d+hAya/
nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAya/ bod+hisatu ya/ mahAsatAya/Ar+yatAr a ba lo ka ti d+harmanir+ya tatAre I sha d+harman tut+tAre a ni gan d+harmani teture swA hA/ 'di ni 'phagasaMm sgrol
ma 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas rgyal srid dang/ chos dang/ lha dang/ nor yang thob par byed do// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi tAb+hAya/ ta thA ga tA ye/
acha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hAya dan ma Amyua ba lo ka tig rwa a/ bo d+hisatwaya/ mahAsatAya/ a ba lo ki ti tar/ I a ni gni tu'e sAwA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma
kun nas gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas yul gyi dpon por 'gyuraMro// na mo rat+na trayAya/ nAmo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/arma te/ samyaka
saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishA rA ya/ bo d+hisat+taya/ mahAsat+taya/ Ar+ya tA re/ a ba lo ka ti d+harma tA raM/ Asha d+han tut+tAro anaM gan d+harmi tu re swAhA/ 'din 'phags
ma sgrol ma 'phags ma 'chi med mazhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na trayAa/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/ tablag tu ya a tu/
samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA/ mahA sa twa ya/ I sha tAre I sharnyam tut+tAre/ Isha d+harman patshur sAhA/ 'di ni'aphags
ma sgrol ma dbang po zhes bya ba'i rig pa// rtag tu bzlas pas gdengs can du ma skye zhing skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// na mo rat+ta prayAya na mo a mi tre b+ha ya/ ta b+ho ga tAya/ad+ha te/ samyaka/
saM bud+d+hA ya/na ma Ar+ya a ba 'a[']tishar ya/ bo d+hisat+taya/ mahAsat+taya/ Ar+ya tAr/ a naM ga smin r+ya tatshur sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma lus mad ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/
rtag tu bzlas pas lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ra Ar+ya a ba lo ka
tishar ya dbo d+hi satu ya/ mahA satu ya/ Ar+yatAre/ a ba lo ki tad+harmatut+tAre swAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'phags pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/rtag tu bzlas pas ba
thams cad du smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// na mo rat+ma tAyAya/ na mo a mi tA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba loka ti shwa rAya/ bo d+hi sa twA
ya mahAsatu ya/ I shi tA re d+harma hut+tAre/ Ig rnamanitsAhahu re sAdA3 'di na 'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po'i mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas dbang phyug tu
'gyur ro// na mo rat+na traAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ an te/ samyakayaM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwarA ya/ bod+hisatwa ya/ mahAsatwaya/ I she ta'e/
i shachamar ta tAre swAhU~M/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po thob pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas gdon mi za bar thams cad mthong ngo// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi tA
b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/d+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shAr yaM/ bo d+hisaya/ man+tas taya/ tad+ya thA/ ri dzu karmaAr+yatAre/ tAr ya b+ha ga ba ti/ tut+tA
raM sarba b+ha ya/ mo tsa nisAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa las grol ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa sta/ rtag tu bzlas pas skya ba dran par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+tA trayAya/
na mo am byA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya 'borgyusatAya/ mahAsatu ya/ tad+ya glu/ tA re tar NaM/ tus pa/
sha hU~M b+ha ya nAg ni mo tsa ni tu'i sAtsA/ 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma g.yul las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro//
na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA yaM/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti hra ru ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahAsatwAya/ tA'e tAre/ tArAyo
b+ha ga ba ti bcu mo tsa nasAhA/ 'dani 'phags ma sgrol ma 'ching ba grol ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas bsamAn+tana rnams grol bar byed do/ na mo rat+tatra yAya/
namoa mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga taya 2ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahA satuya daa tut+tA re tut+ta reb ra badza mo gAnisAhA/ 'di ni 'phags ma

sgrolam rdorje las thar par byed ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bozlas pas rdo rje'i thog sol bar byed do/ na mo rat+na/ yAya/ na mo a ma tA b+ha ye/ ta wA ga tAya/ ad+ha te dasamyugasaM bud+d+has
na ma Ar+yas ba lo ka ti shwa rAya/ bo d+hisatuya mahAsan+d+hAya/ bya b+hU/ t+tA ri dzukarnyamar tut+tAro/ na nir+ya ta tA re an g+halA s+ya/ d+ham ni sutAre tu re hin sa ni ba byas nATika ni
mad+hani/ dzamanasnyan+tani/ pra b+he tsAn pra b+ho/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi laM/ bag sha bani kun+ti kum ku/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ na ba ti tAre/ hur/ ku ruku ru/ a hayA yaM/ tsaniya/ sin
tAn sA d+ha ya swAhA 'di ni rtsa ba'i rig pa ste/ rtag tu bzlas pas thams car sgrub par byed do// de na 'di'i sgrub thobs kyi chog rig par 'gyur ro// na morat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi ta/
ya ta thA ga tA ya/ ate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya dan ma Ar+yaa ba loka tishA roya/ bo d+hisatwaa/ mahAsatwAlaM/ tad+ya thA/ su ra su rA pa tiha ra har sUt+tA/ 'di ni gu gul gyis sbyin drang
ba'i rig pa'o// rnamorawAhAAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ad+ha te/ samyag saM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishA rA ya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ man+tA satwAya/ tad+ya thA/ tAre tar
ba ti sarba saMdzra sA d+hin til+latits+tshA daA khanar/ sid+d+himahAmasAhA/ 'di ni mchod yon gyi rig pa'o// na mo ratA tra yA ya/na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyakasaM
bud+d+hAya na ma Ar+yaA ba le[']ti shar ya/ bod+hi satwa ya/mahAsatAya/ tad+ya thA/ sngar ra/ ku ru ku ru/ gtsalA sa ni saA/ 'di ni dri'i rig pa'o// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ namo
a mi tA b+hA ya/ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM 'an ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rwa ya/ bo d+hi satwaya/ mahAsatwA ya/ tad+ya/ a mo g+ho/ a mo g+ha/ bA si ba ra de sAkaM/
'di na mi tog gi rig pa'o// na mo ratatrayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+ha ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ ad+ha te/ samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishA rA ya/ bo d+hisat+taya/ mahAsatAya/
tad+ya thA/ me g+ha swa ra ku ru swAhA/ 'di ni bdug spos kyi rig pa'o// na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ twaM b+ha ga tA ya/anyate/ samyakasaM bud+d+hAya/na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shu
rAya bo d+hi satAya/ masid+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ tAre tAre/ da ni da ni/ han han/ ku ru ku ru/ disha ba la swAhA/ 'di ni gtor ma'i rig pa'o/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo a mi tAb+hA
dam ta thA ga tAya/ arta te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shar ya/ po d+hi sa twA ya/ mahAgatAya/ tad+yawA/ me tadzA la dzA la dzA la/ de ba sA
'di ni mar ma'i rig pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mo a mi ta b+hA yaM/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arta te/ samyaka saM b+haya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+hisat+taya/ ma/satwA yaM/
tad+ya thA/ hi ri hiri/ su ru su ru/ mu rumu ru/ sucha satwAkA ru Ni kA/ gtsA tisA d+hu ba naM/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAs ma ya ma nu sma ra ya swAhA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i
rig pa ste dam tog dkar po dang mchod yon gyis gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro// zhes pa 'di rnams rtsa la'i rig pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i rig pa'o// na mo rat+na trAyA ya/

na mo a ma tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tAya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saMbud+d+hAya/ na ma Ar+yaa ba lo ki te shwarAya/bots+tshasaya/ mayasat+tAya/tad+yathA don re tsetAnesats+tshasgrol ma la skyabs su gsol ba 'debs pa'o/
na mo ratrayA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tathA ga tA ya/ u0f00d+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwarAya/ bo d+hi satug/ mahA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ d+harmatAreture
sAhA me tog la sogs pa'i 'bras bu chos kyi sgrol mas sems can dbang du byed do// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ na mo a mi ta b+hA ya/ta thA ga ta// ad+ha to/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma
Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAya/ bod+hisatwAya/ mahAsatwAya/ tad+ya thA/ satwA tA re tu re sA/ sems can rnams la 'phags ma sgrol mas sems can rnams dga' bar byed pa'o//
na mo rat+na trayAya/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya ta thA ga tAyau0f38/ Arta te/ samyaka sa but+tAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba leka tishA nAya bo d+he satwAya/ mahAsatam/ tad+yathA/ satwA rin+ti
tA re swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma sems can sgrol mas bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin pa'o// naoM rat+na pAyA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tathA ga tAya/ an te/ samyaka saM but+tA

detut+tAr sA/// 'phagasamasgrolam bkod pa ldan m zhes bya ba'o// namoratA tAyAm/ namo a mi ta ya/ tathA ga tAa/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha// na ma
Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAya/ bod+hisatAyaM/ mahA satAya/ tad+ya thA/ karme Arlu ba ti tA rab+ha ga ba ti t+tat+tAresAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol 'phyug boldan m zhes bya bkro/ na mo rat+na tra yAya/

trayA ma da rnam Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta sha ru ya/ bo d+hisatu ya/ mahAsatwAyaM/ tats+tsha b+he da wi daMSh+Tha ba tiratur sAny+tsa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma bltas pa dang ldan mazhes bya ba'o//

na mo rat+tarAyAya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ka tishwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwaya/ mahAsatwA ya/ tad+ya thA ]anaM gne a naM ga ba tita re tu re swAhA/ 'phagasamasgrol ma lus med ldan ma zhes bya ba'o

namo rat+tA trayAya/ na ma Ar+yaa ba lo katishwa rAya/ bo d+hisatwaya/ mahAsatwaya/ tad+ya thA/ bi shud+d+he bi shud+d+ha ba tiShAre tut+tAre swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rnam dag ldan ma zhes bya ba'o//

ba'o namor trayA/ na masAr+yaa ba lekata shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/ mahAsatwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ud ke ud ka ba titAre tA re tu su// 'phagasamasgrog
chu bo ldan zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na trayA ya/ nam Ar+yam ba le ka ta shar ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/mahAsatAya/tad+ya thA/ big+ha bag ba titA re pAre swAhA/ phags ma sgrol ma 'gegs can
ma zhes bya ba'o// na moratA trayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lekati shwa rAya/ bo n+tisat+taya/ mahAsatwA yaM/ tad+ya thA/ ka shekA shab tu ro tureswAhA/ laphagasamasgrol ma gsal ldan ma zhes khyu

nam ka a ba la ka ti shar ya/ bo rnyesatAya/ mahAsatuya/ tabyot+tA karnyib ti ta ratAretwAt+tA re tut+tA re tu re tureswAhA/ 'phagasamasgrol ma bzod pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'o// namoratA
trayA ya/ nam Ar+yaa ba lo ki te shwa rIya/ kho rnyesatiya/ mahAsatAya/tad+yathA/ shud+d+ho tAro tAre tut+tA re tur tu re tu re hu b+ha ma titAre swAhA/ phagasam sgrol ma dge ba ldan
ma kum bdun nu'og la sbyor/zhes bya ba'o// na mor trayA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo kati shwa rAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahAsat+tAa/ tad+ya thA/ sAr+yatAres mAn tut+tAretur turatAr/ sUr+ya
ma titA sAtA/ 'ang gas ma sgrol ma nyi ma ldan ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+natsayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki teshwarAya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/mahAsaya/ ta thA/ tsan+dAtAre tsaN+Das
ma tAre tA ro tsan t+tis ma tAre tAre tur tu ra sAnA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma zlab ldan ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo ratA trayAya/ne ma Ar+ya a ba lo ka ti shwa rAya// bod+hisatwA ya/ mahAsatAye/
tad+ya thA/ dzA lani tAre 'dzA la sa ma tAr/ dzul ba ti tA sA/ 'phags ma sgrolam 'bar ba ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/ namorat+na tra yA ya/ nam mA r+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/bod+ho
satwaya dmahAgatAya/ tats+tsha shA/ bra smi tAraM/ bu skyes mo tAre/ bra h+pha Tis ma trer bru h+pham ticu re tu re swAhA/ 'phagasam sgrol ma tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na trayA
ya na ma Ats+tshas ba letaMArA ya/ bo d+hisat+tAya/ mahAsatwAya/ ta/ isi tAro/ u0f00nas ma tAre/ in+tA pa hitAre tu retu re swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma dbang po'i bdag
mo zhes bya ba'odo [0f7a ]/namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo teshwar ya/ bo d+hi satwAya/ mahAsat+tayaM/ tad+ya t+tA/ an+na tAre an pa tatare tA re hut+tAre swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma
kha zas kyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na trayAa/ nam Araa ba lo kagatishwa rAya/ bod+hisatwAya/ mahAsatA la/ tapyawA/ AkA ga tAre/ A kA sha pa ta re tu re re sAnA/ 'phag
masgrolam kun nas gsal ba'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o// na mo rata trayA ya/ na mo Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shar ya/ bod+hisata ya/ mahAsat+taya/ tapya/ga gne tA re gag na pa ti tA
ri tA re tu rasAwA/ 'phags ma sgrol mnam mkha'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o// namo ra yAya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki tishar ya/ bod+hisatAya/ mahAsatwA ya/ tad+ya thA/
dzayi tAre dzayo ba ti tar da re re tur su// 'phags ma sgrol margyul ba'i bdag mo zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/nam Ar+ya a ba lo kiteshwa rAya/ bo d+hisat+taya/ ma//
sa twA ya/ tapya/sarba de ba tAsAr tA ro a b+hi sA ra pa titA re tu re ture tu re swA// 'phags ma sgrol ma 'od gsal gyi bdag mo zhes bya ba'o// tshoratAA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki
tahArA ya/ bod+hisatAya/ mahAsatwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ prat+tan pra titAre/ prastun tAretur ture phra d+hA na ba ti sAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma gtso bo ldan ma zhes bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya
nam A myaa ba lo kiteshwarA ya/ bod+hi sa tAya/ mahAsatiya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba de ba tAre/ sarba de ba ba ti tA'i tA re ture sa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma lha thamasacad kyi bdag mo zhes
dbya ba'o// namor trayA/na maAr+yas ba lag ta shwa rAya/ bo d+hisatAya/ mahA sataa/ tad+ya thA/ sa man tare/ sa man ba ti tAre/ sa mnam ti tAre
tur tu ri tArasAt+tA/ lags masgrolam kun tu ldan ma zhes bya ba'o// namo rat+na trayA ya/ nam Ar+yaa ba lo ki shwa ra la/ bo d+hisatu ya/ mahA saya/ tad+ya thA/ sa maM d+ha ma ti tAraM
