gsum du// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis// rtsa ba'i rig pa bzlas pa dang// dkyil 'khoras gzhal bltasanas// dbus su me tog 'phra ba dor// gal te me tog 'phreng g.yo byed// de nas byon/
par shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas byang sems l// ri yi chu yasemachod yon dang// me tog phulacig de nas ni// khru brgya'i phyi rol sa gzhi la// yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ru// a pA mAna'i yam

shangagis// ma ni rab tu sgyur byas nas// shar du mngon phyogs ku shaya// khris la nye bar 'dug pa yis// rtsa ba'i snying po sbrang rtsi zho/ mar gyis srog blugs brgyad brgyar dbul// de nas sangs rgyas/

byang sems dang// lha rnams la yang machod yon dbul// de nas rakyil 'khor phyogs bzhi'i// gso sbyong yongs su blangs pa yi// skyes bu srung ba'i 'brang ba dang// dbang po tshang ba gzhag par bya// de la
'di ni brjod bya ste// gang zhig rnam pa gzhan byag/ skyong ba bral bar 'gyur ba ste// dkyil 'khor dam tshig brgyad rnams gi/ langadag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir chog byas pa yis// slob mas
dmatshag shes par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon gang// rang gnas slob mas thabs cig tu// song nas ku sha bting pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// tshogs kun
rjes su dran pa yis// g.yas pa'i gzhogs kyis nyal bar bya// de nas tho rangs slob dpon gyis// gtsangam shar ru kha phyogs pas// rmi lam rnam par dpyad par bya// de la 'di ni brjod bya ste/
@#/ gang zhag tsan dan bal ba sogs// u dum bar sogs skya gro d+ha// rgyal mtshan 'phrang bas khyab pa dang// rmi lam rab tu dad pa'i ng rung// kha cig ma lce mdzes pa dang/

de ltar mthong ba de'i dngos grub// mchog gi bar du'o ngang pa dang// kAranA ba khrung khrung dang// rmabya ro haN rnams// gang zhage de lta bu mthong 'gyur// rmi lam bar ma'i dngos grub de// myur ba kho nar
byung bar 'gyur// mi 'am ra hayang rung// de bzhin pa wang thogs pa dang// kun la sogs pa yang rung// de bzhinaa sAg rnyi mthong an// gang yang rgyalama mthong byed pa// mi rnams bla ma'i dngos
grub de// sgrol ma'i rtog par nges bar bstan//gtum po khyil sogs pa rnams// gang gis mthong bar gyur pa dang// bong bu ja mong shing rta sogs// mthong dang reg pa la sogs sam rgya skyugs til mar gyi

cha rig pa gang ga rmi lam du 'jug pa// de'i dngos grub nges par med// dam tshig tsamadu 'byung bar 'gyur// de lta bu sogs yon tan ldan// rmalam blo yis rnam dpyad bya// de ltar rang blos gangashes nas// slob
ma de la lam gyi// mtshan nyid lung du bstan par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slobadaponan// gal takhyim gnas gyur pa 'am// dge slong dge slong mdang na// drag bsnyen dge bskon ga yang rung// chen po de

rnams gso sbyong ni// bzung sta phyi nas slob ma rnams// gso sbyong yang dag gus par bya// slob ma rmi lam ma dag pa// bstan bya sngon du sbyin sreg bya// de nas dkyil 'khor slob bon ni// snga ma khe nar sa
[n/ ]dngan las rasa mthar nas las// zangs las byung bar rab zhugs te// yang dag 'jog par byed du gzhug/ de nas dkyil 'khoras gzhil// tsan danamuyis legs par zug/ slob ma thams cad gnas

gcig tu// bos nas ral pa gcig ma yi// sange bos bsrung ba byas nas ni// rakyil 'khor phyi yo gnas gcig tu// nyer 'jug dam tshig shesapa rnams// nang du rab tu gzhug par bya// de nas nyi ma nub dus su/

rakyila 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu// tshon sna lngal rtsapa yi// snying po lan bdun bsngags byas te// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// phur bu de rnams srad bus btsangs

da dgazams cad khru yi tshad// gsum byas srad bus yongs dkri bya// phyi nas kun tu dung dang ni// rje bo tshe dang rdza rnga dang// 'kharang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// 'khar ba dang ni log rdob rnams// kun nas 'khrol bar

byed du gzhug/ gdugs dar rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs// phyi rol du ni de dgram bya// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// tshon sna lnga pa'i thig skud kyis// khru brgyar byas nas thig gdab bya/ de lam dkyil

'khor gnyis pa ste// de nas kha dog thams cad pa// rtsa ba'i phyag rgyabatsangs nas ni// rtsa ba'i rig pa brgyad brgya bzlas// de nas dkyil 'khor slob dpon na// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rang
sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa yi// nyan thos dge 'dun rnams la ni// phyag byas dkyil 'khor khor yug tu// rgyang grags lnga pa lhag gnas che// ral pa gcig ma'i snying po yis// gdug pa'i sems can Than
byu// cad kyi sams nibatang bar bya ba 'o// dkyil 'khor yang na thams cad kyi// slob dpon gyi ni yo byad rnams// ral gcig snyape bo nyid kyisan// thog mar bsrung ba byas nas/
zla ni byang shar phyogs nas brtsams byas te// tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya// rtsa ba'i rig pa zlos pa nyid// dkyil 'khor thams cad mkhas pas bris// mos su bcad cing lus dkar ba//
rgyuslob de de bzhin gshegs rnams l// phyag byas rin chen phye mas so// pad+ma'i rigs la phyag byas te// phyi ma ser pos bcom ldan ma// 'phagasam sgrol ma phyag byas nas// ljang khu rnams kyis

nyan thos kun/ rang sangs rgyas kun phyag byas nas// nag pos rdo rje'i rigs la'o// de ltar dang yor dkyil rakhor gru bzhi dang sgo bzhi ba'i snying por// phyi nas gnyis la khru gnyis kyi ched du rab tu
'jug par byed pa'o// gsum pa mtho gang ba de'i nyis 'gyur ro// de ltar thams cad du rim gyis bris nas nang gi dkyil 'khor du bris par 'dod pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang// byar chub
sems dpa' dang// rang sangs rgyas thoms cad der rang byon par mdzad du gsol// 'bru thams cad dang// rin po chathams cad dang// sman thams cad dang// dridang ma tog thams cad dang/ darnyan
danagyi chus yongs su bkang ba// mAkha'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa// du ku la'i ras dkar pos mgrin pa bcings pa// gser dang dngul las byung ba/ dkyil 'khor de'i lo byad thams cad rasaras

gnyis pa'i mthar ma tog gi 'phreng bas dkris nas rtsa ba'i rig pas bsngags pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa zhes bya ba ste/ snying po'i dkyila' khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// de la'adaperjod par bya ste/
dam tshig don dang bsod nams don// 'dod don so sor dmags byed du// sdom pa bzung bar byas gyur nas// gang du gnas pa thams cad nas// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bres bar bya// gzhan gyis mi
khrub thugs rjetsho// sangs rgyas byams pa spyan mar bcas// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// de bzhin gshegs pa bri bar bya// bden par skyes dang rtamagrin dang// 'jig rten gsum rgyal dkar mor
grags/ de bzhin dun khro gnyer can// khros ma zhes ni grags pa ste// 'di rnams ming ni kun dran nas// spyan ras gzigs ni bri bar bya// rig pa mchog las slar 'jigs byed// rdo rje sar skya rdorje

ni drag por bzhad dang sang ge dang// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur nyid// 'di rnams ming na kun dran nas// phyagan rdo rje kun tu bri// de nas dkyila 'khor slob dpon gyis snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su phyi
ma dkar po dang yungs kar dkar po bsras pas// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rani bo che'i seng ge 'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa// chos ston par mdzad bzhani pa/ bod kyi dkyil 'khor 'od kun tu
'phro/gtsug tor nas 'od zer 'acung bzhin pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa// skyes bu chen po'imtshan gyis brgyan pa dang por bris shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi stong gi/
gzhogs gnyis su phyag ser po dngapad+ma ge sar phan tshun bsdus bas gtsug tor gyi rgyal bo rnams kun nas 'bar ba'i 'khrabs 'khrugs pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
bon na bo'i gzugs dang/ cha byad dang/ dbyibs kyi malacan rab zhurang ba'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs la/ sa bon gyis gang ba dang 'bras bu phyag na bsnams pa 'di
lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ kun nas 'bar ba'i gtsug tor dang/ gdugs dkar bo dang/ gzi brjid phung bo dang/ nor bu'i phung po dang/

tsha gsar gyi phung bo dang/ rnam par grags pa'i phung bo dang/ kun nasaphung bo rang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nyapa'i nyon mongs pa'i phung po dang/ brtul zhugs 'ang bo dang/ mnor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phung bo

pa dang/ rtag pa'i phung po dang/ dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyi phung bo dang/ thams cad bung po dang/ sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i phung bo dang/ 'jig rten gsum pa'i phung bo dang/ mtha' yas phung po dang/
bsod nams phung bo dang/ lha'i phung po zhes pa 'di rnams g.yas kyi gzhogs su 'bar bzhugs pa'o// g.yon du 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bgatsug tor dang/ mngon par 'phags pa dang/
tsa ] rnam bar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang/ mngon bar mtho ba dang/ sa'i 'dab ma dang/ 'dab ma brgya ba dang/ 'dab ma stong ba dang/ kun nas 'dab ma dang/ 'od zer dang/ 'od zer chen po dang/ dri ma
[4 ]mod pa'i 'od zer dang/ bkod pa'i 'od zer dang/ dkar po'i 'od zer dang/ bad+ma'i 'od zer dang/ bkod pa'i gtsug tor dang/ bdud bzhi rnam par 'dul ba'i gtsug tor dang/ gtsugator mngon
par 'phags pa dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gtsug tor zhes pa 'di rnams dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i nus pa dang/ lung bstan pa zhes ba gtsug tor gyi rgyal po 'di rnams g.yon gyi stong du bri bar
bya// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i logs su 'phrong gtsuge la brten pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo brgyad bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma spyanam dang/ mdzod spu dang/ zla ba dang/ snying rjem dang
byams pa ma dang/ mi'ajag ma dang/ lung bstanam dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i nus ba zhes pa 'di nems pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrug pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku de bzhin gsheg
ba la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// 'di rnams kyi stong du gsang sngags kyi rgyal bo brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed dang/ mkhar gsal dang/ chos gos dang/ de
bzhanagshegs pa'i dri ma dang/ de bzhin gshags ba'i 'od kyi dra ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu snang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye ba'i snying bo
zhes pa 'ar rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrugs pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ cung zadi de bzhani gshags pa la nges bar rtog bzhin pa/ rang gi gzugs las rab tu snang ba'i sku
khri'o gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshags pa'i khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po khro bo'i gzugs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nasa'od
k+Sha kyi dkyil 'khor can/ rtsa gsum dang zhags pas phyag bral yaM/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta ba'o// gzhan du rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi logs su 'phrong gcig la brten pa'i//
rag pa'i rgyal mtshan mo brgyad la 'ad lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thubam dang/ phyi nas dge sbyong ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzesam dang/ sangs rgyas dkar mo dang/ de bzhin
gshegs m somasam dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa lcags kyus 'gugs ma zhes pa 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs
pa'o 'di rnams kyi steng du gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brgyad la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen/
pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten gsum pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'a dus po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig
rten zhes pa 'di rnams kun nas 'od kyi rakyil 'a khor gyis yongs su khaskorab/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// rgyal ba'i
gtsug tor gyi 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal bo kun nas 'od pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ phyag na par ste/ de rnams thams cad lha'i gzugs g.yas pas
sa bon gyis gang ba dang/ phyag g.yon pas mchog sbyin pa/rang gi byad kyis kun tu gnas par yang ngo// gtsug tor gyi rgyal po'i stod du rang sangs rgyas brgyad ji ltar rags par bri bar bya'o// 'di lta

sta bcom ldan 'das snyan grags zhes bya ba'irang sangs rgyas dang/ stong gi drang srong dang/ drang srong chen po dang/ lha'i drang srong dang/ mA da ra dang/ brtsi gas pa dang/ legs par btsugs pa dang/
brtsegs pa chen po zhes pa rang sangs rgyas brgyad po 'di rnams pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bar 'dug pa/ tinge nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ bla gos
mar po can no// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyago/ g.yon du snam sbyar ro// mdun gyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrug
pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyud po la gnas pa'o// de'i yang nyalogs su khro bo'i rgyal bo sgrol mas non pa zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas ba dang/ bcom ldan 'dasam
'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka 'dod par byed bzhin pa'i 'og tu pad+ma rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'jug ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ nar
la dang ras kyi smad g.yogs dang stod g.yogs can thal mo sbyar ba byas ba/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ bkaganod par byed bzhazhe pa'o// de'i
gong du bats+tsha chen po zhes bya ba'i khro bo mdog dmar po kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrug pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar 'dug pa/ bcom ldan 'dasam 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nod par byed
bzhani pa// khro bo'i rgyal po de rnams thams cad kun nas 'bar ba chen po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ dar dang ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ rgyun thams
cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus su bya'o// sgrol ma'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su byang chub sams dpa' mthu chen thob sku mdog dkar bo/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
par brgyan pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ dare la dar ras kyi smad g.yogs can/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas ba/ bcom ldan 'dras shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o// spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gi pad+ma'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' dram med pa 'grob zhes bya ba wiyang ku ltar stobasas/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bazhi dang/ bar 'i gdan la ta bar 'dug pa/ ral ba'i cod pan
'chang ba/ daral g.yob dang bcas pa'i smad g.yogs dang dar la'i stod g.yogs 'chang ba/ shin tu dang ba'i sku/ 'od zer 'barab/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya khrub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa'o/
dri ma med pa 'groba'i stong gi g.yon du bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbyug pa dang/ ril ba spyi blugs dang/ bgrang 'phrang dang/ g.yang gzhi nag po can dang/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/
'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrugs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'dod pa phun tshogs khyedapa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ skudakar bo/ bar 'i sdong bus dkris pa'i yus can/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma dang/
g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu phyag tu bkod pa/ 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrugs pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i khazhin ras can/ phyag na rdo rje'i g.yas kyi snam bu gcig la rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bri bar
bya'o 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog dang/ nyal pa dang/ legs bar grub par byed pa dang/ rdo rjesna dang/ dpung bzang dang/ lapo na brdzas dang rig pa bzang po dang/ leg
grub dang/ sdo bzang dang/ stobs po che dang/ rnam par 'joms pa dang/ ka lA ki la dang/ mchog dang/ legs 'dul dang/ 'gro lding ba dang/ sngon rabs dang/ rin chen ki lA dang/ byis pa'i
ka lI dang/ legs par ka lA dang/ legs par gang ba dang/ gang ba chen bo dang/ lha mthar byed dang/ rdo rje chen po dang/ 'bar bsazhes l nyishu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams sngags kyi rgyal po chen po ste/
kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugasal/ rma bya la takhar 'dug pa/ ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyar du byas pa/ phyag g.yon pas rdo rjedang/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan
'das shAkyakhrub pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed bzhan pa'o// 'di deg gi 'og tu rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo bri bar bya ste/ 'ad lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das mamA ma kaM dang/ rdo rje

zla lcagasakyam dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang/ rdo rje rgyalam dang/ rdo rje rnam par rgyal ma dang/ dmarapo ldan m dang/ grags ldan ma dang/ shi ni rdo rje spyan ma dang/ rdo rje khro gnyer mi dang/ rdo rje/

khu tshur ma dang/ rdo rjem 'jigs ma dang/ rdo rje 'phrong bam dang rdo rjeh+phaldam dang/ rdo rje ge legs ma dang/ rdo rje'adzanam dang/ rdo rjemamo dang/ rdo rje gazhan gyis mi thub ma dang/ rdo rje gnam lcags mdang/

tshe dus kyi rdo rjem dang/ rdo rje gtsug phudam dang/ rdo rje bka' bsgo chen po mi dang/ rdo rje 'od dang/ rgyal ba ldan ma dang/ rdo rjegazugs ldan ma dang/ rdo rje spyan ma zhes pa nyishu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams
rdo rje rags kyi rig pa'i rgyal mo namo ste/ rma bya la rta bar 'adug pa/ ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/ kun nasa'abar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrugs pa cung zad bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan par byas pa
dang dar dang ras kyi sham thabs dang/ dar la'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ g.yon pas rdo rjerang/ g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ lhas bstod pa'i
gzugs 'chang ba'o// de rnams de bzhin gshegs ba'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa/ rang gigazugs dang/ mkhyad dang/ dbyibs bzhan du bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas
00 gyi gzhogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'iny+dzan ltar dkar ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med dbu la bzhugs pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ dar la
dang ras kyi shamaThabs can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pas pad+ma'i phyag phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das la rdzayab g.yob par byed ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la soms
dpa' chen po'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byas pa'i lus can/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyanal lta ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon po'i
'dab ma'i kha dog can/ pad+ma'i gdan la rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ dar dang ras kyi sham khrubs can/ stodagayogs dmar po mnabs ba/ phyag g.yas
pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal bzhin pa/ phyag g.yon pas rdzayab kyis brel ba/ 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i phyag/ cung zad de bzhin gshegs ba'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar
gyur pa'o// sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma chen mo pa yang ltar sngo bsangs/ kununas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ rab dudang ba'i sku/ paspyi'i
gdan la gnasal/cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhani/ dar dang ras kyisham thabs can/ stod g.yogs dmar po mnabs pa/ phyag g.yon pas ut+pal yongs su bzung nas/ g.yas pas bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag ratshol bzhin pa/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ lang tshodang po can/ ha cang mi sprom/ ha cang gi phra ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol
bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yas su 'phrong gcig la bton pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bco brgyadal 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag mtha' yas pa dang/
phyag stong pa dang/ phyag brgya pa dang/ phyag bcu gnyis pa dang/ phyag drug ba dang/ phyag bzhi ba dang/ zhabs stobs dang/ zhal brgyad pa dang/ zhal bcu gnyis pa dang/ zhal drug
bdang/ zhal bzhi pa dang/ rta mgrin dang/ don yod zhags pa dang/ 'od zer stong gis rnam par snang ba dang/ mgran ba dkar pos 'jig rtenagasum las rnam par rgyal ba dang/
mkhra' yas rnam rgyal dang/ rnam rgyal nabo dang/ lha'i mtha' dang/ mtha' dpag tu mar pa dang/ yid gyi shing rta dang/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes pa ragi pa'i rgyal bo chen po 'di rnamA
ba 'irags kyi gtsobo// sridabar 'jug pa/ ha bar skyod par byed pa/ kun sa'abar ba'i 'phrong bas 'khrugs pa/ bana'i lus kyis nye bar bskor ba'i lus/ phyagan kha dang/ g.yas pas
mchog sbyin pa/cung zad sgrol mal lta bar gyur pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das ma'aphags ma sgrol ma'i nya logs su gos dkar mo bar 'i gdan la da bar 'dug pa/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ ral pa'i cod
pan 'chang ba/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i gzugs brnyanalalta bar gyur pa/ phyag na pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa dang/ g.yas pas bgrang 'phrang bsnams pa'o// da'iyang g.yas su 'phrong gtsag la brten
ba'i bar 'i rogs kyi las kyi gtso mo bcu bzhi bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'dasamakhro gnyer can dang/ dkar mo dang/ dkar mo chen mo dang/ dpal 'dunam dang/ pad+ma go ra dang/ grag
ldan ma dang/ sangs rgyas dpar pa'i zla ba ma dang/ longs spyod ldan ma dang/ bde ba ldan ma dang/ grags pa ldan m dang/ shes rab gos can ma dang/ stobs gcig ma dang/ stobs mang po dang/
stobs bcu ma dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yum dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi lum zhes pa 'di rnams rig pa'i rgyal mtshan mo ste/ kun nas 'barab 'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa
rgyan zams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lha'i bud mad kyi cha byad 'chang ba/ rab tu dang ba'i sku/ cung zad sgrol ma'i gzugs brnyan la lta bar gyur pa'o// pad+ma bsnams shing g.yas bsa mchog sbyin
pa rang gi gzugasasu bri bar bya'o// sgrol ma ri 'og tu cibagyi zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i khro bo chen po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ lus brtan
pa nag po mthapyod pa'i gzugs can/ khro gter du byas la/ mtshar gacigs pa/ zhal gcig gis drag tu bzhad pas gdangs bzhin pa/ gnyis ba de bzhin gshegs pa la lta bzhin pa/
dang pos sgrolamal lta ba'o// phyag dang bos bzhi po mthong ba'abyin par byed bzhinal/ g.yon dang pos zhags pa bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'dasam 'phags ma sgrol
ma'i bka' nod par byed bzhin pa'o// de'i yang gayas su khro bo chen kho sgrol mas nob zhes bya ba lhachen bol 'bar 'dug pa/ bar 'i chu bas dkris pa'i lus can/ut+pa la ltar sngo bsangs/
khacom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bka' nodapar byed bzhin pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug ba dang dbang bskurab 'ichog thams cad sngar brjod pa khona'o// ral pa gyen bsngos kyi rgyud phyi ma'i dkyil
'khor chen po'i chog 'od// de nas khyang la sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis (bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan

'das ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen por rang gi snying po spyanipar bgyi'o/ gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jigs ba dang/
nyobar 'tshob dang/ nad 'go bathams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// danas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so
zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so// khyod kyis sbos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang
0 so da nas 'di las dkyil 'khor cho// dam payang dag rab 'chad byed// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam pa ru// phyi yi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de yi dbus su srad bu mnyam// gru bzhi yongs
su bskor bar bya// gnyis par 'joms pa po song ste// dkyil 'khor dam pa khri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul gyi// ri mo ba zhi po rnams kyang ngo// pad+ma'i dab brgyad bra bar bya// pad+ma
yi ge ze'u 'bru la// 'jig rten mgon po dgod par bya// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i 'brang rnams su// sangs rgyas gzugs brtan kun tu thaM// de ru slob dpon rab bzhugs nas// pad+ma chen po'i phyag
mchog/ dkyil 'khor gnas la nyar 'dug bas// mnyam par bzhi gs pas mnyam par dgod// ji ltar tshul pad+ma gang// gnas kyi nyis pa mang bos kyang// gos par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir/
'grol chags pas dag par khyad// lan cig 'di gsungs dpar brjod nas// de nas lcags kyu mchog dag gis// yang dag pa ku gnas pad+ma cho// sbyan ras gzigs dbang grol bar 'gyur//
de la 'di ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu chen po'o// u0f00 ma hA pa hUM dzan+ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs nas slob dpon la ma thongab sbyin par byed do// yang na bod
zer gtong bar byed do// danas 'di nyid kyi phyag rgyas slob ma rab tug zhugs par bya ste/ dar dkar pos gos dkakar po dang/ gtsug tor dkar pos mgo bo dkis bar bya'o/ 'ad nyid 'jig
rten du rab tu ba rjod nas de nas smros shig ces so// de nas brla lag pa g.yon du byin nas g.yas pas chu snod byin te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas
thams cad pad+martse/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de nyid lhan cig brtag par bya// zhes so// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcang ba dang ting nge 'dzin
yang bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ de nas bar 'i rakyila 'khor 'byung ste/ da bzhi'i nyin du rakyil 'khor bris nas dbus kyi ze'u 'khrul to

bar 'dug ste stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin na khed+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa de la kun tu g tshigs bar byed pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid
thob par byed do// zhes pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// donas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ do bzhi kho ra dkyil 'khor brtag par byas nas dbus sulad+ma stong ragod du gzhug go/ de nas khang stong
bo de bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya ste/ lan ro lare yongs su bzlas nas so// de nas slob ma rab tu bcug nas dmatshig brjod par bya'o// budang sor ma'i ched du yang// dam tshig nyams
par mi bya ste/ dmatshig bdag la brjod par bya// gang phyir pad+ma'i rnam pa las/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chagasathams cad dag/ dmatshig gi'i dkyil 'khor// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//
[8 ]mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yisan// sas rgyas thams cad yid kyisamachod// lus kyis spyan ras gzigs mgon la// ngag gis phyag na rdo rje la// las las nam mkha'i snying por skyes// ji
ltar sgrub thabs cho gar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri rab lhun po'iri'i rtse mor 'khod pa/ rang gi ting nge 'dzan gyis kun tu gnas pa'i sku thams cad nas
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgyad do zhes so// de nas dkar bo'i phyogs kyi tshos gcig nas brtsams// rtog tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du bzlas pas/ ji sridi 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyuga mngon du gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bzhin shagasapa'i sku rnams 'phrosanas sgrub pa po'i pad+ma'i dbus su 'khor/ slar yang denas sas rgyas kyi sku gzhan
'byung ste/ sgrub pa po la mngon par dbang bskur ba gnas shing brtan par 'gyur ro// de nas bdag ga dengos po thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mtshungs pa/ skad cig de la bde ba dang ldan
ba dang ji srid du 'bur bar byed do// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing tshodapag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes so// de nas sgrub ba gzhan dang las chen po thams cad 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlus pas
las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gnyis bzlas pasamatshamasamad pa la sogs pa'i sdigs pa thams cad lhag mam dbarathad bor 'gyur ro// 'bum phrag gsum
bzlas pas bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dngos grub thamasacad dang/ de bzhin gshogs ba la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad na/

y+Ya 'bum phrag sumacu rtsa lnga bzlas pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen bonamachod rten stong phrag brgya byas nas mthar tshogs mtshan thog thog tu bzlas par bya'o//

de ga kho rangs de bzhin gshogs ba thams cad byon nas snying khar rab tu 'jug par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' so sor nyid do// de nas zhal du rab tu 'jug par byed do// de nas spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug so sor chud do// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad du 'gyur go/ thog mar brjod pas gzhan gyi grong dang grong khyer srung ba dang/ mdzes par spyod pas thams cad bya'o// 'debs pa la tsan dan gyi
sku bdug pas gdon 'babs so// shirI Shags tog gas sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// dri bzang po'i tog gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do// sa dkar bos bud med do// dri zhim

ba bo'i ma tog gis chom rkun rangs pa'o// yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg gi dgas dang bya 'ongs so// yungs kar dkar bo gtor bas mig 'phrul ston par byed do// rma bya'i nu mas rmi lam ston par bya dado/
dus gsum du bzlas pas rmi lam ngan 'joms par byed do/ til gyi sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad rengs par byed do// bya gag gi gshog pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyal po dbang du byed do// rgyal po'akhyil/
[s/ ]ba'i lo tog gi spyi'i srog gis 'dod pa thams cad dbang du byed do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mad bcas nas mtshan mo brgyud sbyang bar gnas pas gsum bzlas

ba bya'o// da nas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i mchog dbang du byed pa la bud med kyi dbang po'i sgyu'i sbyin srag gis so// bu mo dbang du byed pa la rang ngo// don gzhan
la'ang sbyin srog dang bcas pas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du mar rer dus gsum du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa stsol
bar mdzad do// sas rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas pas zla ba drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchog stsol bar mdzad do// ralabagyen brdzes kyi rgyud bya mar las chen po thams cad kyi sgyu
'khrul go// donas sems dpa' chen po de ting nga'adzazhi de nyid sgom bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal bo sgrol mas non pa'i mnyam par 'dzan pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so// khru lor
rar sgo bzhi dang// sgo khyud rta babs sa gnas ga/ phyi rol pad+ma'i rnam par bya// de ltar kun nas grwa rnams su'ang// de nalegs par bsams byas nas// nang gi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//
sngar brjod snying po 'di yis na/zlos bzhin 'di ni srung ba dang// dkar bo dmar po sor po dang// nag po ljang khu tshon sna lnga// tham 'jam po rnams kyis// sgrol ma'i rag pas mngon
bsngags pas// bsgrub bya bcom ldan 'das bya// khro bo'i rgyal po mdun du sku// g.yon du ral pa gcig ma// g.yas su 'dam skyes phyi rol gi/ sgo khyud snying por ci rigs
zla khri mkhas pas sgrol ma bzlas pa bya// gzhan du yang na gang 'dod// dordzagadan la g.yas sun// dordzakhu tshur de bzhin du// bar du rdo rje'i gdan la dang// g.yas su ma tog gdon grub pa// yongs
su'adod bas rdor rigs// bu yi phye mas longasasu byang// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/ gang du'ajig rten gsum chog/ rdorje 'chang chen ba dod pa yi// 'das pas rnam par thim par 'gyur// khu

tshur rdo rje khu tshur bcas// da nagayas kyi sgo khang du// stobs bo che reb bzha gnas // zhayi mgrin par stobs po che// nub phyogs su ni bye ba'o// g.yas kyi phye yaM sgo khang du// de bzhin dbang phyug chen

po@ du la mdu ga phyag rgyu dgod// 'dza'i sum brakhir// lho yi grwa gnyis su bya ba// phya rgya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// nub dang byang gi grwa rnams su// log 'dren phyag rgya do rdzo'o// byang gi grwa gnyis
rnams su ni// mkhas bsaragasakyi spyan pa// shar gyi gnyis rnams su// mamotshogs kyi phyag rgya dgod// d+dog ra Dolog 'dren bcas// de nas ji ltar 'abyor ba yis// tshogs ji bzhin lha rnam
mad// khro kho stobs chen sgrol mas non// bzlas pas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// ka ra wIr ta la ni/ klaanas rang gnas sbyang gnas pas// mkhas pas byang gi sgo khang du/ gtsang ma gang du rab
0 'jug khyu// blo dang ldan pas spyan drang bya// khro bo'i rgyal bos thamasacar nas// ji ltar rig pa'i chog yis/ tshar gcad rjes su dzapa'i mchog/ gdon dang lus kyi las rnams// de nyid du nangs
ba@#// tshar gacad dmatshigabade ba 'di// gdon 'tsho byed dang zad pyod dang// gang zhag la la gsod pa dang// de bzhin sgrib pa sbyang ba dang// soms can rnams thams cad nyid// sgrub thabs bya
dang 'khrul 'khor ni// tsa'adra ba yis bya ba dang// mkhas khas lasan stengadag dang// gdon rnams bod par byed pa dang// rang gi rogs dang gzhan rigs kyi// phyag rgya nya bar mtshon par bya// 'di yi
rakyil 'khor thams cad nas// 'byung po'i tshogs la sogs pa kun// de nas gtor ma 'dug pa sogs// rgyas pas mngon par mchod par gyis// de yis gdon mthong de mchod bya// phyis kyi dbang las
rul ba thob// skye bos btung ba sbyin sreg la// sogs pas rnam par gzhom par bya// sha rilAnatsan bla sanas// gdon thob pa na'i pho bar bya// srane bo rnams kyis byin pa'i mchu// mthong ba de 'dra'i
mtsho rnams dang/ sha za rnams la rabong can// mgi mi 'dzum par 'adzag pa yi// 'jigs pa mthong n sna tshogs pa// kun tu rnam par lta bar byed// skam byed gdon gyi rnam 'gyuragang//nus dang

dbung ba brtan ba yi// dgra bo rnams thams cad ru// lha dang mtshon cha'i bya ba ni/ khar byed dang ralapa dang// dbyug gu bgrang 'phreng 'dzagasaba'i gnas// ril ba spyi blugs mthub nyid// phyag rgya bram
@#// zecan zhes bshad// rtsa gsum kun dang zla khyod dang// ral pa mag la sogs pa dang// khyu mchog sgra dang drag po dang// dbang ldan rnams te bdun du grags// gat+tigadangs

ka ba danadang// khyim bya de bzhin rma bya'i mjug/ phyag rgya gzhon nu ma can bshan// 'khor lo dung dang ba co nyid// ral gri phub nyid nam mkha' lding// mgo nyid phyag rgya khyab 'jug bshad// rgya ba/
rgyu nanalhachen bogi/ bum pa tun shing dbazhedu// ngang ba'ang g.yonag zhogs phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya wa zhwa dkar bshad// nama'u rnams dang gtor zan dang// rgan po gtum po mazlong ban//
tsa nam gru dkarapo rnams kyi rgya// rang gi ga zugs nyid mthong ba na// mdasa'abrog rnams kyi lhung bzed dam// gdag kharakhyad pa grol ba'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khyung
na sgyu byed pa thams cad rag bal/ shang gtsag gam/ dur khrod dam/ khang stong gtsang ma tshasgomadapa'is gzhi mthong nas sgrub ba po khros bas sa la ma lhung ba'i ba lang gi lci bas rakyil 'khor na
bar tsugs ta ra kha gsum dor bya'o/ kun nas khru bzhi l bar bor thal ba'a'i kha'o// gnyis pa ri btsag gago/ gsum pa sol ba'i byams rab tu 'bad pas bri bar bya'o/ byung ngam nub turang
slog cig byed du gzhug go/ sgro'i dbus su'ang lha chen polag marang zogs pa bya'o// snam bu'inang du sangs rgyas 'donapar rmad du byung ba'i bdag nyid can bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi g.yas kyi gzhog/
su sgrol masazhonab rnam par dgod par bya'o// g.yon du dpa' tshon tsho stobs chochom ral ba gcig mkhazhags// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku rgyab tu dgod par bya ban/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas
dang nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ de bzhin du 'jog bo dang/ dpa' bo kho stobs kyi smyu'ang dgod par bya'o/ de bzhin du bar dang/ bar chen po dang/ dungaskyong dang/ rigs ldan stobs po che'i nang du mngon
parab rjod bgo/ lha de rnams ni 'khor dang bcas pa snam bu gang bar dgod par bya'o// 'du zems cad nas ma mo'i tshogs rnam par dpar bya ste/ dpalaldan ma'i snam bur ro// sgo ru spre'u dang/

rAdang/ bum snam yang sgro'i sbyin pa rwa ba yi yang ngo// nag po'i brgyad pa la lha rnams lto bye chen bo las ma'anas pa yang dag par mchod do stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// shes rab can sngags kyi rgyal
bo grub par 'gyur ro// rims dang gdon thams cad las 'byin pa dang/ rtsod pa'i ng rnam par 'joms par byed do// rang gi gnas su 'jug go/ de nas gsang sngags 'di'ang rtag tu bzlas
ba'i gu gul gyi chu 'am/ lugs gzhan gyis mi thub ba dang/ zhib can dang/ rgyas pa can dang/ mngon par mdzes pa can nyid sbyad pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rab tu byas pas grub ste/ thams
cad 'joms pa sgrol mas non pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i sgrub thabs kyi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ bcom
0 @#// ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrakhacom pa yang dag bar rdzogasara'i sangs rgyas shAkyakhrubapa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gas mngon par shes
ta de bzhin gshegs pa chen tog gala mngon sum du thos ba denas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i snying po ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar sems
can thamasacad kyi don gyi phyir dang/ sgrol ma'i mthu bstan pa'i phyir dang/ thabs la mkhas pa'i snying rje bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa smos shig/

nam sats+tshata blo gtad+d+ho/ mahAbaru ra'athuny+tsa/ snun ma Ar+yal ba la ka shA ram h+pha lcem bra lo tre ya mahUMbadzrapA Nipra T+Ta ti ts+tshem sAs te zlu/ de rnams la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'o lags pa

sbya sa gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi snying po 'dod pazams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa/ semaMs can thams cad kyisaMmi tshugs la/ srid pa'i lam rnam par 'jomasapar byed pa brjod par bgyi'o// sad+ya the daM/
ha bo d+hisatA/ mahAs tA/ hahale/Ar+ya a ba lakataMr bar ma tItsit+tahatsit+ti ka ru Ni kA maM/ ga mkha ti/ mahA bil ti/ rgyur rgyu ru/ snur tsan+d+rin/ bal nam ste sku/ sam+b+has twA/ b+haya
pata/ ha ra ha rihar bAhano blub/ b+hablon kha/ tu ru tu ru/ sgyur sgyu ru su ru su ra/ suwanAsi/ bAmalamAti/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki nArA ya kr-ingan/ dza mu su (b.lo mu tA la ma la/ ba la

mal ma la/ ka la ka la/ nal ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu/ hi bo d+hi sa twA/ ba ya bo d+hisatwA/ mahA bod+hisatwA/na ma ti ru/ ku ru ku ru/ kr-id yaM/ gzhu sma ra/ i daMtsag/ kATaM ku ru swAhA/ 'dan khecom

ldan 'das 'phags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ha la ha la zhes bya snying bo lta/nyim so sor tho rangs langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor byas te/ dri

dang mo tog la sogs mngon par bkram nas de nas lan bcu gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas nad thams cad chub r zhi bar byed do/ zla bcug kho nar byas pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yar yi'ang rtayongs su rdzogs par

byed do/ de bzhin du yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa/ gal te mtshams med pa byas bas kyang ma zla ba bzha/ de'i tshong mtshams med pa byas pa dang/ bdag
nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus par gyuratsag cesaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gathigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalanasabar skad ces gsol

to bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su skyes pa bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyud phyi mar 'jig pa thams cad kyi rig pa sring mo ba na gong nas gong du rab tu 'jug bzhin pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyi rnam par gzigs par gyupa/ rtog pa bzhir skyes pa/ thung ngu'i gzugs can/ nam mkha' la 'grob/ sa 'og dang/ mi snang ba dang/ rolangs dang 'thabs rtsod dang/ rkang pas rab tu bgrod
pa dang/ rgyas pa can dang/ mngon spyod can dang/ dbang du byon pa dang/ skal pa bzang po nyadi rab tu sbyin pa po/tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa

zla rnams kyisagasus pa las bzlogal/rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis lhag pa'i m khyim du skyes la/ kun tu ston par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems pa'i mkhyen ba'i mthu'i don gyis chos stong phrag bas

kyang stong phrag brgyabogs kyang lan cigagazhom pa tsam dang/ rob tsam du tshang chub sems dpa'i yul 'jig rten du ma'i 'byung gnas rang bzhin du gnas pa la bltos nas/ ral pa gyon rjes kyi rgyud phyi mar

bcom ldan 'das ma 'bags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sgrub pa 'dams gsungs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das yid dbang du gyur ba rasagrub rab tu stsol bar mdzad bar gyurato// tad+ya thA/ na mo a mi tAb+hAlaM/ na ma Ar+ya
abalokitahArAya/ bod+hisatAya[0f00]ra yonAhA/ rgyalamazhes pa'o// tad+yawA/ na mo a mi tA b+hAya/ nam Ar+yaa ba lo ki ti garA ya/ oM bi dzaya nAhA/ rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'o// tad+yathA/
namo a mi ta ya/ ma ar+ya a ba lo ka shar ya/ oM adzita mAhA/ mi thub pa zhes khyaba'o// namoam tA b+hA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shar ya/ oM a pa ra dzi te sAhu[） ]gzhan gyis mi thub ma/

zhes bya ba'o// zhes pa de lta bu sring mo bzhi'o// lnga pa ming bon/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ad+ha nya/ na ma Araa ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ okin ki ni sa ta b+hA ga ta ut+tA bshAn+te/ bar de/ ut+ta ma

00 ut+tam ta thA ga ta ut+tA ba hU~M phaT swAhA/mang po zhum bu ru zhes pa'o// sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su bsgrags// mdor na nga rgyal can rlom pa// phyi ma'i rgyud kyilas rnams na// ji lta ji ltar rab sbyar ba// de lta

de ltar sgrub par byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rang gi rje 'phrul gyi tshor phul yang dag par bstan par 'dod pas stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba

byas te rang gi rdo rje gasor nas rdo rje yang dag par skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs taM/ byang chub sams dpa' spyan ras gzig
dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' bdag kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po rgyud phyi ma 'dir/bcom ldan 'dasama'aphags ma sgrol ma'i ma kun tu bstan pa'i don du 'jig rten pathams cad

kyi mchod rten rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'aphagasam sgrol ma'i rjes su skyodal sbyin par gyi'o// de la rjes su yi rang ba'i sams dpa' chen po'i phyi ma'i dus kyi tsho mchog gi grub pa dang/ mchog gi
las byed kha/ tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams kyang khyad par du 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa bos gang rdulalas byung ba 'di rnams rags dang pha rol gnon par byed pa'o//
dazhas tsang chub sems ba' sams dpa' chen po'abags ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la'adi skad ces smras so// phyag na rdo rje gsungs shage/ de nas
phyag na rdo rjes slar yang ting nga'adzan la snyoms par zhugs so// phyag na rdo snyoms par zhugs ba'i da mtho gzhu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu

! snang bcasaso// de nas phyag na rdo rjes phyag gi sor morab tu btang ste/ rdo rje rab tu 'joms bzhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje khu tshur dang/ rdo rje dmar po dang/ rdo rje mthar phyin dang/ rdo rje nag po sgyu ( g.yon pa'i phyag
las khyung ba 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gzhonanu'i skruna rnams// den de rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar byed par gyurato// byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang/ spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug la'ang bo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhon nu'i skrun lnga po rnams l legs so zhes bka' stsal to// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ dngos grub
sbyin par byed pa/ sgrol ma'i rtog par don chen bo sbyin// phyagan rdo rje'i rogs las byub/ barma'i phyag la mnga' bdag tu gyur pa'o// de nas phyagan rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gsungs par gyur to// gtsage

gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang ni// ra sride khru niu0f8brgyad kyi bar/ nora'adod pa yis khyu gcig sta// bu'adod pa las khru gnyis so// dgra nyamasabyed pas khru gsum mo// bzlas pa nyid kyis khru bzhi'o// khrab
dngos grub thams cad la// brgyud pa mkha' la 'gro ba yis// 'og don dang 'khog tshudang// rgya mtshodang dngos grub gnas// khyim du'ang rung stegatsang ma'am// gzhan du g.yogs bar byas ba dang//

las la shes pa gang rung gis// thag gis dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// gru bzhi ba la glu bzhi pa// sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis brgyan// dkyil 'khor chagasum byas pa yi// stong gi ma ru bcom ldan 'das//

sangs rgyas bslu'i ge dana gnas ab// chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa// g.yasasu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyug pa spyi blugs phyag/ g.yon du 'phags pa phyag rdo rje// rdo rje'i phyag gam de

gzhagasasu// khyab 'jug dung dang 'khor las// ba con phyagazha 'khor lo'i// dbus kyi char gul tshon/ klu yi srog shing sgrung ba'o// dang por rdo rje rab 'dzoms dang// sgyu 'phrul dang nitumakhu ru// gnyis
par rdo rje khu tshur dang// rgyal mar bcas pa gsum pa ru// lus dmar dang ni rnam rgyal bcas// bzhi bar rdo rje bsags mtha' dang// mi thub mar bcas lnga pa ru// ltanag gzhan mi thub dang bcas// ljang

khu dkar po dmar po dang// sar po nag po go rims bzhin// lha rnams dgodapar byas nas ni// dkar bo'i gos dang dkar po'i rgyan// pe con dordzogatun shing dang// gzhu dang ral gri mtshon cha'i phyag/ dbus

su zla nyi pad+mal// lha rnams mngon sum dgod par bya// gru yi 'og tu ma dang ni// chus gtaran gon par bya/ rung dang nya dang chu srin gyis// rnam bar brgyan pa'i shar dang lho// nub dang byang du dbang po dang//

gshin rje chu lha lus ngan rnams// bzhon bar ba cas shing phyag rgyar bcas// legs par dkris pa'i bum ban// ri yis chu yis yongs su bkang// yal 'dab kyis ni bar mdzes// grwa rnams su na regod bar bya//
[p]// 'dir bum pa lngapa ni// rin chen gyis brgyan 'jam ba yi// gos kyis mgrin pa dkris pa dang// sa ha ka pa'i yal 'dab kyis// kha na dga' bar byas pa dang// gdugs khaslong ma tog

wang ba sbyangs// shar gyi sgo ru dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi'u mtshobazhi// dung dang pad+ma la sogs kyis// ri yis rtswa mo yis kyang bya// rgyal mtshan rnams 'khrugs bla re bres// in+d+ra nI la gsar dang ni//
dngul dang zangasadang lcags rnams kyi/ phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// lhayom tog bdug pas bdug/ rnam pa sna tshogs gtor mas mchod// dus kyis non pa'i me tog 'bras/ 'byag gsor sna tshogs
ragi chen dang/ khaza' ba phyi rol gcal du dgram// rilo'i steng du rala'i rdzug bya// snying lo phyi mas spyan drang sogs// las rnams kun dang gshagasugasol// de nas gang gis dkon mchog gsum/ dad
[@] pas byang chub sems bskyed de// bud med skyes pa gzhon nu yi// bstan gnas byas pa gos kyis ni// gdong chu bar bcings pa yis// dam tsho'i/ gis kyang mnyan par gyis// dbyig dang gser gyi ma tog
gas lag pa yis kyang do bar bya// de ni gang du lhung gyur la/ de yi rigs gyur nas na ]gdong phya lha rnams bstan par bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rnams kyang 'gyur// yang n nyin dang mtshan moru//
dkyil 'khor de mnyes par 'gyur// de nas gzugs brnyan 'byung ste// ashAtArang/ n+ya gro d+ha dang/ u dum ba ra la zhi ba can dang/ tsA ta dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ nag gsar gyis rgyas pa can

0 dang bal ba dang/ askadang/ a riT+Thi dang/ ko khayis mngon spyod can no// rab ng du byed pa dang skal ba ngan pa rnams l bad kan mthar byed dang/ sham+b+ha la dang/ dIn+d+ha br-it+ta'o/ skyo bar byed pa la
tsan dan dang/ mya ngan med ba'i shing dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ myos byed rnams so// skal ba bzang bo nyid la asbridat+talas byung ba rnams ga/ las thams cad pa la gsaralas byung ba// rgyal srid
'dod pas na dngul las byung ba// zangs ni skal ba zang bo'i ched du'o// lcags las byung ba na mngon spyodacan no// nyams par byed pa la tsam pa ka dang/nag ge sar dang/ ba ku la dang/ a ti
khulta ka'o// nor 'dod pas na sna ma dang/ yA tha ka dang/ mali ka dang/ chos byed dang/ gsarashang dang/ mA la ka rnams so// skal ba bzang po 'dod pas par rang ku mu da'o// zhi ba
can la ut+pal dang so'u gan+nAke'o// rgyas pa can dang gzhan la'ang dri bzang bo can gyi lo tog go/ rgyas pa can gang la dris dman pa'i ma tog go/ mngon spyod can dang nyams par byed pa la sogs
bal na tsan dan la sogs pa'i dri 'phrog pa'o// zhi ba can dang/ rgyas pa can dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ skal ba bzang po nyid la de lta bu'i bdug pa la sogs pa sbyar nas snying po'i sngags 'di rnal

kyis las bya// namo rarA tra yA ya/namash+tsa t+tabadzra pA Na ye/ mahAyas+sa sa nA pa ta ya/ na mashA tut+taMb+hagi nA naM/ namo deb tu ra sAt+ma kA ha ya/ dzam+b+hani/ dzam ka ro ti am tra/ stam+b+hani/
'a// stam+buka ro/ midzaM mo hanA/mo hI kar tu mitaM/ an+nAn in+d+rika ra tamitaM/ dza ya A gats+tsha bi dza ya A gats+tsha dzam+b+hanaAhatsa stam+b+han Akats+tsha/ ba laM ba li/ pu/ d+hA pa/

su bahA raM/ bra ti graut+tA/ samaM yA yu bA lAyA wA/ su Tu cu sus badzra b+hany+dzanAyaswAhA/ rig pa 'di ni stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'al 'gro ba dang/ phug tu rab tu 'jug pa dang/

gtera'apho bar byed pa dang/ ragi pa 'dzan pa nyidadang/ mig sman ljong ros sgrub pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ nyams par byed pa dang/ gzhan rab tu 'joms pa dang/ rang ga yul so sor skyong ba dang/ dug
dang bo nadang/ nad 'go ba dang/ mche ba rab bsamasal yang dag par gnas pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dekyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ khros pas rgyal po'i khab rab tu sgrub pa ste/ de lta bu la sogs
ra ba'i las gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pas bsgrub bar bya'o// sring mo bzhi'i snying po rdzogs so///denas slar yang dkyil 'khor gsungs pa/ khru bzhi pa gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/

kun nas rta babs kyis brgyan ba/ gshin rje dang/ tshulha dang/ lus ngan rnams bzhon pa dang bcas/ mtshon dang bcas pa'i sgo skyong bya sta/ sgo gsum byed du gzhug go khyung garab tu thob par bya stachagasum

byas nas stong gi chab com ldan 'adas ma sgrol ma'o// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rdzong du phyag g.yon pas rdo rjod ng g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ kun nas 'bar ba bAkhar byago/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i g.yon du rdo rje

[z/]lcags kyu lcags lagazhathogs pa/ gzhan du rdo rje lcags sgrog lcags sgrog lagan thogs la/ thams cad kyang ri'i rtsachol yang dag par gnas par bya'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs la brten pa'i lha chen po
chung ma dang bcas pa/ khyu mchog dang bcas pa yang dag par bri'o// gzhan rnam pa gsum rim gyis mtshon chadang/ gnas dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya// blo gi ri Ti dang/ dga' byed dang//
nag po chen po rnams so// nub tu mi sbyin dang/ tum bu ru dang/ 'od srungs dang/ sna tshogs bshes gnyen la sogs pa rnams ril ba spyi blugs dang chu snod phyoganabasnams pa'o// nang gi char gru bya'o/

khron pa dang/ srog shing bsgrung ba dang/ ta tas bri'o// stod g.yogs ljang khu can/ lagazhage con thogs pa/ rtsod pan gyis brgyan pa/ phyag na tog skyong ba bsnams pa/ rnab la rgya skyags kyis brgyan pa'o//
rgyal ba dkar po phyag na rdo rje thogs pa/ stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can no// rnam par rgyal ba lus dmar po/ phyag na gtun shing thogasal gos dmar bo'i stod g.yogs can/ gser gyi kha dog
can gyi gzhu phyag na bsnams pa'o// gzhan gyis mi thub pa nag mo/ gos khra bo'i stod g.yogs can/ gos nag po'i shamakhabs can/ phyag na ral gri thogs pa/ gru la zhen pa'o// de nas zla ba dang/

nyim dang/ lha rnams dang nang du pad+ma rab tu gtor ba bri bar bya'o// byang gi sgor log 'dren chen po g.yas kyi gzhogs su chubo rab mad khor yug tu rdo rje dang/ dung dang/ lo da dang/ dbal be'u rnams
kyang kun tu bri// de ltar thams cad yang dag par bris te/ de nas ngaltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang/ rtog pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang/ bza' ba rnam pa lnga dang/ k+kany+tsamang bo dang/
bza' ba rakrisapa'i 'gazanadang/ dzam+bulika rang/ zho dang/ bu ram dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi ji ltar rigs la dbul bar bya'o/ chu'i bum pa bzhi ji ltar r don pa'i yal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa dang/
bumal tsA'i chu thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba/ sa bon thams cad dang/ sman thams cad dang/ yal 'dab dang/ gos kyis grin pa dkris pa/ dbyig dang/ gsaranang/ ni po che rnams
dang yal 'dab kyis brgyan pa 'i bum pa rnam pa lnga lnga rnams dang/ phyi'u ban bon rnams kyis mngon par bkram pa'o// de lta bu la sogs ba'i bkas ba rnams byas nas phyi nas bzlas par bya'o/

de nas mngon du slob ma rab tu zhug par bya ste/ 'di las gzhan pa'i sgrogs su 'gyur ba na ]na mor tAAya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na yaM/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ na many+tsa tuSh+Tha gi nInAMm ma dza yAya/ ma he ti
nAhAsngags 'di rnamakha brgyad kyis sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// ma tog dang/ yungs kar dang/ lan tshwa dang/ chudang thal bas dri mod nyid suna' byin pa'i cha byad kyis kyang ngo// namo
ratra yAya/ namany+tsazlobadzrapA Na la/ mahAyaklu sonApa ta ya/ na mo bi dza yA ya haha/ rnal/ ku mar ni biSh+Thamu kher sha sAhA/ rig pa 'di'abum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro//
ro nas brgya byin gyi gnam lcags log pa'ileshing sor drug pa'i shing blangs nas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par gyur nas/ gang du mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa der song nas bum pa bzhi pa
thams cad kyang ma tog dang yal 'dab kyis kha brgyan pa gzhag par bya'o/ de nas khag bting zhing bkram kha'i dkyil 'khor dang/ lcags gsum khasungs pa'i phur bu da rkang pa g.yon pa lagal
g.yon pas mnan te (ji srid du log pa mi snang bar gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// lag pa gtang bar yang mi bya'o// de nas phur bu de dgon par gdab par bya ste/ phur bu khyim du 'byung ngo// tsho
ga 'di nyid kyis btab nas phur bu chung pa g.yon pas yang dag par mnan nas dbang du gyis shago/ grong khyer 'jig pa'i lag ba btsar bas phyag rgya thams cad dang/ dug byas pa rnams kyang

'joms par byed do// skya bo'i nang du'ang gdab par bya stathams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan la'ang jiltar 'dod pa bzhin du las rnams byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ namany+tsats+tshabadzra pA Naye/

mahAyak+Shas nA ta ya/na mash+tsatasrinaM/b+ha gi gno/namasti bu ru/sazla ba ha su/mahAkarmas+ya/ ba cipa so/ a ma kAya/ b+hag pa pa tan sAhA/ nag po'ibargyad pa lam nag po'i bcu bzhi pa la mtshan mo gsum
ru sgyur bar gnas pas sngags 'di thod bar khrig gis za bar bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mngon par basngags par byas naso tshul dor bar bya// rnam pa thams cad pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro// na mo
rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsa N+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA ba ta la/ na masha ta sra b+ha ga nInI/ na mo dzam+b+han/ tsA tu tsA tu/ tsacu tsa tu sAhA/ rig pa 'dis rgyal gyi zla
ba la mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'og tun lasham gsum khar bcug sta/ stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de nas na le sham gtsagi khar rab tu bcug ste/ gangamigam 'dzumasapar lta bar

byed pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ namat+tabadzrapA Naya/ mahAyak+Sha se nA pa taya/ namasha ta si Ni b+ha gi nInA/ na mastsalhu ru mahA sAny+tsa/ bA hA ya/ na mo dzaya bi dza ya a dzi ti/
a pa ra dzi ta swAhA/rag pa 'das ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sngon du bstan pa byas nas/ nag po'i brgyad pa 'am nagau po'ibcu bzhi pal nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas pas gos gtsang ma bgos nas

mar ma dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phreng bal sogs pa phul te mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ murang nyid kyisaT+Thas nas zangs kyi snod du gzhag ste thun gcig tu bzlas bar bya'o// de 'thungs shing khrus byas

nas chog de nyid kyis tho rangs dge 'dun gyis bstan pa'i slong mo zos nas de lta bu zhim brgyad zlosashig/ de nas khyogs bzhir rig pa'i gnas rnams kha ru rab tu 'jug par byed de thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//

a na mo rat+na trayA ya/ nam ts+tshAbadzra pA Naya/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na many+tsata saM NaMb+ha gi nInaM/ tan+timi li mi laM sAny+tsa/ rig pa'i dase rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i muklung du zhugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas khu

tshur byas nas nyin bcu gsum bzlas par bya'o// dul ga dang mchabs shi ba thams car slong ba 'jug bar byed do// khu tshur gyis ga don rnams 'bebs par byed do// na mo rat+tarAyA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Nam/

mahA yak+Sha so Na pa tal/ nam byAta sri b+ha gi zhinaM/ na masnyam ru/ sa mahAya/ su tsu su zhu badzra bra b+hat+tanAya sAhA/ sngags 'dis ba khyung ga rekyil 'khor khrub pa byas nas/ der bsha ka'iyam shing zhe dang/

sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad gyis shig/ nag kho'abargyad pa nas brtsams taji sridi bco lnga pa'i bar du'o// gang 'dod pa de'agugs par byed do// 'dis kyang khros pas rgyal

bo'i pho brang rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ kun tu rgyu rab tu zhugs nas de la sol bsa mngon par b+bas te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ de nas khro ba dang bral bar 'agyur ro// de nas
phyag rgya rab 'chad byed// dge ba'i lag pa las kun l// las gang cung zad bya ba de// kun l lag bgayon sbyar bya/ mthe bo la bzung ba yi// phyag rgya lha mir yongs su bsgrags// sdigs mdzub
can naganod sbyin l// dri zalan gung mo ste// 'byung po rnams la ming mdado// sprul sogasalam bu chung// srin po rnams lamaNa'i ru'o// dbyug pa'i phyag rgya yi dgas rnams// phyag rgya rnams
brgyad du bshad/ mthe bong rdo rjerab 'joms pa// sdolas mdzub rdo rje khu tshur te// gung mo rdo rdzolus dmal/ mthe'u chung nag po'i yanalag can// mtho khong tuslur zhes 'ad// rang gi gzugs kyis
rab r la/ phyag rgya lnga bo rnam par dgod// kade nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chabo ma chan thob/ bcom ldan 'das kyazub ba la mgo
khos phyag 'tshalasa'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen bo can/ sems can Thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ rtog pa'i rgyal bo chen bo phal pa rgyan brdzis kyi rgyud phyi mas ji ltar
bcom ldan 'das rage pa'i sngags kyi skyod pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad du ji ltar bya ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rigs kyi khu legs so//

des na gang gi pa 'dzin pa bkrus ba zhan pa rig pa de rjes su dran par byas s rig pa med par khrus bya ba dang/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs ma yazhi khar zlos pa nyid de rnams nalus rtsub pa dang stobs chung
bar 'gyur ro// gang lam du 'gro ba grong pa'ichos kyis gos ba rnams l yid kyis bats+tshas bcad do// rtag tusams g.yo ba dang nad mang bar 'gyur ro// gang yang yang nas yang du rogi ba thunamong du
'pho bar ng/ gnas yin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor bar byed pa dang/ sbyin sreg dang bram khas bzlas pa byed pan rtag tu don nyams pa dang/ grogs nyams par yang 'gyur ro// gang zhig slar yang rag
ba ra dzan par ng gi rige bal bsab byed pa dang lha la bar khyad ban log par 'dren pa dang skrag par byed do// rtag tu 'jig rten dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu yongs su brtas par 'gyur ro// rtag
churang rage ba 'tshan pas sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'od ng/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos kyis gsus pa'i rig pa'i sngags rnams me tog dang bdug spos la sogs kha
rnams kyis mchod bar tsa/ bkur stir bya'o// dam tshig yod pa dang/ srog gcod par byed pa dang/ sngags byed pa dang dge slong ma sun 'byin par byed pa dang/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang/

tshul dang bral bas dge 'dun gyi rjes la yos su longs spyod pa dang/ 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang la yongs su 'gro kha dang/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma gsod par byed pa dang/ zas la rkang pas rje
bar byed pa dang/ dmatshag med bar khro bas zas rdzi bar byed pa dang/ 'thor bar byed pa dang/ dom tshag med ba shi ba mthong nas 'gro bar mi byed pa dang/ dam gi med pa rang rakyil 'khor du ma
zhugs pa la phyag rgya dang sngags sbyin par byed pa dang/ de la'ang dam tshig med par sman rkang pas rdzi bar byed pa dang/ dam tshig las nyams par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dba' rnams dang/ lha gzhan rnams la'ang dra tshad nyid kyis 'gom par byed pa dang/ dam tshag bad bar dung dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtsa gsum kha gdangs dang/ be con dang/ mdung dang/ rdo rje/
dang/ thub dang/ gzhu dang/ gshol dang/ gtun shing dang/ mda' dang/ mdung thung rim/ glang pochadang/ khyu mchog dang/ bong bu dang/ phag dang/ shar lha dang/ song go dang/ bya gag/
dang/ rlabya dang/ ma ho dang/ rngamo dang/ rong ba dang/ mi dang/ lha bzhon pa dang/ mchogamasnatshogs pa rnams kyang 'gom par byed pa dang/ sna tshogs byed pa mthong nas

zla nang bas gnon par byed pa dang/ rnam pa gzhan du log par 'dren pa dang dngos grub skor bar mi byed do// bza' ba'i tshog dang 'dar til dang/ sha dang/ paNaTadang/ dzam+b+hal ke dang/ nya dang/ pU pa la ka

mang bo dang/ til gyi thug pa dang/ lha bshos dang/ drimad nyid bza' ba'ang spang bar bya'o// lha'i dri med nyid gzhon pa dang/ bang gnon pa dang/ mu la gnas pa dang ldan pa dang/ ut+pa la gnon pa dang/

nags kyi bdagu bo gcod pa dang/ rtsa ba 'byin par byed pa'i ng sbyang bar bya'o// ga brjes su dran par byed pa nyid kyis rtag tu gos gtsang ma bgos pas bya ba thams cad la bstan pa nyid dang/ gzhan rag ba'i rtog
khams cad la mchod par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ slar yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la bka' stsal ba/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phagasamasgrol

ma'i rig pa'i yi ge rnams thabs dang bcas pas bde blag tu sgrub par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ ral pa gyen brdzas kyi rgyud phyi mar yid kyis grub pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams ni/ na mo ratA

dra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA yaM/ mahA sa tAya/ glu ni glu ni la la la sid+d+hi sin+d+ha bar kram sAhA a tIg+hA su taAhA/ sam+bostsaAr+ya a ba lo kati sAhA/ 'di ni 'phags pa zla

[o] ]ba ma zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i go sta las thams cad byed pa'o// sgrub pa pos rtag tu gtsug bu dngacing ba dang/ phyag rgyabacing pa'i ng bya'o// khagags thams cad rnam par 'jom
par byed ba'o// del 'dono tho rangs langs nas gtsang mar gyur pas dkyil 'khor byas nas/ mi tig la sogs pa gtor ti lngalabartson pas brgyan brgyar bzlos bar bya'o// mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs

bar byed do// yang na gang 'dod pa dadabang du byed de// de nas dkyil 'khor du phyogs tA dza kaM rab tu gter nasagang 'dod pa de skyod par byed par 'gyur ro// bklags pas grub pa gang yin pa de ji lta ba bzhin du rtog

bar bya bar 'gyur ro// yang 'dir rnam grangs kyigatar ba da der gang gcig tu rig pa de dran par byed do// de nas gshad byed skyod par byed par 'dod na dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shang gsam rab tu sAr te
dar sha pos bskor la ji ltar skyes pa'i khrag gis sbyanasrog gyis shag/ nyamibadun pa la 'jigs pa'i nga rog can gyi gshar byed mtshan mo phyed nas lang bar byed do// yang dag par bsngags pas ji ltar
brjod pa'i gnas su yang na byin gyis brlabs pa sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i byin gyis brlabs pas ji ltar bde bar mngon parab de bar byed do/ de nas gnasakhacig tu mi rnams 'tshab

dang gnas kha cig tu ma 'bar bar mthong ba dang gnas kha tilog tu lcags sgrog 'acings pa mthong ngo// de ltar gshad byed de rnam par rgyu bar byed do// de zhi ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pad+ma
stong phrag brgyad dbul bar bya'o// mchog tu zhabar 'gyura'o// dgra rnams skyed par byed par 'dodon dur khrod du song nas dur khrod kyi shang gis me rab tu sbyar te/ yungs kar dka

po la til nag po'i tilamar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sregs shog/ 'gro bar byed do// de nas rams kyis 'dzan par 'dod na dur khrodakyi ma la rur khrod kyi thal ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis
zla shig/ rims chen pos 'dzin no// zhi ba'i don du tshul brgya rtsa bas te mgo bor sbyin par bya'o// rams las grol lo// mgo bo zug rdus 'dzan par 'dod na ba byung gi gzugs brnyan lami rus kyi bur bu

la stong phrag brgyad bzlas la mgo bor phurabus gdab bo/ mgo bo zug rngu chan pos 'dzanano// phur bu bton pas zhi bar 'gyur ro// dbang po la btang namanying du 'gyur ro// btonanazar ro// snying khar bta

nagazer chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bton nathar ro// sar ldeng gi phur bu sha dang khrag gis btags kha srad bus dkris pa la brgyad brgya pazlasal mi rus kyi phur bu'i mgo bor gdab par bya'o// dgra'i sgol

btab na tho rangs 'bros par byed do// ji srid phur bu bton par ma gyur gyi bar du gang du'ang gnas par mi byed do// rgyal po skyid par 'dod na lcachan lo'i khang par song nas/ lhal dug dang khrag gso byugs

ta sha chen po'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// nastsa'i 'dab mas kyang mchod par bya'o// de nas dug dang/ khrag rang/ sku tsho rnams gcig tu byas nas brgyad paskyor sbyin sreg gyis shig/ brgyad brgya dang pos
ni rang gsha'o// gnyis pas me tog go/ gsum pas btsun mo'i 'khor ro// bzhi bsa mtshonaman po'o// ldabasaglang bo che'o// drug pas rta ste/ khro bo chen pos dkris pa'i lasaso// blo bzang po/
nyid nyams par byed par 'dod na namA'igang gis mo sbyar nas/ namA'i lomadang dur khrod kyi phral ba phan tshun bsus pas srag blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skad cig la nyams par 'gyur
ro[“]de nas lkugs par byed par 'dod na tsa kA sa ma ya'i gzugs brnyan byas nas zangs kyi phur bu la brgyad brgya bzlas te/ ragra bo yin la byas nas kha la khur bug dab bar bya'o// lkugs par 'gyur
ro/ phur bu bton na thar ro// mngon spyod can rdzogs so/// ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'byung ste/ so shing la lan bdun bzlas nas bza' bar bya'o// ma blangs par bza'
ba rnyed do// brgyad brgyar bzlos nas mgo bo la byugs pas skya bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gos lalan bdun mngon par basngagasanas gon na bskal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// mag smanal/
mngon par bsngags nas mag la bskus na khro bas dkris pa rnams kyis mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// lamang zlos bzhin pas song na chom rkun rnams kyis 'joms ma nus so// sor mo la lan
bdun bzlas pas mchab can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// gsagamal brgyad brgyar bzlas nasatshul gtor na tshul rgyu ba thams cad rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// bcings pa la ram/ 'gag pa
la bzlas na thar ro// ka ra wAra'i lcag ma la lan bdun bzlas pas rakyil 'khor du dbar byugs nas mal mchon chasbyin par bya'o// gang du 'dod pa der 'pho bar byed/
do[：]khyor ba'i tshul bsngags nas steng du gtor bar bya ste/ dusaMm yin pa'i char rongs bar byed do// thal ba la brgyad brgyar bzlas na thal ba des ra bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyi mas rdo rje'i ra bar
'gyur ro// sgronam gsum gyis mer bar 'gyur ro// b.laba'i 'dab mas bal pa'i ra bar 'gyur ro// brgyad bskyar bzlos pa'i chus chu'i ra bar 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na bcom ldan 'das

gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rtog pa gzhan gyi tshogs ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed do// rig pa bsgrubs pa las mtshamasamed pa las grol nas byang chub kyisoms rnyed do// oM ta thA ga ta u b+hi

Sha a na ba lo ki te mAn+tun te dzo rAnihUM/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha kaD+ha ka/ dar ba de ra tshany+dzatshin+da/ hUM hUM phaT saMNasAhA/ gzi brjod dang phung bor rnam par bshad de/ 'dabamachung ngu'i rgyab tu gnas par bya'o/

[– ]zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rgyud chung ngu las bris pa 'dab ma so so la rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la ras khyod du bcu gnas sam/ yang na dpa' bo'i rin gyis

nyos pa lta/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i ras kha tshar ma bcad pa skra dang bral ba la/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can dbang po mtshang ba min bas kha shar du phyogs pas ras rnams 'phrul 'khor la bzhag ste/ de'i mdun du
00 sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs bzams can dang/ khyad par du bcom ldan 'das ma'aphags ma sgrol ma skya drang bar byas nas/ de nas aka'i shing gis ma rab tu sbyar nas yungs kar
dkar po la mar gyis btags par l pa gcagema'i stong bos ras ris kyi spyan sngar khrubapa'itshor rakyila 'khor du stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg rgyas shig/ ras bse'adribazhin pa na bgags mad par 'gyur

ro de nas tshes grangs dang/ byed pa dang/ rgyu skar dang/ yud tsam dag bal snodagasar par bzhag pa khadog ma 'dres pa/ shin tu so sor btags pa'i kha dog can gyi chus sbyaranas ba lang ga smra'i par gyis
bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing ni snatshogs pa'i gnas rab tu bsngags ba/ bya'i tshog saskad 'byanab/ dpagabasam gyi shing dang mtshungs pa bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpagamar 'dir bzhug
bar bya'o// chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa/ skyil mo krung gis nye bar bzhugs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyisakhargyunala'isku/ mdzes par snang bzhin pa'i lus/ gtsug tor nas 'od zer chen po
gsar gyi kha dog can 'bro ba/ pad+mad karabo la bzhugs pa 'dira gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su dkar po rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ kha dog lnga pa'i gos kyi stod
g.yogs bgos pa/ phyag na rngayab thogs pa'o// gzhan du rgyuskaramakhazhal 'bags pa dri med par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpar 'drir gzhug par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi
phyogs su thams cad dakarapo/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'itshogs dang/ phyag na ral ba spyi blugs dang/ dbyug gu'i shing snams pa/ mchod phyir thogs phrag pa la
'byung ba/ g.yang gzhi nag po can/ gung mo'i sor mos yongs su bzung ba'i bgrang 'phrang dang/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang bas ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ bcom ldan 'dis 'od dpag mad kyis mnan pa'i ral
ba'itsogs can/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ mchog tu skyasapa/ sgrub pabo'i stang du phyag brkyang ba phyag bzhi ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad la 'phags pa dri ma med par 'gro ba cung zad mngon
paralhags pa'o// bcom ldan 'dasalas cung tshad dman pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drore gzhug bar bya'o// de'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ gsaradang rin
po chos rab tu gsal bar byed pa'i lus can/ cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rnam par bkra ba'i gos bgos pa/ rin po che'i stod g.yogs can/ lus cung zad 'dud pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lag pa kha
sbyor byas pas ut+pa la sngon po yongs su bzung ba/ phyag mchog tu skyes pa/ dang por bcom ldan 'das la rtog par byed bzhin pa'i sgrolam 'dir gzhug par bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad+ma'i mtshobya'o// 8
nas rtsa ba'i bad la bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs suraphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa dri ma mar par 'gro ba// gzhan ru bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i
g.yasasu klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas mgo bo bdun pa/ phyag na pasma'i sdong po bsnams pa/ thams cad dkar ba/ rnam par bkra ba'i gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa 'drir gzhug par
bya'o g.yon ru klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sngo bsangs/ phyag na pad+ma'i sdong bo bsnams pa/ 'di 'dra ba 'drir gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa bar ng bar dkar mo/
rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par bargyan pa/ rin po che'i stodagayogs can/ rin pa dang tshad Ta ka phyugan bsnams ba/ pus mo sa la btsugs pa'i lha mo 'dzAr gzhug par bya'o/som ldan 'das ma 'phags
sgrol ma'i g.yas kyi gzhogs su rtsa ba dang nye bar 'khod pa'i thams cad dkar mo gzhon nu ma'i gzugs can rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyun pa/ thal mo kha sbyararu byas pa/ bcom ldan 'das
mdang / bcom ldan 'das la nges par rtog bzhin pa'i bde ldan 'daMr gzhug par bya// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs kyidrung du sgrub pa bo skyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta
bar gyur pa/ gos dkar po'i stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs can/ rabyibs dang rnam pa'i khyad par ci dra babasamo gnyis 'asregs pa/ lag pa spos phor thogs pa bya'o// lha'i bu tsha bo tsha rdung bar

byed bzhin pa bya'o/ sprin las glog dang bcas pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi dang phyogasazal derang bya'o/ g.yas su ras ris kyi stong du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bum tog rathorathar byed bzhazhi ba 'dzar
gzhug par bya'o// stong du zla ba dang nyim rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par bargyan pa 'drar gzhug par bya'o// stong du dung dang rda bo ma dag go/ 'phags pa spyan ras gtsags dbang
phyug gi g.yas su nag mo gsus pa 'phyang ba/rgyan thams cad dang/ mchab gtsags pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang/ go zhes bya ba'i pags pas bkrasel/ gtsug bar la thod ba'i
'phreng ba 'phyang ba/ rdob la rab tu bzhugs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi phyag gis dgra sta yongs su bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i dang bosakhrag gis yongs su
rigang ba'i snod dang/ phyogs dang ldan pa'i lus lasminam dang skaraldan pa/ bcom ldan 'dasal thal mo sbyar ba byas pa/ sen mo rang po can/ glang po che'i pags pas stod g.yogasapa/ byang chub sem
dpa' chen bi'i bka' rab tu nod par byed bzhin par gyur pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma'i srin mo chen mo ra=ra gzhug bar bya'o// de ltar ras ris 'dir bcug nas gtsang ma'i phyogs su dag pa dang/ skyong ba

kha dang tshad ma nyid kyi yan lag rnam par sbyangs pa/ri bo dang mu klung gi 'gramamam/ gzhan du'ang rung sta/ gtsang ma'i gnas su'o// de nas du ba 'khrul bas na debang du byed do// gang thabs cig gsang

sngags byed pa de'o// lhathamasacad gsal bar byar par 'adod pas dkar po'i brgyad pa'i ng rung sta las brtsam par bya'o// gtsang ma'i sa'a phyogs su gzhu'i tshad kyis thang la yongs su byug par bya sta/ de'i

d+ha dbus su so phag gzhag par bya'o// phyogs bzhi rnams su sa las byung pa'i rtsa ba dang nag po med pa'i chu'i bum pa bzhal brgyad brgyarab sngags pa gzhag par bya'o// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu tshon sna lnga/
pas legs par dkris pa'o// dri zhim po'i phyo mas dkyil 'khor byas nas/ phyogs bzhir chang dang sha med pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// dri bzang bo'i ma tog gi mchod pa bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul
le zangs kyi snod mar gyis bkang ba bzhag nas 'gram gyi phyi ma rnams l nye bar gnas par gzhug par bya'o// shar du mngon par phyogs pas phyi rol lam dkyil 'khor du ral pa gcig malamachod pa dang gtor

ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas ku sha ljang khu blangs nas gos dkar po gcig 'chang bar byas te/ ji sude du rkang pa gnyis kyi bar de srid du byabs par bya'o// de nas mar gyi snod kyi stang du sha ris dor bar bya'o//

de nas mar chung ngu de la gal te nga ma dang san mo dang/ ska mthong na de dor nas gang dang gang gcig tu bya'o// ji srid du rang 'dod pa dang skya ba lhag par skyes kyi bar du'o// ra nas bum pa re re blangs te zlos bzhin

pas gzhag par bya'o// sbyangs pa'i snod nges par gnas ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byed du gzhug go/ 'dile'ang 'di'i wiskumatosbyin par bya'o// pri yang ku dang

na ga go sar dang sbrang rtsi can dang/ tu ru ska rnams gcig tu byas nas lan bdun mngon par basngags pa byas te bsku bar bya'o// ba'i mar dang bsras pa'i bza' ba mchog khaza bar bya'o// nad med par 'gyur ro/
gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu sngon por bcos pa la lan bduna mngon bar bsngags par byas nas rna ba la bcang bar bya sta mig gi nad zhi'o// mgrane palawacings na skyags pa sel

bar byed do// srad bu 'di nyid kyi ras yug 'thag du gzhug par bya'o// stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa gyad kyi lus la bcing bar bya ste/ g.yul du gzhan gyis mi thub par 'agyur ro// khru bzhale tshad

kyi dkyil 'khor nyobar byugasata/ bcom ldan 'das ma la dri bzang po'i me tog gi mchod pa byas nas ba'imaragyi sgron ma dbul bar bya'o// de nas byang chub shang gis me sbar nas sha'i khris la lung 'dug

pas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'isra rtsa pog gi srog blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sraka gyis shig/ nyam bdun la gang 'dod pare'and yun ring po 'phar zhibar byed do// bgagasathams cad

nyab zhi bar byed par 'dod pas rgya mtshor 'groba'i chu klung gi 'gram gnyis kyis blangs nas/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'isang ge dang stag gi gdong pa can gyi bgegs rnams nyin rtsa gcig lhag pa'i brgya bya'o// de

nas nag po'i brgyud pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma'i phyogs su khrog sgrub par byed pa bar thogs te lasabartsam par bya'o// de'i rol tu phyogasabazhir rgya phyogs kyi le mal 'dug pa'i
bgags rnams gzhag par bya'o// bgagaso rnams kyi dbus su bgags chen po log par drinapa gzhag par bya'o// lan cig mngon par basngags pa'i tshon sna lnga phyi ma de rnams kyis thog mar dkyil
tsa 'khor bdun bya'o// ma tog dmar po dang rwademar pos mngon par mchodapar bya'o// phyogs bzhir mar gyi maram dbul bar bya'o// khyogs bzhi'isha'i gtor ma dbul rabya'o// rgya skyegs kyi khu ba
phyogs bzhare gtor bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad du mngon par bsngags pa 'am/ brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa'i srad bu dmar bos bgags thams cad la g.yas
skor du dkri bar bya'o// de nas bgags kyi rgyal po chen po bcing par bya sta/ ri rnams kyi dbus su u dum pa'i yam shing gis me rab tu sar nasakhag gas btang bar bya'o// zhes brjod nas sAhA'iyi

gas pa'i 'i lci ba la zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i mtshan mo stong phrag brgyad sbyin srab g gyis shig/ de nas sgrub pa po ri'i bgags dang log par 'drenapa thams cad bcings par 'gyur
ro par g pa thams cad sgrub par byed bzhin ban bgags med par 'gyur ro// da rnams ni ri rnams kyis byabs pas log par 'dren pa chen po gcig tu bzhags nas bgags rnams thams cad la
tog thams cad dbulalo// srung ba thams cad kyang ngo// bdug pa ni log 'dren chen po rnams la ka ra wir dmarapo dang tsan dan dmar po dbul lo// bgag thams cad dang nyabar tsho ba thams cad la
mchod yon dbulal// leg pa 'dren pa dang bcas pa la gu gul dang marab sras bsamachod yon dbul lo// de nas lta ba'i tshad du dong brko bar bya'o// de ru so so so sor bcu gnas slar yang sa'i sar
pa/ dbyar [“]de ltar rag pa radzin pa'i bgags thams cad med par 'gyur ro// ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du sa la ma lhung ba'i ba byung gis dkyila 'khor 'bar byug/
te dri dang ma rtog lasogs pa rnams kyis mchod ba byas nas u dum wA ra'iyam shing gsam rab tu spor te/ tshangs ma'iyam shing rnams kyis thun gsum du sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad gyis
shig/ khyim bdun phrag kha chig gam/ lim bdun phrag gnyis su tsa ru batha' bas yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// khru bzhi'i tshad kyis dkyil 'khor 'bar byugs te 'o ma can gyi yamashing gs me rab tu
sbyar nas ro ma'i sbyin srag gyis shig/ tham ze dbang du 'gyur ro// tsartsa'i srog blugs kyisashog/ rgyal rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// zho'i srog blugs gyis shig/ rdzo' rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// nas kyi/
srog blugs gyis shig/ dmang+ga rigs dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad du bsgrub bya bsgrub pa'i don du 'am bdun phrag gtsag go/ dgra la bltas nas bzlas par bya sta rengs par 'gyur ro// mAsha ka'i
yam shang zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg kyis shag/ gang la bltas nas bzlas pa de las su mi rung ba ragyur ro// rlulalan bdun mngon
par bsngags pas dug thams cad sol bar byed do//dug thams cad la 'dod pas khyab par bya'o// zhu mkhan gyi ril bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas mag dgang bar bya ste/ mig nad nye bar zhi
bar byed do// byis pa gdon gyis rgan pa la srad bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bcing bar bya ste/ grol bar byed do// nad pa la btung bar bya ste/ gdon thams cad mthu med par 'gyur ro/
thal ba la lan bdun bzlas bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// du mthon ba la til mar la yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/ bde bar btsa' bar gyur ro// rmongs pas mngal gyi rus tshod la 'das pa la

khrus byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i b.rimar la lan bdun mngon bar ba sngags par byas nas btung bar sbyin no// bza' ba mchog dang ldan pa mtha' bar bya'o// bu skya par byed do// de nas bu mo mang po can gyi
yamagang stong phrag brgyad sbyin sregakyis shig/ thal ba de bum pa bzhi chus kun tu bkang nas brgyad brgyar mngon par basngags pa dkyil 'khor ru gsum gzhag par bya'o// skal ba bzang bor 'gyur ro//
'di'i bu 'chabe'ang med do// shu dag la brgyar brgyar mngon par bzlas talag pa g.yon la pa cings na skya ya thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ma tog thun gsum du stong
phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyisashage/ phyogs gcig la g.yul du gzhan gyis mi khrub bar 'agyur ro// gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu la brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas nas mdud pa bdun bya'o//
lag pa la bcings na brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug mkhru med par 'gyur ro// de nas mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyi mtshaba'i dug laAhA'i yo che'i bar du khyor bar chublangs nas brgyad brgyara mngon bar ba stags
tabatung ba sbyin par bya'o// dug nyalakha'ang slong bar byed do// de nas ma las na phyogs bzhi rnams su mngon par bsngags pa byas te 'du ba sbyin par bya'o// 'dzeg
pos kyang mchi ba'i dug slong bar byed do// stan gan+ta ka la lan bduna mngon par bsngags pas la byug pa sbyin par bya'o// ma bcings par yang de nyid du skam par byed do// tshor ba med par spyad do//

yams kyi nyapar 'tsho ba rnams la grong ngam grong khyer gyi dbus su mtshan mo byed nas ba lang gi pags pa'i tshad kyi thang la 'bar byug par bya ste/ dkar gsum gyi gtor ma byin nas dri dang ma tog la
sogs pa'i gtor ma byin te/ 'o ma'i shing gsam rab tu sbyar nas ro ma'i srog blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyisashagi/ nyim gsum gyis grong gsum gyi dang/ nyi ma bdun gyis khang pa'i
lams zhapar zhi bar byed do// de nas 'u par zhi bar ma gyuran 'dir khyim bdun du bad kan mthar byed kyi yam shing gis ma sbyar nas akA'i til mar gyisabatagasapa'i 'brasayos stong phyag brgyad
sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyim gsum la raphral gyi yams rab tu zhi bar byed do// thal bas 'gram bcings te zlos bzhin pas gang mthong ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang mkhasgrubs par yang bcom
ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i ras ris kyi spyan sngar 'gyur ro// chog gzhan ni ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar zla ba nyal gzugs bon+tanal dang por nag
po'i phyogs la mchod pa rgya chen bo bya sta/ ana' yams shing gs ma spunas zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags ban gsum du mdzub mo'i tshad kyi spyi'i srog stong phrag brgyud ji srid bco lnga
pa'i bar du gyis shig/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i sbyorabs stong phrag gsum du bzlas par bya'o// stong phrag gsum du bzlas ba bya sta lasagazhan rnams su 'gyur ro/'das sngon du bsnyen
ba byas pas grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal pa'i blon po dbang du byed par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das ma la mchodapabyas nas byang chub shing ga yamashangal id+madar til mar gyis
btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin srag gyis shig/ nyim bdun la dbang du 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di nyad kyis grul bum dbang du 'gyur ro// til btags pa stong phrag brgyud sbyin sreg
gyis shig/ 'byung po dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod du ro bsregs pa'i dum bu can stong phrog brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sha za dbang du 'gyur ro// wANa'ishing g.yam shong stong phrag brgyud
sbyi'i srog gyisashagi/ gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro// bal gyi srog blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'og dang/ tsar+yadang/ til gyi thug pa rnams kyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ 'gis
bzhi dbang du byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro// gu gul gyi ril bu stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ lha chen po'irjes su 'brang ba'i gdon dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan ma gtsang maralas nas
stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg dang bzlas pa gyis sha'i// phyogs gcig la 'ching ba las grol bar byed do// bla pas 'ching ba chen po las grol bar byed do// til dngapad+me ka'i
sbyan srog gis khro ba dbar zhi bar byed do// yang na til gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ dgos 'dod pas dur ba'i myu gu'i sbyin sreg gyis shage/ gos zung brgya red do// thun mong ba'i skyes bu dbang du byed
pa la go ba rwa gyi sbyin sreg gyisashage/ sbyang bu mchurangs kyi mchub ting pa la sa ma 'drab ma'asbyin sreg gyis shog/ stag ga mchungacingebal gar kaNi ka'i spyin sregagyis shige/ seng ge 'i/
mchub cing ba la sa h+phakaNi ka'i sbyin srog gyis shig/ sbral rnams l nagag mar gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhiba'i don du sAma'i lam dang rom can gyi yam shing gis ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i
don thams cad la no dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du khyim bdunanam zla ba phyir du sbyin sreg bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus dang byang chub sams dpa' rnams l
mchod pa byas nas 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ ma grub ba sgrub par byed do// gzhan gyis bsgrubs par ng rnam par 'joms par byed do// klu la sogs pa'i gdon rnams la rgyags bcing ba dang/ dkyil
'khor bcing ba la sogs pa bzlas pa nyid kyis byed do// mtshan ma bdun du thunagasum du tshor ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shage/ ragra bcom par byed do// nam pa'iyam shing tshaba'i til mar gyis btag
[s ]ba stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyisashage/ mtshan mo bdun gyis skye bar 'gyur ro// sku las khyad par du bung bar byed pa la a ri yamashang stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ skyes pa'i
sha dang sbyo byad la rtag tu bzlas par bya sta/ thams cad du phyir ldog par ma 'gyur ro gi wangal lan tigu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas nas thig le byas te rgyal po'i sgo ra dang/ shu dag la stong phrag
brgyad mngon par bsngags par byas nas lag pa la bcangs nas gang blangs pa de red do/ gdon 'bros par 'dod pas mi'i rus pakhongs nas sor brgyad pa'i tshad byas nas brgyad brgyara mngon
ba bsngag pa gdon gyi gnas su gdab par bya ste/ gdon 'bros par byed do// ma tog dang/ sridang/ 'bras bu la sogs pa brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags par byas nas gapal bzhi pa de dbang
nga byed do// rig pas bgags rnam par gzhomapa'i don du sang ldengag yam shing stong phrag brgyad sbyin srag gyis shig/ nyim gsum nas bgegs mad par 'gyur ro// de lta bu la sogs ba'i las
thams cad byed do// thams cad du gso sbyong can gyis ras yas kyi spyan sngar bsgrub par bya ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// stong phrag blangs nas g.yas kyi gzhogs su gzhag sa ra re la
lan pharana mngon par bsngags pa byas nasam la sbyin sreg bya'o// bar skabs 'dar ras ris rab tu 'gul bar byed pa dang/ mar me'i rtse mo 'bal bar byad ba dang/ nam mkha' la lha'i rdza
