bya/// kho cha'i sgra sgrog ba dang/ dri zhim po rlung ldang ba dang/ sarab tu g.yo ba'o// dazhas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen bo can/ byang chub sems/
dpa' dang rig pa'i tshogs du mas yongs su bskor ba/ ral ba spyi blugs dang/ dbyug gu'i shing dang/ g.yang gnanag po zogasapa/ ral ba'i cod pan 'phyang ba 'byon par byed do// 'phags
baspyagaras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer byung sta/ mapar 'phro ba'i 'od thorado rnams kyis sems can ngamyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas thams cad yud tsam gyi tshor ba las
nyamasaso// rang nyid thugs rje chen po can sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba'i 'phags pa spyan ras garbages dbang phyug mthong bar byed do// sgrub pa bo pus mo gnyis btsugs pas/
shar du gzhug pa'i rnam rgyal gyi bum pas mchod yon dbul lo// de nas rab gs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ mchog tu 'dod pad sbyin par byed do/ gang blangs pa re
dar ro// rig pa 'dzan pa'i 'khor los sgyur banyid dang/ rgyal srid chen po dang/ tshe ring po de dang/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dang/ lus la dbang po ma tshang ba med pa nyid dang/ gso dka' ba'i
nad 'joms pa 'am/gtor 'pho bar byed do// phug tu 'jug par byed pa dang/ rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dang/ mi snang ba nyid dang/ sachen po'i dbang phyug gam/ gang blangs pa de
[78 rnyed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang 'dod pa der yang 'gro'o// 'dis tsho bskal par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub
par byed ba ni rig pa thams cad kyi 'khor las sbyar ba nyid dang/ mang du 'dod pa dang/ thogs pa med pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'
ldang dang/ mi 'am tsa thams cad kyis mngon par 'dod pa sgrub pa bdun pa la mtshams mad pa byed pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ zhes pa de lta bu kho nas kun tu rtogs par bya'o/ zhes pa sgrub
pachen po dang po'i chogabcom ldan 'das ma 'phagasam sgrol ma'i rtsa ba dang po las btus pa rdzogs so////rasaras zhalashar du phyogs bar bzhag nas/ de nas tsho
'phrul gyi phyogs kyi dkar po'i brgyad pa 'am/ rmo baphrul gyi phyogs kyi bcu pa la las brtsam par bya ste/ lo ma dang/ nas zan dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ tsar+yadang/ 'dab ma dang/
zho dang/ 'om dang/ rtsa dang/dra'i zar ba'om/ slong mo zungs pa'i bza' bas kyang rung so/ gso sbyong can gyis byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pas byang chub mchog tu sems
bskyod de/ sems can rnams kyi don rjes su bsams nas nyi ma so sor 'phel bzhin pa'i mchod pa byed cing/ kusha btang ba'i mal stan lakhrus lan gsum byed cing/ gos lan gsum
du brdzes te sha'i wasal 'bar 'dugs/rim par la ji ltar 'byor pas 'phar bar byed bzhin pas slongam bza' bar bya'o// rkang pa g.yon khas bgrod pa la sogs

pa byed cing 'bum phrag bcu drug bzlas par bya'o// de ltar sngon du bstan pa byas pas dkarapo brgyad pa 'am bcu bzhi pa la sgrub pa brtsamaparabya ste/ dge slong gi dga' dun 'dra rnams kyis btsal bar bya'o/
de nas ras ris kyi phyogs bzhir sa las byung ba bum pa rtsa ba dang nag po med pa bzhi ru dang bcas ba/ a mra'iyal 'dab kyis kha bkab pa/ sa bon thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba'i bum pa gzhag

tshapar bya'o// ras ras kyi spyan sngar khu bzhi ba'i tshadal zangs dang/ gsar dang/ dngul las byung ba 'am/ sa las byung ba'i bum pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma dang 'khrigaMng gis smras pa/
dag pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ snubazams cad dang/ sman thams cad dang/ rodang/ dr-idang/ rin po che'i snying po ma tog gi bon pos kha bkab pa/ du ku la'i sa ma nyams pas mgrin pa btungs pa
rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i bum pa gzhag par bya'o// ras ras kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinem gzhag par bya'o// de nas dri zhim po ma tog gi
'phro ba bcu drug ras ris la dbul bar bya'o// mdun du rmi bzang po tsan dan gyi chus yongs su bkang ba dang/ 'o mas bkang ba'i brgyad po de rnams so// ba'i mar gyi mar ma brgyad dbul bar bya'o//
paru dang/ 'o thug dang/ til gyi thug pa dang/ zan don dang/ pad+ma ka dang/ bcar bar bya ba rnams kyis kham phor bkang nas ras ris kyi phyogs la nare dbul bar bya'o// thams cad du ras ras la bris
pa'i lha rnams ladakar gsum gyi gtor ma dang/ lha bshos dang/ phyi rol du gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// da nas 'phuthams cad dang 'bras bu thams cad ji ltar rnyed pas ras ras kyi phyogs bzhir
gtor ma dngul lo// a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas sha'i khresal 'bar 'dug stayir rtsa gcig pas phyogs su lasabartsam par bya'o// 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing/
gisam rab tu sbyar nas/ a ka ru nag po'i yam shang la zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa zhes khyaba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de'ang ting ngeng 'dzan las langs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a jig rten gyi khams la lha'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po mthu chen thob la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad 'gyur ba/ rjes su dran ba tsam gyis bdag nyid srung ba la lan cig brjod pas
gtsug phud bcareb/ gnyis baT+Thas pas srung bachen mo dang/ gsum bzlas pas rakyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ bzhi bzlas pasamatshubatung ba dang/ lta bzlos pas rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa srung

sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rlung du a riyadang 'o ma can gyi shing gi yam shing gis ma khab tu sbyaranas/'bras las kyi sbag blugs thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyim gsum la
gcig gi dang/ bdun gyis skya bo chen bo dang/ phyogs kyi grong dang/ grong khyer gyi dang/ blubs yul 'khor chen po zhi bar 'gyur ro// rgyas par 'dod na ras risakyi spyan sngar 'o ma can gyi yam
shi nga gis ma rab tu sbyar nas 'khru dang 'khras thug po chathun gsum du sbyin srog stong phrag brgyad gyis shage/ ma bdun phrag gsum gyis rgyas par 'gyur ro// khyim bdun gyis rgyas pa chen por
'gyur ro// a ma'iyam shang gsam rab tu sbyar nas rur ba'i myu gu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sug byas shage/ smra ba rnams la skya ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// zhim shar ba nas ji srid nub kyi bar du
zi aka' shing ga mo la ming nas smos te lag pa g.yon pas lan bdun du khyab ma'i sbyin sreg byas shag/ dbang du 'gyur ro// byang chub shade gi yam shang gas mo rab tu sbyar nas me tog brgyab dang/
sha ta ba ridang/ shu dag dkar po dang/ yungs kar dang/ nas rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad lan ti rtsa gcig tu sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyim bdun gyis skyes bu chen po dbang du byed do/

mar gyi sbyin sreg gis rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa dbang du byed do// rgyal po'i sarku'i yam shing gsam rab tu sbyar nas tshaba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i rgya skyegs kyi khom stong phrag brgyad sbyin
srog gyis shage/ nyim bdun la dmag ste 'jig par byed do// seng ldang gi yam shing gas ma rab tu sbyar nas klog ljang khu stong phrag brgyad sbyin sra gyis shig/ phyogs kyi dgA'i 'gro ba gcod/
bar byad do// 'o ma can gyi yam shang gis ma rab tu sbyar nas lha'i shing gi yam shang dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyisashagi/ zla ba gcig la 'og gi lha mo rnams dbang du byed do//
oM ru batha' zhari kA'ashange gas pa rab tu sbyar nas na ga ge sar la mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ zhim so sor 'phal bzhin pa'i mchod pa bya ste/ rim

bdunanam zla ba gcig la stong du 'gro ba'i lha mo rnams dbang du byed do// tsa rlabazir zhing byang chub shang gi amashong gis me rab tu sbyar nas zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar gyis btags pa'i yungs
kar rgyal po'i sug blugs stong phrag brgya sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyam gsum la rgyal po'i btsun mo dbang du byed do// gang smras ba ra zams car rdzogs par byed do// 'dod bsatabar gzhag pa/
ni ma gtogs so// byang chub shing gi yam shing gis ma sbyar nas bsama'i 'dab ma rnams thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ khyim gyi gnod pa nyapar zhi bar byed do// ras ris kyi
spyan sngar mda' rgyang gi tshad kyi thabal nye bar byugs te/ nas kyi ril bu stong phrag brgyad la gzugs brnyan byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i mtshon rnon pos
gzhub cing gtub cing srag blugs stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// desrid rkang pa'i bar du ming nas smosanas khu tshur bcings te 'dug pa'i stong du lag pas dbul lo// danas khyim mer
bar kun tu snang ba'i ched du rtogs par bya'o// de'i mdun du khu tshur ragrol bar bya sta/ zhi ba nyid dbang du 'gyur ro// de ltar nyim gsum la rab ngs nyid kyis 'bar gnas so/ a riTayam
shang gisam rab tu sbar nasashing tAr brtarizhogasam rnams la lan bdun bzlas pas thun gsum du stong phrag brgyud sbyin sreg gyisashage/ phyogs kyi bza' ba rgyun mi 'chad par skya'o// pA la sha'i
yam shang gis ma rab tu sbyaranas e pamasgra'iyamashi'i mar gyis btags pa thun gsum du ming nas smos te stong phrag brgyad sbyin srag gyis shig/ nyim 'dun laM ga 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ba
byung gi gzugs sman+tanacasanas lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas pa'i mtshon rnon bos mgo khonas brtsams nas/ rkang ba'i bar du gtubasanas stong phrag brgyar sbyin sreg byas g nyim bdun la
nga rgyal chen po dbang du 'gyur ro// dkar po'i btsalngal sa la ma lhung ba'ab byung gas pa lang gi bags pa'i tshad thangal nyapar phyugs te/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du ras sa bzhugs
00 nas gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs kyi snod du sar skya rgyur mtshungs pa'i ba ra'i mkhazhon nu mas bsrubs parim blos nas ku sha'akhris la habar 'du ste/ anAtA'i 'dab ma'i nang la stod
byas nas g.yas su bskor ba bzhi ru rab tu bzhag nas/ lag pa g.yon bsamanan te thun gsum du stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa bya'o// nyama'adun ba la lag pa g.yas pa'i mang mad kyi sor mos

rakrugs te rjesrid du dro bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas btung bar bya ste go cha btsape ba'ang bcom ldan 'das ma nyid kyis bya'o// yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud
phyi mar zla ba'i tshog 'itabar sbyod pa'o/// sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs kyi rig pathams cad la sa la ma lhung ba'i sar skya'i babyung gas gtsang ma'i khyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya'o//
ba byung res yang dag par rdzogs par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brtan gzhag par bya'o// de'i yang gazhogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma gzhag par bya'o// de nas bal pa'i
mgo bo'i 'dab ma rnams byas nas/ til dang/ til gyi thug pa rang/ til mar dang/ smyo cad dang/ ro thug dang/ bu ram dang/ gang ba can dang/ nas tshan bza' sto/ ma rnyed pas sa ka ru'i//
bdug ba srag go/ der lho dang nub tu'ang phyogs bzhir sngar brjod pa'i gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi ming smosanas brjod par byago/ 'ongs pa dang/ dr-idang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ gter ma so
so bzhes pa dang/ 'di lta bu mang gi rig pa bzlas so// der bu ram dang/ gang ba dang/ 'o thug kyang shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// dri za rnams la gtor m dang/
til dang/ til gyi thug pa dang/ chang gis bkang ba can lho'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// gnod sbyin dang grul bum rnams la gtor ma'o mas bkang dang/ 'o thu gzhub kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/
klu dba'adab bzang rnams la gtor ma tshub mas bkang ba dang/ zhes bkang ba dang/ zan yang byang gi phyogs su gzhag par bya'o// gnod sbyin mo rnams la gtor ma dang/ dar bas bkang ba dang/
tshudang bsres ba'o/ bcom ldan 'das ma la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma phul nas ma tog thams cad kyis kyang mchod par bya'o// de'i phyogs bzharigu gul gyi bdug pa dbul lo// a ka ru dang/
tu ru ska dang/ ga bur ram/ dri'isar dza ra'i gtor ma 'am/ zan dron dang phyi phyogs bzhir gzhag par bya'o// yod bzhin pa ma yin pas ji ltar 'byor ba dang/ ji ltar yod pa'i gtor ma dbul bar
bya'o bcom ldan 'dasamala'ang mar gyi mar me dbulal// de nas myur du ril ba spyi blugs g.yas kyi gzhogs su gzhag par bya'o// ras ris sam/ bdun pa 'am kusha blangs nas lan/
bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas/ khashar du phyogs te rig pa bzhi lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bor bar bya'o// brgyad brgyara mtshon las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de'i ming nas smos pa nyid kyis rus
0 gsum du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mtshungs par 'dor bzhin pa byas pa la bcom ldan 'das la gang ma tog dang/ bar g pa dang/ mar ma'ang dor nas rnam ba gzhan gyi gtor ma thams cad blangs
tu 'phang bar bya'o// rdzing skam po 'am khron pa gzhug par bya'o// yang na gzhan gtsang ma'i phyogs bla gab dang bcas par yapar sta rnam par dor bar bya'o// gang du wa dang/ ce spyang rang/ khyi
rnams kyis mi za bar re// rkang pa dag kyang rung sta/ mnan par mi bya'o// yang na mas legs par bsrag par bya ba nyid do// dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa thams cad la'ang gtor ma gshegs pa'i
mo ga'o phyi nas zla ba las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor phyogs su lta byas pa zhes pa brtags pa ma yin pal/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o// 'ad rnams
khyab pa'i thabs so// chog gzhan thams cad du rdzogs pa'i rig pa dang snying po lasachen bo thams cad ji srid par de bzhin kho nar sal ma lhung ba'i ba ser skya'i ba byung gis sngar brjod pa'i tshogs
kyil 'khor byas nas/ de bzhin kho nas gtor ma gzhug par bya'o// bdug pa dang me tog kyang ji skad gsungs ba bzhin phul nas khyab par bya'o// srid bu bcang bar bya'o/ bdag nyid bsrung bar
bya'o gang zhig las chen por rgyas par byed par 'dod pas chog de nyid kyis bsgrub par bya'o// snga ma kho na de srid du'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i gos sku dang bralab la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyanam
'dres pa'i nagyis 'drir gzhug par bya'o// gzugs bar n zhal nub tu phyogs pa de'i g.yon gyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drar
gzhug par bya'o// phyag bzhi pa gi haMgi dpal le'u bya'o// ji srid du bsgrub par bya ba'i rig pa de'ang de'i dbus su rgya skyegs kyi mdog tu snang ba gur kum gyis bri bar bya'o// dpralaM bar
yang rung ste/ gsar las byung ba'i dar thod bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma gsar dang sngo bsas/ na bza' dkar bo mnabs pa/ mchod
phyir thogs pa can// ut+pal sngon po phyag na thogs pa/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas su rig pa'i rgyal mo ma bya chen mo phyag bzhi pa'o// rmacu chen mo'i bar du chu bya'i rgyal po
gsar du snang ba zhes bya ba gsar las byung ba'agashog pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o//rig pa rma bya chen mo na dkar zhing dag pa 'dzAri gzhug par bya'o// 'di'i g.yas kyi

phyogs su 'dzam bu'i gling rtse mo gsum pa/ shing rta'i gdong gi rnam pa 'o// nub tu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling zlumapor 'dir gzhug par bya'o// byang gi phyogs su byang sgra mi snyan gyi gling gru bzhi
mnyams pa bya'o// shar du lus 'phags por rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dri za'i bdag po 'khor dang bcas po'arAr gzhug par bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi gzhogs su rgyalapo chen po 'phags

skyes po grul bumatshul dagalo tsa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gzhogs su rgyal po chen po mag mi bzang klu rnams kyi bdag po sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi stong du gsar gyi stan la gos dkar bo can ba lang
gamig can bya'o// 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi gzhogs su thal mo sbyar ba byas pa pus mo gnyis sa la btsugasapa bya'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs kyi gcig gi rgyab tu phyag na rdo rje

phyag na rnga yabathogs pa bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi gzugasabartan gyi khor yug thams cad du me tog dang 'bras bu phra lo rnams so// sangs rgyas kyishar gyi phyogs su shar gyi lus 'phags kyi glang ngo//
byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling gi gzhogasasu rgyal po chen po ngalasos po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen porakhor dang bcas pa 'dir gzhug par bya'o// de nas dkar po'i tshos gcag nas brtsams te tshangs
bar sbyod pa bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'o ma dang zan bza'azhing dus gsum du kun ng ra'abadug pa sdug cing ras ris de la rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod par bya'o// 'di skad ces
brjod par bya ste/ rag pa'i dngos grub bdag la gyur cage/ khyim phyi ma gsum l gso sbyong la gnasapa nyid kyis bcol la dga' bar bya'o// dkar po'i phyogs las bon btags pa las khang
btsan gyis nyo bar sbyar ba dang/ bram ze gzhon nusaM bkal ba'i srad bu dang/ gzhon nu mas byas pa nye bar blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi zhabs kyi drung du bya'o// lcags lnga rgya shug
gatshag gu tshad kyi gsar dang/ dngul dang/ 'ongs dang/ tshon mo stayag po dang/ lcags rnams sangs rgyas kyi gzugs t+tAn+tan gyi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// rig/
ba grubapal lcagasar rnams l dbul bar bya'o// yang nas nigs rgyas la mchod pa'i las rnams so// de nas sal ma lhung ba byung bsar skya las byung bas b.langagapags pa'i rnam shar du
mgo bo bstan par nye bar byugs nas/ kha'irtsakhar shar gyi lus 'phags kyi glare zumapo bya'o// lho'i rkang pa gnyis su 'dzam bu'i gling zur gsum pa/ lho nub tu las ras kyi spyan sngar nub la

lang spyod kyi gling shum bca'o// nub kyi rkang pa'i mdun du byang sgramaM snyan gyi gling gru bzhimaMnyamapa'o// ga myun gyi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brtan zhal nub tu phyogs pa gzhag par bya'o// de'i
g.yon gyi gzhogs su bcom ldan 'dasam skalam 'adzrara gzhug par bya'o// ri mor byas pas sam[） ]salasabyung ba gzhag par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas la gus pa dang bcas pas dra dang mo
tog lasogasal ser po ji lta ba dang/ tshar mod pa'imar gyi mar ma rnams dbul bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i spyan sbyar mar gyi maram dbulapar bya'o/gling bzhi la rnams su sbrang rtsis
bkang ba dang/ mar gyi mar ma 'am/ til mar gyi mar ma dbul bar bya'o// shar gyi phyogs sutsan dan btags pa'ibarugapa dri tha rnams la dbul bar bya'o// bu ram gyis bkang ba dang/ phyi'i
skyom dang/ rozag rnams lho'i phyogs su bdug pa dang/ 'bras yos dang/ lungs gar dang/ la dang/ 'bras thug po cha rnams basros ba dang/ til gyi thug ba dang/ chang gis bkang ba'ang
grul bum rnams la dbul bar bya'o// nub kyi phyogs su mar dang gu gul gyi bdug pa dbul zhing/ 'oms bkang ba dang 'o thug rnams kyang klu dang 'dab 'bangs rnams lagator ma dbul bar bya'o//

byang gi phyogs su kun tu tshu'i bdug pa dang/ rtsabamo dang/ zhozanayang gnod sbyin rnams la dbulatharabya'o// kun tu ru marnyed na tsan dan btags pa'i m/ sra rtsi pog kyang rung ngo// khya'i skyo ma
dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba'ang phyogs bzhir rab tu grags shing/ ji skad brjod pa'o yul 'khor srung la sogs pa'i bza'abashos ba'i gnas akyis brtags bar byas ba/ tshuklung 'khyil bas bkang ba'i
bum par ra 'phru dang/ ji ltar nod pa'i rgya shug dang/ u dum ba ra dang/ khardza ra dang/ rgun 'brum la sogasapa rnams dbulapar bya'o// sa bon thams cad kyang nyung du nyung ngu lhag ma dang bcas pa
bya'o dul gal te rig pa bsgrub par bya bzhin pa la shar gyi phyogasasu rtse sbyong mo'i sgra grags par gyuran/ de la gnas nas 'das pas shar gyi phyogs gang yin par gtor ma lhag ma dang bcas par
gzhag ste/ rtag tu gtor bar bya'o// gal te lho'i phyogs su gtor ma lhagam dang bcas pa bzhagob can gyis gnas der 'jigs pa 'jigs pas gtor bar bya'o// de bzhin du zhub dang byang gi
phyogs su gtor bar bya ste/ 'dazhi yongs su spyod pa pos bya'o// rig pa sgrub pa pos rig pa kun tu sgrub pa la rang bar bya'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i snga ma'i rtsa ba ra khashar
du phyogs ta ku sha blangs nas nye bar 'dug cing/ nyob 'dug nas rig pa 'dzin pasagling bzhi rnams kyi phyi rol du phyogs bzhir khor yug ga ri'i ngos bzhalazlumapo sor skya'ib byung de nyid kyis
bya'o blangs nas nya bar 'dug pa de'i stan la sangs rgyas kyi gzugasabartan gyi bar du sol ba dang/ ba byung dang/ pA lasha las byung ba rnams gzhag par bya'o// lhag mal sogs pa'i ng
ma la stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// bsgrub par bya bar bsgoms te dang por mtshonamarang de nas yongs su bzlas pa'i swAhA'i mthar rab tu la gzhug par bya'o// samIr yamashing dpaa
ma rnyed na u dum ba ra dang/ pA la sha dang/ a bamagadang/ gzhan gang yang rung ba kun nas srog tu gzhug par bya'o// de nas gzhon mas bkalapa'i srid pa gang yin pa de la sngags 'dis ming nas
lasmos bar bya'o// na mo ratA trayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bo d+his tA ya/ ma hAsatA ya/ a ba lo ki ni swAhA/ sngags 'di brgyad brgyarab zlasal mdud pa brgyad byas te rak+Sha swAhA/

zhes bya'o// srad bu de bdag nyid srung ba'i rin du bdag nyid kyilag pa la bcing bar bya'o// sangs rgyas de dang de dus gruphapal lhagam srad bu dang/ sa bon la sogs pa rnams blangs nas yongs su spyod pa
pos lha'i khang pa nam mkha' la gzhag par bya'o/ lcamachod pas mchod par bya'o// de nas nad pa rnams kyis lhung bzed du bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa rnams dbul bar bya'o// lhag ma yod
kyis bgos te muklung du rab tu blugs par bya'o/ rdzong skam po 'am/ khron ba 'am/ bla gab can gyi sa phyogs sus labaskorab r bya'o// mas legs par bsngags par bya'o// gang la la bcom ldan
'das ma sgrol ma sgrubapar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa'idon 'dis dang po kho nar byang chub kyi sems lhan cig bskyod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thams cad kyang

byang chub chen po'i mchog gi dngos grub kyi gnas so// de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni reb pa 'gog pa dang/ rig pa skye ba ste da de'i phyir de la rig pa bsgrub par bya ste/ de la bgegs byed par mi nus so//

thog ma kho nar gzhan du rig pa sgrub par byed pa'i dus na sa ga'izla ba'i bco lnga nyaram/ dbo ramachu stod dam/ smin drug gi dkar po'abaco lngal rnam pa gang du'ang rung ste/ gang du 'dod pa der bsgrub
par bya'o// dbyar dang mtshan mo sbyangs te/ slob ma 'ongs par dbyar rig pa bsgrub par makhya'o// dkyil 'khor gsar pa bris nas zhi ba'i sgrub pa 'du bya'o// gang zhig drag po sgrub par byed par

'dod pa de rnam pa 'dis nag po'i phyogs kyi tshos gcig nas nye bar blangs te/ nag po'i bcu bzhi pe la sngags 'das so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwarAya/ bo d+hisaMt+tAya/ mahAsatwA
ya mahA ka ru NikAya/ saM bo da bde swA hA/ sngags 'dis sngon du srad bu dmar po bcings te dur khrod du b.lang ga pags pa'i rnamaparasar skyari ba byung gis nye bar byugs pa
byas nas/ de bzhin kho nar gtor ma'i tshogs 'byung po gzhan rnams la gtor ma sna tshogs bya'o// yongs su spyod par byed pa po bzhisa mtshon chad nga bcas pa'i rnam pas yamashang srog tu gzhug

[E, ]par bya'o// srad bu la mdud pa brgyad brgya byas nas bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas des 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ tshangs pa'i srin po la sogs pa rnams dbang
du 'gyur ro// rig pa grub pa na de bzhin kho nar gtor ma'i chog gshegs su gsol lo// rig pa sgrub pa thams cad la gang rig pa sgrub par byed par 'dod pa des mtshan mo gtsang mas gtsang mar gyur
pa'i gos bgos te/ rang bsgrub par bya bar 'gyur ro// kun tu ra 'am a ka ru nag po'i 'jug pa srog cing kha shar du phyogs pasalon bcur brjod par bya'o// 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste/
bcom ldan 'das ma rang nyidabyon nas me tog dang gtor ma'ang so sor bzhes nas bdag gi bya ba 'damadzod cig ces so// de bzhin du lhoshar du kha phyogs pas dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/
byang shar dang/ stang dang/ 'og tu'ang brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro// rang nyid kyis byon ta bdug pa dang/ ma tog la sogs pa dang/ mar ma so sor bzhes nas bdag ga bya ba'ang bya'o zhes so//

[4/ ]phyir zhing tho rangs zhi bar ng lan bdun nam/ bcur de bzhin nyid du phyogs bcu rnams su spyan drang bar bya bar 'gyur ro// khyon pa dang bdug spos la sogs pa'i ng dbul bar bya'o// slar yang nyin mo
rnam par mnan te gtor marelas thams cad byas nas ku sha zlangs te nyapar 'dug par 'dod pas da nga zhan nyid du phyogs bcur spyan drang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma byon pa dang/ dri dang me
tog la sogs pa'i ng bzhes te bdag gi bya ba'ang mdzod cig ces so// de nas ku sha zungs te da bar 'dug ste ji skad bshad ba'i bsgrub pa bya'o// rig pa sgrub pa la mtshan ma 'di rnams 'byung ste/
rig pa'i ched du rmi lam mthong ba ni glang po che dang/ rdo dang/ lha'i khyim dang/ khang bzang mthong ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ rig pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshon nyid rnams kyang rta mthong bas rlung
bya ba'i dngos grub grub bo// de bzhin du ma dang/ pha dang/ mos po dang/ yang mes dang/ rgyal po chen po dang bu mo rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba dang/ gos dkar po bgo ba dang/ zan dang
ba glang dang/ thom ze gzhon nu dang/ gsar dang/ rgyan dang/ rmabya dang/ sha dang/ tadang/ rom dang/ zho dang/ mar gyi gtor ma'i lasal sogs pa rnams 'jug bzhin pas rten
par sprul rnams dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu la sogs ba mthong na ji lta bar ldan pa'o// de nas so ka dang dbyar nye bar ma mthong ba dang/ brlan la gnas pa'i nyis dang gro rnams mthong na
phyin ci log ga dus kyi char pa dang/ ji ltar rab tu bsngags pa'i ba 'a dod pa ni mapa gang ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu rnamA
zla mthong na rab tu 'jug par bya bzhin pa 'di rnams ni mchog las so// ba lang dang/ bram ze dang/ ba gzhon nu dang/ gser dang/ rma bya la sogs pa rnams mthong ba dang bltas nas dngos grub bo/

zhas rag pa las rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i bya ba rnams la las rnams btsum par bya'o// phyin ci log 'di rnams mthong nas/nyid mi log ste/ rmi lam du sngog pa dang/ bong bu dang/ jamo dang/ phag dang/

sbrar dang/ bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rgod thams cad dang/ bya ba dang/ byi la dang/ da byed dang/ gcer bu dang/ pi ta ru kAdang/ snod stong pa dang/ shing skam po dang/ dur khrod kyi sol ba dang/ chu klung
sbyar bsams pa dang/ log par 'dren pa rnams te/ ma shes pa mthong nage ba ma 'grub bo// bya ba thams cad la bgegags 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la sngags 'ad bgags thams cad la rab tu sbyar

bar bya'o// oM badzrakhu ra ba kr-itA nan hU~MhU~M phaT/ sngags 'dani rta mgrin zhes bya ba khro bo'i rgyal po sta/ sngags 'di lhag par gnas pas bdag nyid bsrung ba byas pa dang/ gang du las thams cad sgrub
a ba la 'jigasapa mi 'byung ngo// de nas rims rnams dang/ byas pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la byabs pa dang/ srid du khang bar bya ste/ dugakhyab pa'i ng ji srid du rig pa lan cig bzlas pas 'grub

par byed do// de la bum pa la 'drar gzhug par bya ste/ ga zhon nu mas bkal ba'i srad bu gtso bo'i sngags kyis mdud pa brgyad brgya byas nas bum ba de la bcang bar bya'o// rag pa de dngos grub dang dngos
grub mad par ston par byed do// nyim gnyis pa la mdud pa thams cad ragrol bar bya'o// rnam pa gzhan du na rig pas khasungs tam klo la bzhan pa don med par byed pa de lta bu la sogs pa sngags des
las bco brgyad du 'gyur ro// 'danelhag par gnas pa thams cad dang sngags thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs te/ de lag pa'i stogs kyi sbyor ba'i khyad par brjod par bya ste/ gang dukhasgrub bar

bzhin pa'i skyes bul mthong ba sbyin par byed de/ de la skyes bu'i lhag pa'i lha de skyes bu la bar gnas par rtog par byed de/ sngags de gang gis bsgrub par bya bzhin yal bud mad mthong ba sbyin par byed do/
lhag pa'i lha de da bar gnas par rtog par byed do// rang rig pa'i sngags kyi khyad par ro// sngags 'di'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyatshog n dekyil 'khor gru bzhi pa rta bar phyugs te/ de'i dbus
su sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas/de'i g.yonagyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'dasam gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du khro bo'i rgyal po rtamagrazhi// de nas myur du shar du
mngon par phyogs bas gnas nias kusha blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan la dra deng mar mal sogs pas mchod pa byas nas/a ka ru dang/ tshur ska'i bdug pa bsrag ta/gtor ma thob pa'i ng
ga/ smras pa'i phyogs bzhi rnams su phul nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar ku sha blangs nas rtabar 'dug ste/ nad thams cad la khyad par du khyab par bya'o// nad thamA
cad rnamapar thim zhing grol bar 'gyur ro// nyim bdunapa tho rangs sam mtshan mo gsum la'o// sgrolam rgyud de thams cad kyi chog 'khor dang bcas pa 'chad par byed do// rgya mtshodang/ ri bo dang/
dur khrod rnams su so sor gnas pa'i dge slong ma gzhan gapal las bdag nyid srung ba'i don du bzlas pa dbul bor bya'o// sha wa ba' ba/nod sbyin la sogs pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi 'dzags pa mi
'byung ngo// de la shar gyi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas rakyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas der dra dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa la sogs pa phul nas/ bdag nyidi srung ba'i don du lan nyi shu rtsa bdun
bzos pa dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du mtshan mo'i dus la bab pa na lam du bzlas pas bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// rtog tu yod la bya'o// srad pu'ang bdag nyid la bcang bar bya'o// sngar brjod pa de
rnams kyis kyang lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas bris par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du snying por gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i tshogs kushas khyab bar bya'o// sngar brjod pa de rnams kyis kyang
rig pa bdun po de rnams kyis so// de bzhin du lho'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas bdug pa dang ma tog phul nas lan 'ashu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du grul bum gyi gdon

00/ rnams la sngar brjod pa'i tshogs khyab par bya'o// srad bu'ang bcing bar bya ste zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin du klu dang 'dab bzang gi gdon rnams la sngar
brjod pas khyab par bya'o// sngar brjod pa'i cho gsaso// dezhin du byang gi phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod pas de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams la sngar brjod pa'i chogs so// de bzhin du phyogs bral
rnams su'ang ngo// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ slar yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams la smras pa/ grogs po khyed rnams nyon cig/ de bzhin gshags pa'i
gzugasamtshan thams cad rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshags pa'i sku mthong nas g.yas pasa mchog sbyin pa dang/ chos ston pare mdzad bzhin pa 'am mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o// der gi

pa bsgrub par bya'o// mngon spyod can nabasgrub par mi bya sta/ sgrolamosazhon pa'i khro bo dang 'bar bsgrub bar bya'o// ji srid ral gcig ma'i mdun nam phyag na rdo rdzodang nye bar ro// khro bo'i mtshan

nyid kyango 'chad par byed do// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa snum zhing sngo bsangs ltar brjod pa'i rnam pa las zhi ba'i gzugs can gyi mdun du rag pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya'o// mngon

spyod can gyi rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can du bya'o// zhi ba can dang rgyas pa can n zhi ba'i gzugs can no// gang du sgrub pa po mngon par phyogasanas bltas pa der bsgrub par bya'o// ral pa gyen brdzas
su brjod pa'i rig pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog rjes su gnang ba'ang bud mad gang yin pa'i bud mdade'i mtshan nyid dang/ gzugs dang/ chabyad 'chang bar bya'o// skyes

pa yoran skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang dag par ldan par gyurapo/skyes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas pa/ lag cha dang bcas pa rung rab rim/ sngar brjod bde 'dra ba khya'o// phyin ci log gi gzugs kyis
dngos grub mi 'byung ngo// ji srid du lhadrag po de'i nyalogs su de bzhin gshags pa gzhag par bya'o// mchod rten nam/ slar yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po can/ ma gas shing dum

bur ma gyur pa dngos grub sbyin par byed do// de la bcom ldan 'das ma 'bagasam sgrol ma'i ra kyil 'khor 'di ni dem tshig thams cad skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ta/ rnam bar rgyal ba mngon
par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba bkrashas dang bsod nams kyi las thams cad byed pa dang/ lo tog dang/ tshodang/ nad med pa 'phel bar byed pa/ dam tshig nyams pa rnams kyang dam tshag skyed par byed
pa pora'agyur ro// sna tshogs pa'i chu klung gi 'gram mam/ brgya'i mtsho'i 'gram du da kyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o// legs par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi'i char byas nas sku dang phub ma dang/ sol ba dang/
thal ba dang/ shing dang/ so phag dang/ gseg ma dang/ thod pa dang/ kang rus dang bral ba/ mgrin pa ma chub tshod gang du nyalogs na chu yod pa'i g.yas kyi gzhogs samatshub tu gang dum tog dang

[oo]'bras bur ldan pa'i shing yod pa dang/ gang yang yid du mngon par 'ong ba gang du norayodapa'i phyogs su gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhapa/tshon lnga pa'isAli'i byams dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya'o// chon sna ljapa'i srad

bu nyid kyis thig btab nas u dum ba ra'aphur bu rnams kyis kyang ngo// dkar po'i phyogs kyitshosagrangasadang/ byed pa dang/ yud tsam dang/ rgyu skar dang/ sbyor ba dgo ba la de rnams kyis dang por dkar
boganyis par damar bo/ gsum par sar bo/ bzhibar sngon bo/ staparanag pozhes so// lhag ma shar gyi dbus su lha rnams 'bar bya'o/ pad+ma'i dbus su 'bru dang/ rin po chadang/ sman dang/
ma tog thams cad kyis yongasasu bkang ba'i bum pa rab tu gzhag par bya'o// de'i shar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyigayas su 'phags pa sbyan yas gzigs dbang phyug go/ g.yon du dri ma
med par 'gro ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhogs su sgrol ma bdun no// g.yon du dril med pa 'gro ba'i bud med bdugano/ dpal lha mo'i gzhogs su gos dkar mo'o//
sgrol ma rnams kyi gzhogs su bam gzhag par bya'o// zla ba mnas brtsamasanas dpal mo grags ldan mo rang dkar mo'ang ngo zhes so/ gzhogasasudakar mo chen mo dang khro gnyer can no// sgo'i phyogs su

snying stobasam dang nus ba'o// dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi gzhogs gnyis kar tshangs par ng rAg po'ang ngo// drag po'i gzhogs su lha mo dbu mgo/ tshangs pa'i debyangs can ma'o// sgo'inang du dbyug gu dang
ril baspyi blugs so/gcig tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// gcig tu zhi ba thob pa'o// sgo ru mngon phyogs dang rtamagrin zhes bya ba'i khro bo gzhug bar bya'o// de'i gzhogasasu srin mo

ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o// 'dani bcom ldan 'das ma 'phagasam sgrol ma'idakyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ khru bzhi pa 'am/khrukhargyad pa 'am/ khru bcu gnyis pa 'am/ khru bcu drug pa'i dkyil
'khor kun tu bri bar bya'o// gzugs sam phyag rgya rnams dgod par bya'o// thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyi brlan pad+ma'i phyag rgyargyas par bya pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rogis bzang
po'o 'phags ma sgrol ma'i na uta la'o// dpal mo'i ni ma tog kha phyab dang parmadakarapo'o// gos dkar mo de nyid sdong bu dang bcas pa mchog tu rgyas pa'o// 'phagasam grags ldan ma'i sdong bu

sgra1dang bcas pa'i ma tog go/ sgo rnams thams cad du dang ka shar ral tsAta'i yal 'dab ba bkod de stod du ba danabasgrung bar bya'o/ de nas rang rang gi sngags kyis spyan drang bar bya sta/ gshegs sugasol/
ba'ang ngo// yang na 'phagasapa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying pos/ tshor ba rig pas so// yang na 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying pos ma tog dkar pos spyan drang ba dang gshegs su gsol lo//
mtshan mo dri dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar mos mchod pa byas nas tor mas bar mchod do/ bkashas can dang/ ulce pi gdang/ mon sran the'u dang/ snum 'khur la sogs pa dang mon/
sAn snga'u'il du dang/ til gyi thug pa dang/ 'o thug dang/ zho zanadang/ zhodang/ dar ba dang/ thug pa dang/ 'khyung po'iwas snum zur gzhan rnams dang/ bya na bu ram dang/ zhorang ste/ gtor ma'i
choga'o// de nas slar yang dra bathang po'i ridang ma tog gi mchod pa byas nas chulas skyes pa mkhyad bar du'o// de nas ra ralasngags lan bdun bdun brjod par bya'o//yang na 'phags ma sgrolam brgyud

brgyarab zlas par bya'o// nang gi bum pa gang yin pa de la snying bo ya gi lngas stong brgyud bsgyur bzlas par bya'o// de nas ma'i gnas su me nye bar bzung nas maradang/ ta'imaradang/ zas nyid kyi sbyin
srug gi cho ga ji ltar gzugs dang grangs med par daltar sbyin sreg kyang bya'o// phyi nas slob ma legs par yongs su brtags pa'i snod dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos yang rab tu gzhug par bya'o//
gos kyis gdong g.yogs te thal mo me tog gis bkang ba rab tu bcug stogator bar bya'o// gang du lhung ba de de'iragasasu 'gyur ro/ daltar rakyil 'khor du rab tu bcug ste slob ma dmatshagashes
bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur gang 'dod pa de byin te lho dang nub nas shar du mngon par phyogasanas su lci pog gi bdug pamar dang bsres pas 'babadug go/ nyim gung la khumapas so// sngags thams
cad bdun bdun bzlas ba'i srog blugs bsregs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'ilas chen pos slob mgayon gyi phyogs su gzhag lta/ de nas rakyil 'khor la skor ba byed du gzhug go/ snying po'ang
sbyin no// des 'phags ma sgrol ma 'di'i phyag rgya bcingasanas baN+Das par bya'o// de lta bu s mngon bar dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// de rnams thams cad du thams cad byas na 'di
myur zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dasam la rab tu dad par byed do// sang ge'i khri la gnas pa lta bu'i rgyal srid 'dod pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// long spyod 'dod pas rgya skyegs kyi 'dab
mal gnas pa'o// log par 'dren pa nyabar byung ba bdag gas so phagal kun tu gnas pa'o// rma'adod pasazung du bcul g.yo ba'i sa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// slob dpon rgyas par 'dod pas a rikAdang
bodapal kun tu gnas pa can ta bar phyung ba mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// lan bdun du mngon par dbang bskur bsan dpal mar pa rab tu zhu bar byed do// lan bcu gnyis su mngon par dbang bskur bas
nargyalapora'agyur ro// lan lngar mngon par dbang bskur bas ni dbul ponor dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyi nas slar yang mchod de gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rnam par rgyal
pa'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chogaro// dkyil 'khor 'da kun tu bris nas ring bor mi thogs pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das ma rab tu rargyas par byed do// de nas yang byang chub

sems dpa' mathu chen thob kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjel stsasapa/ ral pa gyen brdzas kyi rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rjes su brtse bas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi bstan

000 pa kun tu pasrung ba dang yos su bskyang ba'i ched du/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad nyid du dngos grub byed pa/ snyigs ma ltas nyon mongs pa 'di la'ang chos kyi tshul thams cad lhag par gnas pa'i ched du sgrol
masazhon pa dang mtshungs pa/ las byed pa phyi ma 'di'i lam rab tu gnas pa'i ched du 'di skad du'ang smras s/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu gnas pa dang smonalam brjod par bgyi'o// sngags kyi spyod pa de/
lta bu 'don can s de sems can rnams l shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyur yongs su'agyur ba dang/ cinas de thams cad 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad kyi 'jigs pa dang/ pha rol
dmag tshogs dang/ dusam yin pa'i char lhung ba dang/ sdig pa'i ra byed pa'i mi dang/ mam yin ba dang/ dud 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang/ de la'ang bkra mishaseb dang/ rmi lam dang/

mtshan ma ngan pa dang/ gdug pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ skyes bu dang/ ro dang bral ba dang/ kha ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ dri ngan pa dang/ rig pa ngan pa dang/ dug bsalabar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma
sgrol ma bud med kyi gzugs dang cha byad kyis de la chom rkun dang/ chudang/ ma ga dang/ rnam par 'atshobasal bar bgyi'o// rgyal po dang/ sang ga dang/ stag dang/ ma he dang/ spyang kadang/ dug dang/
chom rkun dang/ ma dang/ mim yon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad kyang sngags sgrub pa'i tshig la mkhas pa/ yongs su longs spyod pas rnam pa sna tshogs
pa'i 'bras bu dang/ sman dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu'i ro bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ gos dang/ gnas dang/ mal cha dang/ stan rnams rdzogs par bgyi ba dang/ somasacan

thams cad kyang chos 'dod pa nyid dang/ dag ba'i chos kyi spyod pa lasbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di'i bdag gisangs rgyas wAms cad kyi spyan sngar smonalam mthar thug pa ste/ gang du bdag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das thams cad kyis gnang bar gyur cig/ bdag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi dngos grub yid kyi shing rtayongs su rdzogs pa dang/ bdag dang skyes bu'i rnam pa 'di yis par sgrol ba'i
chen du de lta bu'i gzugs kyis bdag dang phyag na rdo rje bud med kyi gzugs kyis dang/ sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang cha byad kyis sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o// de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la rjes su brtse bas brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyongab gzhan rnams dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dAze dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'
ldang dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams ragug par byas nas de lta bu'i gzugs kyis skyes bu chen po'i rnam pa byed par 'gyur ro// danas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams
thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug grub par 'gyur ro// de nas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan rasag gas

za00na/ dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni bdud dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rtenaskyong ba gzhan rnams dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ rwa za dang//
lham yaMnadang/ gzabarjid chazhang gzi brjid che ba'im rnams yong bar byed cing/ sangs rgyas Thams kyis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyisabarlabs pa/ khyed kyi rig pa dang sngags kyi tshag rnams n gang

khyod kyis nus pa de lta bu'i gzugs dang skyes bu'i rnam par byas pa'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang skad cig gse tshangs pa'i chabyad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par sbyor bar byed do//
yud tsam gyis dge slong gi cha byad kyis dung/ skad cig gis sman dang rtsi'i gzugs kyis dang/ yud tsam gyis brgya byin gyi gzugs kyis 'phags pa'i lam du 'jug par byed do// skad cig gis bdud kyi sa

gzugs kyis gzhan gyi gzugs sprul tadabang sgyur gyi lha'i dbang po dang/ dga' ldan dang/ mtshom dang/ 'og min dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang/ 'byung po thams cad pa dang/ dur khrod dang/ drag po dang/

khyab 'jug dang/ nor lha'i bu dang/ nor sbyin dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
yidags dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ tham ze'idang/ rdzo'urogs dang/ dmangs rigs dang/ sang ga rang/ glang po che dang/ mnye dang/ spru'u dang/ phag dang/ sna tshogs pa'i
da @#// gzugs kyis 'dab chags dang/ ri dang/ shing dang/ 'bras bu dang/ gos dang/ chos gos dang/ bzhon pa dang/ mal stan dang/ rnga pa Ta ha dang/ dung dang/ rin po che'isnod/
dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzugs kyis sna ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni kha dog dang/ gzugs dang/ rtags dang/ dbyibs brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i
gzugasadanga mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu'adi na bya ngachub sems dpa' spyan ras
ma gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu chen pos 'dar 'ongs pa ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa'i yul la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ gang du bdud dpung rang bcas pa'i yul du gnas pa byang
chub sems dpa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rig pa dang/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i thabs kyis sems can rnams yongs su spyod par byed do// ci 'drab 'i sems can phyogs bcu rnams su tshad med cing
grangs med pa rnams yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sgrib pa med pa'i yo shes kyi spyan gyis gzigs par gyur to// bsam pa ji lta ba'i gzugs kyis rang dang
ji lta bu s gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams la gnas gsum pa phyir mi ldog pa la 'jog par byed do// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis gang yang sems can gyi chags pa zilagyis mnan te/

zabawa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'a yi khyadadang/ yongs su longs spyod par 'dod pa rnams kyi zhen pa spang ba'i ched du de rnams la yo byad rnams phyin nas phyir mi ldog pa nyid la rab tu 'jog par byed do// nges par slar
yang dmatshagi des khyang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la smras pa/ rags kyi bu khyed rnams brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig
rtan skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra zad ng/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha'alding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams yid kyis bshad pa la bdag rab tu spro ba
chen po bgyidado// bdag rta mgrin zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po sbas pa'i ng/ bcom ldan 'das dang phan tshun phan pa dang 'jam pa'i sems su gyur cig/ 'di ni bdag gi gsang sngags 'dras
bu chen po/gzi brjidachen po/ las kyi don thams cad sgrub pa por 'gyur te/ yang 'dir/ namo ran+na tra yAya/namo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ acha to/ samyaka saMng ya/ nam Ar+ya a pa

tirahA rA ya/ bo d+hisatwAya[） ]mahAs tA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kAya/ saN+DasatA ya/ a nu kam kA ya/ sam+b+ha satwa byas na spyi ti ni/ sam+basatwA ya ka rAya/ saT+Ta bAr+ya rAdza a d+hi'i A tu ya mahA rA dza thok+ta/
'di rnams la phyag byas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzags dbang phyug gi zhal nas gsungs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub pa/ phagogs thams cad gsod par byed cing thams cad 'joms par
[s]'khyu/ byed pa'i sngags brjod par bgyi'o// oM hu du hu/ taru ye/ bi ta ru le/ sats+tshab de/ glu ta ka/ dzA la ta pa phuling+ka/ tIgs/ kashar Ti pa/ badzrakhur nirag+ha te/ ka tsayaM ta/

ba su d+hA ta la/ ni'us/ mAru titib+hi/ d+ha ra Ni d+he ra/ b+ha Na/ tI has/ a pa ri mi tA ba rakram b+hi ta lha ta ga// buk+Sha busgyu/ ha ya kI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra mnaM sid+d+him dan/ a bkaya/ dzAl ra pi

shA tsa gra sa[= ]/a pra ti ha to/ b+hab/ badzra kiny+tsarA ya si i maM duSh+Tha haduwAsan+d+haMtA/ blun na/ ma tha ma tha/ pa Ta pa TaM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bud+d+ha d+harmA/ sang+g+ha/ a nu dzA ka ra shAk+Sha/ haya glu ba phaT/ badzra gA tsA ya phaT/

badzran tA ya phaT/ badzra rat+taya phaT/ badzra khu rAya yaT/ badzraAr+yakhu ra nar glu ta nA ya laT/ par man+ta khInAshanA ya baT/ rdulo b+ha ya kA rA ya phaT/ saN+Da karma a pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badzra ku lo Di sa nA
yapaT/ hU~MhU~MhU~M/ laT phoT phaT phaT swAhA/ hU~M yig drug dang phaT yig bzhis bcobargyad kyis lhag pa'i bcu bzhi la brten pa'i rtamagrin gyi zhal gyi sngags rdzogs sog oM badzra khu ra

bikr-i tAnan hUM phaT/ tapa'i sA po'o// o haya grwa ba hri da ya/ mA parta yi lami da a hi a hi/ mahAb pa/ badzran kha/ badzra ro ma/ badzra ko Ta/ badzra ko Ta/ badzra khu ra/ ba daMShA han han/ da ha da ha/

pa tsa pa tsa/ bats+tsakhaM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ radared/ sa has ha/ dzam+badzawA/ tu ru tur/ ru tu ru su/ blun rgyu na/ bi d+hu na bi d+hun/ ma thamaTha[） ]kam kamA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ sam+b+hade daM/ saT+ThA yak+Sha san+d+ha bi ha Na kA//

0 sam+b+hab phra khaM/ phra ba phra badra bsha/ haya grwa ba dri ya dz+wa la a pisha A bi sha badzra khur/ mA yalaya/ bud+d+ha d+harmAsaM g+ha ba tsan/ ma nu sma ra/ dzA ti ma nu sma ra/ sprod yam nu zla ra/ bkaM ra bi ka ra/ ga dza ga dza/ namAnan+da/
gu lugu lu mul mulu3 nAhananahan/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'i sngags so// na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ta kArAya/ 'dirang stobs dang/ pha rol gnonapa dpag tu med pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po
chen po lus kyi mchog gi gzi brjid rnam pare'ajig par byed la/ de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi rjesasu 'jugatsang mchod pa'i rjes su gnang ba rnam par 'atshong thams cad rnam par gnon ba
rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchodapa/ lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dI wa dang/ lham yin dang/ ma mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen pos yang dag par bstod pa/
yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum gyis mchodapa/ rnam par 'gyur ba chen po mchab gtsags pa/ rtamagran gyi rgyal po'i chagara'agyur ro// sngag pa sbyang pa byas nas mchod rten du 'bum phrag
gsum bzlas so// de nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ dkar po'ibaco lngalamtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas kha tshar gyi rtsomo ma bcad pa sku dang bral ba'i rasal/ rimo mkhan gso sbyong can
gyis kha dog ma 'dris pa'i tshon gyis par gtsang ma gsar pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugasaTon+tan pad+ma'i gdan la gnas pa chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa 'ad+dar gzhug par bya'o// g.yon gyi
/gzhogasau raphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchod phyir thogs dkar bo can/ ston ka'i sprin ltar dakarab bar 'i lus dang ralang 'dod pan 'chang ba'i dbusasu 'od dpag

mad dkar po sbyangs pa'i snod kyi nang du gnas pa/ phyag g.yas pas ma 'dzegs pa rab tu sbyin pa/ g.yon pas paspyirab tu sbyin pas phyag sbrel ba'o// sgrub pa po'ang nges par rtog par byed bzhin pa'o//
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og ga g.yon du ston ka'i sprin ltar dkar ba'i rta mgran rag pa'i rgyal po bri bar bya'o// rnam par gyur pa'i zhal spyanadamar po/ skya ser skya/ ecaya'i
phyag chen po/ ras yug gis dkris pa/ drag po gsus pa 'phyang ba/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogasapa can/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ 'bar ba'i zhal/ pad+ma'i phreng ba
drug cus dbu la brgyan pa'o// de'i da logs su brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa lag na skyes phor gyis khrel ba pus mo gnyis btsugs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi gzhogs su

'phags pa phyaga' tshout+pal sngon po ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma la gnas pa g.yon gyi ga zhogs su khro langs par rtogabazhinal cungathad btsum pari bzhi ni/ rdordzol zhug par byed bzhin pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas
'khrugs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs gnyis 'khoral par r stong du gnas pa/ brla de'ang glu gzhonanus yongs su than pa'o// de nas ga pa 'dzanas rima'i las rdzog

parang mchod pa rgya chen po byas te mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas bgrang 'phrang bzhag nas mar gyi mar rgya chen po dang dkar bo'i gtor ma phulanas/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas sngon sbyad pa byas

pas mtshan mo gcig tu rab tu bcug ste gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyung ste rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo gas skyong can gtsang mdabang po ma tshang bam yin pa'i las byed pas khyad du bcug nas/ sor

mo brgyad ba rgyas pa yongs su zlum pa/ rdo rdzong bar ba'i 'phro bsa'i khrugs pa'o// nga nas rig pa'i dzinapas ra khoralo da'ang ba cung ltar mtshan mo gcig tu bcu gnas gzhag par bya'o// de nas bton nas
khrus dang rjes su byug pa byas taM/ gos dkar pos kun nas dkris nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhi g sta bdug pa dang/ gtor ma dang/ mchod yon gyi snod zungasanas lha thams cad spyan drang
bar bya'o// mchod yon phul nas slar yang gshegs su gsol ba yang bdag la byas nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yan lag bdun bzlas pa'i thal bas phal ba'i ra ba dang/ sgron ma gsum yan pa dun bzlas
pas mgir ba dang/ de nas srung ba'i chog byas nas yungs karal lan bdun bzlas pasas gzhi btung ba dang/ chul lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas naam mkha' bcing ba'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin
pas dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba/ ma tog dkar po dang lhan cig pa/ pus mo gnyis btsugs pa'i rig pa 'dzan pas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gilha spyan drang bar byas nas/ mchod yon phul te stan dal lha
rnams tsham par bya'o// mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ romasasreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzan pasalag pa gnyis kyis 'khor lo blangs nas ji srid du

zla 'bar bar gyur ba de srid du bzlasapar bya'o// rdzabaco'i sgra thos pa dang/ spyanalas go lu golu sgrogs pa dang/ marama'irtsa mo raphal ba dang/ ras chas 'gul ba dang/ dung gis+sathos pa dang/ le bu'i
sgra sgrogs pa dang/ gnya'i slathos pa rang/ rigs kyi bu de rnams grub pa legs so legs so// 'khor lo 'di byang chub sems dpa'i lam bgrod pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho chen po sgrol bar byed do// de
nas rig pa 'dzan pas ras pa rings par risrid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon gyi bar du bsgyus ba bya'o// byon pa na'ang mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos mchod
yon phul nas/ donus 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sgrub pa po la gsungs pa/ bu bdud kyi phyogs de rnams nges par thul ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'ilaMm de rnams bgrod
ba ci bya zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po la phyag g.yas pas spyi bor myug par mdzad do// skyugs pa'i skad cig de nyid la dpag tshad stong du

rgya chab 'ibla ragayemakha'i rwa ba 'phyang ba/ gsar gyi 'dab mas rab tu 'phyang bzhin pas sgrol ma bcings pa/ in+d+ra nIl dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ so gany+tsi ka dang/ rgyan gyi khyad par gzhan rnams kyis
kyang rdo rje'i zhus pas rnam par spras shang tapar smras pa/ bkra shis pagazhan gyis kyang rig pa 'dzan pa 'a mo gzugs po za zhing mdzes pa/glu len bzhin pa/ snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sapalasgrogs pa/

pi wang dang/ rdza rngadang/ gling bu dang/ phag rdob rjes su sgrub pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa po'i bla re 'di rang nyid rig pa'i rgyal po de'i mthus ji sridi blob dang/ nyim dang/ skar ma
rnams yod kyi bar du 'khor dang bcas pa rol par byed pa dang/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus rag ba'adzan pathoms cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyimanga' bdag go// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gathig

dbang phyug gi sgrub pa pos gzhal med khang bskyod nas slar yang mthapa'i gro ste/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pa stong phrag gis yongs su bskor ba'i yongs su spyod par byed pa pos 'phags ba sbyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug la phyag bya ba byas nas yongs su spyod par byed pa bo dang lhan cig gzhal med khang la 'dzegs nas 'gro bar byed do// 'khoral de'ang 'barab zhin pa lagazhal med khang gi rtse mor rig pa thamathad kyi loralos

sgyur ba rnam par ra gro ba'i yid kyis bad ba can du 'gro bar byed do// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mad bzhugs pa der lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha'
ldong dang mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang dgi pang dzan pas kyang bstod par bya bzhin pa/ ma tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa rnams kyis bskal par gnas shing/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los
[©]// skyur ba'imanga' bdag lta/ gang gi tsho'achi ban khram ze rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing skyo badran pa dang/ mchin thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ dus thams cad mngon par shes pa dang
norachen po dang/ longs spyod chen po dang/ brtson 'grus chen pos pha rol gnon pa dang/ samasacan thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba dang/ snying rje can dang/ sas rgyas la mngon par dang ba dang/
yid gzhungs ba dang/ thos pa 'dzan pa dang/ bzo dang/ yi ga dang/ ri mo thams cad la mkhas pa dang/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa gang sems par byed pa de yid kyis rtogs par bya ba'o// nad thams
cad rnam par spangs ba'i bram ze'i rigs sa skya'o zhes so// lan bduna mngon par bsngags pas gtsug phud bcing ba dang hU~M gi yi gas 'phal pa dang/ gzhon pa dang/ rmongs par byed do/ dza mi gas
gshegs su gsol lo// g+ha'i yi gas gsod pa'o// sAhA'i yi gos zhi ba'i don dang 'tsho bar byed pa'o// mdor bsdusan ston par byer te/ ragi pa 'dzan pa gsang chen mchog sgrub par 'dod pa des
gcod pa dang/ gsod pa dang/ dbye ba dang/ rlag par byed pa dang/ sdigs pa dang/ gsod par byed pa gzhan thams cad kyang 'dir bya'o// thams cad snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis sgra'i par khyod kyis/ drag

po yis nam yin pa kho na'o// ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu sbyar bar mi bya ba'i gnas rnams su rab tu sbyarab r mi bya sta gang rab tu sbyor bar byed pa de'i mchog gi sgrub pa mi 'grub bo// dam tshig shes
pa med bar yang 'gyur// dngos grub 'di ni sgrub thabs thams cad dang/ rgyud thams cad du'o// sor mo la lan bdun mngon par basngags par byas nas sngon gnon par byed do// mgo reg byas nas rgyan/

borgyalakhar byed do// b+bastad thams cad nyid kharang ngo// yungs karal lan yodun bsngags pa byas nas ril bsnun bar bya ste/ rnam par snyal bar byed do// mA la ri'i ma tog la lan bdun mngon par bstag
ba bud med gang gis snoms par na pa 'am/ mgo bor blugs na de dbang du 'gyur ro// ru ltadang/ shang tshe dang/ a ka ru nag bo dang/ tsan dan dang/ gur kum dang/ sa hA ka ra'i snya ma dang/ tshab
gsum gyi 'dab ma dang/ na le sham dang 1 pa gu larAm tog dang/ prayang ku'i me tog rnams phya mazhib mor byas nas sbrang rtsis sbyar te/ tsan ka'i radab ma ril bu can du gzhug par bya'o// 'di

rnams lan ltar yongs su bzlas te byin pa de dbang du ragyur ro// rtsa dang sngags kyis skyes pa dang lhan cig bud med dpang du 'gyur ro// sgrub pa la zhugs pas gang dang der gnas pa de nyid kyis phyi mas
yang dag par brtsam par bya ste/ log 'dren rnams kyis zil gyis mizhon no// 'di nyid kyis srin po dang yi dgas la sogs pa rnams kyis so// ku ru dza'i sa bon dang/ nag ga sar dang/ pa'i'adab
ma dang/ grwa ba'i ma tog dang/ spang spos dang/ rgya spos dang/ ru rta dang/ lag skyes kyis bon dang/ tsan dan dmarapo dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dkar porim tog dang/ sa bon rnams gtsamig tu
byas nas bsar skya'i gtsan gyis bu mo'i lag par btags par bya'o// de nas ril bu byas zhas chibam lamA la tI'i ma togad karaposabago bar bya'o// 'di rnams kyis lus zugs
nalegakhara'adren pa dang mdegs dang/ grul bum dang/ shaza la sogs pa rnams gang gas kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// gal tami sbyin n ba lang gi gtsanal lanabaduna mngon par bsngag
bar byas bsazhad rab tu 'joms par byed/ gu gul dang/ pi tsumar ta'i sa bon dang/ tsan dan dang/ dur sa dang/ bAs ka'ada rnams khyab byas nas gos la 'jug par gyis shig/ gang gis kyang
thal gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// ldong ros dang/gi wang dang/ lag skyes dang/ b.ru ra dang/ ka dam pa'im tog dang/ shar mangar dang/ sa tha li ka'il tog dang/ shing tsa dang/ zhalesham dkar
bo'i sa bon dang/ yung ba gnyis dang/ shu dag rnams kha sar skya'i gtsan gyis zam ze'ibu mo'i lag pa ragaso skyong can gyis btags par bya'o// ril bu byas nas ut+pa las bsgo bar bya'o// a ti muk+ta
ka dang// sU la dang// me tog sngon pos bskos par bya'o// log par 'dren pa rnams sam/ gzhan rnams sam/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum dang/ srin po la sogs pa rnams gang gis kyang
wil gyis gnon par ma 'gyur ro// nad med pa'i le'u rdzogs so///de nas rolangs sgrub pa 'byung sta/ skyes pa'i rom nyams pa rab tumatshos po la dkar bo'i 'aco lnga la rtse
byug pa byas nas sbyangs pa'i snod ru bzhugs nas/ gso sbyong can des kyang skra gnor du bcug nas me tog gi 'khreng ba mgrin pa la bcangs te/ khron pa skam por zhugs nas ser skya babyungag ring bsrel/

dang bcas parimachod rten de nyid dukhron par bzhag nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te gtor ma dang/ sapa ldeng gyi phur bu bzhi rnams kyis bcing ba dang/ phyogs skyong ba rnams gzhag par bya'o// ro de la 'bras

yom dang phyu ba seraskya'i 'om dang sbyar te/ ji srid du rora'i lce byung gi bar da srid du khar srog blugs gyis shig/ de bcad nas ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dpa' bo chen po pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro//

nyima'acharab dang mnyam pa'i 'od du 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// rolangs kyi sgrub pa gnyis pa 'byung sta/ rur khrod kyi zalabs ro langasabris nas mchod pa rgya chen po rang gtor ma
byas te/ de'i mdun du bsha'akhris la nyabar 'dug nas seng ldeng gi yam shongal tshaba'i til mar gyi btags pas/ ji srid ro langs langs kyi bar de srid du sbyin srogabya'o// gang yid kyis sems par

byadapade myur du'agugasal byed do// bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do// del zhonanas sbyin sreg gis 'gro bar byed de/ lo stong phrag bcu gsum du 'tsho bar byed do// rolangs sgrub pa gsum la 'byung ste/

ser skya'i 'i byung gis dkyil 'khor bar phyogasazhas mal spyan srog byas pa'i thal bas ro langs dris nas mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhazhe ru yang dag par bzhagazhas le kaM kata'i sreg blugs kyi sbyin srog/
khyer cing/ rig pa 'dzin pas de kaM ka tus kun nas bstan par bya'o// rtsa ba'i sngags rngan pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// longs shig longs shig/ drab r byed pa dang/
rob tu dgodapas grol bar byadan 'dzags par mkhya'o// jisAd rang nyid langs kyi bar du rgyab nas rjes su 'gro bar byed de/ dbang po'i chung marang myur du 'gugs par byed do// bcud kyis len du 'gyur
ro de zos nas lo stong phrag bcu gsum du'atshobar byed do// gang gi tshoratshabade'i tshonor chen po'i rigs su skya bama'agyur ro// skya badran par yapa'i gyur ro// rolangs sgrub par 'gyur ba'o//
mabya dang/nam mkha' ldang dang/ glang po chadang/ rtagrog mkhar gyis dang 'oms dkarapo'i bco lngal legs par btsugs pa byas nas chu rnam par dbye ba gosum rnams rtsa ba'i sngags

kyis yongs su bzlas nas de ser skya spyod du gzhug go/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas rnam par dben pa'i ba byung gas gso sbyong can gyas sar skya de'i mazungasanas sa'i gong bu de mnyapar bya'o// de nas rma bya
dang nam mkha' lding dang/ glang po dang/ rtagang yang rung ba mo ram gang yang rung ba byas nas/ ri mo mkhan gso skyong can gyis 'dir gzhug par bya'o// las ris kyi zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhi g

a nasamachod pa rgya chen pabyas te/ maram rnams dang srung ba'i chog byas nas u dum ba ra'i yam shange gis srog blugs bdun gyi spyan srog chado// dri'i chus lha rnams spyan drangs nas slar yang rnam par

0 phya snyam chod yon phul te/ rma bya de ras rasakyimadun du bzha gnas ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlos bar bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas ranges pa rings par 'thus par bya ste/ gal te rma bya sgrub

parabyed na de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ni rma bya skad 'byin pa dang/ glang po chagu la gul sgrogs pa dang/ rdo 'tsher ba dang/ nam mkha' lding gshog pa g.yo ba ste/ dngos grub kyi mtshan ma
'di rnams su gyuran rmabya'i rgyal po smin drugaganyis par 'gyur te// brtson 'grus chen pos stobs dang la rol gnon par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi rgyags pa gnon par byed do// bar gyi bskal
par 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tshar mib de'i tshozam ze'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di'i dngos grub bo/// de nas rdo rje rnam par byad pa des a ka ru las byung ba'am/ tsan
dan las byung ba 'am/ lha'i shing las byung ba 'am/ seng ldengalas byung ba 'am/ drilas byung ba'am/ nama'i shing las byung ba 'am/ rgyal gyi lcags las byung ba 'am/ grog mkhar las
byung ba'am/ shel las byung ba 'am/ sar las byung ba'i 'khor lo dang/ lcags kyu dang/ dgra sta dang/ mdung thung dang/ ro rje dang/ rtse gsum kha gdang sgrub par byed do// rdo rjertsi bzhi pa sor/
bcu drug pa las byed pa gso sbyong can gyis cha mtshang ba med pa byed du bcug nas/ ser skya'ib byung lngas rab tu bkru bar byas nas dkar po'i bco lnga la rasaras kyi spyan sngar gtor ma dang/ mar mo
rang mchod pa rgya chen bcasate/ rdo rje dri chus 'khrur bcug nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bkod pa'i gzugs brnyan byas te dri'i chu dang rtsa ba'i sngags
brjod de/ rang gilha rnams spyan drangabacas nas mchod yon dang gdan yang phul te/ slar yang gshagasasu gsol nas mar gyi srog blugs sbyin sreg byas shAg/ de nas rag pa 'dzin pas lag pa g.yas

bas rdo rje thogs te ji srid 'bar ba dang/ tsi tsi ba'i sgra sgrogs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzan pas ringasapa nyid du bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid shar gyi phyogs su mthong ba'aphags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po can/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrol ba tsho yarol tu phyin pa thams car kyis yongs su bskor ba dang/ rta mgrin rgyal po rig pa bye bas longs su bskor ba dang/ 'phags pa
khrogator can dang/ sgrol ma dang/ gos dkor mo dang/ ri khrod lo ma can dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po re re la bya balnga rnams kyis yongs su bskorab/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin rjes su
'brangs bas 'ong bar byed do// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha rnams kyi ma tog gi char gyi char bab pas mchod par bya bzhin pa/'phags bskrun ras gzags dbang phyug ral ba spyi
tshag blugs dang dbyug gu'i shing bsnams pa/ g.yas pas sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa/ ston ka'i sprin ltar dakar ba/ sbyangs pa'i snod dkar po nges par gnas pa/ g.yang gzhi nag po

'chang ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag mad khyim ltar bar bzhin pa/ gsaragyi srad buT mchod phyir thogs pa can/ sgrub pa po la rma bo che'i sgra zab mo'i tshig gis

dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin pa'o/ de nas sgrub pa pos byon cing byon pa rnams la mchod yon dang gdan phul te/ smon lam gdab pa byas nas rjes su brtse bas bcom ldan 'das la rjesasu brtsa ba 'bar blangs
nas gsungs shig/ sdig pa byed pa drang/ bsod nams dang/ dngosagrub gzhan pa la bcom ldan 'dasazugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po thugs rje
chen po'i bdag nyidi can gsungs shig/ bdag gi sdig pa byas pa la nor gyi dngos grub dang/ sgrub pa posalan bcu gsum du smon lam gdab pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dngos grub gsol bar bya'o/

de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub pa po'i spyi bor phyag g.yas pa rig par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so/ pu tsa bye/ de nas mchod yon dang ma rtog gi chun po phul nas lus
mo gnyis btsugs te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dngos grub bdag la stsol cig/ khyod kyi rin las brtson 'grus chen po dang/ stobs chen pos rag pa 'dzan pa'i rgyal po rig pa
'dzin pa thams cad kyi mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i lus su mdzod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/bu de rnams grub bo// jorje 'dani brtson 'grus chen pos stobs dang la rol
gnon ba/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thogs pa med par 'gro bamathu chen po phyag na rdo rje dang 'drab 'i lus so// de nas rig pa'i dzazhi bas rdo rje blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor
bcas te/ rig pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzani ba bye ba lngas yongs su bskor ba/ rig pa 'dzan pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rol par byed pa/ gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes pa/ mtshan
thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa/ bar gyi bskalapar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tsho tshib de'i bram ze'i rigasasu skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran te 'di'i dngos grub bo// de nas

dmag sman sgrub par 'dod na nyim gung la dpa' bo'i ran gyisarnaba'i mig sman blangs nas/ bsaraskya'i 'o mas lan bdun du bkru bar byas nas/ ba ser skya'i ba byung lnga po de nyid kyi'o// de'i 'og tu de nas
tshag sman zangs kyi stod du byas nas brtag par bya'o// de nas mnas bton ta ras ris mchod pa rgya chen po dang gtor ma byas nas/ mig snyan khar bcug ste dkarapo brgyad pa'i m/ blu ba gzas

bzung bas mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas ja spyod dro ba dang/ du ba 'khrul ba dang 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas bar bya'o// ngo bar gyur bsazhi dbang du byed do// du ba 'phrul bzhin pas na
ma snang ba'o/ 'bar bas nanatshamakha' la 'gro bar byed do// mig la bskus pas lo stong phrag ltar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tsho'achib pa'i nor chen po phyug po'i rigs su skya bar gyur ro//
skye ba dran no/// de nas gnod sbyin mo sgrub par 'dod na sku dang bral ba'i ras gru bzhi la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi
tshad kyi gzugs brnyan rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/cung zad 'dzom pa'i zhal/ phyag g.yas pas mya ngan med pa 'chang bzhin pa bsnamasapa 'drir gzhug par bya'o// rag par dzan pas/
dkar po'i brgyad pa la bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngararas ras bzhugs zhas gtor ma dang mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas pas rang gi lha spyan dra
nas mchod yon dang gdan phul to/ slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon phul nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'o ma'i sa ga zlugs brgyar sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas rig pa 'dzan pas ku shar
khres la nye bar 'dug pas ji srid gnod sbyin mo rang nyid 'ongs kyi bar de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'ongs pa dang mchod yon phul nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// so sorab zhes shig/ so sor
bzhes la bzhugs shig ces so// rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis legs so zhes smras tabaka' bsgo bar byed pa ci zhig bgyi zhes so// de nas sgrub pa pos chung ma'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te
sring mo'o zhes barjod par byed na/ de nas sgrub pa po 'tsho ba las mi 'bral bar byed do// de nas chung ma'o zhes rjod par byed na/ ri nas sgrub pa po lag pas bzung nas rab tu 'dzam pa'ibazhin gyis
rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed do// bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do// de thos pas skad cig de nyid la skul zhing 'khyalal/ lo brgyud gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa/ nyim 'char ba'i

kha dog 'ar ba/ lha'i gzugs can gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes ga lo stong phrag lngararatshobar byed do// de dpalhan cig rol par byed do// gangag tsho'achib de'i tsho chen po'i rigs su skyes bar 'agyur te/

skye ba dran no// chog de nyid kyis kha tshar makhacad pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pas/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi gcig pur bri yang ku'i shing la 'phyang ba gos
gcig pa tharama'i ma tog dang mtshungs pa'i gnod sbyin ma'adir gzhug par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos dkar po'i brgyud pa la mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas par gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ring
bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du mchod pa dang/ gtor ma dang/ mar ma byas nas/ rang gi lha spyan drang bar byas te mchod yon dang gdan phul nas slar yang gshegs su gsol te/ pra yang ku'i

yam shing pa sar skya'imaragyis btags pa srog blugs brgyad sbyin sreg rgyas shig/ de nas rag pa 'dzazhi pas ji srid gnod sbyin mo rang nyid 'ongs ba de srid du bzlos par bya'o// 'ongs b.lamachod yon dbul

bar bya'o// 'di skad zer te bka' bsgo ba ci bgyi/ de nas sgrub pa pos 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bdag gi chung ma mdzod cig ces sgrub pa pos smras pa dang/ rab tu 'dzam pa'ibazhin gyis khyod kyis ji ltar
0 bka' bsgo babazhin du'o zhes zeraro// sgrub pa po lag pas bzung nas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed do// bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do// skad cig de nyid la gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes par 'gyur

ro lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// cho ga de nyid kyis ras la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ra mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis gnod sbyin mo 'drari gzhug par bya'o// gsar ltar sar ba/ gos gcig
bzla grolas/ kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis sgrub pa po la nges par rtog bzhin pa/ a ti muk+ta'i shing la'aphyang bzhin pa/ cung zad 'dzum pa'i bzhin can/ phyag g.yas pa'i sor mos sgrub pa po la
sngogs par byed pa'o// de nas sgrub pa pos ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten ra ras ris bzhugs su gsol te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas ras ris kyi spyan star mtshan mo gsum skya bar gnas te

mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas mchod yon dang/ ri bor bya ba dang/ slar yang mchod yon phul nas gshegs su gsol te 'oma'i srog blugs tishu rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de nas sgrub pa pos rtsa ba'i
sngags kyis lan bdun bsngags pa'i mAl ti'i me tog ra rasaji srid rang nyid 'ongs kyi bar du gnod sbyin mo la bsnun par bya'o// sgrub pa po lag pas bzung nas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed do// gnas

su song nas bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do// skad cig de nyid la gzugs bzang por 'gyur te/ ro yis lhan tsog rol bar byed do// lo stong phrag lta'atshobar byed do// gang gi tshorachab de'i tshonoran po'i
rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// chog 'di nyid kyis tsadan dang/ rgya spos dang ]ru rtadang/ shing tsadang/ bar pa la lA dang/ gur kum dang/ ldong 'os
dang gar wang dang/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ pad+ma'i sa bon rnams gcig tu byas nas dri khu ba dang nam mkha'i sa bram ze'i bumo gso sbyong can gyis lag par btags par bya'o// dri dkarapo gzug

brnyan byas nas ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten du dkar po'i brgyad pa la mchod pa byas nas/ mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pasagazugs brnyan de mchod rten gyi spyan sngar bzhugs nas rtsa ba'i
sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang bar bya ste/ mchod yon dang gdon phulanas slar yang gshegs su gsol ba'i mchod yon phul to/ ku shu'i khris la dbar 'dug pas bad+ma ge sar la bsar skya'i
mar gyis btags pa'i srag blugs bdun sbyin sreg gyis shag/ de nyid du sha khresal nye bar 'adug pas ji srid gnod sbyin mo rang nyid 'ongs pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'ongs pa la mchod yon
dbul bar bya'o// de nas de re bkas bsgo ba ci zhig bgyi zhes zer ro// 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// chung ma mdzod cig ces so// de nas des smras pa/ de bzhin bya'o zhes sgrub pa po lag pas

bzung nas rang gi gnas su 'gro bar byed cing/ bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do// lha'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag ltar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tsho'achi ba de'i tshobram ze'i rigs su skye
070 bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran ba yang 'gyur ro// chog de nyid kyis ba ser skya'imar gsarapa la gzugs bar n byas nas/ ras ris kyi spyan sngaragatub cing sbyin sreg bya'o// ji srid gnod sbyin mo
byung ba'i bar du'o// chog 'di nyid kyis nyon ngan dmar po las byung ba'i gzugs brnyanabyas nas/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te muklung du gzhug go/ skad cig da
nyid la gzugs bzang po'iganod sbyin mo'ong zhing 'dod pa thoms cad rab tu sbyin par 'agyur ro// namA'i shing las byung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi gnod sbyin mo byed du bcug
nas rimo mkhanagaso sbyong can gyis kha dog ma 'dres pa'i chon gyis 'dzAr gzhug par bya'o// ring bsreladang bcas pa'i mchod rten du tshogs gtor ma dang mar me'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/

de nas sgrub pa pos rnam par dben par sbyongs pa'i snod dang gos kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drang bar bya sta/ mchod yon dang gdan phul nas slar yang gsheg su kasol te/ risId du gnod sbyin mo
rang nyid kyi gzugs kyis gsal bar byed bzhin pa ma tog gi 'phrang ba byas nas 'ong bar byed de/de srid du bzlus par bya'o// de snyab dang denas sgrub pa pos chung ma mdzod cig ces brjod par bya'o//
denas rab tu 'dzum pa bzhin rgyas sgrub pa po la ma tog gi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed do// rang gi lag pas bzung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'grolor byed do// bcud kyis len sbyin par byed do//
0 @#// skad cig de nyid la lha'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang po rab tu mdzes par gyur ro// de'i lhan cig rolaparabyed cing dga' mgur longs su skyod par byed
do lo stong phrag ltar 'tsho bar byed de/ lha'i tshoro// gang gi tsho'achab de'i tshonor chen po'i rigs sa skya bar 'gyura'o// rab tu mdzes ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba
dang longs spyod chen po rang/ nor chen po dang/ 'dod pa chen po dang/ snying rjecan dang/ thams cad sbyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus chen po skye ba dran pa'o// gnod sbyin mo'i le'u rdzogs so//
pad+ma'i mtshor song na sgrub pa pos dpal mo 'ongs kyi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o// ru rta dang/ rgya spos dang/ pad+ma'i sa bon dang/ pad+ma'i ga sar rang/ tsan dan sbrang rtsis lhan cig btag
par bya'o// gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// rtsa ba'i sngags kyisame tog gi 'khru ba la yongs su bzlas te gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rtsal byed par 'dod bas rtan cing 'brel

bar 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi mchod rten sprod du mchod rten phyi ma rab tu g.yo bar byed pa de sude du bya'o// de nas las kyi sgrib pa zad par byas nas mtshams med pa lnga byas bas kyang 'grub par 'gyur
te rnam pa gzhan du ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sgrub par 'dod n kha tshar ma bcad pa'i
00 ras skra dang bral ba la kha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyis par gsar pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phagasal stunaras gzigs dbang phyug gser ltar sar ba/ ral pa
'phyang ba/ 'od dpag med dbu la'adzani pa/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba 'drir gzhugakhar bya'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po slos phoralag na thogs pas pus mo gnyis btsug
ba 4 byang chub sems dpa' la nges par rtog bzhin pa'o// de nas rig pa 'dzan pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te ras ras kyi spyan sngar tim re re zhing rgyun mi 'chadapa'i
mchod pa dang/ gtor ma dang/ mar me'ang ja srid zla ba nyapa'i bar du bya'o// zla ba nyal mchod pa rgya chen po dang/ gtor ma dang/ mar ma'ang byas nas smon lam gdab par yang bya ste/ sangs
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpar thams cad la phyag bya ba byas nas/ mAl ti'i ma tog gas yongs su bkang ba'i dri'i chu'i snod lag pa gnyis kas blangs nas pus mo gnyis btsugs te rtsa ba'i
sngags lan bdun brjod nas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang bar bya ste/ mchod yon dang gdan phul nas slar yang byabs te bsar skyarimaral btags pa'i mA la ti ma tog sbyin sreg bya'o// lha
rnams tsham par byed pa byas nas bsrung ba byas pa ku sha'i khris la nye bar 'dug ste/ nga rgyal dang bral ba mi skya bsagayo babcom ste/dran pa mchog gis dmags par byas la/ ji srid 'phags
00 @#// pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang nyidi yarol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba byon pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems dpa' chen po khyonapa dang/ sa
g.yo bar ng/ ri rtsa mo nyal ba dang/ soms can thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang/ lha thams cad me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs par byed pa dang/ rig pa 'dzan ba thams
cad kyang tsan dan gyi phyi ma'i char 'bebs pa dang/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams rin po che chen po'i char rab tu 'bebs pa dang/ lham yin thams cad uta la'i char rab tu 'bebs par byed do//

drag bo thams cad khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa rnams kyang skad cig dal bde ba skyes te mchog tu 'jigs pa sna bar byed do// dri za rnams glu snyan pa'i sgra thos par byed do/ rig pa 'dzin
pa thams cad kyang rang gi rig pas yongs su bskor te/ ji ltar rnam par 'phrul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do// log 'dren thams cad rung/ bgags thams cad dang/
srin bo thams cad dang/ yi dgas thams cad dang/ ji srid du drag po sna tshogs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' byon pa mthong nas zhi ba'i sems su gyur to// sbyin las gu lu ku lu'i sgra sgrogs pa

dang/ sa rnam ba drug tu g.yo ba dang/ phyogs bzhi skyong ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar byed do// leg khara'aren pa thams cad dang bgegs thams cad 'ong ste phyogs bzhi rab tu zhi
bar 'gyur ro/ rlung 'gro ba dang/ drag po rab tu 'gro bar byed/ dusam yin pa shing la ma tog tu 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzan pa thams cad 'ong ste/ phyogs gang du rig pa 'dzan ba sgrub
pa byed pa der sems dpa' chen po'i dga' ston la thams cad nyade 'dusaso// sgrub pa pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong nas mchod yon phul nas phyag bya'o// lha thatshes
cad dang/ rig pa 'dzan pa thams cad la mchod yon dang gdan phul nas/ de naso lhathams cad dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis sgrub pa bo byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byon te/
srid pa gsum gyi chu bo chen po las bsgral bar byas pa de rnams nges par rgyal ba kun tu snang bsamanan pa byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang lkon cig 'tsho ba'o// danas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug gis lha thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag g.yas pa sgrub pa po'i spyi bor myug par mdzad do// de 'chi ba med pa mdzad do// de nas sgrub pa pos gang
yidal stang po bsams pa der gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang/ rig ba'adzan pa'i rgyal po lha nyid dang/ lha nyid gang 'dod pa da rnams chos gzhan du snang sta/ 'di skad ces brjod
parabya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug glo'adzan de mthong bar 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dbas skyes bu chen po phyag g.yas pas bzung ste ragi pa'i rgyal po rta mgrin
la yang dag bar gtad par gyur to// gru 'dzin du song zhig/ gang 'dod pa de sbyin par gyur ro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa'i rgyal po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba dang bcas
pa sgrub pa po'i lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas rgya mtsho'i dbus su lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa

sgrub pa po'i rig pa'i tshogs la me tog gi char 'babs pa dang/ rdzabo che dang/ rdzapa Ta ha dang/ rdzad ng/ rdza khagag pa dang/ rdzo cha rnams sgra'abyin bzhin du gruradzan du 'gro bar byed do// rgya mtsho'i

stong der rgya mtsho chen po rig pa'i rgyal posa mthong nas/ skyes bu dam pa de'ang chu klung thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i rin po che'i mchod yon rab tu stsol bar byed par 'agyur ro// legs so zhes
bya ba'ang gnang bar mdzad do// rigs kyi bu legs so legs par 'tsho ba dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas so// de nas rgya mtsho
chen po bsgral nas gru 'dzin du song ste mthong ba dang/ der gang rig pa 'dzan pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri dang/ lha mayon dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am cad ng/ lto 'phye
chan bo rnams thams cad mchod yon gyi snod kyi ma tog gi char chen pos sgrub pa po la bsu ba la 'ong bar byed do// de nas gru 'dzin mthong nas sna tshogs pa'i nor bu dang snyan gyis bskus pa/ mu
tag gi do shal rab tu 'phyang bzhin pa/ gser dang shalalas byung ba dang/ bi zlum+malas byung ba dang/ in+d+ra nIl las byung ba dang/ mthon ka chen po las byung ba'i thim skas dang/ snam bu rnams
kyis sna tshogs pa'i ma tog nyabaramadzes pas rig pa'i rgyal bo dang/ sgrub pa po de la mngon par dbang bskur ba byas nas/ sgrub pa po la smras pa/ gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags
ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas rin po che sna bzhalas byung ba/ khang ba dbus mar ji srid byang chub kyi bar du rang gi gzhas bzhin du kun tu spyod cing gnas so// de nas rig pa 'dzazhi
ba'i rgyal po la mngon par dbang bskur te/ rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu bgrod par gyur to// 'di na dngos grub sta/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i mthu rnam par bsgyings pas mtshams med pa
byed pas kyang 'di 'grub par byed do// rtamagrin rgyal pos/ rig pa'i rgyal bo thams cad la snas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga gnas rin po che/
bzhi las byung ba/ dbus ma'i khang par rang gi gnas bzhun ngugazhi la gnas pa'i rig pa sgrolam dang/ khro gnyer can dang/ gzhan rig pa thams cad pha rol gnon pa chen po'o// ragi
ba'i rgyal po 'di ni makh+k+rasgrubs pa nyid du las thams cad byed de gtan pa gcod par byed pa dang/ hU~Myig gis rgya mtsho skamasapar byed pa dang/ sor mo'i sdogs mdzub kyis thams cad
rengs par byed pa dang/ o yig gis 'gugs par byed pa dang/ phaT yig gis lhun po rnams kyang rnam par 'joms par byed pa dang/ yid kyi bzlos pas sems can thams
cad dbang du byed pa dang/ o yig gis spyanarAng ba dang/ hU~M yig gis gshegs su gsol ba dang/ phaT yig gis gsod pa dang/ sAnA'i yigis ratshobar byed pa sta/ mdor na rig pa rnams kyi

cho ga ji snyed yod pa de thams car ragi pa 'di nyid kyis 'dzagadon dang 'jig rten las 'das pa bsgrub par bya'o// 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi chogazun mong ba ste/ gangal cho ga med pa dang sdig pa byed
bas kyang lan gsum du bzla'o// rta mgrin rag pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa chen po 'di lan gsum gyis mtshams
mad pa byed pas kyang 'grub par byed do// dad pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa chen po dang/ snying rje'i bdaganyid can/ gar sna med pa dang/ byas pa gzo ba dang/ sangs rgyas

dngachos la mngon par dang ba dang ma dang ba dang/ ma dang phar shes pa dang/ myurab kho narab zod pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ sbyin pa sbyin par byed lamakhasgrubs par yang 'grub par byadad/ mdor na
las thams cad pa 'di brjod nas rig pa gcod par 'dod pa dang/ sol bar 'dod pas 'di brjod nas te/ 'di ni las thams cad pa'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par gzhan

gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta sta/ rig pa'irgyal po sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rdzogs pa'i ched du rta mgrin rgya lapo'imagul du'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthu rnam par bsgyings pa zhes
bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so//de nas 'od dpag med mthong bar 'dod na kha tshar ma bcad cing sku dang bral ba'iras la/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can gyisakha dog ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis
