bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phags pa 'od dpag med gsar ltar sar ba/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'drare gzhug par bya'o// 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo'i gzhogs g.yon ru rtamagrin rgyal bo zhal
rnam par 'gyur ba/ 'jigs par byed pa/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ mdamar ser 'bar ba'aphro bzhin pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i chod phyir thogs pa can lag 'gro'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ral pas/
'od dpag med 'dzan pa/ sor mos log par 'dren pa la sdigs par byed bzhin pa/ de'i rgyab nas log par 'dren pa 'bros par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yas kyi gzhogs su rnam par brgyan pa sbyangs pa'i
snod dang/ gos dang phyag g.yasapa sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin par mdzad bzhin par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gsar ltar sar ba/ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba'i dbus su 'od
dpag med mgo bos ra dzan par byed pa/ pha rol gnon pa'o// 'od dpag med kyi snying gi sbyin de la sprin gseb nas gnas gtsang mam tog rab tu 'thor bzhin pa 'drar gzhug par bya'o// bcom
ldan 'das kyi pad+ma de'ang glu gzhon nu rnams kyis 'dzin pa'o// 'og tu lag na skos phor thogs pa'i sgrub pa po pus mo gnyis jatsugs pa/ 'od dpag med la rnam par lta
bzhin pa'o// rima'i las yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sgrub pa pos gtor ma dang/ mar ma dang/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ zla ra nyal mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas pas sbyangs pa'i
snod dang gos 'di nyid kyis rig pa'i rgyal bo rtamagrin bkug nas mchod yon phul te sgrub pa dang/ slar yang gshegs su gsol te/ ba ser skya'i mar dang/ pad+ma'i sa bon dang na ga ge sar rnams
gtsagi tu byas nas/ zhim bdun du sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nga nas rig pa 'dzin pas lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas ku sha'i khres la nye bar 'dug pas smon lam gdab par bya ste ji srid dus
rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yo ba dang/ mar ma'i rtse mo 'phel ba dang/ sman las gu lu gulu'i sgra sgrogs pa dang/ ma tog gi char rab tu 'bebs pa dang/ tsan dan gyi phyi ma'i char 'bebs ba dang/
phril bu'i sgra thos pa de srid du bzlas bar bya'o// nga nas rig pa 'dzin pas rangs pa ranges par bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po brtson 'grus chen pos rol gnonapa rtamagran rig pa
thams cad kyis sgrub pa sal 'ongs pa de srid du'o// de nas sgrub ba bos ma tog dkar po dang dri'i chus yongs su bkang ba'i snod kyis mchod yon phul nas smon lam gdab bo// 'di skad ces
smras so// khyod legs par 'ongs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pa'i ched du slar yang legs par 'ongs so// rtamagrin 'di ni brtson 'grus chen lo
stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod ba'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ pus mo btsugs
nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// khyod la snang bar gyur pa gang yon ba de rnams lhan tsag 'tshalayo// danas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag g.yas pa
sgrubal po'i spyi bor smyugapar mdzad de/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// skyes bu dam pa brtson 'grus chen po stobs dang pha rol gnon la khyod kyis gang brtson 'grus chen pos pha rola gzhon pas
rig pa'i rgyal po bsgribs la legs so legs so// khyod cag gis mngon para'adod pa smosashage/ mchog sbyin par bya'o// 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba
can du 'gro bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od dpag med de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su'o// de nas btsem ldan 'das
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag g.yas pa brkyang sto/ sgrub pa bo phyag g.yas pas bzung nas rta mgrin rgyal po la yang dag par gatad par gyur to// rig pa'i rgyal po chen
po skyes bu dam pa 'di bzung nas me tog gi char rab tu 'bab pa'i bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig/ gang du de bzhin gshags pa 'od dpag med bcom ldan
'das kyi 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa der sdod du bcu gnas / slar yang gru ra dzan gang na ngayod pa derashog cig/ de nas rta mgrin rig pa'i rgyal pos sgrub pa po bzung nas me tog gi char
rab tu 'bebs pa'ibade ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sgrub pa po la sbas pa/ skyes bu dam pa ro bzhan gshags pa 'od dpag med de byang chub sems dpa' rnams l chos ston pa la
ltos shig ltos shig/ de nas rig pa'i rgyal bos der sdod du bcug nas/ slar yang 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug gis gru 'dzan der 'ong bar mdzad do// da nas sgrub pa po 'jig rten
gyi khams der 'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi drung du chos nyan no// dngos grub 'di ni gnas ma yin pa rnams la gang sbyar bar mi bya sta/ gang zhig byed nu d mchog las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod
sa mchog gi sgrubapa rnams l 'di gnas pa mayin pa rnams la rab tu ma sbyor te/ de'i dam tshig med do// las de rnams thams cad rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byed du gzhug go/ thal bas thal ba'i
rab 'i sgron ma gsum gyis ma'irab 'o// chul lon bdun mngon par bsngags pas nam mkha' bcing ba'o// yungs kar dkar pos sa gzhi bcang ba'o// til gyi sbyin sreg gis log par
'dren pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// sa tsho'i sbyin sreg gis yi dwags dang sha za thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ka ra wI ra ma tog gi sbyin sreg gis khro boThams cad 'grub par byed do// ma
tog thams cad tshaba'i til mar gyis btags pa'i sbyin srog gis 'jig rten pa'i rig pa'irgyal po thams cad dbang du'agyur ro// d+harU'i sbyin sreg gis dbang phyug chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/ pi
yang ku'i me tog dang/ mA la ti dang/ so ga/ ka dang/ gu gul ba ser skya'i mar dang lhan cig tu byas nas sbyin sreg byed na/ rig pa thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
dri wi dang/ lham yin dang/ mi ram tsa dang/ rkang gnyis dang/ rkang bzhi pa thamasadabang du byed do// gi'u wang la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nasab+baMg le byas te/ mchobs
dad par za bar byed pa dang/ tha snyad las rgyal bar byed do// sngar brjod pa'i cho gas ba ser skya'i mar blangs nas lus la mngon par byugs te mar rab tu 'jug par byed do/ sang ldengalas byung
ba'i rdo rje blangs te/ hUMyig dang lhan tsag pas phug gi sgor lha ma yin gyi bu mo byung ba dang/ rab tu zhugs pa la 'khor lo'i 'jigs pami'abyung po// gal te 'khorale rab tu 'jug bar byed na
dmatshig dran pas hUM yig gi phung pos 'khoralo phyi mar byas par 'gyur ro/ gdo nas ril bu'i sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rig pa'i dzan pa ralapra sgrubapar byed pas tshanadanadamar po
dang ma togapa dang/ brlags r dang/ 'bras sA la dmar po'i thul ma dang/ gaNika'i myu gu dang/ DAka'i sa bonadang/ 'bru dang/ ma sha'i myu gu dang/ ru rgyu/
dang rgya skos dang/ tu ru ka'i til mar rnams gtsagi tu byas te/ cha mnyam pa gcig tu byas nas rgyud mtshungs pa'i kha sor skya'i mal gso sbyong can gyis sar skya de la rnam par dben par rtsa ba'i
sngags su bzlas nas khyim du btagasate/ legs par btsags rimUla mngon par bsngags nas nyim bdun du spyad par bya'o/ khyim du 'am rnam par dben pa'i phyogasasurang rang ste/ de nas

bsrung ba byas pa'i pa lang ga rdza ris pa bzho bar bya'o// de nas ngo ma de dag gtsang ma'i phyogs rnam par dben par bum pa la bzlas par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas bram ze'i bu mo'i lag pas srub
bar byed du gzhug go/ mar des rdzas 'di rnams btags pa byas te/ lcags gsum gyis yongasasu dkris pa byas nas/ de'ang ba ser skya'i ba byung lngar ril bu mtshan mo gtsag tu bcu gnas gzhag
par bya'o// de nas bton nas dri'i tshul gzhag par bya'o// bkrus te brla 'dab maragi'u wang gis phyugs la gzhag par bya'o// de nas ras ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzha gnas srung ba'itsho
ga byas pas gtor ma dang mar ma dang/ mchod pa'i chogargya chen po byas taM/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pas lag pa gnyis kas pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams kyi ril bu brgyad blangs te par kha sbyor du bzhag
0 nas ba ser skya'i mar de nyid mA la ti'i ma tog dang gcig tu byas nas srog blugs ban sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lha spyan drang ba byas nas/ 'phags pa spyanaras
gzags dbang phyug gi spyan sngar ji srid du rub b.labar byed pa dang 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o/du ba'i zul bzhan pas mi snang pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ nam mkha'
la 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/nyima'achar ka dang mtshungs pa'i 'od kyi rig pa 'dzin pa mchanaThams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan tsag rtsa
bar byed/ dga' bar byed do// lo stong phrag ltar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gi tsho'achib de'i tshe rgyal rigs kyi khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis
pad+ma'i sa bon dang/ paN+Dita ka ra'i sa bon dang/ tu ru sa dang/a ka ru nag po dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ so gaN+DU ku dang/ ma la ma tog dang/ gur kum dang/ ldong ros
dang gi'u wang rnams ba ser skya'i ba byung lngas gzhon nu ma gso sbyong can dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pas btag par bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzan pas phra yang ku'ishing blangs nas khang pa brtsig
kha gtsang mar shang bzo ba gso sbyong can byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'i lag pas zam tog byed du gzhug go/ za ma tog der ril bu nyishu rtsa gcig bcug
nas ras risakyi spyan sngar mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ gtor ma'ang phul nas dzam tog blangs te gos gtsang ma g.yogs nas mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas
lpa bas rig pa'i lha rnams spyanadrang bar byas nas/ srid du rlobar byed pa dang/ du ba 'thul bar byed ba dang/ 'bar bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// dro bzhin pa la dbang du byed pa dang/
ma snang bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'khrul bzhin pa la rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu'i mchog gcig go/ 'bar bar byed pa ni rig pa 'dzan pa drug dang lhan cig 'gro ste/ rig pa 'dzan pa'i bu mo rnams
kyis yongs su bskor nas lhun po'itsamorartse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgurayongasasu spyod par byed do// lo stong phrag lngar 'tsho bar byed do// gang gitsho'achib de'itshonor
chen bo rnams su skyabar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran pa yang 'gyur ro// 'di nyid kyis mag sman ljongs sgrub par byed do// dkarapo bco lnga la dpa' bo'i rin gyis nyos pa'i gi'u wangablangs nas
mtshan mo gcig tu skyung bar gnas las/ nyim gung la bram ze'i bu mo gso sbyong can gyis pad+ma'i 'dabamosab ser skya'i 'o mas btags par bya'o// ras ras la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ ras
ris zhal nub tu phyogs par bzhugs nas srung ba'i chog byas pas rang gi lha rnams spyan drang ba byas te/ mchod yon dang gdan phul nasapri yang ku'i ma togadang ba sar skya'i 'o mas srog blugs
bdun sbyin sreg rgyas shag/ lha rnams tshim par byed pa byas nas slar yang lca de rnams mdun du pad+makhasbyor du ral bu bcug nas/ ji srid du du ba 'phrul ba dang/ dro bar byed pa dang/ 'bas/
bar byed pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// drobazhinapa la nathig le byas pa'i bo thams cad dga' bar 'agyur ro// nga ba 'khrul bzhin pa lanamasnang bar 'gyur ro// rab tu 'bar bas thig le/
byas na rig pa 'dzan pa drug gis yongs su bskor ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams kyis lhan cig rtse bar byed do// gang gi tshe'ameb de'i tshe nor chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dran
par yang 'gyur ro// til gyi sbyin sreg byas shag dakladabang du 'gyur ro// 'dangasha'i sbyin sreg gyis shig/ yi dgas dbang du 'gyur ro// mA la ti'i ma tog gi sbyin sreg byed na/
lha mo chus byung dbang du 'gyur ro// pri yang ku'im tog gi sbyin sregagyis shig/ lha dbang du 'gyur ro// so gnu ka'i sbyin srag byed na gnod sbyin dbang du 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po la
lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas gang gi spyi bor byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa dang/ rimasaM kyis btab pa dang/ srin pos zin par Mmadun du sku tshel lan bdun mngon
par bsngags pas sbyin sreg byed cing/ de'i thal bas snyan par byed na grol bar 'gyur ro// rtamagrin rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo 'dirang rdzogs so/
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu bskyis pa/ 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zams car du 'gyur ba de 'byung ste/ rig pa'irgyal po gang la chog
med pa de rnams chag 'di nyid kyis sgrub pa dang/ rtog pa'i rgyal bo de nyid kyis thams cad byas to/ mdor na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i ng lan gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs
kyi bu gang dad pa dang ldan pa/ ser snumadapa/ g.yo med pa/ phram med pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po la gus pas gung rtog pa pa la mchod par byed pa dang/ klog par byed pa dang/ kha ton
byed pa dang/ gzhan la ston par byed pa dang/ sar sna med par gyur nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dag ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yongs su than pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang/
dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'o// ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar rta mgrin rgyal por tshog zhib mo'o// sla rayang dus de nas shar gyi phyogs kyi chanas mngon par dgar
ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sgrol ma mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gzhal bar bya ba dang/ bgrang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs kyis skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gsang sngags thob pa gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bzhugs pa gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di nyid du 'ongs nas/ ji ltar byung ba'i pa'i la/danal gnas pa de rnams kyang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa'
chen bo ji ltar 'phel ba'i stobs dang sgrub pas pad+ma'i gdan de la bzhugs so// de lta bu la sogs pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed bzhugs pa de rnams skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyisagling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'o// de nas mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa'i ri bzhin gsheg
pa de rnams rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud phyi ma'adrar/ bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stags kyi spyod pa laso sor rjes su yid rang ba'i ched dang/ bsrung ba dang/
bskyab pa dang/ sba ba'i ched dang/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i char dang/ bcom ldan 'dasam 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dngos grub kyi ched du bsod nams kyi stobs kyis bsgrub/
ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs// na mo rat+na tra yA ya nam ako rlu ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ rotso
ni ri tsani/ dro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ tAsan sanaM/ pra ti han pra ti han/ sarba mapa raM pa rA NisA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yAya/ na mash+tsaN+NasArU yA ya tathA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te/ samyaka saM/
bud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+he mati/ tsan+d+ra ka ra Ne/ melAmi lA/ bud+d+ha a d+hiShita/ si li si li/ d+harma/ a d+hiSh+ThataM/ ki li ki li/ saM g+ha a d+hiSh+Tha
ti sAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa 'di'i mtshan 'dzan par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa bskal par brjod de yid la byed par 'gyur ba de
rtag tu bskal ba stong phrag bzhi bcur 'tsho bar byed do// skya ba dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems ma brjod pa thob par 'gyur ro// na mo ratA tra yul/ nam pul+laka ta pe/ dbag
tAya ad+ha te samyakasaMbud+d+hAya/ tad+ya thA/ puphu pasung pusu pasAt+tA/ gzungs 'di me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te cho ga ji lta ba dang/ 'du
shesaji lta ba bzhin du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rab tu gtor bar bya'o// de'i mngon par 'dod pa thams cad yongasasu rdzogs pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pathams cad zad
par 'gyur ro// na mo rat+tatrayA ya/ na maH sam+b+hanaM ba ra Na/ bkaMb+hin ta wA ga ta ya a te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ spu Ta spu Ta/ spu Tazlum/ sam+b+hapA pAnaM/ sa
bud+d+ha sat+ya na/ d+hamasarkyen/ saM g+hasat+ya na/ inasate na/ ba ru Nasacan/ ya lo ka sarkyen/ par Nasarkyen sarkyen sat+ya sa tsa na na ste tunu/ saMn+d+hAyApA na sarba bud+d+ha ad+hi ne na
0 sAhA mtshan mo nyi'u tsu gcig gis las thams cad zad par byed do// nyin mo dang mtshan mo gsum byas nas drug tu rab tu sbyorab sa mtshams med pa nges par thod par byed do// na mo rat+na tra
lAyaM na mo ba ro tsa nAya/ tathA ga ta ya/ argate/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma A kA sha gan+d+hAya/ bo ng+hisatAya/ ma hAsatwA ya/ ma hA kA ru NikAya/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/
budraguru/ be ro tsa na/ rasmi sany+tsed de/ A gats+tsha Ar+ya A kA sha gats+tsom hA kA ru Nika/ pU ra yaM/ shu b+hodareya bud+d+ha bi yaM tsar tsar/ tsi ri tsi ri sAhA/ 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad
kyi snying bo zhes bya ba'i gzungs bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ skyug pa dang/ rgyun po dang/ dug rang/ dugakhartan pa dang/ byad stams dang/ rgyal po dang/ chom rkun la sogs pa
rnams gnon par byed do// gang du bros pa gzhas pa 'am/ mgo dang lag pas 'chang bar byed pa de la nye bar 'tsho ba dang/ nad 'go ba thams cad mi 'byung ngo// 'di rtag tu bzlas pas dril
mad pa'i ting nge 'dzin so sorarnyed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo po ro tsa na ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma A kA sha gam+b+haya/ bo d+hisatwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA
badzaspu badzawA/ badzra d+hAdze/ shAcu dA pra desho/ be ro tsanagasany+tsa an+ti yasho d+hani swA hA/ chog ni rtag tu bzlas pas 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas so sor rnyed do//
klu bdud thams cad dang/ phyir rgol ba thams cad dang/ dgra thams cad dang/ bgag dang legapar 'dren pa thams cad kyisazub dka' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gang
bris nas lag tu ratshang bar byed pa de la'ang yon tan 'di rnams so// na mo rat+na tra yAya/ nam sats+tshadurga ti pa risho d+hAya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arma te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/

go d+ha ne sho d+han/ san+d+ha pA paM bi sho d+ha na 'du bshud+d+hasarba karma a ba rtsa ba shud+d+hA sAnA/ gzungs 'di'i tshig ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sangs
rgyas kyis byin gyis rlabs pas skyo ba zhi'i btsan 'gyur ro// ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su zad par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// namo rang tAAya/ na mo
b+ha ga wa te Ar+ya pradzApA ra mi tAyaM/ o ti/ taM/ bi dza ya swA hA/ 'dabazung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho gan 'phagasam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
ba'i glegs bam bzhugs nas/ de'i mdun du sa la malhung ba'i ba mir skya'i ba cung gas dkyil 'khoranye bar zhugs te/ nyin mtshan du srung bar gnas pas gnas der mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas/
ba'i mar gyi maram phul te capa yid la dran par gyur pas gdon par bya'o// de nyid du ku sha btang nas gsar gyi kha dog ga re bzhin gshegs po'i sku mthong ngo// de 'di la yang dag pa ji lta babazhin
00ston par byed do// kho rangasasam mchin mo nyid du'ang rung ste/ tshig tu gdon par bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// namo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
bo d+hi satA ya/ mahAsatA ya/ ma hA ka ru NikA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rdzaya dzaye/ ma hA dza ye/ dzayarA hAn/ phal ut+tar/ ka la ka la/ malam la/ tsal tsal/ mulu gulu/
k+khi NiNi/ saT+Thakarma A ba ra NAnaM/ ma bi sho d+ha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ sa hasU/ Abarta/ san+d+ha bud+d+ho a ba lo ki ti/ tsaklu/ grotra/ sgyu Na/ dza hA/ kA ya/ mno ba bi dzA na/ sho d+hanaM/

su rusu ra/ phra su ra pra su ra/ sam+b+ha bud+d+ha/ a d+hahi sAhA/ d+hamad+ha tu gan+d+hesAgA/ A b+hA ba sam+bad+harmaa bi b+ha nga na sAhA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ mtshan mo gcig tu rjes su
dran par byas nas rtag tubazlas pas bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i ng zad par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas stong gis nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa stong gi
'khorab las phyir phyogs par byed do// skya la brjes te lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rgyal sradi dam yongs su dag pa'isangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro nyim nyi shu rtsa gcagi
bzlas pas ji ltar 'dod pa'i rmi lama mthong bar byed do// 'di ni stong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs de yin/ phan yon chen po byang chub sems dpas yang dag par brjod pa'i mdo bklag par bya'o//
rtag tu yid la bya'o// na mo ratA tra yA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+hamaya/ na maH saM g+haya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rAya/ bod+hisatwA ya/ mthA satA ya/ A tAya/ shA

ta b+hu dzAya/ dA da sha b+hu dzaya a gis haM/ b+ha ga wan Ar+ya a ba lo ke shA rA ya/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA bud+d+hA/ Ar+yam nur/ bud+d+ha ma nu sgyur/ d+harmA satu ma nu sma ra/ saM g+ha sat+ya ma nu sma ra/
tad+ya thA/ na tun tu/ ki Ni ko NaM/ tu ru tu ra/ sbyoskyo/ ku ru ku ru/ sats+tsha saN+Dim sA d+hu yaM hi ri maro TaM TaM/ ninaM/ mams ba ri bA ra sa/ saM nA/ man bar sAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
'od dpag med kyis gzungs 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyi rtsa ba'i rig pa'i gzungs
'dan bklags pas grub pa/ ma bsgrubs par yang las rnams 'byung bste/ blo ba nyal gso sbyong can gyis nyin mtshan ngumyung bar gnas pa'i ng rung ngo// sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sngar byang chub

kyashing gsam rab tu sbyar nas hil nag po stong phrag khargyang sbyin sreg gyis shig/ de bzhin du nyim bdunangulan re 'am thun gsum du byas n rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du 'gyur rod mtshan mo/

gsum du smyung bar gnas pas yungs kar dkar po stong phrag brgyad sbyin sreg gyisashig/ phyogs sam cha bar yul gyi don du glog mkhar bdun gyi rtse mor song nas re re 'dzegs te/ nyim snga dro nas ji srid
phyi dro'i bar bzlus par bya'o// mtshams mang ba grol bar byed do// bu 'dod na 'o ma'i sbyin sreg gyis shase// mtshan thams cad yarag par rdzogs pa'i khye'u 'byung ngo// gzungs 'di nyid kyis bdag
nyid bsrung ba dang/ gzhan bsrung ba dang/ gnod bar gdon 'bros par byed pa la byabs pas sam/ rdzas su btsangs pas kyang rung ngo// yang na chom rkun thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rtag par
rgyun du zlos bzhin pa nanilatabarab sags par gyur zhing/ dgra rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bton gshegs pa 'od dpag mad kyis slar yang ral pa gyen brdzas kyi rgyud ci
maragazungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams gsungs pa/ na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmAya/ nam saM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ gul yul/ ba ma/nar ma le sho d+hAn/ Atsati/ mi rapa Ta la/

sats+tshAn ro ga bi na ga nod naM/ tsAd na/ pA ta sa mutitaM pA tus mu til+lataM/ shA/ satsIpA ta sa mut+tI taM sam+b+ha nA sha ni/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shu ra s+ya/ te dza zhan s+yAhU~M/ aki rog/ gzungs 'da'i cho
gna'ad yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rakyil 'khor byas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lag pa 'am ku sha la brgyad brgyar yongs su bsngags nas mig la khyab par bya'o// long bas kyang

mag so sor rnyed do// zla ba drug gis rtag tu dran par byed namag zha 'acung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gtsags dbang phyug dang/ gru 'dzi'i
klad na gnas pa'i 'khor chen po la legs par gathogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi chog

lar ni rtog pa'i rgyal pos rgyud phyi ma 'dir brjod pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'dasa'aphags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa pos rtag tu dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am dag bstan nam/
dag khasonams chos gos kyi rje ba'am/ gos kyi mtha' lamadud pa ca'o// gang la la zhigabcom ldan 'dasam sgrolam sgrub par byed pa des l cig brjod nas/ gsum gyi gos la bgos pas dgra rab ng du bama'agro

bar 'dod pa dang/ gdug pa thams cad rengs par 'dod pa dang/ dngos grub thams cad rtogasalama'adodapa dang/ don thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'adod pa dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par 'dod pa dang/

mamadza' ba rnam par 'joms par 'dod pa ci'irgyu dang/ de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can donathams car bya ba la rab tu 'jug pa 'dzin par byed do// de la yid la grub pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams ni

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/namo a mi tAb+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA yaM/ ahate/ samyaka saM zur ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ man+tas tAya/ rnam Ar+ya ma lha swA ma prab+ha ya/ bo d+hisatwA/ pA mnaM

tut+tA ma/ stami tAnA ma/ stami riman pishAtsi bats+tshasha wa ri pa na sha wa raM/ pishatsab+ha gabati/ pAshihasta/ b+hAran+tar Ni/ yA ni/ kAni/ ts+tshata/ b+hayani/ut+pa t+yan+te/ yaSh+Tha/ ri tAyo/ yAkaM hU~Mti/ma

[4/ ]hAbA d+ye/ me ka tsita// u pa dra dI/ ya ka tsita/ Ar+ya ba/// yo ka tsita/ u pa serga/ a u pas// sam+pan+nAdzA/ ut+yan+te/ sam+b+haNitAn/ sawAn+taM/ sarba te/ pA la tad+ha na/ a tun+ten/ paN+Di an

nasaton/ sat+ya dwa kon/ oM b+hi/ paN+Dita/ a d+hilIti rman+ta parormamarakaM ku ru pa ri tu NaM kur pa ri gra haM ku ru po ripAl naM kur/ sAsti yanaM ku ru ruN+Da pa riharaM ku ru/ shashu pa riharaM ku ra/ pa kho pa ri haraM ku ru

bat+tAr raNaM ku ru/ bi Sha nA sha NaM ku ru tad+ya thA/ amr-iti a sI targa mA 1 ma ram rasam/ pra sam/ u pas ma/ tunu/ ba tu nu/ tu le tu mu le/ mamasarmasahAnAny+tsarakiM ku ru swAhA/ 'di na ri khrod lo ma
can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ bzlas pa dang sbyin srag gis nad thams car dang/ gdon thams cad dang/tabar ratshab thams cad 'dzoms par byed do// 'di lta ste/ mi rnams l yams kyi nyi bar ratshob la
shing sha mi'i yam shing gis ma rab tu sbyar nas gang ba'i srog blugs stong phrag brgyad zun gsum du ji ltar nus pas sbyin sreg gyis shag/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras ga gis dbang phyug

la mchod pa byas nas rekhrod lem can la'ang bya'o// de bzhin las byas pas nyabara'atsho ba thams chung 'joms par byed do// ba lang gi bar ratshob la ba lang gi spu dang rus pas sbyin sreg bya ste/zhi bar 'gyur

ro ma ho'i nad thams cad la skadang rus pas nyim 'dun du sbyin sreg bya stazhi bar 'agyur ro// rgyu skar gyi gnod bal nyim bdun du 'oma'i sbyin sreg bya'o// dngos grub thams cad rtogs par 'dod pas nyim
wA tsargyu

klu rimasal srad bu bcing bar bya ste/rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// za ba dang sbyin sreg kyang bya'o/ gdon la bag zan las byung ba'i gzugs parnyan byas lalanabadun bzlas te nyim bdunanas grol bapa'i gyur ro// mig

nab lamig sman gyi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ nyi ma bdunagyisagrol lo// zhu bar 'dod pas duran+ta'i sbyin sregagyas shag/ zhi bar 'gyur// rgyas par 'dod pas yungs kar gyi spyo'i srog gyis shig/ rgyas par 'gyur ro/

rgyal bal shudag gi sbyin sreg gyis shig/ rgyal bar 'gyur ro// lan tshwalas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan byas nas sbyin sreg gyis shig/ dbang du 'gyur ro// sbrul gyi mche bas zinapa la yal 'dab kyi las so// sbrul wA

byung ba'i nyi ma bdun la dbang du byed do//'byung po dang sha za'i rgyas btab palalananyishur bzlasapa'i yungs kar gyis bsnan par bya ste/ rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// rtag tu bzlus pas skya bo thamacad dga' bar 'gyur ro//

rgyal bo'i pho brang du rajug pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdong la yongs su rdzusan gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi las thams cad la nyim bdun du sbyin sreg byang// mdor na tabar 'tsho batramasa'od 'dzom
]]parabyed do// snama'im tog gi sbyin sreg gis las thams cad byed do/ las thams cad la dang por gang ba'i srog blugs sbyin sreg gyis shig/ las thams cad la'ang las 'di nyid gyis shig ces bya'od
gso sbyong ban gyis bya ba'o// sems can thams cad lasams kyis dmigs pas sa las byung pa'i ka bal dang/ sol ka la brgyad brgyara mngon par bsngags par byas nas/ gzhon nu mas mdud pa brgyad brgya/

bya'o de nas de dri'i chus bkrus namashing la bzhag ste/de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du ma he rnams dang/ ra rnams dang/ phyugs rnams la chom rkun gyis nyebaparatshab la rab la bcing bar bya'o//

bum pa chus gang ba byas nas gtsang mas brgyad brgyar mngon par bsngags pa byas te nad pa'i da pal bcing bar bya'o// rang gi gnas su 'gyur ro// khyim du tshangs pa'i srin po dang sha lngas nye bar 'al rnams

la sbyin sreg gyis shig/ ji ltar nus pa'i gtor ma'i chog bya'o zhes te/ 'dane ri khrod lem can zhes bya ba'igazungs ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar gsungs pa byang chub sems dpar yang dag par barjod
pa rimado starang ngo/ slar yang dus de'i tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor phyagagayas

ba rab tu brkyang nas myug par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rin chen 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ 'di klog par byed pas 'grub par sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su yirang

las gsungs so// rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po phyi ma de la bsung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ spaba'i ched dang/ ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud khyim r bcom ldan 'dasam 'phagasam sgrol ma'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub byed
pa rtag tu byed du gzhug go/ blo gros dang ldan pas gang dge ba'ichos grangs la sa nas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pasasngags kyi tshog 'adit+tems paka bstsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/

namo d+harmAya/na maHsaM g+hA ya/namasapa/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ko TInAMnam tI ya/ pramu khAnaM/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hisatAnaM/nam samyag tA naM/ namasamyakA ti pan+d+hanaM/na mo amAhU~M/ zha monA gA mAnaM/ nams kr-i dwagAmIhUM/ nam

gro tA pan+d+hanaM/namo arnyataM/ma tu/ a pa ra dza ti sr-id yaM/mA brtayiny+tsamasamyakasaM bud+d+hA b+hAShita/ malo datad bag Nas+sah+phakarmu karaM/ shub+haM pa bi trastsab/ maM ga laM/ d+ha naM/ gu karaM/ shu ts+tsaM rak+Sha/ sgyu sa/

sat+tAnaM/ de bstsal pa ra dza tad yaM/ mA bltayi lcami sam+b+hapA pa/ prashamanaM/sarba am+bas naM/ snya[é ]/sarba tha hab ne shanI/ni huM dza ya/ ka ri bye Shashag spyi ba a pa ra dza tA ya kr-i t+yA/ nAyAnaMtso ba/rAdza/

ang+girib nA sha nIkr-ita kamaNi/ bo tA Do dusAb+hA pa a thasna tan de ba/dun ba/ gan+d+har/ yakA rakAs/ pan+d+hag/ rak+Sha/ ku jan+taman tuM samAn+tatsa/ ta dzanaM a hi kA/ dA tI ya ka dzArA tItAya kA/ tsatuT+Ta ke sbyo/ ra//

yaM bi'i ma dzar ma Nib TaM b+hat+taM ga raM tsobazlo tshu brdza yi pyadi yaM su dA na b+ha ba ta gan+d+honyayan+taya spyodA raka/ rit+tAmA la i yaM te lo'i phra ma ma ba ha te/ dza yamash+tsa/ kAmol pa tany+tsa/ shAkA mo la b+ha teshwayaM/ bi b+ha ho/

ra Na/ saM gra ha/ kyi bram rA te/ dza yaM/ a tra ba t+yaM/ phra bkA mi/ratAAl ti/ ba putaM/ dA ba tA lo kanAtha idzrasatanu pad+ma kaM/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+han ka rib phu la ka riya sha ka ri/ ban+d+he ka ra a yun te al ki bra sa ma ni

h+pha nanA r+ya ba b+hAdzAn khayaM ka ri/ sarba glo ha nak+ShatA/ bsha/ banam/ d+ha dzanan/ su tA dzazhan pa ri bA ra ba ts+tsha na ]a yun ni/ pra ti ka ri/ dzamAn/ stamAni/ a mo g+hagat+tikAny+tsan/mAl gra hAsomya/ ka ra Nisadz+dzAkA la kA

lAhA'i gra ha/bar da pu sha mnaM/ par tsaka/nitAr Nipa ra so mya stawA tsit+tanamalIka ra Ni/san+d+rapApa pra sha mnasawakil+lin shan sAhA/tsu'u tshu zhu/ tu tu/ mu tshu lu sAhA/ sam+b+hade ba a nu dzA ta swAhA/ sats+tshAnA ga saM

rak+Shi ta swAhA/ oM ri'aT han han phaT/ da ha da haya3/ba tsa pa tsa ya yo ba d+ha n+d+rin ba sha ma tsaSh+Thayan+ti/haha// kAkhorda kuwan+ti/ ka rayaMt+taM/ kr-i tany+tsa a b+hayAnu mo da nil+li pa paNasAhA/ ag+ni san+nAyAmi bo Ti sha sku ud kyi rtsor

sa rum+basarba byA d+hi ta tsan raM dza na yAm hU~MhUMphaT phaT swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'dab mas khrus byas te rin po che'i 'phrang bas rnam par bargyan pa las thams cad byed pa 'di ni rtag tu bsrung ba byed pa'o// de bzhin nyid

du'ang gro ga'i 'dab ma la bris pa ram gang du 'am/ der yang rung ste/ la la'ibagags srung ba dang/ bsod nams mchog dang/sdig pa dang/ drim 'joms pa dang/ g.yul du 'am/rtsod pa 'am/ thams cad du rgyal ba

sbyin zhing dge ba'o// gang 'di'i dzin pa la gopa zhi ba bris pa dang/ skyes pas rtag tu glog bde la'ajigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// klog pa dang 'dzin pa thams cad rtag tu srung bar byed do// gsang ba ba rnams kyis yong

su skyong bar byed do// choga'irgyal bo 'di rtag tu mthar byed pa ltar rin po chos spyasapali'aphreng ba stong du rnam par 'bar ba'i dpal gang yin pa da rig pa 'dzin par byed do// 'di la gdon de rnam par nyams par byed de//
nad rnams kyang mi phyung ngo// bu dang tshabo rnams kyang 'phel lo// khorab zang po can rnam par gnas so// rig pa 'din thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can la

yanapa'i don gyi ched dang/byas pa rnams khyad par du bsrung bar bya ba'i ched do// lha dang/ rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ d bzhi zhi nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas gzig

par mdzad do// dag kha'adzin rnam par 'phal pa rang/ sdig pa thams cad kun nas thad par 'gro ba dang/ rmi lam ngan pa rnams dang/ nyes par byas pa rnams las kyang grol te/'dare the tshom med do// ral pa gyen brdzas

kyi rgyud phyi ma'i gzungs so// de nas 'di las rgyud 'dirabyang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzags dbang phyug gi phyag rgyu'i mtshan nyid gsungs so// 'di lta ste/ gtsug phud dang/ go chadang/ ra ba dang/

snying po dang/ nya ba'i snying po zhes pa ste rnam pa lnga'o// rtsa ba'i reg palan drug cur bshad do// donathams cad sgrub pa de la drang por re zhagi ra ba ta dang/ ba Nika dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthar thug pa rnams so// masgor

chu khab kyi rnam pas sa larab tsar ba'i gung mo dang mthe borag tu bshad do// 'di ni 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gang ba'i phyag rgya'o zhes rnam par grags te/don thams cad sgrub pa'o// rig pa tshim par byed bal

mthob chung gnyis bsnun par bya ste/ rnam par chim par 'gyur ro// lhag par gnas la mthe bong gnyis ka khab kyi rnam pasaso sor g.yo bar bya sta/sA bo rnam par shes par bya'o// bstod pa kho na'i ming gis

000 so nya ba'i snying pol mthe bong gnyis 'di lta ste/zhang kho na'i khu tshur ro/ mthe'u chung lcags sgrog gi chu'i sgra'i dang/ sdigs mdzub kha phu ba khab tu byas ba 'din goma'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid de/ rtag tu bdag

nyid la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// sngags mdzub gnyis nges par btsirenas gung mo bkras te khab kyi rnam pas bsngogs pa 'danogatsug phud kyi phyag rgya'i mnam ste/bdag nyid kyis gtsug phud bcings pa'i dus

bu rab tu sbyar par bya'o// slar yang khu tshur bcings nas sdigs mdzub kha co ba khab kyi rnam ba sta/'di na bzlas pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// de lta bu khon yongs su gyur par sdigasamadzub khab kyi rnam pas ra

ba'i phyag rgya bya'o// khu tshurab cings nas sdigs mdzub gnyis lcags sgrog gi rnam pa sta/ mchanam 'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'o// gang pa mnyam pa la g.yas pa'i nang pa rab tu bzhag nas gar gyi sbyorabs

yongs su bskor bar bya ste/ gzhan du bskor nas lag pa gnyis las rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i las sbyar ro// dpral bar yapalas thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyur 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pa dang/ bzlas
ba'i dus dang/ nyal ba'i dus dang/ rnam pa gzhan ru'ang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gdon gyi las dang las thams cad la rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de/

bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas ral pa gyen brdzes kyi rgyud phyi mar spyan ras gzigs dabang phyug la rjes su brtse bas/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i don phyag rgya bcing ba gsungs so/
de la 'di rnyems yang dag sbyar byab// yamasan bde bar bya dang mkhas la phyag 'tshal ga/ rig gsum la yang thun mong phyag rgya//de rnams bar drangs ba phyug 'tshalaphyag rgyan//
g.yas ba'i sor mo'itshigs la chags kyi rtsomo kun// phyag rgya nyade nirjes su btungs par gyis shig dang// rtag tu gsol ba 'debs lagatsang mgasol 'debs pa'i/ phyag rgyud 'tshan khonarags pa sor mo yi

tshigs rnams chig su byas nas rjes su yi rang bya// mchod paThams can kho na gtsang mas rtag tu ni// mchod ba rtag tu rjes su yi rang byed ba dang// soramo rnams kyi bdud rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan rigs kyisartse

mthe bong snying po yang dag ldan//'di rnams rgyal yiniphyag ra'agyur// sor mo'i rtsa mo yang dag sbyarab gung mo dang/ mthe bong gnyis karagang du mi'agyur phyag smyu yis// bzlas bsa mchog sbyin yid kyi bak+kAs

pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams thams cad yang rangarang rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs pa'imtshan ma ston par mdzad bzhin pas slar bzhengs pa'i mchanama mdzad do//
de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khoras dang nam mkha' la gnas pa dang/ sems can rab tu 'gul ba dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dir rang 'gul bas skrag cing ma teg ginama'abab pa dang/ bar snang
laskyodapa'i 'byung po bas thams cad du 'gro ba'il/dug ba rab tu btulago// danas yang byang chub sems dpa' mathu chen thob kyis d bzhi nagshegs pa shAkyakhrub pal yongs su zhus pa

[@/ ]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming tsalags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa rigs kyi bu des na ralapa gyen brdzus zhes bya bayang zung zhig/ rtog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ spyan ras gzige

dbang phyug gis zhus pazhes byabarayang zung zhuge/ rig pa dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i mdo sde zhes bya bar yang zung zhage/ rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i le'urab 'byamAzhes bya bar yang zu zhagi/ thabs kyi spyod ba zhes bya

bar yang zung zhage/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad cesagasolato// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba btsem gyis de rnams yang dag par ldan par 'gyur/ chos du zhig gis lhags par gnas pa lagrwa

byams pa des gang chos bcus 'di lta bu mthong ba kho na ste/sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ pATha dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/nam mkha' lding dang/ mi
matsadang/ yi dgas lasogs pa rnams casekun bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang/gzungs mnyamapa'i sems zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ dag pa'i chos l kun tu gnas pas ji srid du 'dri bar
'gyur ba dang/ zisanas 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang/ glegs bam du gyur par byas nas mchodapar 'gyur ba dang/ tshod/ nadamad par ng/ dbang phyug dang/ bde ba phun gsum tshogs pama'agyur ba dang/ bde
'groraragro ba sta/ yon tanamang po nyid dang/ phan yon chen po nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs/ lha dang bcas pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ rig pa dang sngags chen po 'dus pa/ 'khor ba'ilarol/
tu song ba/ bdag gis kyang yang dag par rgyas radang/ mtshan mo dang/ nyin m dang/ zla ba dang/ lor bde ba'i ched du mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// ga ba
lhabcu'il salamadang grags pa 'phal nang yongs su rdzogs par gyur ro// ral pa gyen brdzasa'achang ba po dang/ khyim dugazhag pa dang/ rab tu byung ba rnams la'o// de skad cesabakar
stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasal yid kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ driwarab cas pa'ingajig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs la mngon ma dga' 'o// ral pa gyenakhardzas kyi rgyud phyi ma rdzogs so//[– ]/ 'dan thob napo a rtesha'i phyag dpa ra slob nas dka' thub chen
pos gdan drangs nas/ shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub gyis 'phar ba'i lo/ cho'aphrul chen po rta'i zla ba'i tshes bco lta la rdzogs par bsgyur ba'iyi ga pa/ lo tsa ba chen po de nyid kyi
zhabs drung du nye bar gnas pa/ shAkya'i dag skyobasod namAny+tsan sgrub kyis bgyis so// paN+NaM hal ma gtugs shing// dpadabayaM'agrel bam rnyed pas// sgra don leg par
gyurasridan// mkhas ba rnams kyis bcos par gsol//
